<s> pre-inaugural position </s>
<s> thus when premier khrushchev intimated even before inauguration that he hoped for an early meeting with the new president mr kennedy was confronted with a delicate problem </s>
<s> shortly before his nomination he had set forth his basic view about the problem of negotiations with the soviet leader in these words </s>
<s> the president had set for himself the task which he believed vital of awakening the u s and its allies to the hard and complex effort necessary to shift that balance </s>
<s> he did not want the effort weakened by any illusion that summit magic might make it unnecessary </s>
<s> he wanted time too to review the united states global commitments and to test both the policies he had inherited and new ones he was formulating </s>
<s> attitude flexible </s>
<s> at the same time the president took pains not to rule out an eventual meeting with the soviet leader </s>
<s> ideally he knew it should be preceded by concrete progress at lower levels </s>
<s> but mr kennedy saw value even in an informal meeting provided that undue hopes were not raised in connection with it </s>

<s> it dealt mainly with a broad range of east-west issues </s>
<s> but it also briefly suggested the possibility of a meeting with mr khrushchev before the end of the year if the international climate were favorable and schedules permitted </s>
<s> developments over the next two months however caused the president to reconsider the question of the timing </s>
<s> there were intense discussions in the inner councils of the white house about the advisability of an early meeting not because the international climate was improving but precisely because it was deteriorating alarmingly </s>
<s> deadlock on tests </s>
<s> the president was especially concerned about the deadlock in the nuclear test ban negotiations at geneva </s>
<s> in the u s strong pressures have been building up for a resumption of tests on grounds that the russians may be secretly testing </s>
<s> mr kennedy was less troubled by that possibility than by the belief that a geneva breakdown or even continued stalemate would mean an unchecked spread of nuclear weapons to other countries as well as a fatal blow to any hope for disarmament </s>
<s> there was reason to believe that premier khrushchev was also concerned about a possible spread of nuclear weapons particularly to communist china </s>
<s> the question arose as to whether a frank discussion of that danger with the soviet leader had not become urgent </s>
<s> moreover moscow appeared determined to apply the tripartite veto principle to the executive organs of all international bodies including the u n secretariat and the international control commission for laos </s>
<s> mr kennedy was convinced that insistence on the demand would make international agreements or even negotiations impossible </s>
<s> developments in cuba and laos also suggested the advisability of an early summit meeting </s>

<s> the outlook </s>
<s> the announcement last week of the forthcoming encounter produced strong reactions in the u s of both approval and disapproval </s>
<s> the approval did not arise from an expectation of far-reaching agreements at vienna </s>
<s> the inclination was to accept the statement that there would be no formal negotiations </s>
<s> but those who were in favor of the meeting felt that a frank exchange between the two men and an opportunity to size one another up would prove salutary </s>

<s> apart from the personal equation another reason advanced in favor of the meeting was that too often in the past the us appeared to have been dragged reluctantly to the summit </s>
<s> premier khrushchev has made propaganda capital out of that fact and in the end got his summit meeting anyway </s>

<s> disapproval of the meeting was based largely on the belief that the timing could hardly be worse </s>

<s> there are so my biologist friends tell me mechanisms of adaptation and defense that are just too complete and too satisfactory </s>
<s> mollusks are a case in point </s>
<s> the shell which served the strain so well at a relatively early stage in the evolutionary scheme tended to cancel out the possibility of future development </s>
<s> though this may or may not be good biology it does aptly illustrate the strength and the weakness of american catholic higher education </s>
<s> there can be no doubt that the american catholic accomplishment in the field of higher education is most impressive our european brethren never cease to marvel at the number and the size of our colleges and universities </s>
<s> the deeper wonder is how this miracle was accomplished in decades rather than in centuries and by immigrant minorities at that </s>
<s> by way of explanation we ourselves are prone to imagine that this achievement stems from the same american catholic zeal and generosity which brought the parochial school system into existence </s>
<s> there is however one curious discrepancy in this broad and flattering picture </s>
<s> viewing the american catholic educational achievement in retrospect we may indeed see it as a unified whole extending from grade school to university </s>
<s> but the simple truth is that higher education has never really been an official american catholic project </s>
<s> certainly not in the same sense that the establishment of a parochial school system has been a matter of official policy </s>
<s> official encouragement is one thing but the down-to-earth test is the allocation of diocesan and parochial funds </s>
<s> american catholics have responded generously to bishops and pastors appeals for the support necessary to create parochial schools but they have not contributed in a similar fashion to the establishment of institutions of higher learning </s>
<s> they have not done so for the simple reason that such appeals have hardly ever been made </s>
<s> diocesan authorities generally have not regarded this as their direct responsibility </s>
<s> all of this may be understandable enough it is however in fact difficult to see how diocesan authorities could have acted otherwise </s>
<s> yet for better or for worse the truth of the matter is that most american catholic colleges do not owe their existence to general catholic support but rather to the initiative resourcefulness and sacrifices of individual religious communities </s>
<s> community esprit de corps has been the protective shell which has made the achievement possible </s>
<s> it is something more than the arithmetical sum of individual totals of piety and detachment </s>
<s> a religious community with a vital sense of mission achieves a degree of group orientation and group identification seldom found elsewhere </s>
<s> the fact that the group orientation and group identification are founded on supernatural principles and nourished by the well-springs of devotion simply give them a deeper and more satisfying dimension </s>
<s> the net result is a uniquely satisfying sense of comradeship the kind of comradeship which sparks enthusiasm and blunts the cutting edge of sacrifice and hardship </s>
<s> had it not been for such private enterprise diocesan authorities might of course have been goaded into establishing institutions subsidized by diocesan funds and parish collections and staffed by religious as paid employees </s>
<s> it is this spirit which explains some of the anomalies of american catholic higher education in particular the wasteful duplication apparent in some areas </s>
<s> this is not an isolated example </s>
<s> this aspect of the total picture has been commented upon often enough </s>
<s> it would seem to represent esprit de corps run riot </s>
<s> and while no one expects total democracy on the academic scene the scholar will be particularly sensitive to a line between first and second class citizenship drawn on any basis other than that of academic rank or professional achievement </s>
<s> but in any case one does not have to read very closely between the lines to realize that the situation is not regarded as a particularly happy one </s>
<s> there are two reasons why failure to come to grips with this demand could be fatal to the future of the catholic university </s>
<s> in the first place there is the obvious problem of recruiting high caliber personnel </s>
<s> word spreads rapidly in the tightly knit academic profession much given to attending meetings and conferences </s>
<s> expressions of even low-key dissatisfaction by a catholic college faculty member has the effect of confirming the already existing stereotype </s>
<s> in the academic world there is seldom anything so dramatic as a strike or a boycott all that happens is that the better qualified teacher declines to gamble two or three years of his life on the chance that conditions at the catholic institution will be as good as those elsewhere </s>
<s> to appreciate the nature of the gamble it should be realized that while college teaching is almost a public symbol of security that security does not come as quickly or as automatically as it does in an elementary school system or in the civil service </s>
<s> much has been made of the fact that major catholic institutions now guarantee firm tenure </s>
<s> this is a significant advance but its import should not be exaggerated </s>
<s> when a man invests a block of his years at a university without gaining the coveted promotion not only is he faced with the problem of starting over but there is also a certain depreciation in the market value of his services </s>
<s> just as it is possible to exaggerate the drawing power of the new tenure practices it is also possible to exaggerate the significance of the now relatively adequate salaries paid by major catholic institutions </s>
<s> adequate compensation is indispensable </s>
<s> broadly speaking the total catholic atmosphere is such an intangible but the larger demand is for a sense of creative participation and mature responsibility in the total work of the university </s>

<s> the anti-trust laws inform a business that it must compete but along completely undefined lines </s>

<s> behind this reply and its many variations is the ever-present budget problem all libraries must face from the largest to the smallest </s>
<s> most library budgets are hopelessly inadequate </s>
<s> the plight of a small community library is proportionately worse </s>
<s> confronted with this situation most libraries either endure the severe limitations of their budgets and do what they can with what they have or else depend on the bounty of patrons and local governments to supplement their annual funds </s>
<s> in some parts of the country however a co-operative movement has begun to grow under the wing of state governments whereby with the financial help of the state libraries share their book resources on a county-wide or regional basis </s>
<s> new york state has what is probably the most advanced of these co-operative systems so well developed that it has become a model for others to follow </s>
<s> because it is so large a state with marked contrasts in population density the organization of the new york co-operative offers a cross-section of how the plan works </s>
<s> at one extreme are the systems of upper new york state where libraries in two or more counties combine to serve a large sparsely populated area </s>
<s> at the other are organizations like the newly formed nassau library system in a high-density area with ample resources and a rapidly growing territory to serve </s>
<s> under this law annual grants are given to systems in substantial amounts </s>
<s> an earlier difficulty was overcome by making it clear that individual libraries in any area might join or not as they saw fit </s>
<s> some library boards are wary of the plan </s>
<s> a large well-stocked library surrounded in a county by smaller ones may feel that the demands on its resources are likely to be too great </s>
<s> a small library may cherish its independence and established ways and resist joining in a cooperative movement that sometimes seems radical to older members of the board </s>
<s> within a system however the autonomy of each member library is preserved </s>
<s> the local community maintains responsibility for the financial support of its own library program facilities and services but wider resources and additional services become available through membership in a system </s>
<s> all services are given without cost to members </s>
<s> the collection may be in an existing library or it may be built up in a central collection </s>
<s> each system develops differently according to the area it serves but the universal goal is to pool the resources of a given area for maximum efficiency </s>
<s> the basic state grant is thirty cents for each person served and there is a further book incentive grant that provides an extra twenty cents up to fifty cents per capita if a library spends a certain number of dollars </s>
<s> this system by virtue of its variety and size offers an inclusive view of the plan in operation </s>
<s> the nassau system recognizes that its major task it to broaden reference service what with the constant expansion of education and knowledge and the pressure of population growth in a metropolitan area </s>
<s> the need is for reference works of a more specialized nature than individual libraries adequate to satisfy everyday needs could afford </s>
<s> the major part of this collection is in the central headquarters building and the remainder is divided among five libraries in the system designated as subject centers </s>
<s> basic reference tools are the backbone of the collection but there is also specialization in science and technology an indicated weakness in local libraries </s>
<s> the entire headquarters collection is available to the patrons of all members on interlibrary loans </s>
<s> it is connected by teletype with the state library in albany which will supply any book to a system that the system itself cannot provide </s>
<s> the books are carried around by truck in canvas bags from headquarters to the other libraries </s>
<s> each subject center library was chosen because of its demonstrated strength in a particular area which headquarters could then build upon </s>
<s> east meadow has philosophy psychology and religion </s>
<s> freeport houses social science pure science and language </s>
<s> history biography and education are centered in hempstead </s>
<s> levittown has applied science business and literature </s>
<s> while hewlett-woodmere is the repository of art music and foreign languages </s>
<s> the reference coordinator at headquarters also serves as a consultant and is available to work with the local librarian in helping to strengthen local reference service </s>
<s> this kind of cooperation is not wholly new of course </s>
<s> public libraries in nassau county have been lending books to each other by mail for a quarter-century but the system enables this process to operate on an organized and far more comprehensive basis </s>
<s> local libraries find too that the new plan saves tax dollars because books can be bought through the system and since the system buys in bulk it is able to obtain larger discounts than would be available to an individual library </s>
<s> the system passes on these savings to its members </s>
<s> further money is saved through economy in bookkeeping and clerical detail as the result of central billing </s>
<s> books are not the only resource of the system </s>
<s> schools and community groups turn to the headquarters film library for documentary art and experimental films to show at libraries that sponsor local programs and to organizations in member communities </s>
<s> the system well understands that one of its primary responsibilities is to bring children and books together </s>
<s> headquarters has also set up a central juvenile book-review and book-selection center to provide better methods of purchasing and selection </s>
<s> sample copies of new books are on display at headquarters where librarians may evaluate them by themselves or in workshop groups </s>
<s> headquarters of the nassau system is an increasingly busy place these days threatening to expand beyond its boundaries </s>
<s> it maintains a central exhibit collection to share displays already created and used </s>
<s> the system itself is governed by a board of trustees geographically representing its membership </s>
<s> in nassau as in other systems the long-range objective is to bring the maximum service of libraries to bear on the schools and on adult education in general </s>

<s> expressway answer east river drive </s>
<s> to the editor of the inquirer </s>
<s> your continuing editorials concerning the schuylkill expressway are valuable </s>
<s> however several pertinent considerations deserve recognition </s>
<s> one of the problems associated with the expressway stems from the basic idea </s>
<s> we shuffle a large percentage of the cars across the river twice </s>
<s> they start on the east side of the schuylkill have to cross over to the west to use the expressway and cross over again to the east at their destination </s>
<s> bridges tunnels and ferries are the most common methods of river crossings </s>
<s> each one of these is by its nature a focal point or a point of natural congestion </s>
<s> widen the east river drive at least one lane </s>
<s> so widen it as to minimize the present curves and eliminate drainage problems </s>
<s> paint continuous lane stripes and install overhead directional lights as on our bridges </s>
<s> one additional lane would then be directional with the traffic burden and effectively increase the traffic carrying capability of the east river drive by fifty percent </s>
<s> this could be accomplished without the tremendous expenditures necessitated by the schuylkill expressway and without destroying the natural beauty of the east river drive </s>

<s> disputes stans column business scandal views </s>
<s> to the editor </s>
<s> the new column by maurice stans regarding business scandals is fair and accurate in most respects and his solution to the problem has some merit </s>
<s> i must in fairness take issue with his premise primarily because the so-called scandals in labor unions were very much connected with business scandals </s>
<s> these arrangements would have been impossible if the business community was truly interested in the welfare of its employes </s>
<s> a sweetheart arrangement can come about as often by employers doing the corrupting as by unscrupulous labor leaders demanding tribute </s>
<s> anyone familiar with the details of the mcclellan hearings must at once realize that the sweetheart arrangements augmented employer profits far more than they augmented the earnings of the corruptible labor leaders </s>
<s> further it should be recalled that some very definite steps were taken by congress to combat corruption in the labor movement by its passage of the landrum-griffin act </s>
<s> escalation unto death </s>
<s> it is being fought moreover in fairly close correspondence with the predictions of the soothsayers of the think factories </s>
<s> they predicted escalation and escalation is what we are getting </s>
<s> some time ago however mr khrushchev decided that when bigger bombs were made the soviet union would make them </s>
<s> and now of course the hue and cry for counter-escalation is being raised on our side </s>
<s> so escalation proceeds ad infinitum or more accurately until the contestants begin dropping them on each other instead of on their respective proving grounds </s>
<s> the escalation must end sometime and probably quite soon </s>
<s> he feels therefore that to seek a discontinuity in the arms policy of the united states is the least risky path our government can take </s>
<s> his proposal is opposed to that of richard nixon governor rockefeller past chairmen strauss and mccone of the atomic energy commission dr edward teller and those others now enjoying their hour of triumph in the exacerbation of the cold war </s>
<s> escalation is their first love and their last </s>
<s> they will be faithful unto death </s>
<s> if this capacity had not failed them they would see that their enemy has made a disastrous miscalculation </s>
<s> but if his purpose was to inspire terror his action could hardly have miscarried more obviously </s>
<s> not terror but anger and resentment have been the general reaction outside the soviet sphere </s>
<s> khrushchev himself is reported to be concerned by the surge of animosity he has aroused yet our own nuclear statesmen seem intent on following compulsively in his footsteps </s>
<s> when one powerful nation strives to emulate the success of another it is only natural </s>
<s> thus when the russians sent up their first sputnik american chagrin was human enough and american determination to put american satellites into orbit was perfectly understandable </s>
<s> but to imitate an opponent when he has made the mistake of his life would be a new high in statesmanlike folly </s>
<s> the tide turns </s>
<s> when east germans fled to the west by the thousands paeans of joy rose from the throats of western publicists </s>
<s> they are less vocal now when it is the west berliners who are migrating </s>
<s> west berlin morale is low and in age distribution the situation is unfavorable </s>
<s> whole families are moving and removal firms are booked for months ahead </s>
<s> they are leaving so fast that the president of the west german employers federation issued an appeal this week to factory workers in the west to volunteer for six months front-line work in factories in west berlin </s>
<s> the handwriting is on the wall </s>
<s> the only hope for west berlin lies in a compromise which will bring down the wall and reunite the city </s>

<s> tanks lined up at the border will be no more helpful </s>
<s> a compromise will leave both sides without the glow of triumph but it will save berlin </s>
<s> or the city can be a graveyard monument to western intransigence if that is what the west wants </s>

<s> u thant of burma </s>
<s> with the neutralists maintaining pressure for one of their own to succeed mr hammarskjold u thant emerged as the only possible candidate unlikely to be waylaid by a veto </s>
<s> what is interesting is that his positive qualifications for the post were revealed only as a kind of tail to his candidacy </s>
<s> in all the bitter in-fighting the squabbles over election procedures the complicated numbers game that east and west played on the assistant secretaries theme the gentleman from burma showed himself both as a man of principle and a skilled diplomat </s>
<s> he has moreover another qualification which augurs well for the future </s>
<s> he is a buddhist which means that to him peace and the sanctity of human life are not only religious dogma but a profound and unshakable weltanschauung </s>

<s> facts in focus </s>
<s> the current stereotype of straight news reporting was probably invaluable in protecting the press and its readers from pollution by that combination of doctored fact fancy and personal opinion called yellow journalism which flourished in this country more than a generation ago </s>
<s> the public is now armed with sophistication and numerous competing media </s>
<s> besides there are no longer enough corruptible journalists about </s>
<s> the accepted method of writing news has two major liabilities </s>
<s> first it does not communicate </s>
<s> a reporter restricted to the competing propaganda statements of both sides in a major labor dispute for instance is unable to tell his readers half of what he knows about the causes of the dispute </s>
<s> second it subjects the news to distortion by the unscrupulous </s>
<s> the charges by the late junior senator from wisconsin not only destroyed innocent people but misled the nation </s>
<s> yet the press was powerless to put these charges in perspective in its news columns </s>
<s> despite several years of front-page stories the average citizen was unable to get a complete picture of mccarthy until he saw on the television screen what the reporters had been seeing all along but had no effective way of communicating </s>
<s> the senator had boxed them in with their own restrictions </s>
<s> it seems to me the time has come for the american press to start experimenting with ways of reporting the news that will do a better job of communicating and will be less subject to abuse by those who have learned how to manipulate the present stereotype to serve their own ends </s>
<s> the objective should be to provide a method of getting into print a higher percentage than is now possible of the relevant information in the possession of reporters and editors </s>

<s> dr bonnor begins with a discussion of the relativistic theories of the universe based on the general theory of relativity </s>
<s> because of this dr bonnor holds that the universe is becoming more thinly populated by stars and whatever else is there </s>
<s> this expansion has been going on for an estimated eight billion years </s>
<s> expands and contracts </s>
<s> dr bonnor supports the idea that the universe both expands and contracts that in several billion years the expansion will slow up and reverse itself and that the contraction will set in </s>
<s> then after many more billions of years when all the galaxies are whistling toward a common center this movement will slow down and reverse itself again </s>
<s> professor bondi disagrees with the expansion-contraction theory </s>
<s> he supports the steady-state theory which holds that matter is continually being created in space </s>
<s> for this reason he says the density of the universe always remains the same even though the galaxies are zooming away in all directions </s>
<s> new galaxies are forever being formed to fill in the gaps left by the receding galaxies </s>
<s> if this is true then the universe today looks just as it did millions of years ago and as it will look millions of years hence even though the universe is expanding </s>
<s> for new galaxies to be created professor bondi declares it would only be necessary for a single hydrogen atom to be created in an area the size of your living room once every few million years </s>
<s> dr lyttleton backs the theory that we live in an electric universe and this theory starts with the behavior of protons and electrons </s>
<s> the charges of the electron and proton are believed to be exactly equal and opposite but dr lyttleton is not so sure </s>
<s> this would give the hydrogen atom a slight charge-excess </s>
<s> now if one hydrogen atom were placed at the surface of a large sphere of hydrogen atoms it would be subject both to the gravitation of the sphere and the charge-excess of all those atoms in the sphere </s>
<s> dr lyttleton then imagines the universe as a large hydrogen sphere with surface atoms shooting away from it </s>
<s> this he claims would reasonably account for the expansion of the universe </s>

<s> one of the most widespread features of contemporary thought is the almost universal disbelief in the reality of spirit </s>
<s> just a few centuries ago the world of spirits was as populous and real as the world of material entities </s>
<s> not only in popular thought but in that of the highly educated as well was this true </s>
<s> demons fairies angels and a host of other spiritual beings were as much a part of the experiential world of western man as were rocks and trees and stars </s>
<s> in it important elements of christianity and of the biblical view of reality in general which now cause us much difficulty could be responded to quite naturally and spontaneously </s>
<s> the progress of science over these last few centuries and the gradual replacement of biblical by scientific categories of reality have to a large extent emptied the spirit world of the entities which previously populated it </s>
<s> in carrying out this program science has undoubtedly performed a very considerable service for which it can claim due credit </s>
<s> the objectification of the world of spirit in popular superstition had certainly gone far beyond what the experience of spirit could justify or support </s>
<s> science is fully competent to deal with any element of experience which arises from an object in space and time </s>
<s> when therefore it turned its attention to the concrete entities with which popular imagination had peopled the world of spirit these entities soon lost whatever status they had enjoyed as actual elements of external reality </s>
<s> in doing so science has unquestionably cleared up widespread misconceptions removed extraneous and illusory sources of fear and dispelled many undesirable popular superstitions </s>
<s> there have been indeed many important and valuable gains from the development of our present scientific view of the world for which we may be rightly grateful </s>
<s> all this has not however been an unmixed blessing </s>
<s> the scientific debunking of the spirit world has been in a way too successful and too thorough </s>
<s> the house has been swept so clean that contemporary man has been left with no means or at best with wholly inadequate means for dealing with his experience of spirit </s>
<s> although the particular form of conceptualization which popular imagination had made in response to the experience of spirit was undoubtedly defective the raw experience itself which led to such excesses remains with us as vividly as ever </s>
<s> we simply find ourselves in the position of having no means for inquiring into the structure and meaning of this range of our experience </s>
<s> there is no framework or structure of thought with respect to which we can organize it and no part of reality as we know and apprehend it with respect to which we can refer this experience </s>
<s> science has simply left us helpless and powerless in this important sector of our lives </s>
<s> as the play opens the audience is introduced to the community of salem in puritan america at the end of the eighteenth century </s>
<s> aside from a quaint concern with witches and devils which provides the immediate problem in the opening scene it is a quite normal community </s>
<s> the conversation of the characters creates an atmosphere suggesting the usual mixture of pleasures foibles irritations and concerns which would characterize the common life of a normal village in any age </s>
<s> there is no occasion to feel uneasy or disturbed about these people </s>
<s> instead the audience can sit back at ease and from the perspective of an enlightened time which no longer believes in such things enjoy the dead seriousness with which the characters in the play take the witches and devils which are under discussion </s>
<s> a teenage girl abigail williams is being sharply questioned by her minister uncle the reverend samuel parris about a wild night affair in the woods in which she and some other girls had seemed to have had contact with these evil beings </s>
<s> for all involved in this discussion the devil is a real entity who can really be confronted in the woods on a dark night the demon world is populated with real creatures and witches actually can be seen flying through the air </s>
<s> as the play unfolds however the audience is subtly brought into the grip of an awful evil which grows with ominously gathering power and soon engulfs the community </s>
<s> everyone in salem saint and sinner alike is swept up by it </s>
<s> it is like a mysterious epidemic which starting first with abigail and parris spreads inexorably with a dreadfully growing virulence through the whole town until all have been infected by it </s>
<s> it grows terribly and unavoidably in power and leaves in its wake a trail of misery moral disintegration and destruction </s>
<s> the audience leaves the play under a spell it is the kind of spell which the exposure to spirit in its living active manifestation always evokes </s>
<s> this is not to attempt to say what spirit is but only to employ a commonly used word to designate or simply identify a common experience </s>
<s> the tragic irony of the play is that the very belief in and concern with a devil who could be met in the woods and combatted with formulae set out in books was the very thing that prevented them from detecting the real devil when he came among them </s>
<s> we marvel at their blindness for not seeing this </s>
<s> in our disbelief we think that we can no longer even use the word and so are unable to even name the elemental power which is so vividly real in this play </s>
<s> we are left helpless to cope with it because we do not dare speak of it as anything real for fear that to do so would imply a commitment to that which has already been discredited and proved false </s>
<s> even mr miller himself seems uncertain on this score </s>
<s> and his belief is not to his discredit </s>
<s> apparently he does not intend that those who read or view this play should think of the devil as being actually real </s>
<s> yet such is the dramatic power of his writing that the audience is nevertheless left in the grip of the terrible power and potency of that which came over salem </s>
<s> it casts a spell upon them so that they leave with a feeling of having been in the mysterious presence of an evil power </s>
<s> it is not enough in accounting for this feeling to analyze it into the wickedness of individual people added together to produce a cumulative effect </s>
<s> for this does not account for the integral elemental power of that which grows with abounding vigor as the play unfolds nor does it explain the strange numinous sense of presentness which comes over those who watch the play like a spell </s>
<s> spirit and community </s>
<s> there is nothing in the whole range of human experience more widely known and universally felt than spirit </s>
<s> apart from spirit there could be no community for it is spirit which draws men into community and gives to any community its unity cohesiveness and permanence </s>
<s> think for example of the spirit of the marine corps </s>
<s> surely this is a reality we all acknowledge </s>
<s> we cannot of course assign it any substance </s>
<s> yet it exists and has an objective reality which can be experienced and known </s>
<s> so it is too with many other spirits which we all know the spirit of nazism or communism school spirit the spirit of a street corner gang or a football team the spirit of rotary or the ku klux klan </s>
<s> every community if it is alive has a spirit and that spirit is the center of its unity and identity </s>
<s> in searching for clues which might lead us to a fresh apprehension of the reality of spirit the close connection between spirit and community is likely to prove the most fruitful </s>
<s> for it is primarily in community that we know and experience spirit </s>
<s> it is spirit which gives life to a community and causes it to cohere </s>
<s> yet the spirit which lives in community is not identical with the community </s>
<s> the idea of community and the idea of spirit are two distinct and separable ideas </s>
<s> one characteristic of the spirit in community is its givenness </s>
<s> the members of the community do not create the spirit but rather find it present and waiting for them </s>
<s> it is for them a given which they and they alone possess </s>
<s> the spirit of the marine corps was present and operative before any of the present members of it came into it </s>
<s> it is they of course who keep it alive and preserve it so the same spirit will continue to be present in the corps for future recruits to find as they come into it </s>
<s> this does not mean that mythological language as such can no longer be used in theology and preaching </s>
<s> his point is not that mythology may not be used but that it may no longer be regarded as the only or even the most appropriate conceptuality for expressing the christian kerygma </s>
<s> when we say that a mythological mode of thought must be completely abandoned we mean it must be abandoned as the sole or proper means for presenting the christian understanding of existence </s>
<s> but this statement is completely unconvincing </s>
<s> nor is it necessary to look for such evidence in the great urban centers of our culture that are admittedly almost entirely secularized and so profoundly estranged from the conventional forms in which the gospel has been communicated </s>
<s> although the theological forms of the past continue to exist in a way they do not in a more secularized situation the striking thing is the rapidity with which they are being reduced to a marginal existence </s>
<s> this is especially in evidence among the present generation of the suburban middle class </s>
<s> but it is to say that this need is far more important for such infatuation than most of the pundits seem to have suspected </s>
<s> however even if the latent demand for demythologization is not nearly as widespread as we are claiming at least among the cultured elements of the population there tends to be an almost complete indifference to the church and its traditional message of sin and grace </s>
<s> and yet this is exactly the risk we run when we assume as we too often do that we can continue to preach the gospel in a form that makes it seem incredible and irrelevant to cultured men </s>
<s> until we translate this gospel into a language that enlightened men today can understand we are depriving ourselves of the very resources on which the continued success of our witness most certainly depends </s>
<s> in arguing in this way we are obviously taking for granted that a demythologized restatement of the kerygma can be achieved </s>
<s> and that we firmly believe this will presently become evident when we set forth reasons to justify such a conviction </s>
<s> but the main point here is that even if such a restatement were not possible the demand to demythologize the kerygma would still be unavoidable </s>
<s> this is what we mean when we say this demand must be accepted without condition </s>
<s> if to be a christian means to say yes where i otherwise say no or where i do not have the right to say anything at all then my only choice is to refuse to be a christian </s>
<s> this must be stressed because it is absolutely essential to the argument of this concluding chapter </s>
<s> and though this process by no means represents an unambiguous gain and is in fact marked by the estrangement from the depths that seems to be the cost of human maturation it is still a positive step forward </s>
<s> and those of us who so richly benefit from it should be the last to despise it </s>
<s> in any event it is an irreversible step and if we are at all honest with ourselves we will know we have no other alternative than to live in the world in which god has seen fit to place us </s>
<s> to say this of course is to take up a position on one side of a controversy going on now for some two hundred years or at any rate since the beginning of the distinctively modern period in theological thought </s>
<s> it is to this same tradition that most of the creative figures in the last century and a half of american theology also belong </s>
<s> what makes this long and diverse tradition essentially one is that those who have belonged to it have been profoundly in earnest about being modern men in a distinctively modern world </s>
<s> although they have also been concerned to stand squarely within the tradition of the apostolic church they have exhibited no willingness whatever to sacrifice their modernity to their christianity </s>
<s> they have insisted rather on living fully and completely within modern culture and so far from considering this treason to god have looked upon it as the only way they could be faithful to him </s>
<s> when we say then that today in our situation the demand for demythologization must be accepted without condition we are simply saying that at least this much of the liberal tradition is an enduring achievement </s>
<s> for we have said in effect that of the two alternatives to his position variously represented by the other participants in the demythologizing discussion only one is really an alternative </s>
<s> in order to make the implications of our position as clear as possible we may develop this argument at greater length </s>
<s> we may show first that there cannot possibly be an alternative other than the three typically represented by bultmann barth and buri </s>
<s> hence if what is in question is whether in a given theology myth is or is not completely rejected it is unimportant whether only a little bit of myth or a considerable quantity is accepted </s>
<s> for in either event the first possibility is excluded </s>
<s> a second point requires more extended comment </s>
<s> one hundred years ago there existed in england the association for the promotion of the unity of christendom </s>
<s> but it must be readily seen that the religious picture in england has so greatly changed during these hundred years as to engender hope at least on the catholic side </s>
<s> i came to england last summer to do research on the unpublished letters of cardinal newman </s>
<s> as an american catholic of irish ancestry i came with certain preconceptions and expectations </s>
<s> since arriving here however i have formed a far different religious picture of present-day england </s>
<s> in representing part of this new picture i will be recounting some of my own personal experiences reactions and judgments </s>
<s> but my primary aim is to transcribe what englishmen themselves are saying and writing and implying about the roman and anglican churches and about the present religious state of england </s>
<s> since the protestant clergy for the most part wear gray or some variant from the wholly black suit my roman collar and black garb usually identify me in england as a roman catholic cleric </s>
<s> in any case i have always been treated with the utmost courtesy by englishmen even in devonshire and cornwall where anti-catholic feeling has supposedly existed the strongest and longest </s>
<s> nowhere have i seen public expression of anti-catholicism </s>
<s> on my first guy fawkes day here i found catholics as well as non-catholics celebrating with the traditional fireworks and bonfires and was told that most englishmen either do not know or are not concerned with the historical significance of the day </s>
<s> yet it represents a very considerable percentage of the churchgoing population </s>
<s> she found this a marvel because as she said only six per cent of english people are churchgoers </s>
<s> she may not have been exact on this number but others here feel quite certain that the percentage would be less than ten </s>
<s> from many sides come remarks that protestant churches are badly attended and the large medieval cathedrals look all but empty during services </s>
<s> a catholic priest recently recounted how in the chapel of a large city university following anglican evensong at which there was a congregation of twelve he celebrated mass before more than a hundred </s>
<s> the protestant themselves are the first to admit the great falling off in effective membership in their churches </s>
<s> while it must be said that these same protestants have built some new churches during this period and that religious population shifts have emptied churches a principal reason for this phenomenon of redundancy is that fewer protestants are going to church </s>
<s> still it is clear from such reports and apparently clear from the remarks of many people that protestants are decreasing and catholics increasing </s>
<s> an anglican clergyman in oxford sadly but frankly acknowledged to me that this is true </s>
<s> one of the ironies of the present crusade for christian unity is that there are not relatively speaking many real christians to unite </s>
<s> many english catholics are proud of their catholicism and know that they are in a new ascendancy </s>
<s> with traditional nationalistic spirit some englishmen claim that english catholicism is catholicism at its best </s>
<s> i have found myself saying with other foreigners here that english catholics are good catholics </s>
<s> it has been my experience to find as many men as women in church and to hear almost everyone in church congregations reciting the latin prayers and responses at mass </s>
<s> intercede for our separated brethren that with us in the one true fold they may be united to the chief shepherd the vicar of thy son </s>
<s> the english saints are widely venerated quite naturally and now there is great hope that the forty martyrs and cardinal newman will soon be canonized </s>
<s> i have not seen this charge made during my stay here but apparently it is still in the air </s>
<s> in this connection it has been observed that the increasing number of irish catholics priests and laity in england while certainly seen as good for catholicism is nevertheless a source of embarrassment for some of the more nationalistic english catholics especially when these irishmen offer to remind their christian brethren of this good </s>
<s> moreover for those few there was almost no ecclesiastical representation in the city to care for their religious needs </s>
<s> now not only are there considerably more laity as students and professors at oxford but there are also numerous houses of religious orders existing in respectable and friendly relations with the non-catholic members of the university </s>
<s> some catholic priests lecture there </s>
<s> catholic seminarians attend tutorials and row on the cherwell with non-catholic students </s>
<s> the general tone of articles appearing in such important newspapers as the manchester guardian and the sunday observer implies a kindly recognition that the catholic church is now at least of equal stature in england with the protestant churches </s>
<s> the catholic priest though somewhat superficially drawn easily came out the best </s>
<s> there were many letters of strong protest against the portrait of the anglican clergyman who was indeed portrayed as a man not particularly concerned with religious matters and without really very much to do as clergyman </s>
<s> such a series of articles was certainly never printed in the public press of mid-victorian england </s>
<s> there was so much interest shown in this present-day venture that it was continued on bbc where comments were equally made by an anglican parson a free church minister and a catholic priest </s>
<s> catholic priests have frequently appeared on television programs sometimes discussing the christian faith on an equal footing with protestant clergymen </s>
<s> a notable example of this was the discussion of christian unity by the catholic archbishop of liverpool dr heenan and the anglican archbishop of york dr ramsey recently appointed archbishop of canterbury </s>
<s> the good feeling which exists between these two important church figures is now well known in england </s>
<s> the holy sacrifice of the mass with commentary has been televised several times in recent months </s>
<s> of course the crowning event that has dramatically upset the traditional pattern of english religious history was the friendly visit paid by dr fisher then anglican archbishop of canterbury to the vatican last december </s>
<s> english catholics reacted to this event with moderate but real hope </s>
<s> almost daily something is reported which feeds this catholic hope in england statistics of the increasing numbers of converts and irish catholic immigrants </s>
<s> news of a protestant minister in leamington who has offered to allow a catholic priest to preach from his pulpit </s>
<s> a report that a catholic nun had been requested to teach in a non-catholic secondary school during the sickness of one of its masters </s>
<s> the death of a man is unique and yet it is universal </s>
<s> the straight line would symbolize its uniqueness the circle its universality </s>
<s> christianity declares that in the life and death of jesus christ the unique and the universal concur </s>
<s> perhaps no church father saw this concurrence of the unique and the universal as clearly or formulated it as precisely as irenaeus </s>
<s> to be the savior and the lord jesus christ has to be a historical individual with a biography all his own </s>
<s> yet this utterly individual historical person must also contain within himself the common history of mankind </s>
<s> his history is his alone yet each man must recognize his own history in it </s>
<s> his death is his alone yet each man can see his own death in the crucifixion of jesus </s>
<s> each man can identify himself with the history and the death of jesus christ because jesus christ has identified himself with human history and human death coming as the head of a new humanity </s>
<s> not a circle then nor a straight line but a spiral represents the shape of death as irenaeus sees it </s>
<s> for a spiral has motion as well as recurrence </s>
<s> as represented by a spiral history may in some sense be said to repeat itself </s>
<s> yet each historical event remains unique </s>
<s> christ is both unique and universal </s>
<s> the first turn of the spiral is the primeval history of humanity in adam </s>
<s> as origen interprets the end of history on the basis of its beginning so irenaeus portrays the story of adam on the basis of the story of christ </s>
<s> for god had not rained says the scripture before man was made and there was no man to till the earth </s>
<s> irenaeus does not regard adam and eve merely as private individuals but as universal human beings who were and are all of humanity </s>
<s> adam and eve were perfect not in the sense that they possessed perfection but in the sense that they were capable of development toward perfection </s>
<s> they were in fact children </s>
<s> irenaeus does not claim pre-existence for the human soul </s>
<s> therefore there is no need for him as there is for origen to identify existence itself with the fall </s>
<s> existence is created and willed by god and is not the consequence of a pre-existent rebellion or of a cosmic descent from eternity into history </s>
<s> historical existence is a created good </s>
<s> thus the image of god is that which makes a man a man and not an oyster </s>
<s> the similitude of god by contrast is that which makes a man a child of god and not merely a rational creature </s>
<s> recent research on irenaeus however makes it evident that he does not consistently maintain this distinction </s>
<s> he does not mean to say that adam lost the similitude of god and his immortality through the fall </s>
<s> for he was created not exactly immortal nor yet exactly mortal but capable of immortality as well as of mortality </s>
<s> and he laid down for him certain conditions so that if he kept the command of god then he would always remain as he was that is immortal </s>
<s> these conditions man did not keep and thus he became mortal </s>
<s> yet he did not stop being human as a result </s>
<s> the true way to immortality lay through obedience but man did not believe this </s>
<s> for she did not obey when as yet she was a virgin </s>
<s> and even as she having indeed a husband adam but being nevertheless as yet a virgin having become disobedient was made the cause of death both to herself and to the entire human race </s>
<s> his interpretation of the beginning on the basis of the end prompts him to draw these parallels between the virgin eve and the virgin mary </s>
<s> for as it was christ the word of god who came to rescue man so it was disobedience to the word of god in the beginning that brought death into the world and all our woe </s>
<s> with this act of disobedience and not with the inception of his individual existence man began the downward circuit on the spiral of history descending from the created capacity for immortality to an inescapable mortality </s>
<s> at the nadir of that circuit is death </s>
<s> and disobedience to god entails death </s>
<s> this leads irenaeus to the somewhat startling notion that adam and eve died on the same day that they disobeyed namely on a friday as a parallel to the death of christ on good friday </s>
<s> he sees a parallel also to the jewish day of preparation for the sabbath </s>
<s> in any case though they had been promised immortality if they ate of the tree they obtained mortality instead </s>
<s> the wages of sin is death </s>
<s> nevertheless even at the nadir of the circuit the spiral of history belongs to god and he still rules </s>
<s> even death therefore has a providential as well as a punitive function </s>
<s> this idea which occurs in both tatian and cyprian fits especially well into the scheme of irenaeus theology </s>
<s> for it prepares the way for the passage from life through death to life that is achieved in christ </s>
<s> as man can live only by dying so it was only by his dying that christ could bring many to life </s>
<s> it is probably fair to say that the idea of death is more profound in irenaeus than the idea of sin is </s>
<s> this applies to his picture of adam </s>
<s> it is borne out also by the absence of any developed theory about how sin passes from one generation to the next </s>
<s> it becomes most evident in his description of christ as the second adam who does indeed come to destroy sin but whose work culminates in the achievement of immortality </s>
<s> death reminds man of his sin but it reminds him also of his transience </s>
<s> it represents a punishment that he knows he deserves but it also symbolizes most dramatically that he lives his life within the process of time </s>
<s> these two aspects of death cannot be successfully separated but they dare not be confused or identified </s>
<s> the repeated efforts in christian history to describe death as altogether the consequence of human sin show that these two aspects of death cannot be separated </s>
<s> one night so some of these theories run adam would have fallen asleep much as he fell asleep for the creation of eve </s>
<s> and thus he would have been carried over into the life eternal </s>
<s> the embarrassment of these theories over the naturalness of death is an illustration of the thesis that death cannot be only a punishment for some termination seems necessary in a life that is lived within the natural order of time and change </s>
<s> on the other hand christian faith knows that death is more than the natural termination of temporal existence </s>
<s> it is the wages of sin and its sting is the law </s>
<s> if this aspect of death as punishment is not distinguished from the idea of death as natural termination the conclusion seems inevitable that temporal existence itself is a form of punishment rather than the state into which man is put by the will of the creator </s>
<s> this seems to have been the conclusion to which origen was forced </s>
<s> if death receives more than its share of attention from the theologian and if sin receives less than its share the gift of the life eternal through christ begins to look like the divinely appointed means of rescue from temporal ie created existence </s>
<s> such an interpretation of death radically alters the christian view of creation </s>
<s> for it teaches salvation from not salvation in time and history </s>
<s> because christianity teaches not only salvation in history but salvation by the history of christ such an interpretation of death would require a drastic revision of the christian understanding of the work of christ </s>
<s> furthermore as an encouragement to revisionist thinking it manifestly is fair to admit that any fraternity has a constitutional right to refuse to accept persons it dislikes </s>
<s> we today are not entitled to excoriate honest men who believed parker to be downright pernicious and who barred their pulpits against his demand to poison the minds of their congregations </s>
<s> happily for posterity then the boston association did not actually command parker to leave the room though it came too close for comfort to what would have been an unforgivable brutality </s>
<s> whereupon parker broke down into convulsions of weeping and rushed out of the room though not out of the fellowship </s>
<s> all this near tragedy which to us borders on comedy enables us to tell the story over and over again always warming ourselves with a glow of complacency </s>
<s> parker was never excommunicated </s>
<s> to the extent that he was ostracized or even reviled we solace ourselves by saying he asked for it </s>
<s> in both cases the stubborn fact remains liberalism gave birth to two brilliant apostates both legitimate offspring of its loins and when brought to the test it behaved shabbily </s>
<s> however there is a crucial difference between the two histories </s>
<s> emerson evaded the problem by shoving it aside or rather by leaving it behind him he walked out of the unitarian communion so that it could lick the wound of his departure preserve its self-respect and eventually accord him pious veneration </s>
<s> parker insisted upon not resigning even when the majority wanted him to depart upon daring the fellowship to throw him out </s>
<s> hence he was in his lifetime as is the memory of him afterwards a canker within the liberal sensitivity </s>
<s> he still points an accusing finger at all of us telling us we have neither the courage to support him nor the energy to cut his throat </s>
<s> actually the dispute between parker and the society of his time both ecclesiastical and social was a real one a bitter one </s>
<s> it cannot be smoothed over by now cherishing his sarcasms as delightful bits of self-deprecation or by solemnly calling for a reconsideration of the justice of the objections to him </s>
<s> the fact is incontestable that liberal world of unitarian boston was narrow-minded intellectually sterile smug afraid of the logical consequences of its own mild ventures into iconoclasm and quite prepared to resort to hysterical repressions when its brittle foundations were threatened </s>
<s> parker along with garrison and charles sumner showed a magnificent moral bravery when facing mobs mobilized in defense of the mexican war and slavery </s>
<s> nevertheless we can find reasons for respecting even the bigotry of the populace </s>
<s> their passions were genuine and the division between them and the abolitionists is clear-cut </s>
<s> but parker as the ultra-liberal minister within the pale of a church which had proclaimed itself the repository of liberality poses a different problem which is not to be resolved by holding him up as the champion of freedom </s>
<s> even though his theological theses have become to us commonplaces the fundamental interrogation he phrased is very much with us </s>
<s> there can be no doubt the boston of that era could be exquisitely cruel in enforcing its canons of behavior </s>
<s> we stand more in awe of one another than most people </s>
<s> i think it fair to say that he never quite reached such candor in his sermons </s>
<s> an institutionalized liberalism proved itself fundamentally an institution and only within those defined limits a license </s>
<s> by reminding ourselves of these factors in the situation we should i am sure come to a fresh realization however painful it be that the battle between parker and his neighbors was fought in earnest </s>
<s> he arraigned the citizens in language of so little courtesy that they had to respond with at the least resentment </s>
<s> reproach the catholics for it </s>
<s> you and i do the same thing </s>
<s> there are a great many bishops who have never had a cross on their bosom nor a mitre on their head who appeal not to the authority of the pope at rome but to the almighty dollar a pope much nearer home </s>
<s> this was war </s>
<s> parker meant business </s>
<s> we have no answer as to why we are not alarmed </s>
<s> so we are the more prepared to give parker the credit for having taken the right side in an unnecessary controversy to salute his courage and to pass on happily forgetting both him and the entire episode </s>
<s> i have within the past fifty years come out of all uncertainty into a faith which is a dominating conviction of the truth and about which i have not a shadow of doubt </s>
<s> it has been my lot all through life to associate with eminent scientists and at times to discuss with them the deepest and most vital of all questions the nature of the hope of a life beyond this </s>
<s> i have also constantly engaged in scientific work and am fully aware of the value of opinions formed in science as well as in the religions in the world </s>
<s> in an amateurish yet in a very real sense i have followed the developments of archaeology geology astronomy herpetology and mycology with a hearty appreciation of the advances being made in these fields </s>
<s> doubts thus inculcated left me floundering for a while and like some higher critical friends trying to continue to use the bible as the word of god while at the same time holding it to have been subjected to a vast number of redactions and interpolations attempting to bridge the chasm between an older reverent bible-loving generation and a critical doubting bible-emancipated race </s>
<s> although still aware of a great light and glow of warmth in the book i stood outside shivering in the cold </s>
<s> to ask me to believe that so inexpressibly marvelous a book was written long after all the events by some admiring follower and was not inspired directly by the spirit of god is asking me to accept a miracle far greater than any of those recorded in the bible </s>
<s> here i took my leave of my learned friends to step out on another path to which we might give the modern name of pragmatism or the thing that works </s>
<s> test it try it and if it works accept it as a guiding principle </s>
<s> so i put my bible to the practical test of noting what it says about itself and then tested it to see how it worked </s>
<s> the outcome of such an experiment has been in due time the acceptance of the bible as the word of god inspired in a sense utterly different from any merely human book and with it the acceptance of our lord jesus christ as the only begotten son of god son of man by the virgin mary the saviour of the world </s>
<s> i now ever look for christ according to his promises and those of the old testament as well to appear again in glory to put away all sin and to reign in righteousness over the whole earth </s>
<s> to state fully what the bible means as my daily spiritual food is as intimate and difficult as to formulate the reasons for loving my nearest and dearest relatives and friends </s>
<s> the bible is as obviously and truly food for the spirit as bread is food for the body </s>
<s> again as faith reveals god my father and christ my saviour i follow without question where he leads me daily by his spirit of love wisdom power and prayer </s>
<s> i place his precepts and his leadings above every seeming probability dismissing cherished convictions and holding the wisdom of man as folly when opposed to him </s>
<s> i discern no limits to a faith vested in god and christ who is the sum of all wisdom and knowledge and daring to trust him even though called to stand alone before the world </s>
<s> i stood at the bedside of my patient one day and beheld a very sick man in terrible pain </s>
<s> as i ministered to his needs i noticed that his face was radiant in spite of his suffering and i learned that he was trusting not only in the skill of his doctor and nurse but also the lord </s>
<s> what a joy to realize that we too can claim this promise tendered by the lord during his earthly ministry to a group of men who were very dear to him </s>
<s> he was about to leave them to depart from this world and return to his father in heaven </s>
<s> before he left them he promised that his peace would be their portion to abide in their hearts and minds </s>
<s> i praise god for the privilege of being a nurse who has that peace through faith in the lord jesus christ </s>
<s> how often have i looked to jesus when entering the sick room asking for his presence and help in my professional duties as i give my talents not only as the world giveth but as one who loves the saviour and his creatures </s>
<s> such a calm and assuring peace can be yours </s>
<s> as only a member of the family can share in the innermost joys of the family likewise one must belong to the family of god in order to receive the benefits that are promised to those who are his own </s>
<s> perhaps you are not his child </s>
<s> perhaps you do not know if you belong to him </s>
<s> it is to those who believe on his name and belong to him that he gives his peace </s>
<s> not that empty peace the world offers but a deep abiding peace which nothing can destroy </s>
<s> why not open your heart to the lord jesus christ now accept him as your saviour and let him fill you with peace that only he can give </s>
<s> then with the hymn writer of old you can say </s>
<s> resting sweetly in jesus control </s>
<s> i am kept from all danger by night and by day </s>
<s> satellites sputniks rockets balloons </s>
<s> our necks are stiff from gazing at the wonders of outer space which have captured the imagination of the american public </s>
<s> one out of every three or four marriages ends in divorce </s>
<s> delinquency juvenile and adult is at an all-time high </s>
<s> read your daily newspaper </s>
<s> it is true that we must keep up our national defenses and scientific accomplishments </s>
<s> only a fool would think otherwise </s>
<s> never forget that a chain is only as strong as its weakest link </s>
<s> so it is spiritually </s>
<s> only he can satisfy the deepest longings </s>
<s> you can receive god into your heart and life by a step of personal faith </s>
<s> accept the sinless son of god jesus christ as your own personal saviour </s>
<s> the lord is the strength of my life </s>
<s> it was a session at which all the youngsters were told to express their fears to get them out in the open where they could talk about them freely </s>
<s> dr george w crane a medical columnist thinks it would </s>
<s> they are worry warts </s>
<s> yet they keep running from one physician to another largely to get a willing ear who will listen to their parade of troubles </s>
<s> we are evidently trying hard to think of new ways to deal with the problem of fear these days </s>
<s> it must be getting more serious </s>
<s> people are giving their doctors a hard time </s>
<s> look at the things we do to escape our fears and to forget our worries </s>
<s> we spend millions of dollars every year on fortune tellers and soothsayers </s>
<s> we spend billions of dollars at the race tracks and more billions on other forms of gambling </s>

<s> after all this destruction of old literature it should be obvious why we have so little information about the early history and development of the lo shu which was already semisecret anyhow </s>
<s> indeed mathematically speaking it was both functionally and symbolically the most important number in the entire diagram </s>
<s> and the latter is the total sum of all the numbers in the square by which all the other numbers are overshadowed and in which they may be said to be absorbed </s>
<s> furthermore the middle number of the lo shu is not only the physical mean between every opposing pair of the other numbers by reason of its central position </s>
<s> in fact the neat balance of these pairs and their subtle equilibrium would have had special meaning in the minds of the old chinese </s>
<s> for they considered the odd numbers as male and the even ones as female equating the two groups with the yang and yin principles in nature </s>
<s> thus all differences were leveled and all contrasts erased in a realm of no distinction and the harmonious balance of the lo shu square could effectively symbolize the world in balanced harmony around a powerful central axis </s>
<s> these twin tendencies seem to have reached their height in the han dynasty </s>
<s> later we shall see what happened when an emperor took this idea too literally </s>
<s> this trend has often been ascribed to the cult of the five elements itself as though they had served as the base for all the rest </s>
<s> obviously something suddenly caused them to start thinking in terms of fives and that may have been the workings of the lo shu </s>
<s> this whole tendency had an unfortunate effect on chinese thinking </s>
<s> scholars made numbered sets of as many things as possible in nature or assigned arbitrary numbers to individual things in a fashion that seems to the modern scientific mind as downright nonsensical and philosophical ideas based upon all this tended to stifle speculative thought in china for many centuries </s>
<s> although the primary mathematical properties of the middle number at the center of the lo shu and the interrelation of all the other numbers to it might seem enough to account for the deep fascination which the lo shu held for the old chinese philosophers this was actually only a beginning of wonders </s>
<s> for the lo shu square was a remarkably complete compendium of most of the chief religious and philosophical ideas of its time </s>
<s> as such one cannot fully understand the thought of the pre-han and han periods without knowing the meanings inherent in the lo shu </s>
<s> but conversely one cannot begin to understand the lo shu without knowing something about the world view of the old chinese which they felt they saw expressed in it </s>
<s> the chinese world view during the han dynasty when the lo shu seems to have been at the height of its popularity was based in large part on the teachings of the yin-yang and five-elements school which was traditionally founded by tsou yen </s>
<s> heaven acting through the tao expressed itself by means of the workings of two basic principles the yin and the yang </s>
<s> the yang or male principle was the source of light heat and dynamic vitality associated with the sun </s>
<s> while the yin or female principle flourished in darkness cold and quiet inactivity and was associated with the moon </s>
<s> together these two principles influenced all things and in varying combinations they were present in everything </s>
<s> we have already seen that odd numbers were considered as being yang while the even numbers were yin so that the eight outer numbers of the lo shu represented these two principles in balanced equilibrium around the axial center </s>
<s> during the han dynasty another yin-yang conception was applied to the lo shu considering the latter as a plan of ancient china </s>
<s> taking the former from the five sacred mountains of the han period and the latter from the principal river systems of old china </s>
<s> but in this respect it was merely following the accepted chinese convention for all maps </s>
<s> the same arrangement was used when the lo shu was equated with the nine provinces </s>
<s> and whenever the lo shu involved directional symbolism it was oriented in this same fashion </s>

<s> preparation for membership </s>
<s> it is important that persons desiring to unite with the church be prepared for this experience so that it may be meaningful and spiritually significant </s>
<s> it is unfair and unchristian to ask a person to take the sacred vows of church membership before he has been carefully instructed concerning their implications </s>
<s> preparation for church membership begins immediately after the commitment is received </s>
<s> the pastor writes a personal letter to each individual expressing his joy over the decision assuring him of a pastoral call at the earliest convenient time and outlining the plan for membership preparation classes and membership sunday </s>
<s> some pastors write a letter the same night the decision is reported by the visitors </s>
<s> it should not be postponed later than the next day </s>
<s> a helpful leaflet may be enclosed in the letter </s>
<s> the pastor calls in the home of each individual or family for a spiritual guidance conference </s>
<s> if possible he should make an appointment in order that all persons involved may be present </s>
<s> this is not a social call </s>
<s> he will discuss the significance of christian commitment the necessity of family religion and private devotions and the importance of the membership preparation sessions </s>
<s> there may be problems of conduct or questions of belief which will require his counsel </s>
<s> each conference should be concluded naturally with prayer </s>
<s> a piece of devotional material such as the upper room may be left in each home </s>
<s> a minimum of four sessions of preparation for membership is necessary for adults </s>
<s> some churches require more </s>
<s> none should ask less </s>
<s> those who join the church need to be instructed in the faith and the meaning of christian discipleship before they take the sacred vows </s>
<s> they will have a greater appreciation for the church and a deeper devotion to it if membership requires something of them </s>
<s> many churches find the sunday school hour to be the most practical time for adult preparation classes </s>
<s> others meet on sunday night at the mid-week service or for a series of four nights </s>
<s> some pastors have two sessions in one evening with a refreshment period between </s>
<s> the sessions should cover four major areas a </s>
<s> b </s>
<s> c </s>
<s> d </s>
<s> following each instruction period a piece of literature dealing with the topic should be handed each one for further reading during the week </s>

<s> fourth session important </s>

<s> men need unity and they need god </s>
<s> care must be taken neither to confuse unity with uniformity nor god with our parochial ideas about him but with these two qualifications the statement stands </s>
<s> the statement also points to a classic paradox the more men turn toward god who is not only in himself the paradigm of all unity but also the only ground on which human unity can ultimately be established the more men splinter into groups and set themselves apart from one another </s>
<s> to be reminded of this we need only glance at the world map and note the extent to which religious divisions have compounded political ones with a resultant fragmentation of the human race </s>
<s> massacres attending the partition of india and the establishment of the state of israel are simply recent grim evidences of the hostility such divisions can engender </s>
<s> the source of this paradox is not difficult to identify </s>
<s> it lies in institutions </s>
<s> institutions require structure form and definition and these in turn entail differentiation and exclusion </s>
<s> a completely amorphous institution would be a contradiction in terms </s>
<s> to escape this fate it must rule some things out </s>
<s> some persons are so sensitive to this truth as to propose that we do away with institutions altogether </s>
<s> in the present context this amounts to the advice that while being religious may have a certain justification we ought to dispense with churches </s>
<s> the suggestion is naive </s>
<s> man is at once a gregarious animal and a form-creating being </s>
<s> having once committed himself to an ideal which he considers worthwhile he inevitably creates forms for its expression and institutions for its continuance </s>
<s> to propose that men be religious without having religious institutions is like proposing that they be learned without having schools </s>
<s> both eventualities are possible logically but practically they are impossible </s>
<s> as much as men intrinsically need the unity that is grounded in god they instrumentally require the institutions that will direct their steps toward him </s>
<s> yet the fact remains that such institutions do set men at odds with their fellows </s>

<s> i shall touch on three areas personal national and theological </s>
<s> by personal factors i mean those rooted in personality structure </s>
<s> some interfaith tensions are not occasioned by theological differences at all but by the need of men to have persons they can blame distrust denounce and even hate </s>
<s> such needs may rise to pathological proportions </s>
<s> fortunately the number of pathological bigots appears to be quite small but it would be a mistake to think that more than a matter of degree separates them from the rest of us </s>
<s> to some extent the personal inadequacies that prejudices attempt to compensate for are to be found in all of us </s>
<s> interfaith conflicts which spring from psychological deficiencies are the most unfortunate of all for they have no redeeming features whatsoever </s>
<s> it is difficult to say what can be done about them except that we must learn to recognize when it is they rather than pretexts for them that are causing the trouble and do everything possible to nurture the healthy personalities that will prevent the development of such deficiencies </s>
<s> while the personality factors that aggravate interfaith conflict may be perennial nationalism is more variable </s>
<s> the specific instance i have in mind is the afro-asian version which has gained prominence only in this second half of the twentieth century </s>
<s> emerging from the two centuries of colonial domination the afro-asian world is aflame with a nationalism that has undone empires </s>
<s> as an obvious consequence obstacles to genuine interfaith communication have grown more formidable in one important area relations between christians and non-christians in these lands </s>
<s> colonialism alone would have been able to make these difficulties serious for christianity is so closely tied to colonialism in the minds of these people that repudiation of the one has tended automatically toward the repudiation of the other </s>
<s> actually however this turns out to be only part of the picture </s>
<s> nationalism has abetted not only the repudiation of foreign religions but the revival of native ones some of which had been lying in slumber for centuries </s>
<s> the truth is that any revival of traditional and indigenous religion will serve to promote that sense of identity and volksgeist which these young nations very much need </s>
<s> all this works severely against the kind of cross-cultural communication for which christian missions stand </s>
<s> africans and asians tend to consider not only missions but the local churches they have produced as centers and agents of western culture and ideology if not of direct political propaganda </s>
<s> the people hardest hit by this suspicion are of course christians on the mainland of china </s>
<s> but the problem extends elsewhere </s>
<s> for example in burma and ceylon many buddhists argue that buddhism ought to be the official state religion </s>
<s> again india has imposed formidable barriers against the entrance of additional missionaries and fanatical hindu parties are expected to seek further action against christians once the influence making for tolerance due to nehru and his followers is gone </s>
