<s> of course in prudential calculation in balancing the good directly intended and done against the evil unintended and indirectly done no greater precision can be forthcoming than the subject allows </s>
<s> he is not talking in the main about probabilities risks and danger in general </s>
<s> he is talking about double effects of which the specific action causes directly the one and indirectly the other but causes both </s>
<s> of which one is deliberately willed or intended and the other not intended or not directly intended but still both are done while the evil effect is with equal consciousness on the part of the agent foreknown to be among the consequences </s>
<s> it means to do it and to know one is doing it but as only a secondary if certain effect of the good one primarily does and intends </s>
<s> naturally where one or the other of the effects of an action is uncertain this has to be taken into account </s>
<s> especially is this true when because the good effect is remote and speculative while the evil is certain and grave the action is prohibited </s>
<s> presumably if the reverse is the case and the good effect is more certain than the evil result that may be forthcoming not only must the good and the evil be prudentially weighed and found proportionate but also calculation of the probabilities and of the degree of certainty or uncertainty in the good or evil effect must be taken into account </s>
<s> there must not only be greater good than evil objectively in view but also greater probability of actually doing more good than harm </s>
<s> nevertheless according to the traditional theory a man begins in the midst of action and he analyzes its nature and immediate consequences before or while putting it forth and causing these consequences </s>
<s> he does not expect to be able to trammel up all the future consequences of his action </s>
<s> above all he does not debate mere contingencies and therefore if these are possibly dreadful find himself forced into inaction </s>
<s> by contrast a good deal of nuclear pacifism begins with the contingencies and the probabilities and not with the moral nature of the action to be done </s>
<s> he bravely attempts to face this alternative realistically ie by considering the worst possible outcome namely the total domination of the world by russia within a few years </s>
<s> thus moral decision must be entirely deduced backward from the likely eventuality </s>
<s> it is no longer to be formulated in terms of the nature of present action itself its intention and proximate effect or the thing to be done </s>
<s> several of the replies to mr toynbee without conscious resort to the traditional terminology with regard to the permission of evil succeed in restoring the actual context in which present moral and political decisions must be made by distinguishing between choosing a great evil and choosing in danger of this evil </s>
<s> no political order or economic system is so clearly contrary to nature </s>
<s> but one does not have to affirm the existence of an evil order irredeemable in that sense or a static order in which no changes will take place in time to be able truthfully to affirm the following fact there has never been justitia imprinted in social institutions and social relationships except in the context of some pax-ordo preserved by clothed or naked force </s>
<s> on their way to the heavenly city the children of god make use of the pax-ordo of the earthly city and acknowledge their share in responsibility for its preservation </s>
<s> not to repel injury and uphold and improve pax-ordo means not simply to accept the misshapen order and injustice that challenges it at the moment but also to start down the steep slope along which justice can find no place whereon to stand </s>
<s> toynbee seems to think that there is some other way to give justice social embodiment </s>
<s> it is a proposal that justice now be served by means other than those that have ever preconditioned the search for it or preconditioned more positive means for attaining it in the past </s>
<s> this is to surrender in advance to whatever attack may yet be mounted to the very last </s>
<s> it is to stride along the steep slope downward </s>
<s> the only contrary action in the future as in the past runs the risk of war </s>
<s> and now and in the future unlike in the past any attempt to repel injury and to preserve any particular civilized attainment of mankind or its provisional justice runs some risk of nuclear warfare and the danger that an effect of it will by human action render this planet less habitable by the human race </s>
<s> finally just as no different issues are posed for thoughtful analysis by the foreshortening of time that may yet pass before the end of human life on this earth but only stimulation and alarm to the imagination the same thing must be said in connection with the question of what we may perhaps already be doing by human action to accelerate this end </s>

<s> this article presents our observations of that session of the realtors as they saw themselves and as the faculty and students saw them </s>
<s> such conversation quickly reveals an ethically significant ambivalence in the self-images held by most realtors </s>
<s> professional responsibility is seen to consist largely in serving the wishes of the client fairly and in an efficient manner </s>
<s> but as conversation goes on particularly among the realtors themselves another image emerges that of considerable power and influence in the community </s>
<s> judgments are continually rendered regarding the potential buyers income educational level and above all racial extraction </s>
<s> a narrow professionalism </s>
<s> the rationale for this avoidance was most frequently expressed in economic terms </s>
<s> all feared the supposed stigma they believed would inevitably attach to any realtor who openly introduced non-white particularly negro peoples into all-white restricted areas </s>
<s> realtors live in their communities as specialists in a given area of work as members of social and professional organizations as citizens and civic leaders as church laymen as university alumni as newspaper readers etc </s>
<s> from such communal roles the realtor finds the substance that shapes his moral understanding </s>
<s> there is some reality to this </s>
<s> but such a reaction obscures the powerful efforts made in the past by both nareb and its local boards for the maintenance of restrictive clauses and practices </s>
<s> also it does not recognize the elements of choice and judgment continually employed </s>
<s> like business and university groups generally these men had very limited knowledge of recent sociological and psychological studies and findings that might illumine the decisions they make </s>
<s> realtors both generally and in this group have invariably equated residential integration with a decline in property values a circumstance viewed with considerable apprehension </s>
<s> recent studies by the commission on race and housing and others however point to a vast complex of factors that often do not warrant this conclusion </s>
<s> there are increasing numbers of neighborhoods that are integrated residentially without great loss of property values the white population having taken the initiative in preparing the areas for an appreciation of the negroes desire for well-kept housing privacy etc </s>
<s> data on the decline of property values in an area after a new racial group enters it has to be assessed in terms of the trends in property values before the group comes in </s>
<s> often they are able to get in only because the area is declining economically </s>
<s> no one anticipates any radical shift in this situation but questions concerning reading habits the availability of such data and the places where it is discussed must surely be raised </s>
<s> the role of both church and university as sources of information and settings within which the implications of such information may be explored needs consideration </s>
<s> on the positive side recent federal action has largely undermined the legal sanction so long enjoyed by the segregationist position </s>
<s> anti-discriminatory statutes in housing have now been adopted by thirteen states and while specific provisions have varied the tendency is clearly toward expanding coverage </s>
<s> there are sins of omission as well as commission </s>
<s> the attitude adopted by realtors and their associations either negative or positive plays a large part in the public acceptance of such measures and the degree to which they may be effectively enforced </s>
<s> such a decision should have placed a powerful weapon in the hands of the entire housing industry but there is little evidence that realtors or at least their associations have repudiated the principle in such clauses </s>
<s> but as yet no real estate board has been willing officially to support such laws or to admit the permissibility of introducing minority buyers into all-white neighborhoods </s>
<s> one of the roles of the social scientist ethicist or theologian in our discussions with the realtors became that of encouraging greater awareness of the opportunities offered by the legal and political processes for the exercise of broad social responsibilities in their work </s>
<s> but responsiveness to these opportunities presumes that all of us judge the good as a human good and not simply as a professional white american good </s>
<s> such judgments are meaningful only in so far as persons are members of a world let us say a community that embraces scarsdale or yonkers but is also infinitely richer since it is all-inclusive </s>
<s> that community of all creation is then the ultimate object of our loyalty and the concrete norm of all moral judgment </s>
<s> racial discrimination is wrong then not because it goes against the grain of a faculty member trying to converse with a few realtors but because it goes against the grain of creation and against the will of the creator </s>
<s> thus moral issues concerning the nature of the legal and political processes take on theological dimensions </s>
<s> a fragmented society </s>
<s> our faculty and students pressed this issue more than any other </s>
<s> if we look about the world today we can see clearly that there are two especially significant factors shaping the future of our civilization science and religion </s>
<s> science is placing in our hands the ultimate power of the universe the power of the atom </s>
<s> religion or the lack of it will decide whether we use this power to build a brave new world of peace and abundance for all mankind or whether we misuse this power to leave a world utterly destroyed </s>
<s> we may feel pessimistic at the outlook </s>
<s> and yet there is a note of hope because this same science that is giving us the power of the atom is also giving us atomic vision </s>
<s> we are looking inside the atom and seeing there a universe which is not material but something beyond the material a universe that in a word is not matter but music </s>
<s> and it is in this new vision of the atom that we find an affirmation and an invigoration of our faith </s>
<s> atomic energy </s>
<s> to see this vision in perspective we need first of all a clear idea of the magnitude of this new power from the atom </s>
<s> you know that i could hold right here in my hand the little chunk of uranium metal that was the heart of the bomb that dropped on hiroshima </s>
<s> it was only about the size of a baseball </s>
<s> that is enough tnt to fill the tower of the empire state building </s>
<s> and with the availability of bombs of that size war became a new problem </s>
<s> now we might have restricted the use of uranium bombs by controlling the sources of uranium because it is found in only a few places in the world </s>
<s> but we had hardly started to adjust our thinking to this new uranium weapon when we were faced with the hydrogen bomb </s>
<s> hydrogen is just as plentiful as uranium is scarce </s>
<s> we know that we have hydrogen in water </s>
<s> water is af and the h stands for hydrogen </s>
<s> there is also hydrogen in wood and hydrogen in our bodies </s>
<s> i have calculated that if i could snap my fingers in one magic gesture to release the power of all the hydrogen in my body i would explode with the force of a hundred bombs of the kind that fell on hiroshima </s>
<s> and then think how little hydrogen we have in us compared with the hydrogen in delaware bay or in the ocean beyond </s>
<s> salt water is still af the same hydrogen is there </s>
<s> and the size of the ocean shows us the magnitude of the destructive power we hold in our hands today </s>
<s> of course there is also an optimistic side to the picture </s>
<s> for if i knew the secret of letting this power in my body change directly into electricity i could rent myself out to the electric companies and with just the power in my body i could light all the lights and run all the factories in the entire united states for some days </s>
<s> and think if we all knew this secret and we could pool our power what a wonderful public utility company we would make </s>
<s> with just the hydrogen of our bodies we could run the world for years </s>
<s> then think of delaware bay and the ocean and you see that we have a supply of power for millions of years to come </s>
<s> it is power with which we can literally rebuild the world provide adequate housing food education abundant living for everyone everywhere </s>
<s> an octillion atoms </s>
<s> now let us see where this power comes from </s>
<s> to grasp our new view of the atom we have to appreciate first of all how small the atom is </s>
<s> i have been trying to make this clear to my own class in chemistry </s>
<s> one night there were some dried peas lying on our kitchen table and these peas looked to me like a little group of atoms </s>
<s> i calculated first that there are about an octillion atoms in the average human body </s>
<s> then i calculated that a million peas would just about fill a household refrigerator </s>
<s> a billion peas would fill a small house from cellar to attic </s>
<s> a trillion peas would fill all the houses in a town of about ten thousand people </s>
<s> and a quadrillion peas would fill all the buildings in the city of philadelphia </s>
<s> imagine that there is a blizzard over pennsylvania but instead of snowing snow it snows peas </s>
<s> so we get the whole state covered with peas about four feet deep </s>
<s> you can imagine what it would look like going out on the turnpike with the peas banked up against the houses and covering the cars </s>
<s> pennsylvania thus blanketed would contain about a quintillion peas </s>
<s> but we still have a long way to go </s>
<s> then we have sextillion peas </s>
<s> and then we have septillion </s>
<s> finally we go into the farthest reaches of the milky way </s>
<s> we cover each of these with our blanket of peas and then at last we have octillion peas corresponding in number to the atoms in the body </s>
<s> so you see how small an atom is and how complicated you are </s>
<s> now although an atom is small we can still in imagination have a look at it </s>
<s> let us focus on an atom of calcium from the tip of the bone of my finger and let us suppose that i swallow a magic alice in wonderland growing pill </s>
<s> i start growing rapidly and this calcium atom grows along with me </s>
<s> i shoot up through the roof into the sky past the clouds through the stratosphere out beyond the moon out among the planets until i am over a hundred and fifty million miles long </s>
<s> then this atom of calcium will swell to something like a great balloon a hundred yards across a balloon big enough to put a football field inside </s>
<s> and if you should step inside of such a magnified atom according to the physics of forty years ago you would see circulating over your head down at the sides and under your feet some twenty luminous balls about the size of footballs </s>
<s> these balls are moving in great circles and ellipses and are of course the electrons the particles of negative electricity which by their action create the forces that tie this atom of calcium to the neighboring atoms of oxygen and make up the solid structure of my finger bone </s>
<s> since these electrons are moving like planets you may wonder whether there is an atomic sun at the center of the atom </s>
<s> so you look down there and you see a tiny whirling point about the size of the head of a pin </s>
<s> this is the atomic sun the atomic nucleus </s>
<s> even if the atom were big enough to hold a football field this nucleus is still only about the size of a pinhead </s>
<s> it is this atomic nucleus that contains the positive charge of electricity holding these negatively charged electrons in their orbits </s>
<s> it also contains nearly all the mass and the atomic energy </s>
<s> and since you are made of atoms you are nothing much but empty space too </s>
<s> if i could put your body in an imaginary atomic press and squeeze you down squeeze these holes out of you in the way we squeeze the holes out of a sponge you would get smaller and smaller until finally when the last hole was gone you would be smaller than the smallest speck of dust that you could see on this piece of paper </s>
<s> someone has remarked that this is certainly the ultimate in reducing </s>
<s> at any rate it shows us how immaterial we are </s>
<s> music of the spheres </s>
<s> for we believed that the electrons obeyed the law of mechanics and electrodynamics </s>
<s> and therefore the atom was really just a little machine </s>
<s> and in mechanics the whole is no more than the sum of the parts </s>
<s> so if you are made of atoms you are just a big machine </s>
<s> and since the universe is also made of atoms it is just a supermachine </s>
<s> and this would mean that we live in a mechanistic universe governed by the laws of cause and effect bound in chains of determinism that hold the universe on a completely predetermined course in which there is not room for soul or spirit or human freedom </s>
<s> and this is why so many scientists a half a century ago were agnostics or atheists </s>
<s> a suggestion from louis de broglie a physicist in france showed us that these electrons are not point particles but waves </s>
<s> and to see the meaning of this new picture imagine that you can put on more powerful glasses and go back inside the atom and have a look at it in the way we view it today </s>
<s> now as you step inside instead of seeing particles orbiting around like planets you see waves and ripples very much like the ripples that you get on the surface of a pond when you drop a stone into it </s>
<s> these ripples spread out in symmetrical patterns like the rose windows of a great cathedral </s>
<s> and as the waves flow back and forth and merge with the waves from the neighboring atoms you can put on a magic hearing aid and you hear music </s>
<s> it is a music like the music from a great organ or a vast orchestra playing a symphony </s>
<s> harmony melody counterpoint symphonic structure are there </s>
<s> and as this music ebbs and flows there is an antiphonal chorus from all the atoms outside in fact from the atoms of the entire universe </s>
<s> and so today when we examine the structure of our knowledge of the atom and of the universe we are forced to conclude that the best word to describe our universe is music </s>
<s> the island of nantucket part of the state of massachusetts lies about thirty-one miles southeast of its mother state </s>
<s> some of the island is sand and is not suitable for living </s>
<s> the island folk have their living almost entirely from summer visitors </s>
<s> the rest is obtained from harbor scallops </s>
<s> during about three and a half months of the year in the summer there are three boats that run from the mainland to the island carrying passengers food and cars </s>
<s> but the rest of the year only one boat is needed which ties up at the mainland nights and makes the trip down to nantucket in the daytime </s>
<s> this is a fine trip too on a good day </s>
<s> even more of an obstacle is the difficulty of separating the influence of christianity from other factors </s>
<s> although a complete picture cannot be given we can indicate some aspects of life into which the christian faith entered as at least one creative factor </s>
<s> at times we can say that it was the major factor </s>
<s> what in some ways was the most important aspect was the impact individually on the millions who constituted the nation </s>
<s> presumably those who did not have a formal church connexion had also felt the influence of christianity to a greater or lesser extent </s>
<s> many of them had once been members of a church or at least had been given instruction in christianity but for one or another reason had allowed the connexion to lapse </s>
<s> the form of christianity to which they were exposed was for some the protestantism of the older stock for others the protestantism of the nineteenth-century immigration </s>
<s> for still others mostly of the nineteenth-century immigration it was roman catholicism and for a small minority it was eastern orthodoxy </s>
<s> upon all of them played the intellectual social political and economic attitudes institutions and customs of the nation </s>
<s> upon most of these christianity had left an impress and through them had had a share in making the individual what he was </s>
<s> yet to determine precisely to what extent and exactly in what ways any individual showed the effects of christianity would be impossible </s>
<s> at best only an approximation could be arrived at </s>
<s> to generalize for the entire nation would be absurd </s>
<s> for instance we cannot know whether even for church members the degree of conformity to christian standards of morality increased or declined as the proportion of church members in the population rose </s>
<s> the temptation is to say that as the percentage of church members mounted the degree of discipline exercised by the churches lessened and the trend was towards conformity to the general level </s>
<s> yet this cannot be proved </s>
<s> we know that in the early part of the century many protestant congregations took positive action against members who transgressed the ethical codes to which the majority subscribed </s>
<s> thus baptist churches on the frontier took cognizance of charges against their members of drunkenness fighting malicious gossip lying cheating sexual irregularities gambling horse racing and failure to pay just debts </s>
<s> if guilty the offender might be excluded from membership </s>
<s> as church membership burgeoned such measures faded into desuetude </s>
<s> but whether this was accompanied by a general lowering of the moral life of the membership we do not know </s>
<s> what we can attempt with some hope of dependable conclusions is to point out the manner in which christianity entered into particular aspects of the life of the nation </s>
<s> we have already hinted at the fashion in which christianity contributed to education and so to intellectual life </s>
<s> we will now speak of the ways in which it helped shape the ideals of the country and of the manner in which it stimulated efforts to attain those ideals through reform movements through programmes for bringing the collective life to the nation to conformity to christian standards and through leaders in the government </s>
<s> throughout the nineteenth century christianity exerted its influence on american society as a whole primarily through the protestantism of the older stock </s>
<s> by the end of the century the roman catholic church was beginning to make itself felt mainly through such institutions as hospitals but also through its attitude towards organized labour </s>
<s> in the twentieth century its influence grew as did that of the protestantism of the nineteenth-century immigration </s>
<s> the american dream </s>
<s> the ideals of the country were deeply indebted to the protestantism of the older stock </s>
<s> with its zeal for liberty and its dependence on god it breathed the spirit which had been nourished on the evangelical revivals </s>
<s> the great seal of the united states was obviously inspired by the christian faith </s>
<s> here was what was called the american dream namely the effort to build a structure which would be something new in history and to do so in such fashion that god could bless it </s>
<s> america america god mend thy every flaw confirm thy soul in self control the liberty in law </s>
<s> o beautiful for patriot dream that sees beyond the years thine alabaster cities gleam undimmed by human tears </s>
<s> the american dream was compounded of many strains </s>
<s> some were clearly of christian origin among them the great awakening and other revivals which helped to make christian liberty christian equality and christian fraternity the passion of the land </s>
<s> some have seen revivalism and the search for christian perfection as the fountain-head of the american hope </s>
<s> here too must be placed unitarianism and less obviously from christian inspiration emerson transcendentalism and the idealism of walt whitman </s>
<s> reform movements </s>
<s> with such a dream arising at least in part from the protestant heritage of the united states and built into the foundations of the nation it is not surprising that many efforts were made to give it concrete expression </s>
<s> a number were in the nature of movements to relieve or remove social ills </s>
<s> significantly the initiation and leadership of a major proportion of the reform movements especially those in the first half of the nineteenth century came from men and women of new england birth or parentage and from either trinitarian or unitarian congregationalism </s>
<s> several of the movements were given a marked impetus by revivalism </s>
<s> quakers some from new england had a larger share than their proportionate numerical strength would have warranted </s>
<s> we do well to remind ourselves that from men and women of new england ancestry also issued the church of jesus christ of latter day saints the seventh day adventists christian science the american board of commissioners for foreign missions the american home missionary society the american bible society and new england theology </s>
<s> the atmosphere was one of optimism of confidence in human progress and of a determination to rid the world of its ills </s>
<s> we cannot take the space to record all the efforts for the removal or alleviation of collective ills </s>
<s> a few of the more prominent must serve as examples of what a complete listing and description would disclose </s>
<s> several were born in the early decades and persisted throughout the century </s>
<s> others were ephemeral </s>
<s> some disappeared with the attainment of their purpose </s>
<s> still others sprang up late in the century to meet conditions which arose from fresh stages of the revolutionary age </s>
<s> the anti-slavery movement </s>
<s> in the latter year samuel hopkins from whom the hopkinsian strain of new england theology took its name asked the continental congress to abolish slavery </s>
<s> as we have seen methodism early took a stand against slavery </s>
<s> the nineteenth-century immigration whether protestant or roman catholic was not so much concerned for very few if any among them held slaves they were mostly in the northern states where slavery had disappeared or was on the way out or were too poverty-stricken to own slaves </s>
<s> the anti-slavery movement took many forms </s>
<s> garrison massachusetts born of nova scotian parentage was by temperament and conviction a reformer </s>
<s> a marked impulse came to the anti-slavery movement through the finney revivals </s>
<s> finney himself while opposed to slavery placed his chief emphasis on evangelism but from his converts issued much of the leadership of the anti-slavery campaign </s>
<s> weld was the son and grandson of new england congregational ministers </s>
<s> a strong temperance advocate through the influence of a favorite teacher charles stewart another finney convert he devoted himself to the anti-slavery cause </s>
<s> a group of young men influenced by him enrolled in lane theological seminary and had to leave because of their open anti-slavery position </s>
<s> the majority then went to the infant oberlin </s>
<s> he shunned publicity for himself and sought to avoid fame </s>
<s> although he later broke with the churches because he believed that they were insufficiently outspoken against social evils he remained a devout christian </s>
<s> he was remembered chiefly for his fearless advocacy of abolition but he also stood for equal rights for women for opportunity for the freedmen and for prohibition </s>
<s> individuals possessing unusual gifts and great personal power were transmuted at death into awesome spirits </s>
<s> they were almost immediately worshipped for these newer even more terrible abilities </s>
<s> their direct descendants inherited not only their worldly fortunes but also the mandate of their newfound power as spirits in the other half of the universe </s>
<s> royal lineages could be based on extraordinary worldly achievements translated into eternal otherworldly power </s>
<s> thus the emperor could draw on sources not available to those with less puissant ancestors </s>
<s> but this eminence was not without its weighty responsibilities </s>
<s> since he possessed more power in an interdependent universe of living beings and dead spirits the emperor had to use it for the benefit of the living </s>
<s> the royal ritual generated power into the other world it also provided the living with a way to control the spirits and bring their powers directly to bear on the everyday affairs of the world </s>
<s> proper ritual observance at any level of society was capable of generating power for use in the spirit world </s>
<s> but naturally the royal ritual which provided unusual control over already supremely powerful divine spirits was held responsible for regulating the universe and insuring the welfare of the kingdom </s>
<s> the chinese emperor by proper observance of ritual manifested divine powers </s>
<s> he regulated the dualities of light and darkness yang and yin which are locked in eternal struggle </s>
<s> by swaying the balance between them he effected the alternation of the seasons </s>
<s> his power was so great that he even promoted and demoted gods according to whether they had given ear or been deaf to petitions </s>
<s> in this system no man is exempt from obligations </s>
<s> and to offend the dead meant to incur their wrath and thus provoke the unleashing of countrywide disasters </s>
<s> the family home was in fact a temple </s>
<s> and the daily duties of individuals were basically religious in nature </s>
<s> the dead spirits occupied a prominent place in every hope and in every fear </s>
<s> the common belief was that there existed one moral order which included everything </s>
<s> the dead controlled the material prosperity of the living and the living adhered to strict codes of conduct in order not to weaken that control </s>
<s> men believed they could control nature by obeying a moral code </s>
<s> if the moral code were flouted the proper balance of the universe would be upset and the disastrous result could be floods plague or famine </s>
<s> modern westerners have difficulty comprehending this fusion of moral and material largely because in the west the historical trend has been to deny the connection </s>
<s> living in urban conditions away from the deadweight of village constraint and the constrictions of a thatched-roof world view the individual may find it possible say to commit adultery not only without personal misgivings but also without suffering any adverse effects in his worldly fortunes </s>
<s> in china the magical system par excellence was taoism </s>
<s> it was this timeless unity that was all-important and not its temporary manifestations in the world of reality </s>
<s> the taoists believed the unity could be influenced by proper magical manipulation </s>
<s> in other words they were actually an organization of magicians </s>
<s> mahayana buddhism was no exception to these prevailing magical concepts </s>
<s> after this form of indian buddhism had been introduced into china it underwent extensive changes </s>
<s> during its flowering in the sixth to the eighth centuries mahayana offered a supernatural package to the chinese which bears no resemblance to the highly digested philosophical zen morsels offered to the modern western reader </s>
<s> mahayana had gods and magic a pantheon heavens and hells and gorgeously appareled priests monks and nuns all of whom wielded power over souls in the other world </s>
<s> the self-realized mahayana saint possessed superhuman powers and magic </s>
<s> the mahayana that developed in the north was a religion of idolatry and coarse magic that made the world into a huge magical garden </s>
<s> nonmagical confucianism was a secular rational philosophy but even with this different orientation it could not escape from the ethos of a cosmic government </s>
<s> confucianism had its own magic in the idea that virtue had power </s>
<s> this was not virtue as we understand the word today and it did not mean an abandonment of the belief in magic manipulation </s>
<s> propriety was synonymous with ritual observance the mark of a true gentleman </s>
<s> this in brief was the historical background out of which zen emerged </s>
<s> promoters of zen to the west record its ancestry and recognize that zen grew out of a combination of taoism and indian mahayana buddhism </s>
<s> proponents of zen to the west emphasize disproportionately the amount of mahayana buddhism in zen probably in order to dignify the indisputably magical taoist ideas with more respectable buddhist metaphysic </s>
<s> actually zen owes more to chinese quietism than it does to mahayana buddhism </s>
<s> so too was the insistence on the relativity of the external world and the ideas that language and things perceived by consciousness were poor substitutes indeed for immediate perception by pure indwelling spirit the opposition of pure consciousness to ratiocinating consciousness </s>
<s> zen maintains that cognitive things are only the surface of experience </s>
<s> one of its features attractive to the west is its irreverence for tradition and dogma and for sacred texts </s>
<s> one patriarch is supposed to have relegated sacred scriptures for use in an outhouse </s>
<s> but this is not the spirit of self-reliant freedom of action for which the westerner mistakes it </s>
<s> reality is considered not only irrelevant to the acquisition of higher knowledge but a positive handicap </s>
<s> it is important for an understanding of zen to realize that the esoteric preoccupations of the select few cannot be the doctrine of the common man </s>
<s> in the supernatural atmosphere of cosmic government only the ruling elite was ever concerned with a kingdom-wide ordering of nature popular religion aimed at more personal benefits from magical powers </s>
<s> early chinese anchoritism was theoretically aimed at a mystic pantheist union with the divine personal salvation being achieved when the mystical recluse united with divine essence </s>
<s> but this esoteric doctrine was lost in the shuffle to acquire special powers </s>
<s> the anchorite strove in fact to magically influence the world of spirits in the same way that the divine emperor manifested his power </s>
<s> thus the mahayana metaphysic of mystical union for salvation was distilled down to a bare self-seeking and for this reason the mystic in asia did not long remain in isolated contemplation </s>
<s> as the zen literature reveals as soon as an early zen master attained fame in seclusion he was called out into the world to exercise his powers </s>
<s> the early anchorite masters attracted disciples because of their presumed ability to perform miracles </s>
<s> exponents of zen often insist that very early zen doctrine opposed the rampant supernaturalism of china and proposed instead a more mature less credulous view of the universe </s>
<s> in support of this stories from the early literature are cited to show that zen attacks the idea of supernatural power </s>
<s> they went along the pass talking with each other for a short while until they came to a river roaring with torrent </s>
<s> there being no bridge the master had to stop at the shore </s>
<s> but his companion crossed the river walking on the water and beckoned to hwang pah to follow him </s>
<s> the monk then understood the spiritual attainment of hwang pah and praised him as a true mahayanist </s>
<s> a closer look at modern zen reveals many magical carryovers that are still part of popular zen attitudes </s>

<s> holiness without which no man will see god </s>
<s> the new birth is necessary because all have sinned </s>
<s> as it is written there is not one just man </s>
<s> there is none who understands </s>
<s> there is none who seeks after god </s>
<s> all have gone astray together </s>
<s> all have sinned and have need of the glory of god </s>
<s> the new birth is necessary because the natural man is spiritually dead and blind </s>
<s> therefore as through one man sin entered into the world and through sin death and thus death has passed unto all men because all have sinned </s>
<s> you also when you were dead by reason of your offenses and sins </s>
<s> and if our gospel also is veiled it is veiled only to those who are perishing </s>

<s> and that which is born of the spirit is spirit </s>

<s> you need the barbell variation to build width and mass in the pecs </s>
<s> the dumbbell variation develops a most classically sculptured outline to the aj </s>

<s> now good definition is one thing that all of us can acquire with occasional high-set high-rep light-weight workouts </s>
<s> this comes not alone from high-set high-rep training but from certain definition-specialization exercises which the champion selects for himself with the knowledge of exactly what works best for him </s>
<s> often these exercises work well for some bodybuilders but less spectacularly for others </s>
<s> only when the newest mr america or mr universe discovers them and puts them into practice are we reacquainted with them and once again see how effective they really are </s>
<s> why it was ever forgotten for even a moment i cannot say because it works perfectly for everyone no matter whether he has short or long thigh-bone lengths </s>
<s> the facet of muscular development that wins prizes </s>
<s> definition of the thighs at the uppermost part is quite commonly seen in most championship olympic lifters which is easily understandable </s>
<s> the one leg lunge is a split and all lifters practice this in their regular workouts </s>
<s> indeed a lighter weight works much better because a greater more extensive split can be performed </s>
<s> used in several sets of high reps once or twice each week it will not be long before your entire upper leg takes on a razor-sharp definition in which the muscles look like wire cables writhing and twisting under the skin </s>
<s> it places terrific tension on the leg muscles from start to finish of each repetition </s>
<s> it improves over-all balance and control for the bodybuilder and helps to make squats more easily and more correctly performed </s>
<s> it increases flexibility of the legs </s>
<s> it speeds muscle growth and power development even for the advanced bodybuilder because each hip and leg is exercised separately thus enabling a massive concentrated effort to be focused on each </s>
<s> place your power stands in position and adjust their height so that this will correspond to the height of your shoulders when you are in a deep leg split as for a heavy clean </s>
<s> place a suitably-loaded barbell across them </s>
<s> extend your feet forward and backward until you are in a deep leg split </s>
<s> now raise the weight by straightening your front leg without moving your feet </s>
<s> when the front knee is straight and locked allow it to bend again until you feel the bar come lightly into contact with the sides of the power stands </s>
<s> after you have taken a breather reverse the position of your legs so that the front thigh of the previous exercise is now to the rear and the rear thigh now to the front and perform the same movement in the same manner </s>
<s> you should have a couple of training partners to stand by when you make your first experiments just for safety </s>
<s> you should also begin this exercise with a very light barbell until you become accustomed to it balance-wise </s>
<s> squat-style lifters and leg-split lifters would both benefit enormously by practicing those variations providing that they remember to make alternate sets with the left and right leg to the front </s>
<s> pansies are supposed to like it cool but those great velvety flowers were healthy and perky in the glaring sun </s>
<s> i sought out the gardener and asked him what he did to produce such beauties in that weather </s>
<s> he seemed puzzled by my question </s>
<s> the more i talked with him the more convinced i became that that was the secret of their riotous blooming </s>
<s> of course his love was expressed in intelligent care </s>
<s> he planted the pansy seeds himself buying them from a pansy specialist </s>
<s> these specialists i learned have done a great deal of work to improve the size and health of the plants and the resulting flowers </s>
<s> their seeds produce vigorous blooming plants half again the size of the unimproved strains </s>
<s> i asked him if he took seeds from his own plants </s>
<s> occasionally when he had an unusual flower that he wanted more of he did </s>
<s> i fingered it and had the feeling of adequacy that comes with the right texture tilth and body </s>
<s> nothing is easier to grow from seed than pansies </s>
<s> they germinate quickly the tiny plants appearing in a week and grow along lustily </s>
<s> i like to make a seedbed right in the open though many people start them successfully in cold frames </s>
<s> if you do use a cold frame be sure that its ventilation is adequate </s>
<s> for my seedbed i use good garden soil with a little sand added to encourage rooting </s>
<s> i dig it rake it smooth sow the seeds and wet them down with a fog spray </s>
<s> then i cover the sowing with a board </s>
<s> this keeps it cool and moist and protects it from birds </s>
<s> ants carry away the seeds so better be sure that there are no ant hills nearby </s>
<s> when the first sprinkling of green appears i remove the board </s>
<s> a light porous mulch applied now keeps the roots cool and the soil soft during these early days of growth </s>
<s> i like sawdust for this or hay </s>
<s> every time you transplant a pansy you cause its flowers to become smaller </s>
<s> i put a little scoop of pulverized phosphate rock or steamed bone meal into each hole with the plant </s>
<s> that encourages rooting and the better developed the roots the larger and more plentiful the flowers </s>
<s> pansies are gluttons </s>
<s> i doubt if it is possible to overfeed them </s>
<s> i spade lots of compost into their bed </s>
<s> lacking that decayed manure spread over the bed is fine </s>
<s> one year i simply set the plants in the remains of a compost pile to which a little sand had been added and i had the most beautiful pansies in my or any of my neighbors experience </s>
<s> in addition to the rich soil they benefit by feedings of manure water every other week diluted to the color of weak tea </s>
<s> as a substitute for this organic fertilizer dissolved in water to half the strength in the directions may be used </s>
<s> they need mulch </s>
<s> we put a light mulch over the seedlings </s>
<s> now we must use a heavy one </s>
<s> three inches of porous material will do a good job of keeping weeds down and the soil moist and cool </s>
<s> when winter comes be ready with additional mulch </s>
<s> i like hay for this and apply it so that only the tops of the plants show right after a good frost </s>
<s> that keeps in the cold retains moisture and prevents the heaving of alternate freezing and thawing </s>
<s> the pansies i cherished most bloomed for me in february during a particularly cold winter </s>
<s> i started the seed in a flat in june and set out the little pansies in a cold frame </s>
<s> that cold frame was my morale builder </s>
<s> its mass of bright bloom set in a border of snow made my spirits rise every time i looked at it </s>
<s> like strawberries in december pansies are far more exciting in february than in may </s>
<s> try pegging down each separate branch to the earth using a bobby pin to hold it there </s>
<s> pick the flowers keep the soil dampened and each of the pegged-down branches will take root and become a little plant and go on blooming for the rest of the season </s>
<s> as soon as an experimental tug assures you that roots have taken over cut it off from the mother plant </s>
<s> a second and also good practice is to shear off the tops leaving an inch high stub with just a leaf or two on each branch </s>
<s> these cut-down plants will bud and blossom in record time and will behave just as they did in early spring </s>
<s> i like to shear half my plants at a time leaving one half of them to blossom while the second half is getting started on its new round of blooming </s>
<s> probably no one needs to tell you that the way to stop all bloom is to let the blossoms go to seed </s>
<s> that done her work is accomplished and she ignores the plant </s>
<s> here is a word of advice when you go shopping for your pansy seeds </s>
<s> go to a reputable grower preferably a pansy specialist </s>
<s> it is no harder to raise big healthy blooming plants than weak sickly little things </s>
<s> in fact it is easier </s>
<s> but you will never get better flowers than the seed you grow </s>

<s> that is not true </s>
<s> if the plants are cared for and protected over the winter the second year is more prolific than the first </s>
<s> remove about half the branches from each plant leaving only the strongest with the largest buds </s>
<s> the flowers will be huge </s>
<s> pansies have character </s>
<s> they stick to their principles insist upon their due but grow and bloom with dependable regularity if given it </s>
<s> a salad with greens and tomato is a popular and wonderfully healthful addition to a meal but add an avocado and you have something really special </s>
<s> this delightful tropical fruit has become well-known in the past thirty years because modern transportation methods have made it possible to ship avocados anywhere in the united states </s>
<s> you will find that avocado is unlike any other fruit you have ever tasted </s>
<s> it is roughly shaped like a large pear and when properly ripened its dark green skin covers a meaty melon-like pulp that has about the consistency of a ripe bartlett pear but oily </s>
<s> the flavor is neither sweet like a pear nor tart like an orange </s>
<s> it is subtle and rather bland nut-like </s>
<s> once you become an avocado fan you will look forward to the season each year with eager anticipation </s>
<s> naturally dormant and no spray danger </s>
<s> today refrigerated carriers have made the shipping of avocados possible to any place in the world </s>
<s> the fruit is allowed to mature on the tree but it is still firm at this point </s>
<s> it is brought to packing houses cleaned and graded as to size and quality and packed in protective excelsior </s>
<s> one of the most attractive things about avocados is that they do not require processing of any kind </s>
<s> there is no dyeing or waxing or gassing needed </s>
<s> if the temperature is controlled properly the avocado will delay its ripening until needed </s>
<s> and unlike other fruits one cannot eat the skin of the avocado </s>
<s> nutritious and a cholesterol reducer </s>
<s> good taste and versatility plus safety from spray poisons would be enough to recommend the frequent use of such a fruit even if its nutritional values were limited </s>
<s> avocados however are very rich in nutrients </s>
<s> their main asset is an abundance of unsaturated fatty acids so necessary for maintaining the good health of the circulatory system </s>
<s> the b vitamins are well represented especially thiamin and riboflavin </s>
<s> calcium phosphorus and iron are present in worthwhile amounts and eleven other minerals also have been found in varying trace amounts </s>
<s> none of these values is destroyed not significantly altered by refrigeration storage </s>
<s> dr wilson c grant of the veterans administration hospital coral gables florida and the university of miami school of medicine set out to discover if avocados because of their high content of unsaturated fatty acids would reduce the cholesterol of the blood in selected patients </s>
<s> they were put on control diets to determine as accurately as possible the normal cholesterol level of their blood </s>

<s> if our national interest lies in being able to fight and win a war rather than committing national suicide then we must take a much more penetrating look at ballistic missiles </s>
<s> we must determine whether missiles can win a war all by themselves </s>

<s> one must first detect a fleeting mobile or moving target decide that it is worthy of destruction select the missile to be fired against the target compute ballistics for the flight and prepare the missile for firing </s>

<s> let us suppose the russians decide to build a rail-mobile icbm force </s>
<s> the aircraft could be used to destroy other mobile fleeting and imprecisely located targets as well as the known fixed and hardened targets which can also be destroyed by missile </s>
<s> war under these circumstances cannot be one massive exchange of nuclear devastation </s>
<s> forces will survive a surprise attack and these forces will give depth or considerable duration to the conflict </s>

<s> they are not susceptible to wholesale destruction by ballistic missile </s>

<s> here then is our problem aircraft are vital to winning a war today because they can perform those missions which a missile is totally incapable of performing </s>
<s> but the airfield on which the aircraft is completely dependent is doomed by the missile </s>
<s> aircraft are mighty expensive if you can use them only once </s>
<s> this is the point on which so many people have written off the aircraft in favor of the missile </s>

<s> use nuclear propulsions to keep our long-range military aircraft in the air for the majority of their useful life </s>

<s> with such a force of manned bombers we could bring enormous pressure to bear on an enemy and this pressure would be selective and extremely discriminating </s>

<s> but for students of musical forms and would-be classifiers the work presents its problems </s>
<s> moreover the piece is written in five movements rather than the conventional four of most quintets and this gives the opus a serenade or divertimento flavor </s>
<s> the many and frequent performances of the trout serve to emphasize the dual nature of its writing </s>
<s> some renditions are of symphonic dimensions with the contrabass given free rein </s>
<s> other interpretations present the music as an essentially intimate creation </s>
<s> recently i was struck anew by the divergent approaches when in the course of one afternoon and evening i listened to no fewer than ten different performances </s>
<s> let me say at the outset that the music sounded as sparkling on the last playing as it did on the first </s>
<s> artur schnabel was one of the greatest schubert-beethoven-mozart players of all time and any commentary of his on this repertory is valuable </s>
<s> yet no detail was too small to receive attention from this master and as a result the playing here has humor delicacy and radiant humanity </s>

<s> it is moreover a perfectly integrated ensemble effort </s>
<s> helmut roloff playing with a group of musicians from the bayreuth ensemble gives a sturdy reading in much the same vein as that of the last-mentioned pianists </s>
<s> from the beginning of commercial recording new discs purported to be indistinguishable from the real thing have regularly been put in circulation </s>
<s> seen in perspective many of these releases have a genuine claim to be milestones </s>
<s> although lacking absolute verisimilitude they supply the ear and the imagination with all necessary materials for re-creation of the original </s>
<s> since the concept of high fidelity became important some dozen years ago the claims of technical improvements have multiplied tenfold </s>
<s> in many cases the revolutionary production has offered no more than sensational effects the first hearing was fascinating and the second disillusioning as the gap between sound and substance became clearer </s>
<s> other innovations with better claims to musical interest survived rehearing to acquire in time the status of classics </s>
<s> if we return to them today we have no difficulty spotting their weaknesses but we find them still pleasing </s>
<s> records sound like records because they provide a different sort of experience than live music </s>
<s> this difference is made up of many factors </s>
<s> some of them are obvious such as the fact that we associate recorded and live music with our responses and behavior in different types of environments and social settings </s>
<s> any alteration of one of these factors is distortion although we generally use that word only for effects so pronounced that they can be stated quantitatively on the basis of standard tests </s>
<s> yet it is the accumulation of distortion the fitting together of fractional bits until the total reaches the threshold of our awareness that makes records sound like records </s>
<s> the sound may be good </s>
<s> but if you know the real thing you know that what you are hearing is only a clever imitation </s>
<s> because of this only those with truly fine equipment will be able to appreciate the exact degree of the engineers triumph </s>
<s> the easiest way to describe this release is to say that it reproduces an interesting and effective steinberg performance with minimal alteration of its musical values </s>
<s> the engineering as such never obtrudes upon your consciousness </s>
<s> the effect of the recording is very open and natural with the frequency emphasis exactly what you would expect from a live performance </s>
<s> this absence of peaky highs and beefed-up bass not only produces greater fidelity but it eliminates listener fatigue </s>
<s> a contributing factor is the perspective the uniform aesthetic distance which is maintained </s>
<s> the orchestra is far enough away from you that you miss the bow scrapes valve clicks and other noises incidental to playing </s>
<s> yet you feel the orchestra is near at hand and the individual instruments have the same firm presence associated with listening from a good seat in an acoustically perfect hall </s>
<s> command has achieved the ideal amount of reverberation </s>
<s> the music is always allowed the living space needed to attain its full sonority </s>
<s> yet the hall never intrudes as a quasi-performer </s>
<s> the timbre remains that of the instruments unclouded by resonance </s>
<s> all of this would be wasted of course if the performance lacked authority and musical distinction </s>
<s> for me it has more of both elements than the majority of its competitors </s>
<s> steinberg seems to have gone directly back to the score discounting tradition and has built his performance on the intention to reproduce as faithfully as possible exactly what brahms set down on paper </s>
<s> those accustomed to broader more romantic statements of the symphony can be expected to react strongly when they hear this one </s>
<s> without losing the distinctive undertow of brahmsian rhythm the pacing is firm and the over-all performance has a tightly knit quality that makes for maximum cumulative effect </s>
<s> the presto ma non assai of the first trio of the scherzo is taken literally and may shock you as the real allegro con spirito of the finale is likely to bring you to your feet </s>
<s> in the end however the thing about this performance that is most striking is the way it sings </s>
<s> steinberg obviously has concluded that it is the lyric element which must dominate in this score and he manages at times to create the effect of the whole orchestra bursting into song </s>
<s> the engineering provides exactly the support needed for such a result </s>
<s> too many records seem to reduce a work of symphonic complexity to a melody and its accompaniment </s>
<s> the command technique invites you to listen to the depth of the orchestration </s>
<s> your ear takes you into the ensemble and you may well become aware of instrumental details which previously were apparent only in the score </s>
<s> it is this sort of experience that makes the concept of high fidelity of real musical significance for the home music listener </s>
<s> the home listener is overpowered all right but the experience is a far from pleasant one </s>

<s> the design of a mechanical interlocking frame is much like a mechanical puzzle but once understood the principles can be applied to any track and signal arrangement </s>
<s> in the frame are two sets of bars which interact with each other to prevent the operator from making dangerous moves </s>
<s> if the lever is pulled to clear a signal or move a switch the tappet moves a short distance lengthwise at the same time </s>
<s> close behind the plane of the tappets are the locking bars </s>
<s> these can also move a short distance but at right angles to the tappets </s>
<s> the number of locking bars required depends on how many false moves must be prevented </s>
<s> two or more dogs are mounted on each locking bar </s>
<s> these slide into and out of the notches in the tappets as the tappets are moved locking and unlocking them </s>
<s> this also pulls the tappet connected to the particular lever and forces any dogs seated in the notches to the side thus moving one or more locking bars </s>
<s> the dogs on the other ends of these locking bars are thus forced into notches in other tappets </s>
<s> by this scheme pulling one signal to clear locks all the other switch and signal levers in safe positions until the first signal is again restored to normal </s>
<s> there are other basic rules </s>
<s> a turnout may have two levers one to actually move the switch points the other to lock the points </s>
<s> a signal cannot be cleared until all the related turnouts are properly thrown and locked </s>
<s> the lock insures that the points are thrown all the way with no chance that a wheel flange will snag on a partly thrown point </s>
<s> the lines connecting the wedge-shaped dogs represent the locking bars at right angles to the tappet bars </s>
<s> in some low-speed situations the distant signal is fixed at caution </s>
<s> in other instances where there is no automatic block signaling the distant has only green and yellow aspects </s>
<s> so much for the prototype </s>
<s> frame </s>
<s> you may change the dimensions to suit a frame for more or fewer levers and locks as you wish </s>
<s> our instructions assume you are building this particular frame which is for a junction </s>
<s> when cutting the pieces dress the ends smooth and square with a smooth file or sanding disk </s>
<s> these will be drilled and tapped later on </s>
<s> solder it and the five locking bar spacers to the frame </s>
<s> cap with a af bar and tack-solder in place </s>
<s> remove all the loose spacing bars </s>
<s> mark and center-punch all the holes required for screws to hold this assembly together </s>
<s> either lay the components aside in proper order or code them with numbers and letters so they may be replaced in their proper positions </s>
<s> dress all surfaces with a file cleaning off all solder and drilling burrs </s>
<s> now reassemble the frame using af roundhead steel screws and nuts </s>
<s> number all the tappet bars before removing them so they can be replaced in the same slots </s>
<s> remove all other loose pieces and file the edges of the basic frame smooth </s>
<s> these are supporting members for the short locking bars </s>
<s> cut off excess screw lengths and file flush with either frame or nut </s>
<s> tappets and locking bars </s>
<s> to find the other stop screw position insert the tappet into the frame and hold the screw head tight against the frame edge </s>
<s> repeat these drill and tap operations for each of the tappet bars </s>
<s> these will serve as lifting pads for the electrical contacts </s>
<s> fitting the locking bars and making the locking pieces is a rather tedious job since stop screws tappets and locking bars must be removed and replaced many times </s>
<s> as the work progresses the frame and moving parts become a sort of chinese puzzle where several pieces must be removed before the part you are working on is accessible </s>
<s> a little extra work here will pay off with a smooth snug-fitting machine when you are finished </s>
<s> each completed locking bar should remain in place as the work progresses to insure snug fitting </s>
<s> the order of fitting is not too important </s>
<s> however we started with the first row of bars and worked our way back </s>
<s> since the same method of shaping and fitting the dogs and notches is used throughout we will only describe the construction of one locking bar </s>
<s> all the bars are cut from af brass </s>
<s> draw-file the edges square up the ends and put a slight chamfer on the edges so they will not snag in the frame </s>
<s> see the drawings for the shape of the notch </s>
<s> scribe v-shaped lines on the bar and rough out with either a hack saw or a cutting disk in a hand power tool </s>
<s> we used the latter equipped with a carborundum disk about </s>
<s> such disks are very handy for cutting and shaping small parts </s>
<s> file to a smooth finish </s>
<s> a barrette swiss pattern file is handy since its triangular shape with only one cutting face will allow you to work a surface without marring an adjoining one </s>
<s> endeavor to get the notches as much alike as possible </s>
<s> the notch should have a smooth finish so that the steel dog will slide easily over it </s>
<s> assemble the parts in the frame and test the sliding action of the mating pieces </s>
<s> all matching surfaces should be checked frequently and mated on a cut and fit basis </s>
<s> this tool can also be made with a lathe </s>
<s> scientists say that the world and everything in it are based on mathematics </s>
<s> math and the formulas that allow it to be applied to different problems are therefore essential to any scientific endeavor </s>
<s> hot rodding is a science </s>
<s> a guy can be an active and successful hot rodder for years without becoming even remotely involved with mathematical problems </s>
<s> however he will have a clearer understanding of what he is doing and the chances are he will be more successful if he understands the few formulas that apply to rodding </s>
<s> a mathematical formula is nothing more than a pattern for solving a specific problem </s>
<s> it places the various factors involved in the problem in their correct order in relation to each other so that the influence of factors on each other can be computed </s>
<s> the first step in using a formula is to insert the numerical values of the factors involved in their correct positions in the formula </s>
<s> the equation is used for the mathematical process of solving the problem </s>
<s> equations for rodding formulas are not complicated </s>
<s> they involve only simple mathematics that are taught in grammar school arithmetic classes </s>
<s> however it is essential that the various mathematical symbols used in the equations be understood so that the mathematical processes can be done properly and in their correct order </s>
<s> they indicate simple division multiplication subtraction and addition </s>
<s> the symbol for division is a straight line that separates two numbers placed one above the other </s>
<s> the lower number is always divided into the upper number af </s>
<s> it is used to separate two or more numbers in a row </s>
<s> for example af </s>
<s> numbers to be multiplied together may be multiplied in any order </s>
<s> the result will be the same regardless of the order used </s>
<s> the symbol for subtraction is the standard minus sign </s>
<s> this is nothing more than a dash </s>
<s> it separates two or more numbers </s>
<s> the number on the right of the symbol is always subtracted from the number on the left of the symbol </s>
<s> for example af </s>
<s> when more than two figures are separated by subtraction symbols the subtraction must be carried out from the left to right if the result is to be correct </s>
<s> the symbol is used to separate two or more numbers </s>
<s> for example af </s>
<s> numbers separated by addition symbols may be placed in any order </s>
<s> when solving an equation that involves division as well as other steps do all the division steps first to reduce those parts of the equation to their numerical value </s>
<s> multiplication subtraction and addition can then be accomplished as they appear in the equation by starting at the left end of the equation and working toward the right </s>
<s> completing the division first also includes those division parts that require multiplication subtraction or addition steps af </s>
<s> for use in formulas fractions should be converted to their decimal equivalents </s>
<s> the easiest way to do this is with a conversion chart </s>
<s> charts for this purpose are available from many sources </s>
<s> they are included in all types of mathematical handbooks and they are stamped on some types of precision measuring instruments </s>
<s> the various mathematical processes can be simplified by carrying the results to only two or three decimal places </s>
<s> shortening the results in this manner will not have any detrimental effect on the accuracy of the final result </s>
<s> a constant is a number that remains the same regardless of the other numbers used in the formula and the resultant equation </s>
<s> it is a number without which the equation cannot be solved correctly </s>
<s> rodding formulas apply to many phases of the sport </s>
<s> the answers they give can often pave the way to performance increases and quite often are necessary for completing entry blanks for different events </s>
<s> when it is needed one formula is as important as another </s>
<s> however some formulas are used more than others </s>
<s> engine displacement </s>
<s> a rodder should be able to compute the displacement of his engine </s>
<s> most entry blanks for competitive events require engine displacement information because of class restrictions </s>
<s> it is good to be able to compute displacement so that changes in it resulting from boring and stroking can be computed </s>
<s> pi is used in formulas concerned with the dimensions of circles </s>
<s> actually the engine displacement formula is the standard formula for computing the volume of a cylinder of any type with an added factor that represents the number of cylinders in the engine </s>
<s> the cross-sectional area of the cylinders is determined and then the volume of the individual cylinders is computed by multiplying the area by the stroke length which is the equivalent of the length of the cylinders </s>
<s> the formula is af </s>
<s> dimensions in inches and fractions of inches will give the displacement in cubic inches </s>
<s> the formula with the fractions converted to decimals becomes af </s>
<s> to arrive at the answer multiply the numbers together by starting at the left of the group and working to the right </s>
<s> the different steps will look like this af </s>
<s> compression ratio </s>
<s> cylinder volume can be determined mathematically but combustion chamber volume must be measured with a liquid </s>
<s> cylinder volume is determined in exactly the same manner as for the displacement formula af </s>
<s> to measure the volume of one of the combustion chambers in the cylinder head install the valves and spark plug in the chamber and support the head so that its gasket surface is level </s>
<s> then pour water or light oil from a graduated beaker into the chamber to fill the chamber to its gasket surface </s>
<s> do not overfill the chamber </s>
<s> this is possible with water and other liquids that have a high surface tension </s>
<s> such liquids will rise to a considerable height above the surface around the chamber before they will flow out of the chamber </s>
<s> the amount of liquid poured into the chamber is determined by subtracting the quantity still in the beaker when the chamber is full from the original quantity </s>
<s> however the displacement of the cylinder can be converted to cubic centimeters </s>
<s> the compression ratio arrived at with the formula will be the same regardless of whether cubic inches or cubic centimeters are used </s>
<s> the only precaution is that all volumes used in the formula be quoted in the same terms </s>
<s> the volume of the opening is added to the combustion chamber volume </s>
<s> another thing that must be taken into consideration is the volume of the area between the top of the piston and the top of the cylinder block when the piston is in top dead center position </s>
<s> compute this volume by measuring the distance from the top of the block to the piston head as accurately as possible with a depth micrometer or some other precision measuring device and then multiply the area of the cylinder by the depth </s>
<s> the formula for this step is af </s>
<s> this volume is added to the total volume of the combustion chamber and head gasket opening </s>
<s> after the factors just described have been computed they are applied to the following formula af </s>
<s> applying these figures to the formula we get the equation af </s>
<s> this method of computing compression ratio cannot be used accurately for engines that have pistons with either domed or irregularly shaped heads </s>
<s> any irregularity on the piston heads will make it impossible with normal means to determine the final combustion chamber volume because the volume displaced by the piston heads cannot be readily computed </s>
<s> the only way to determine the final combustion chamber volume when such pistons are used is by measuring it with liquid while the cylinder head is bolted to the cylinder block and the piston is in top dead center position </s>
<s> there are four versions of the formula that involves the relationships of car speed engine speed rear axle gear ratio and rear tire size </s>
<s> by using the appropriate version any one of these factors can be determined for any combination of the other three </s>
<s> to simplify the formulas a representative symbol is substituted for each of the factors </s>
<s> these are </s>
<s> mph for car speed </s>
<s> for engine crankshaft speed </s>
<s> for rear axle gear ratio </s>
<s> for tire size </s>
<s> tire size can be determined in several ways but the one that is the easiest and as accurate as any is by measuring the effective radius of a wheel and tire assembly </s>
<s> this is done by measuring the distance from the surface on which the tire is resting to the center of the rear axle shaft </s>
<s> a tire must be inflated to its normal hot operating pressure and the car must be loaded to its operating weight when this measurement is made </s>
<s> the measurement must be in inches </s>
<s> any fraction of an inch involved in the measurement must be converted to a decimal equivalent to simplify the mathematics </s>
<s> to determine car speed for a given combination of engine speed gear ratio and tire size the formula is af </s>
<s> to determine engine speed for a given combination of the other three factors the formula is af </s>
<s> using the same figures as for the previous example the equation becomes af </s>
<s> to determine the rear axle gear ratio for a combination of the other three factors the formula is af </s>
<s> using the figures from the previous examples the equation becomes af </s>

<s> picturing the south </s>
<s> foliage is the outstanding photo subject in many of the southern locales mentioned above and some specific tips on how and where to shoot it are in order </s>
<s> for example the chamber of commerce of gatlinburg tennessee sponsors special camera tours into the great smoky mountains to get pictures of the profusion of wild flowers flourishing in these wooded regions </s>
<s> exposure problems may occur in these forest areas where uneven lighting results from shafts of sunlight filtering through the overhead branches </s>
<s> best solution is to find an area that is predominantly sunlight or shade </s>
<s> in any instance you should determine the exposure according to the type of light which falls on most of the subject area </s>
<s> for shooting the interiors of the famous ante-bellum southern mansions make sure your equipment includes a tripod </s>

<s> the west </s>

<s> built upon seven hills istanbul like rome is one of the most ancient cities in the world filled with splendor and contrast </s>
<s> it is an exotic place so different from the ordinary that the casual tourist is likely to see at first only the contrast and the ugliness of narrow streets lined with haphazard houses </s>
<s> at the moment many of these are being pulled down </s>
<s> even when they are finished however the contrast will remain for istanbul is the only city in the world that is built upon two continents </s>
<s> about a thousand years after that when the roman empire was divided it became capital of the eastern section </s>
<s> when that was broken up after the first world war its name was changed once more </s>
<s> rich in christian and moslem art istanbul is today a fascinating museum of east and west that recently became a seaside resort as well with the development of new beaches on the bosphorus and the sea of marmara only a short distance from the center of town </s>
<s> easy to get to and becoming more popular every year it is only fourteen hours from new york by pan american world airways jet four hours from rome </s>
<s> start of tour </s>
<s> most of the sights lie in the old section across the golden horn from the modern hotels </s>

<s> across the bridge on the left i saw st sophia with its sturdy brown minarets and to the right of them the slenderer spires of the blue mosque </s>
<s> on the other side of the golden horn i rode through eminonu square with yeni cami or the new mosque which dates from the seventeenth century just across from the entrance to the bridge </s>
<s> at the top of the hill the buildings on the left gave way to a park </s>
<s> i got off there crossed the street walked ahead with st sophia on my left the blue mosque on my right and in a moment came to the entrance of st sophia </s>
<s> a few years later the dome fell in </s>
<s> nevertheless it remained one of the most splendid churches of the eastern empire where the byzantine emperors were crowned </s>

<s> inside over the first door i saw one of these which shows constantine offering the city to the virgin mary and justinian offering the temple </s>
<s> on the columns around the immense dome are round plaques with arabic writing </s>

<s> outside st sophia i walked through the flower garden in front of it with the blue mosque ahead on my left </s>
<s> across the street on my right i saw the hippodrome now a park </s>
<s> statues and other monuments that stood there were stolen mostly by the waves of crusaders </s>
<s> near the end of the hippodrome i came upon the built column a truncated obelisk of blocks all that remains of a monument that once rivalled the colossus of rhodes </s>
<s> magnificent mosque </s>
<s> retracing my steps to the mosque of sultan ahmet only one with six minarets i entered the courtyard with a gallery supported by pointed arches running around it and a fountain in the middle </s>
<s> one of the most beautiful buildings in istanbul it was constructed in the early years of the seventeenth century with a huge central dome two half domes that seem to cascade down from it and smaller full domes around the gallery </s>

<s> it stands in the middle of what was once the forum of constantine who brought it from rome </s>

<s> there i got off crossed the square and on the side directly opposite the gate found a good restaurant hard to come by in this part of the city </s>
