<s> note </s>
<s> directions are written for those who have had previous experience in making pottery </s>
<s> instructions for preparing clay drying glazing and firing are not given </s>
<s> equipment </s>
<s> basic pottery studio equipment </s>
<s> wooden butter molds and cookie presses </s>
<s> materials </s>
<s> ceramic modeling clay red white or buff </s>
<s> stoneware clay for tiles </s>
<s> glazes one-stroke ceramic colors stains cones as indicated in the individual instructions </s>
<s> general directions </s>
<s> use well-wedged clay free of air bubbles and pliable enough to bend without cracking </s>
<s> clean wooden molds and presses thoroughly </s>
<s> they must be free of oil wax and dust </s>
<s> pressing designs </s>
<s> the size of wooden mold will determine the amount of clay needed </s>
<s> roll clay to thickness indicated in individual instructions </s>
<s> whenever possible use the wooden mold as a pattern for cutting clay </s>
<s> when mold has more than one design cavity make individual paper patterns </s>
<s> place the cut clay piece loosely over the carved cavity design side of wooden mold </s>
<s> to obtain clear impression of mold press clay gently but firmly into mold cavity starting at center and working to outer edges </s>
<s> trim excess clay away from outer edges </s>
<s> check thickness of clay and build up thin areas by moistening surface with a little water and adding small pieces of clay </s>
<s> be sure to press the additional clay firmly into place without locking in air bubbles </s>
<s> to release clay from mold place hands in a cupped position around project </s>
<s> gently lift the edge on far side then continue to release edge completely around mold </s>
<s> slight tapping on the underside of mold will help release the clay but too much agitation will cause the clay to become soft and will interfere with removal of clay from mold </s>
<s> place a piece of plaster wall board or plaster bat on clay and reverse bat clay and mold in one action </s>
<s> this will prevent the clay from twisting or bending causing warping when fired </s>
<s> place project on table and carefully lift the mold off </s>
<s> study surface of clay for defects or desired corrections </s>
<s> if clay is slightly out of shape square straight sides with guide sticks or rulers pressed against opposite sides or smooth round pieces with damp fingers </s>
<s> if the background of design is too smooth or you wish to create a wood-grained effect it may be added at this time with a dull tool such as the handle of a fine paintbrush </s>
<s> leave the clay on plaster board to dry slowly covered lightly with a loose piece of plastic or cloth to prevent warping </s>
<s> rectangular tiles </s>
<s> back of clay scored or roughened for proper gripping surface </s>
<s> no bisque firing </s>
<s> decorated on unfired glaze with one coat of one-stroke ceramic colors </s>
<s> raised details of designs were colored in shades of yellow-green blue-green brown and pink </s>
<s> round plaque </s>
<s> opaque cantaloupe and transparent wood brown were used </s>
<s> no further firing </s>
<s> paperweight </s>
<s> paperweight may be personalized on back while clay is leather hard </s>
<s> unglazed </s>
<s> jars with lids </s>
<s> fill small hole in bowl with clay </s>
<s> measurements for rectangular pattern piece a are obtained by measuring inside circumference and depth of butter mold bowl </s>
<s> pattern for circular base piece b is diameter of aj </s>
<s> use wooden design head of mold for pattern c </s>
<s> pattern d for lid fits over top diameter of aj </s>
<s> pattern for inner lid piece e fits inside aj </s>
<s> jars are assembled in bowl of butter mold </s>
<s> place patterns on rolled clay and cut around them with knife in vertical position </s>
<s> place clay pieces on wall board </s>
<s> to assemble jar put paper pattern b for base in bottom of mold and clay disk b on top </s>
<s> line sides of mold with paper pattern aj </s>
<s> place clay piece a inside </s>
<s> use slip to join overlapped ends together </s>
<s> join b to bottom of a scoring and reinforcing with clay coil </s>
<s> trim excess clay from around lip of mold and set aside while assembling lid </s>
<s> to assemble lid press clay piece c in cavity of wooden design head </s>
<s> press clay into mold as instructed in general directions </s>
<s> score plain side of c and leave in mold </s>
<s> score one side of disk d join to c </s>
<s> score other side of d and one side of disk e and join as before </s>
<s> while assembled lid is still on design head gently but firmly press it on plaster board </s>
<s> if design head has a deep cavity clay lid will be quite thick at this point </s>
<s> check fit of lid on jar </s>
<s> if inner lid is too big trim to fit allowing room for thickness of glaze </s>
<s> remove lid from head of mold </s>
<s> remove jar from mold </s>
<s> place jar on plaster board with lid in place to dry slowly </s>
<s> for an antique effect on jars brush creek-turn brown toner on bisque ware and sponge it off </s>
<s> glaze with two coats of clear or transparent matt glaze </s>
<s> the large jar was brushed with creek-turn green toner and sponged off </s>
<s> glaze with two coats of matt glazes in turquoise with touches of blossom pink on lid </s>

<s> salt and pepper </s>
<s> use mold to cut four side pieces </s>
<s> for top and bottom pieces use short end of mold as measurement guide </s>
<s> press the side pieces of clay into cavity of mold </s>
<s> trim excess clay from rim of mold </s>
<s> score beveled edges and remove pieces from mold </s>
<s> place design-side up on plaster board </s>
<s> make all four sides </s>

<s> sugar and creamer </s>
<s> cut a strip of clay for sides long enough and wide enough for three impressions of mold design </s>
<s> press clay into cavity of one mold three times </s>
<s> bevel overlapping ends for splice joint score beveled edges </s>
<s> form clay strip into a cylinder </s>
<s> use slip to join scored ends </s>
<s> place cylinder on a disk of clay slightly larger than cylinder </s>
<s> score bottom edge of cylinder and join to disk with slip </s>
<s> trim away excess clay </s>
<s> reinforce seam with a coil of clay </s>
<s> this will form the sugar bowl </s>
<s> make creamer the same </s>
<s> to add handle place a wooden dowel against the inside wall of creamer </s>
<s> score outside of container where handle ends will be joined </s>
<s> bend handle </s>
<s> press scored handle ends firmly in place using dowel to reinforce container while pressing </s>
<s> use slip to join </s>
<s> to form spout between two designs dampen area slightly and gently push clay outward </s>
<s> make lid for sugar bowl the same as jar lids omitting design disk </s>
<s> cut a notch in lid for spoon handle if desired </s>
<s> set aside to dry with lid on sugar bowl </s>

<s> napkin holder </s>
<s> press the two sides into cavity of one mold three times </s>
<s> put cut pieces on plaster board to dry to firm leather-hard state </s>
<s> score side edges of base </s>
<s> join sides and base with slip and reinforce with coil </s>
<s> a cardboard pattern cut to fit inside holder will help to prevent warping </s>
<s> place pattern inside holder </s>
<s> do not use wood as it will not shrink with the clay and would cause breakage </s>
<s> let all projects dry slowly for several days </s>
<s> clean greenware </s>
<s> inside of pieces was glazed with three coats of creek-turn bottle green antique glaze </s>
<s> outside was finished with creek-turn brown toner brushed on and sponged off to give antique finish </s>
<s> changing colors </s>
<s> to change from one color yarn to another </s>
<s> when changing from one color to another whether working on right or wrong side pick up the new strand from underneath dropped strand </s>
<s> photograph shows the wrong side of work with light strand being picked up under dark strand in position to be purled </s>
<s> to measure work </s>
<s> spread article on flat surface to required width before measuring length at center </s>
<s> measuring armhole </s>
<s> to measure armhole </s>
<s> mark row on which first stitches have been bound off for armhole by drawing a contrasting colored thread through it </s>
<s> place work on a flat surface and smooth out </s>
<s> measure straight up from marked row </s>
<s> see illustration </s>
<s> to insert markers </s>
<s> in working always slip marker from one needle to another </s>
<s> to mark a row or stitch tie contrasting thread around end of row or stitch to be marked </s>
<s> backstitching seam </s>
<s> to sew seams with backstitch </s>
<s> most seams are sewn with backstitch especially on curved slanted or loose edges </s>
<s> pin right sides of pieces together keeping edges even and matching rows or patterns </s>
<s> thread matching yarn in tapestry needle </s>
<s> run end of yarn through several stitches along edge to secure </s>
<s> backstitch pieces together close to edge </s>
<s> do not draw yarn too tight </s>
<s> see illustration </s>
<s> to sew in sleeves </s>
<s> place sleeve seam at center underarm and center of sleeve cap at shoulder seam </s>
<s> ease in any extra fullness evenly around </s>
<s> backstitch seam </s>
<s> weaving seam </s>
<s> to weave seams together </s>
<s> straight vertical edges such as those at the back seam of a sock can be woven together invisibly </s>
<s> thread matching yarn in tapestry needle </s>
<s> hold edges together right side up </s>
<s> menfolk can ride in the forward cockpit where the helmsman has a clear view </s>
<s> the gals can sun themselves in the roomy aft cockpit </s>
<s> all are well distributed not crowded together near the stern </s>
<s> nor is she a wet boat </s>
<s> a lot of thought went into storage space construction </s>
<s> the cabin has several shelves for small items and storage under the bunks for water skiis life jackets etc </s>
<s> the aft cockpit has a af storage bin over six feet long that doubles as a seat </s>
<s> therefore the lumber is bought in planks and ripped to size for battens etc on a table saw </s>
<s> construction follows a thorough study of the drawings </s>
<s> start by laying out the six frames and the transom on a level floor </s>
<s> draw each outline in a different-color chalk one on top of the other </s>
<s> in this way you will be able to detect any obvious mistakes </s>
<s> after notching it for the keelson chines and battens the half-inch plywood transom is secured to it with glue and the same type nails </s>
<s> the frames are notched only for the keelson and the chines </s>
<s> if notched for the battens they would require more work be weakened and limber holes would have to be bored so that bilge water could flow through </s>
<s> nowhere in the boat do the frames come in contact with the plywood planking </s>
<s> the jig is erected after the frames and transom are complete </s>
<s> this is an important step because any misalignment would cause progressively worse misalignment in the hull as you advance in construction </s>
<s> be sure all members are parallel vertical and level as required </s>
<s> the frames are glued and screwed to this piece </s>
<s> the joints are also reinforced on each side with small blocks set in resin-saturated fiberglas cloth and nailed </s>
<s> it is over this piece that the laminated stem and keelson are spliced </s>
<s> the keelson made of two three-inch widths is next installed </s>
<s> the first piece is glued and screwed to the frames and transom and the piece butted between frames one and two </s>
<s> the second piece is in turn glued and screwed to the first </s>
<s> note however that it is six inches shorter at the forward end </s>
<s> a stem jig is next cut to the proper shape and temporarily fastened to frame one </s>
<s> the stem is laminated from four pieces </s>
<s> take two three-inch-wide pieces and rip them down the center of the thickness to make the four </s>
<s> then spread a generous amount of glue on the four pieces and bend them into place on the jig </s>
<s> the first two pieces butt against the inner member of the keelson and are glued and screwed to the brace between the first two frames </s>
<s> the second two pieces lap over the inner member of the keelson and butt against the outer member </s>
<s> a number of c clamps hold the pieces together on the jig until the glue sets </s>
<s> all bottom battens are two inches wide </s>
<s> the side ones are a half-inch narrower </s>
<s> the battens are carefully fastened in place after some necessary fairing on all frames </s>
<s> placement is important because the rear seat bunks and front jump seats rest on or are fastened to many of the side battens </s>
<s> with the exception of two battens all run to the stem where they are glued and screwed after careful beveling </s>
<s> the chines go in the same way except that they are made of two pieces of two-inch wood for strength and easier bending </s>
<s> fairing is always a tedious job but the work can be cut down considerably with a skill planer and a simple jig </s>
<s> the aluminum flush against the battens acted as a fairing stick and enabled me to plane the chines and keelson to the proper bevels easily </s>
<s> four pieces are used </s>
<s> another person inside with a weight against each batten will help in the fastening </s>
<s> the best procedure is to have a few friends hold the planking in place while you mark it off </s>
<s> then trim the excess </s>
<s> i used a homemaster routo-jig made by porter cable for this job </s>
<s> when cut the planking is clamped in place for a final and careful trimming </s>
<s> then it is marked on the inside where it comes in contact with the transom frames keelson and all the battens </s>
<s> it may then be pre-drilled for the fastenings </s>
<s> the next step is to remove it and spread glue where it has been marked at the contact points </s>
<s> then it is replaced and fastened </s>
<s> the bottom planking is applied in the same manner </s>
<s> after planking the bottom gets a layer of fiberglas </s>
<s> the spray rails are first glued on the outside and fastened from the inside with screws </s>
<s> then the chines are rounded off and the bottom is rough-sanded in preparation </s>
<s> since the sides are also covered up to the spray rails they are also rough-sanded in that area </s>
<s> the cloth is laid on one half of the bottom at a time </s>
<s> lay the cloth in place and trim it to size </s>
<s> then remove it and give the whole bottom a coat of resin </s>
<s> when the resin has hardened mix up another batch with a pigment added if you wish </s>
<s> i used bright red mixing the pigment in thoroughly before adding the hardener </s>
<s> using a cheap brush coat one side of the bottom with the resin and then apply the cloth </s>
<s> when the cloth is smooth apply another coat of resin spreading it with a paint roller </s>
<s> be sure it is well saturated and then allow it to harden </s>
<s> when the whole bottom has hardened use a disk sander to feather the edges of the cloth at the keel line and near the spray rail </s>
<s> then lay a three-inch-wide strip of cloth along the keel line from the transom to the point of the stem </s>
<s> before the resin has hardened screw a one-inch mahogany keel strip along the centerline </s>
<s> this protects the bottom in beaching </s>
<s> they will also supply literature on application </s>
<s> i set it on the gator trailer </s>
<s> i laid three layers of glass cloth on the inside of the stem also installing a bow eye at this time </s>
<s> for added strength i also fastened a small block on each side of every frame and batten joint </s>
<s> again these blocks were set in resin-saturated glass cloth and nailed </s>
<s> after trimming off the excess on the frames and transom which was used to fasten them to the jig at a working height the top of the side planking is installed </s>
<s> this is made up of scraps left over from the sides and bottom </s>
<s> these flaring parts really help to keep the boat dry </s>
<s> the sides of the motor well run from the bottom battens to the top and from frame six to the transom forming a real strong transom brace </s>
<s> note another piece of wood six inches wide is fastened to the transom between these pieces </s>
<s> the decking is quarter-inch mahogany marine plywood </s>
<s> all the flooring and the storage bin is half-inch exterior fir plywood </s>
<s> most floor battens are glued and screwed to the flooring </s>
<s> the exception is where the flooring butts </s>
<s> these battens are glued and screwed to the frames </s>
<s> with all deck battens in place the bilge is cleaned and painted up to the floor line </s>
<s> use one coat of firzite and one coat of marine paint </s>
<s> bottoms of the floorboards are also painted and the flooring is then screwed in place </s>
<s> after the decking is on the cabin sides are installed </s>
<s> the windshield glass is shatterproof and plexiglas is used in the cabin </s>
<s> inside bunks are framed up and installed as indicated </s>
<s> a head is a handy thing to have and i installed one under a removable section of the port bunk </s>
<s> the sink in the hinged panel above the bunk drains into the head and a five-gallon water tank is mounted on the bulkhead above the sink </s>
<s> for padding the seats and bunks i used ensolite type aj </s>
<s> lightweight non-absorbent fire resistant and dimensionally stable it is easily bonded to the wood with contact cement </s>
<s> available in af sheets it costs about a dollar a square foot </s>
<s> you can build this vacation cottage yourself </s>
<s> because of the unique design by the architect egils hermanovski you can build most of it in your own home workshop in your spare time </s>
<s> most of it is panelized and utilizes standard materials and requires the use of only simple tools </s>
<s> on the following pages and in the following issues we take you every step of the way to your vacation cottage from choosing the proper site to applying the final trim </s>
<s> in recognition of the growing trend for second homes or vacation cottages we have designed this one specifically with the family handyman in mind </s>
<s> it is a big project not to be taken lightly </s>
<s> but each step has been broken down into easy stages utilizing standard materials and simple tools well within the capabilities of the handyman </s>
<s> the theory </s>
<s> the idea behind our design is modular units or panelization </s>
<s> everything possible has been scaled to standard sizes and measurements of materials </s>
<s> wall panels and structural timbers are standard as are windows and doors making for a minimum of cutting </s>
<s> we have developed an ingenious method of interlocking these so that you can make the major part of your house in your own workshop panel by panel according to plan </s>
<s> thus when you have prepared your foundation and laid the floor these can be trucked to the site and erected with a small crew of friends in a weekend </s>
<s> the roof timbers are precut and the panels standard so that the house can be completely enclosed in a matter of three or four days </s>
<s> then you can do the finishing touches at your leisure </s>
<s> a warning </s>
<s> due to the fact that building codes and regulations vary so much throughout the country the first thing to do is to find out what if any they are </s>
<s> close to a large city they might even specify the size of the nails used </s>
<s> in a remote section there might be no restrictions at all </s>
<s> this can usually be found out at the nearest town hall </s>
<s> at the same time check the electrical plumbing and sanitary requirements as well as possible zoning regulations </s>
<s> be sure that this information is reasonably official and not just an unfounded opinion </s>
<s> if there are any major restrictions they usually can be obtained in printed form </s>
<s> where a building permit is required find out what you must present when applying for one </s>
<s> in many cases you must file a complete set of plans with the local building inspector </s>
<s> these will be available at cost from our plans department </s>
<s> the site </s>
<s> is there evidence of wash-outs on the property </s>
<s> a visit in the early spring after a thaw will be very informative </s>
<s> note where the sun rises and sets and ask which direction the prevailing winds and storms come from </s>
<s> we will take up alternative foundations later on </s>
<s> the materials </s>
<s> this will permit you to get a rough estimate of how much the materials for the shell will cost </s>
<s> bear in mind that this does not include interior panels for partitions fancy flooring appliances and fixtures electrical wiring and plumbing all of which will be taken up in detail in later issues </s>
<s> the wall panels are constructed of a framework of standard af and af of a good grade free from structural faults </s>
<s> they should be as straight as possible as this will effect their ability to mesh properly when the walls are erected </s>
<s> the outside surface of the solid units shall be of an exterior grade of panel board such as plywood plastic coated panel board high density particle board asbestos-cement board or any other product locally obtainable upon recommendation of your building supply dealer </s>
<s> the inner panels do not have to be weatherproof and the choice will depend on the quality of finish desired </s>
<s> all panel board comes in standard af foot size </s>
<s> it is recommended that panels be both glued as well as nailed to the frame </s>
<s> the louvers are constructed as shown in the detail with a drop door for ventilation </s>
<s> there are standard sliding glass windows in wood or aluminum frames for those panels requiring them </s>
<s> the door panels are designed to accommodate standard doors which should be of exterior grade </s>
<s> the filler panels for the gable ends are cut from full af sheets as shown leaving no wastage </s>
<s> the battens covering the joints are of af stock and are applied after the walls are erected </s>
<s> all nails should be rustproof and aluminum is highly recommended </s>
<s> other thicknesses may necessitate ripping a special size lumber for the glass trim </s>
<s> in any case there is no special milling or rabbeting required for the panels </s>
<s> with modern techniques of woodworking and the multitude of cutting tools fixtures and attachments available the drill press has become a basic home workshop tool </s>
<s> there is often a means of locking the quill and on larger presses the table can be tilted </s>
<s> the head is mounted on a horizontal arm that swivels on the supporting column to position the drill bit instead of the work </s>
<s> set-up and maintenance </s>
<s> the drill press should be leveled and depending on whether it is a bench or floor model bolted securely to a sturdy bench or stand or screwed to the floor with lag or expansion screws </s>
<s> this will reduce vibration and increase accuracy </s>
<s> a coat of paste wax or a rubdown with a piece of wax paper will protect the polished surface of the table </s>
<s> wiping with a slightly oiled cloth will discourage rusting of the column and quill </s>
<s> presses not fitted with sealed spindle bearings will need a drop of oil now and then in the lubrication holes in the quill </s>
<s> the rest of the press should be kept clean by dusting with a clean rag or brush </s>
<s> be careful to keep the drive belt free of oil and grease </s>
<s> belt tension is adjusted by manipulation of two locking bolts and a movable motor mount </s>
<s> excess tension will only cause undue wear on the motor and spindle bearings </s>
<s> most drill presses have a quill return spring that raises the spindle automatically when the feed lever is released and holds the quill in the raised position </s>
<s> turning the housing clockwise will reduce tension counter-clockwise will increase it </s>
<s> some manufacturers have had the foresight to provide a socket for the chuck key </s>
<s> feeds and speeds </s>
<s> drill speeds are important if you want a good job </s>
<s> each cutting tool will operate best at a given speed depending on the material worked </s>
<s> on most drill presses it is impossible to get the exact speed but you can come close by adjusting the drive belt on the step-cone pulleys </s>
<s> you will find a chart giving the various speed ratios available with your particular drill press somewhere in the instruction booklet that came with the tool </s>
<s> generally the larger the tool and the harder the material the slower the speed </s>
<s> feed pressure is also of major importance </s>
<s> too much pressure will force the tool beyond its cutting capacity and result in rough cuts and jammed or broken tools </s>
<s> too light a feed particularly with metal or other hard material causes overheating of the tool and burning of the cutting edge </s>
<s> the best results will be obtained by matching the correct speed with a steady feed pressure that lets the tool cut easily at an even rate </s>
<s> common drilling tools </s>
<s> there are numerous types and styles of tools to drill holes </s>
<s> the most common are the twist drill the solid center shaft with interchangeable cutting blades the double spur bit and the power wood bit </s>
<s> the adjustable fly cutter is very useful for cutting large diameter holes and can be used to cut exact-size discs by reversing the cutter blade </s>
<s> since fly cutters are one sided and not balanced they should be used at the slowest speed available and fed very slowly to avoid binding </s>
<s> fly cutters can fool you into putting your hand too close to the tool so if you want to avoid nicked fingers keep your hands well out of the way </s>
<s> simple hole drilling operations </s>
<s> when drilling all the way through a workpiece always place a piece of scrap wood underneath </s>
<s> this will not only protect the work table but also assure a clean breakthrough </s>
<s> another method of assuring a clean hole is to first drill a small pilot hole all the way through then drill half way with the dimensional bit turn the piece over and finish from the other side </s>
<s> in soft woods with pronounced grain there is sometimes a tendency for the hole to wander due to the varying hardness of the wood </s>
<s> in this case drilling a small pilot hole or clamping the work will do much to improve accuracy </s>
<s> when a hole is to be bored to a predetermined depth mark the depth on the side of the stock then run the bit down so that it is even with the mark </s>
<s> the depth gauge rod can now be set and any number of holes bored to exact and identical depth </s>

<s> home air conditioning has come a long way from the early days of overcooled theaters and the thermal shock they inflicted </s>
<s> we know too that health is never harmed by summer cooling </s>
<s> on the contrary there are fewer colds and smaller doctor bills </s>
<s> the filtered air benefits allergies asthma sinus hay fever </s>
<s> control of temperature and humidity is a godsend to the aged and the invalid </s>

<s> that brings its per-year cost down mighty low </s>
<s> for any house </s>
<s> no matter what style your home is ranch two-story colonial or contemporary central air conditioning is easily installed </s>
<s> it can go in out-of-the-way waste space </s>
<s> manufacturers have designed equipment for just such circumstances and your savings over starting from scratch will be substantial </s>
<s> if your house is to have a forced warm air system cooling can be a part of it </s>
<s> this costs less than having a completely separate cooling system for your regular heating ductwork filters and furnace blower do double duty for cooling </s>
<s> the units can be installed in basement attic crawlspace or in a closet located in the living area </s>
<s> from the coil small copper pipes connect to a weatherproof refrigeration section set in the yard garage carport or basement </s>
<s> if you plan to add cooling later to your heating system there are things to watch for </s>
<s> be sure ducts that require insulation get it when they are installed </s>
<s> they may be inaccessible later </s>
<s> be sure your ducts and blower are big enough to handle cooling </s>
<s> this is especially important if you live in a mild-winter zone </s>
<s> be sure you get a perimeter heating system and diffusers that will work as well for cooling as they do for heating </s>
<s> you can get a hot water system that will also work for cooling your house </s>
<s> for cooling chilled water is circulated instead of hot water </s>
<s> separate systems </s>
<s> if the problems of combining cooling with your heating are knotty it may be cheaper to plan on a completely separate cooling system </s>
<s> the simplest kind of separate system uses a single self-contained unit </s>
<s> it is in effect an oversize room conditioner equipped with prefab glass-fiber ducts to distribute the cooled cleaned dehumidified air where it is wanted </s>
<s> in a long rambling ranch two such units can be installed one serving the living area the other the sleeping zone </s>
<s> in a two-story house one unit may be installed in the basement to serve the first floor another in the attic to cool the second </s>
<s> in each case having separate systems for living and sleeping areas has the advantage of permitting individual zone control </s>
<s> the heat pump </s>
<s> one of the more remarkable of the new cooling systems is one that can be switched to heating </s>
<s> as you know a conditioner makes indoor air cool by pumping the heat out of it and then releasing this heat outdoors </s>
<s> a relatively simple switching arrangement reverses the cycle so that the machine literally runs backward and the heat is extracted from outdoor air and turned indoors </s>
<s> how large a cooling unit you need and the method of its installation depends on a variety of factors </s>
<s> among other things besides the nature of your house and how much heat finds its way into its various rooms from the outside it will depend upon your personal habits and the makeup of your family </s>
<s> if you are a party thrower you may need added capacity </s>
<s> cooling requirements are best expressed in terms of aj </s>
<s> a btu is a unit of heat and the btu rating of a conditioner refers to how much heat your machine can pump out of your house in an hour </s>
<s> coolers are also rated by tons </s>
<s> a ton of cooling compares to the cooling you get by melting a ton of ice </s>
<s> you may find a conditioner rated by horsepower </s>
<s> the safest procedure is to let your builder estimate the size of the unit you need rather than trying to do this yourself </s>
<s> better to have your equipment slightly undersized than too big </s>
<s> reducing humidity is often as important as cooling </s>
<s> an oversize unit will cool off your house quickly then shut down for a long period </s>
<s> before it cycles on again humidity can build up and make you uncomfortable even though the temperature is still low </s>
<s> with a unit of the right size a compressor will run continuously during hot weather reducing humidity as evenly as it does temperature </s>
<s> money-saving tips </s>
<s> attention to details can cut in half the size unit you need and pare operating expense proportionately </s>
<s> in a new house generous roof overhangs are a logical and effective solution </s>
<s> shade trees too are a big help so keep them if you can </s>
<s> drawn blinds and draperies do some good but not nearly as much as shading devices on the outside of the house </s>
<s> the more directly the sun strikes walls and roof the greater its heat impact </s>
<s> a shift in the walls or a change in the roof slope so the sun hits them more obliquely can save you money </s>
<s> you can use heat-absorbing glass to stop the sun double glass and insulated glass to combat condensation </s>
<s> restrict large glass areas to the north and south sides of the house </s>
<s> an attic space above insulation makes a house easier to cool </s>
<s> gas adds to the moisture load </s>
<s> insulate weatherstrip double-glaze to the maximum </s>
<s> such extra-thick insulation not only permits a much smaller cooling installation but will continue to reduce operating expenses both in heating and cooling </s>
<s> it costs two to three times as much to remove a btu in summer as it does to add one in winter so every solitary btu is worth attention </s>
<s> keeping conditioners quiet </s>
<s> avoid attic placement directly above a bedroom </s>
<s> most recreation work calls for a good deal of pre-planning </s>
<s> this is particularly true in site selection </s>
<s> you must know before you start what the needs and objectives of your organization are </s>
<s> you must have a list of requirements on where how many and what type sites are needed </s>
<s> with such a program you can make constructive selections of the best sites available </s>
<s> begin the examination of a site with a good map and aerial photos if possible </s>
<s> these are becoming more and more available through the work of counties and other government agencies </s>
<s> the new editions of topographic maps being made by the federal government are excellent for orienting yourself to the natural features of the site </s>
<s> in recent years many counties and the u s forest service have taken aerial photos which show features in detail and are very good for planning use </s>
<s> inspect the site in the field during the time of the year when the area will be most heavily used for recreation </s>
<s> this gives you a better opportunity to get the feel of the climate conditions the exposure to the sun and wind the water interests etcetera which vary greatly with the seasons </s>
<s> it is usually helpful to make a sketch map in the field showing the size and location of the features of interest and to take photographs at the site </s>
<s> these are a great aid for planning use back at the office </s>
<s> for site planning work it is best to have a qualified and experienced park planner to carry through the study </s>
<s> however there is also much to be gained by making use of the abilities of the local people who are available and interested in recreation </s>
<s> county judges commissioners engineers assessors and others who have lived in the area for a long time may have valuable knowledge regarding the site or opinions to offer from their varied professional experiences </s>
<s> a visit to the site by a group of several persons can usually bring out new ideas or verify opinions most helpful to the planning study of any recreation area </s>
<s> this of course depends on the character of the site itself the previous experience of the investigator and the number of factors needed to arrive at a good decision </s>
<s> it is too easy for the inexperienced person to make a quick judgment of a few values of the area and base a decision on these alone </s>
<s> usually there are more factors to good site planning than first impressions </s>
<s> a site may be a rundown slum or a desolate piece of desert in appearance today but have excellent potentials for the future with a little development or water </s>
<s> the same is true of areas which at first look good because of a few existing recreation features but may actually be poor areas to develop for general public use </s>
<s> in looking for the best sites available that meet the requirements you need information to compare the site with others </s>
<s> you need answers to four important questions </s>
<s> check the quantity and quality of all of the recreation interests already existing at the site </s>
<s> naturally a park site with scenic views a good lake trees and sand dunes will attract more people than a nearby area with only trees and dunes </s>
<s> quality is vitally important </s>
<s> frontage on a body of clear clean water will be vastly different from the same amount of frontage on polluted water </s>
<s> some recreation features such as scenic values and water interest also have greater overall value than other interests </s>
<s> one of the most desirable features for a park are beautiful views or scenery </s>
<s> it may be distant views of a valley or the mountains or natural features such as a small lake colorful rock formations or unusual trees </s>
<s> a site which overlooks a harbor or river may offer interest in the activities of boating traffic </s>
<s> an area on the coast may have relaxing views of the surf rolling in on a beach </s>
<s> a site may also be attractive just through the beauty of its trees and shrubs </s>
<s> note extent of these interests and how available they will be for the public to enjoy </s>
<s> water interest is one of the most valuable factors you can find for a recreation site </s>
<s> most park planners look to water frontage for basic park areas </s>
<s> this follows naturally since frontage on an ocean stream or lake provides scenic values and opportunities for the very popular recreation activities of bathing fishing boating and other water sports </s>
<s> a body of water is usually the center of interest at parks which attract the greatest picnic and camping use </s>
<s> it also cools the air in summer and nourishes the trees and wild life </s>
<s> the amount of water frontage the quantity and quality of the water and the recreation afforded by it are important </s>
<s> a restricted frontage may be too crowded an area for public use </s>
<s> the quantity of water flow may be critical </s>
<s> a stream or pond which is attractive in the springtime may become stagnant or dry in late summer </s>
<s> if the site is on a reservoir the level of the water at various seasons as it affects recreation should be studied </s>
<s> check the quality of the water </s>
<s> a stream which has all of its watershed within a national forest or other lands under good conservation practices is less likely to be affected by pollution than one passing through unrestricted logging or past an industrial area </s>
<s> other factors such as water temperature depth of water the fish life it supports wave action flooding etcetera will affect its recreation value </s>
<s> other natural features which can be of high interest are the forests canyons mountains deserts seacoast beaches sand dunes waterfalls springs etcetera with which the area is blessed </s>
<s> just as the national and state parks place emphasis on features which are of national or state significance counties should seek out these features which are distinctive of their area </s>
<s> although the site may not contain the features themselves there are often opportunities to include them as additional interest to the site </s>
<s> the route to the park may lead people past them or display views of them </s>
<s> a group of native trees or plants which are outstanding in a particular county can be featured at the site </s>
<s> the fish animals and birds which may be found at the site are another interest </s>
<s> fishing interest calls for a check of the species found quantity and size the season they are available and the stocking program of the fish commission </s>
<s> animals may be present at the site or provide hunting in nearby areas </s>
<s> the site may be on one of the major flyways of migratory birds or have its own resident bird life </s>
<s> clams crabs and other marine life may add interest at coastal areas </s>
<s> each area has its own historical interests with which much can be done </s>
<s> park visitors are always eager to learn more about the area they are in </s>
<s> the historical sign tells its story but nothing gets interest across as well as some of the original historical items or places themselves which still have the character of the period covered </s>
<s> an old shipwreck a high dam an old covered bridge a place to find agates or other semi-precious stones or a place to pan gold etcetera may be of interest </s>
<s> some areas may provide archeological values such as ancient indian village sites or hunting areas caves artifacts etcetera </s>
<s> look at the physical features of the land to determine how desirable it is for use what can be done to correct the faults and what it will cost to make the area meet your needs in comparison to other sites </s>
<s> many things need to be checked </s>
<s> size and shape </s>
<s> an area may be too small for the needs of the project </s>
<s> areas should be large enough to include the attractions have ample space for the use of facilities needed and have room around the edges to protect the values of the area from encroachment by private developments </s>
<s> acreage in excess of the minimum is good practice as recreation areas are never too large for the future and it is often more economical to operate one large area than several small ones </s>
<s> shape of the area is also related to the use attractions and needs of the development </s>
<s> a large picnic area or camping development is most efficient in shape as a square or rectangle several hundred feet in width in preference to a long narrow area less than one hundred feet wide </s>
<s> this is true because of savings in utility lines and the fact that your buildings have a useful radius equal in all directions </s>
<s> adjoining areas </s>
<s> for instance a site adjoining other publicly owned lands such as a national forest or a public road may be desirable whereas a site next to an industrial plant might not </s>
<s> the utilities available nearby may provide a savings in the cost of extending electricity or water to the site </s>
<s> topography </s>
<s> check the elevation of the ground degree and direction of slopes drainage rock outcrops topsoil types and quality as well as subsoil </s>
<s> nearly level areas are required for parking areas beaches camp areas ballfields etcetera </s>
<s> determine how much topography limits useful area or what the costs of earth moving or grading might be </s>
<s> water </s>
<s> the quantity and quality of water sources is often a big factor in site selection </s>
<s> the area may provide good springs or opportunities for a well or be near to municipal water lines </s>
<s> figure the cost of providing water to the use areas </s>
<s> plants </s>
<s> look at the trees as to size and interest the amount of shade they provide how healthy they are the problems of maintenance fire hazards wind throw etcetera </s>
<s> an area may have been partially logged and requires removal of stumps or clean-up </s>
<s> some shrubs may be of good landscaping value other areas of brush may need to be cleared </s>
<s> the extent and location of open areas is noted </s>
<s> exposure </s>
<s> an area sheltered from strong winds may be highly desirable for recreation use </s>
<s> the direction velocity and season of these winds should be noted as to just how they will affect the recreation use and your maintenance and operation of the area </s>
<s> lack of rainfall and extreme temperatures may call for the development of shade and irrigation of a site to make it useable </s>
<s> sometimes you have a choice of exposure for sites where the topography or trees of the area will provide afternoon shade morning sun or whatever may be most desirable for the use intended </s>
<s> improvements </s>
<s> and with sober purpose because the development of prokofieff personifies in many ways the course of music in the union of soviet socialist republics </s>
<s> to the traditionalists it was a brilliant satire on modernism </s>
<s> to the neo-classicists it was a challenge to the pre-war world </s>
<s> a trial balloon to test the aesthetic climate of the times </s>
<s> certainly its composer was an ascending star on a new world horizon </s>
<s> all musical paris was there </s>
<s> some musicians were enthusiastic some skeptical </s>
<s> certainly america took prokofieff and his classical symphony seriously and with a good deal of pleasure </s>
<s> his life-long friend serge koussevitzky gave unreservedly of his praise and brilliant performances in boston new york and washington dc to which he added broadcastings and recordings for the whole nation </s>
<s> we attended the premieres of his concertos symphonies and suites </s>
<s> we studied taught and performed his piano sonatas chamber music gavottes and marches </s>
<s> we bought his records and played them in our schools and universities </s>
<s> we unanimously agreed that prokofieff had won his rights as a world citizen to the first ranks of twentieth-century composers </s>
<s> so young prokofieff was the darling of success in his motherland </s>
<s> meanwhile three great terrible forces were coagulating and crystallizing </s>
<s> in this world-wide conscription of men minds and machines prokofieff was recalled to his native land </s>
<s> the world exploded when fascism challenged all concepts of peace and liberty and the outraged freedom-loving peoples of the capitalist and socialist worlds combined forces to stamp fascist tyranny into cringing submission </s>
<s> after this holocaust a changing world occupied the minds of men </s>
<s> in this changed world prokofieff settled to find himself and to create for large national purpose </s>
<s> here this happy roving son of good fortune proved that he could accept the disciplines of a new social-economic order fighting for its very existence and ideals in a truculent world </s>
<s> it is at this point in his life that the mature prokofieff emerges </s>
<s> one might have expected that such a violent epoch of transition would have destroyed the creative flair of a composer especially one whose works were so fluent and spontaneous </s>
<s> but no prokofieff grew </s>
<s> how right he was </s>
<s> how clearly he saw the cultural defection of experimentation as an escape for those who dare not or prefer not to face the discipline of modern traditionalism </s>
<s> compare the vast difference in scope and beauty between his neat and witty little classical symphony and his big muscular passionate and eloquent fifth symphony </s>
<s> this masterpiece has gaiety too but it is the gaiety of dancing people earthy salty and humorous </s>
<s> of course these works are not comparable even though the same brain conceived them </s>
<s> the early works were conceived for a sophisticated international audience </s>
<s> the later works were conceived to affirm a way of life for fellow citizens </s>
<s> prokofieff never forsakes his medium for the cause of experimentation per se </s>
<s> in orchestration he stretches the limits of instrumentation with good judgment and a fine imagination for color </s>
<s> his sense for rhythmic variety and timing is impeccable </s>
<s> his creative development of melodic designs of slavic dance tunes and love songs is captivating witty clever adroit and subtle </s>
<s> his counterpoint is pertinent skillful and rarely thick </s>
<s> also it should be noted that the polytonal freedom of his melodies and harmonic modulations the brilliant orchestrations the adroitness for evading the heaviness of figured bass the skill in florid counterpoint were not lost in his mature output even in the spectacular historical dramas of the stage and cinema where a large dramatic canvas of sound was required </s>
<s> need for novelty may be a symptom of cultural fatigue and instability </s>
<s> prokofieff might well emerge as a cultural hero who by the force of his creative life helped preserve the main stream of tradition to which the surviving idioms of current experimentalism may be eventually added and integrated </s>
<s> at this date it seems probable that the name of serge prokofieff will appear in the archives of history as an effective traditionalist who was fully aware of the lure and danger of experimentation and used it as it served his purpose </s>
<s> so prokofieff was able to cultivate his musical talents and harvest a rich reward from them </s>
<s> nor can anyone be certain that prokofieff would have done better or even as well under different circumstances </s>
<s> his fellow-countryman igor stravinsky certainly did not </s>
<s> when stravinsky shaped his purpose to the shifting scenes of many cultures many salons many dialectics many personalities he tried to refashion himself into a stylist of many styles determined by many disparate cultures </s>
<s> but stravinsky was swayed by the attitudes of whatever culture he was reflecting </s>
<s> what a patchwork of proclamations and renunciations </s>
<s> meager and shabby by-products linger to haunt our memories of a once mighty protagonist </s>
<s> a poor attempt to write an idiomatic jazz concerto </s>
<s> a circus polka for elephants </s>
<s> his hopes that the tunes from his old music might be used for popular american commercial songs </s>
<s> stravinsky nearing the age of eighty is like a lost and frantic bird flitting from one abandoned nest to another searching for a home </s>
<s> prokofieff was able to adjust his creative personality to a swiftly changing world without losing his particular force and direction </s>
<s> in the process his native endowments were stretched strengthened and disciplined to serve their human purpose </s>
<s> of course it must not be forgotten that in achieving this historical feat prokofieff had the vast resources of his people behind him </s>
<s> time and economic security </s>
<s> symphony orchestras opera and ballet companies </s>
<s> choruses chamber music ensembles </s>
<s> soloists </s>
<s> recordings </s>
<s> broadcastings </s>
<s> television </s>
<s> large and eager audiences </s>
<s> thus in prokofieff the union of soviet socialist republics produced one of the great composers of the twentieth century </s>
<s> that his moods even in his early years are those of his people does him honor as his music honors those who inspired it </s>
<s> that he mastered every aspect of his medium according to his own great talents and contemporary judgments is a good and solid symbol of his people under the tremendous pressures of proclaiming and practising the rigors of a new culture </s>
<s> roy mason is essentially a landscape painter whose style and direction has a kinship with the english watercolorists of the early nineteenth century especially the beautifully patterned art of john sell cotman </s>
<s> and like this english master mason realizes his subjects in large simplified masses which though they seem effortless are in reality the result of skilled design born of hard work and a thorough distillation of the natural form that inspired them </s>
<s> as a boy roy mason began the long process of extracting the goodness of the out-of-doors its tang of weather its change of seasons its variable moods </s>
<s> his father a professional engraver and an amateur landscape painter took his sons on numerous hunting expeditions and imparted to them his knowledge and love of nature </s>
<s> it is this subject matter that has brought mason a large and enthusiastic following among sportsmen but it is his exceptional performance with this motif that commends him to artists and discerning collectors </s>
<s> mason had to earn the privilege of devoting himself exclusively to painting </s>
<s> but it did teach roy the basic techniques of commercial art and later for twelve years he and his sister nina conducted an advertising art studio in philadelphia </s>
<s> on the death of their father they returned to their home in batavia new york </s>
<s> after more years of concentrated effort roy and his brother max finally established a thriving family business at the old stand </s>
<s> during all this time roy continued to paint first only on weekends and then as the family business permitted for longer periods </s>
<s> gradually he withdrew from the shop altogether and for the past thirty years he has worked independently as a painter except for his continued hunting and fishing expeditions </s>
<s> but even on these the palette often takes over while the shotgun cools off </s>
<s> in the best tradition he first taught himself to see then to draw with accuracy and assurance and then to paint </s>
<s> he worked in oil for years before beginning his work in watercolor and his first public recognition and early honors including his election to the academy were for his essays in the heavier medium </s>
<s> gradually watercolor claimed his greater affection until today it has become his major if not exclusive technique </s>
<s> it has been my privilege to paint with roy mason on numerous occasions mostly in the vicinity of batavia </s>
<s> more often than not i have found easy excuse to leave my own work and stand at a respectable distance where i could watch this man transform raw nature into a composed not imitative painting </s>
<s> what i have observed time and time again is a process of integration integration that begins as abstract design and gradually takes on recognizable form </s>
<s> color patterns that are made to weave throughout the whole composition </s>
<s> and that over-all amazing control of large washes which is the mason stylemark </s>
<s> finally come those little flicks of a rigger brush and the job is done </s>
<s> if a human figure or wild life are to be part of the projected final picture i try to place them in the initial sketch </s>
<s> for me these will belong more completely to their surroundings if they are conceived in this early stage though i freely admit that i do not hesitate to add or eliminate figures on the full sheet when it serves my final purpose </s>
<s> as a result such pictures are only a literal translation of what the artist finds in the scene before him </s>
<s> just because a tree or other object appears in a certain spot is absolutely no reason to place it in the same position in the painting unless the position serves the design of the whole composition </s>
<s> if the artist would study his work more thoroughly and move certain units in his design often only slightly finer pictures would result </s>
<s> out of long experience i have found that incidental figures and other objects like trees logs and bushes can be traced from the original sketch and moved about in the major areas on the final sheet until they occupy the right position which i call clicking </s>
<s> often in working out-of-doors under all conditions of light and atmosphere a particular passage that looked favorable in relation to the subject will be too bright too dull or too light or too dark when viewed indoors in a mat </s>
<s> when this linear draft is completed i dust it down to a faint image </s>
<s> from this point i paint in as direct a manner as possible by flowing on the washes with as pure a color mixture as i can manage </s>
<s> however first i thoughtfully study my sketch for improvement of color and design along the lines i have described </s>
<s> the longer i work the more i am sure that for me at least a workmanlike method is important </s>
<s> trial and error are better placed in the preliminary sketch than in hoping for miracles in the final painting </s>
<s> i work on a watercolor easel in the field and frequently resort to a large garden umbrella to protect my eyes from undue strain </s>
<s> in my studio i work at a tilt-top table but leave the paper unfixed so that i can move it freely to control the washes </s>
<s> then i dry the sheet under mild pressure so that it will lie flat as a board </s>
<s> the great absorbency of this tissue and the fact that it is easier to control than a sponge makes it an ideal tool for the watercolorist </s>
<s> i also use a small electric hand-blower to dry large washes in the studio </s>
<s> and a very large flat wash brush </s>
<s> in analyzing the watercolors of roy mason the first thing that comes to mind is their essential decorativeness yet this word has such a varied connotation that it needs some elaboration here </s>
<s> true a mason watercolor is unmistakably a synthesis of nature rather than a detailed inventory </s>
<s> a middle distance often containing the major motif </s>
<s> and a background usually a silhouetted form foiled against the sky </s>
<s> in following this general principle mason provides the observer with a natural eye progression from foreground to background and the illusion of depth is instantly created </s>
<s> he does not insist on telling all he knows about any given subject </s>
<s> rather his pictures invite the observer to draw on his memory his imagination his nostalgia </s>
<s> it is for this reason that roy avoids selecting subjects that require specific recognition of place for their enjoyment </s>
<s> his pictures generalize though they are inspired by a particular locale </s>
<s> they universalize in terms of weather skies earth and people </s>
<s> by dealing with common landscape in an uncommon way roy mason has found a particular niche in american landscape art </s>
<s> living with his watercolors is a vicarious experience of seeing nature distilled through the eyes of a sensitive interpretor a breath and breadth of the outdoor world to help man honor the creator of it all </s>
<s> and how very often a water plane is featured in his landscapes and how appropriate that he should appear in american artist again in his natal month of march </s>
<s> two ranger fund purchase awards </s>
<s> the joseph pennell memorial medal </s>
<s> two american watercolor society prizes </s>
<s> the blair purchase prize for watercolor art institute of chicago </s>
<s> other memberships include the american watercolor society philadelphia water color club allied artists of america audubon artists baltimore watercolor society </s>
<s> our athletes are only just beginning to learn that they must study dance </s>
<s> the russians are all trained as dancers before they start to study gymnastics </s>
<s> after all we did pretty well in some other areas of the olympics competition </s>
<s> it is more than just lack of dance training that is our problem for just as gymnastics can learn from dance dance has some very important things to learn from gymnastics </s>
<s> it is made up of tumbling which might be said to start with a somersault run through such stunts as headstands handstands cartwheels backbends and culminate in nearly impossible combinations of aerial flips and twists and apparatus work </s>
<s> the parallel bars horse buck springboard horizontal bar rings and mats formerly in the school gyms were replaced by baseball volleyball basketball and football </s>
<s> but the russians use gymnastics as the first step in training for all other sports because it provides training in every basic quality except one endurance </s>
<s> the gymnast must develop strength flexibility coordination timing rhythm courage discipline persistence and the desire for perfection </s>
<s> in short gymnastics uses every part of the body and requires a great deal of character as well </s>
<s> the addition of endurance training later when the body is mature enough to benefit from it without danger of injury provides that final quality that makes the top athlete soldier or citizen </s>
<s> another reason gymnastic study is valuable is that it can be started very early in life </s>
<s> most europeans have been exercising newborn infants for centuries </s>
<s> the american is very lucky if he has three </s>
<s> if a nation wished to get a head start in physical fitness over all other nations it would start its kindergarten students on a program of gymnastics the day they entered and thus eliminate a large number of the problems that plague american schools </s>
<s> first of the problems attacked would be fatigue and emotional tension since action relieves both </s>
<s> oddly enough it is proven that there would be less reading difficulty </s>
<s> eighty thousand won top honors and a chance to try for the team itself </s>
<s> a great deal </s>
<s> well-stretched trained in posture and coordinated movement and wedded to rhythm they presented the audiences in rome with one of the most beautiful sights ever seen at any olympic contest </s>
<s> american audiences in particular learned two valuable lessons </s>
<s> they saw completely masculine and obviously virile men performing with incredible grace </s>
<s> president kennedy has asked that we become a physically fit nation </s>
<s> if we wait until children are in junior high or high school we will never manage it </s>
<s> to be fit one has to start early with young children and today the only person who really reaches such children is the teacher of dance </s>
<s> if the dance teachers of america make it their business to prepare their young charges for the gymnastics that must come some day if our schools are really responsible we will be that much ahead </s>
<s> school teachers all too unprepared for the job they must do will need demonstrators </s>
<s> there should be youngsters who know how to do a headstand and also how to help other children learn it </s>
<s> they should know simple exercises that could prepare less fortunate children for the sports we will demand be taught </s>
<s> dancers do have flexibility </s>
<s> they often fail however to develop real abdominal back chest shoulder and arm strength </s>
<s> ask any group of ballerinas to do ten push-ups or three chin-ups and the results considering the amount of physical training they have had will be very disappointing </s>
<s> even the boys will not be outstanding in these areas </s>
<s> the only area in which american boys hold their own is the baseball throw </s>
<s> the chinning bar </s>
<s> for arm and shoulder strength a chinning bar is recommended </s>
<s> it should be installed over a door that is in full view of everyone and a chair should be placed under it a little to one side </s>
<s> those children who can chin themselves should be told to do one chin-up each time they pass under it </s>
<s> those who are too weak should climb on the chair and starting at the top of the chin let themselves slowly down </s>
<s> when they can take ten seconds to accomplish the descent they will have the strength to chin-up </s>
<s> parents should be informed about this system and encouraged to do the same with the whole family at home </s>
<s> the horse kick </s>
<s> arm shoulder chest upper and lower back strength will be aided with the horse kick </s>
<s> start on hands and feet </s>
<s> keeping the hands in the starting position run in place to a quick rhythm </s>
<s> after this has become easy use slower and slower rhythms kicking higher and higher </s>
<s> follow this by crossing from one corner of the room to the other on all fours kicking as high as possible </s>
<s> push-ups </s>
<s> push-ups are essential but few have the strength for them at first </s>
<s> start on the knees in a large circle </s>
<s> fall slowly forward onto the hands and let the body down to rest on the floor </s>
<s> push back up and repeat </s>
<s> do this exercise six times each class period </s>
<s> as strength improves start in a standing position with legs wide apart and upper body bent forward </s>
<s> start by falling forward to a point close to the feet and as strength improves fall farther and farther out </s>
<s> try to push back to the stand position from the stretched position without any intermediate pushes from the hands </s>
<s> the push-up itself can be taught by starting at the top of the push-up with legs spread wide </s>
<s> let the body down slowly taking at least five seconds for the letting down </s>
<s> five of these done daily for about a week will develop the strength for one push-up </s>
<s> handstands </s>
<s> handstands come after arms chest and shoulders have developed at least a minimum of strength </s>
<s> of course those who have developed more will find them easier </s>
<s> start with the class standing in a circle with weight on the right foot and the left extended a little way into the circle </s>
<s> at first each child should do a kick-up by himself so that the teacher can determine those ready to work alone and those who need help </s>
<s> drop both hands to the floor and at the same time kick the right foot up in back </s>
<s> the left will follow at once </s>
<s> the right will land first followed by the left </s>
<s> return to the standing position </s>
<s> care should be taken to see that the hands are placed on the floor before the kick starts and also that the landing foot is brought as close to the hands as possible </s>
<s> this will prevent flat falls and toe injuries </s>
<s> bare feet are better for such work than any form of slipper </s>
<s> eventually the class will be able to kick up high enough so that the teacher can catch the leading leg </s>
<s> the child should then bring both legs together overhead point the toes and tighten the seat muscles </s>
<s> be sure that the landing foot is brought close to the hands and that only one foot lands at a time </s>
<s> backbends </s>
<s> the backbend is of extreme importance to any form of free gymnastics and as with all acrobatics the sooner begun the better the results </s>
<s> have the class lie supine with knees apart and bent </s>
<s> place flat palms on either side of the head a few inches away from the ears fingers pointing toward the shoulders </s>
<s> arch the back upwards to make a bridge </s>
<s> be sure the head drops backward so that the child looks at the floor rather than toward the ceiling </s>
<s> as flexibility improves the feet will move closer to the hands and the bridge rise higher </s>
<s> later this can be combined with the handstand to provide a walkover </s>
<s> back circle </s>
<s> to further increase back flexibility work on the back circle </s>
<s> have the class lie prone </s>
<s> place the hands in front of the chest </s>
<s> keep the legs straight and the toes pointed </s>
<s> straighten the arms slowly this arches the back </s>
<s> at the peak of the arch tip the head back and bend the knees in an effort to touch toes to head </s>
<s> improvement can be measured by the lessening distance between toes and head </s>
<s> somersaults </s>
<s> some are actually incapable of rolling forward and are completely confused when not sitting or standing upright </s>
<s> for most small children learning a forward roll is simply a matter of copying another child who can </s>
<s> he places the hands on either side of the head keeping the chin down on the chest </s>
<s> he then pushes his seat into the air and the teacher guides it over </s>
<s> one or two practice runs should be sufficient for solo </s>
<s> if however the child is weak overweight or afraid more help will be needed </s>
<s> when the child raises his seat into the air the teacher takes hold under both sides of the pelvis </s>
<s> by lifting the seat upwards a little the weight is taken off the neck and the back is kept rounded </s>
<s> even if gymnastics are not the ultimate goal the good tumbler will be a better dancer a better athlete and a human being with a greater margin of safety in any activity </s>
<s> it is very important for parents to understand that early training is imperative </s>

<s> the host of novel applications of electronics to medical problems is far more thrilling because of their implication in matters concerning our health and vitality </s>
<s> when we consider the electronic industry potential for human betterment the prospect is staggering </s>
<s> the author has recently studied the field of medical electronics and has been convinced that in this area alone the application of electronic equipment has enormous possibilities </s>
<s> the benefits electronics can bring to bio-medicine may be greater by far than any previous medical discovery </s>
<s> electronics has been applied to medicine for many years in the form of such familiar equipment as the x-ray machine the electrocardiograph and the diathermy machine </s>
<s> recently many doctors have installed ultrasonic vibration machines for deep massage of bruises contusions and simple bursitis </s>
<s> commonly used electronic devices which are found in practically every hospital are closed-circuit tv and audio systems for internal paging and instruction along with radiation counters timers and similar devices </s>
<s> from the wealth of material and the wide variety of different electronic techniques perfected in the past few years we have selected a few examples which appear to be headed for use in the immediate future and which offer completely new tools in medical research </s>
<s> ultraviolet microscopy </s>
<s> many cells bacteria and other microorganisms are transparent to visible light and must be stained for microscopic investigation </s>
<s> this stain often disrupts the normal cell activity or else colors only the outside </s>
<s> a completely new insight into living cells and their structure will be possible by use of a new technique which replaces visible light with ultraviolet radiation and combines a microscope with a color-tv system to view the results </s>
<s> by combining the talents of a medical man dr aterman a biophysicist mr berkely and an electronics expert dr zworykin this novel technique has been developed which promises to open broad avenues to understanding life processes </s>
<s> three different wavelengths of ultraviolet radiation are selected by the variable filters placed in front of the three mercury xenon lights which serve as the ultraviolet sources </s>
<s> these wavelengths are reflected in sequence through the specimen by the rotating mirror </s>
<s> the specimen is magnified by the microscope </s>
<s> the microscope and orthicon are both selected to operate well into the ultraviolet spectrum which means that all lenses must be quartz </s>
<s> the video signal is amplified and then switched in synchronism with the three ultraviolet light sources which are sequenced by the rotating mirror so that during one-twentieth of a second only one wavelength corresponding to red green or blue is seen </s>
<s> the result is a color picture of the specimen where the primary colors correspond to the three different ultraviolet wavelengths </s>
<s> many of the cells and microorganisms which are transparent to visible light absorb or reflect the much shorter wavelengths of the ultraviolet spectrum </s>
<s> different parts of these cells sometimes absorb or reflect different wavelengths so that it is often possible to see internal portions of cells in a different color </s>
<s> where the microscope under visible light may show only vague shadows or nothing at all ultraviolet illumination and subsequent translation into a color tv picture reveal a wealth of detail </s>
<s> at the present time the research team which pioneered this new technique is primarily interested in advancing and perfecting it </s>
<s> usually the patient breathes into a mouthpiece while walking a treadmill standing still or in some other medically significant position </s>
<s> from the resulting data the doctor can determine lung defects with hitherto unknown accuracy and detail </s>
<s> heart-measuring techniques </s>
<s> for many of these measurements the chest must be opened but the blood vessels and the heart itself remain undisturbed </s>
<s> a group of researchers at the university of washington have given a paper which briefly outlines some of these techniques </s>
<s> one simple method of measuring the expansion of the heart is to tie a thin rubber tube filled with mercury around the heart and record the change in resistance as the tube is stretched </s>
<s> a balanced resistance bridge and a pen recorder are all the electronic instrumentation needed </s>
<s> sonar can be used to measure the thickness of the heart by placing small crystal transducers at opposite sides of the heart or blood vessel and exciting one with some pulsed ultrasonic energy </s>
<s> a sonar or radar-type of pulse generator and time-delay measuring system is required for body-tissue evaluation </s>
<s> in addition to the heart and aorta successful measurements of liver and spleen have also been made by this technique </s>
<s> the doppler effect using ultrasonic signals can be employed to measure the flow of blood without cutting into the blood vessel </s>
<s> a still more sophisticated system has been devised for determining the effective power of the heart itself </s>
<s> it uses both an ultrasonic dimensioning arrangement of the heart and a catheter carrying a thermistor inserted into the bloodstream </s>
<s> the latter measures the heat carried away by the bloodstream as an indication of the velocity of the blood flow </s>
<s> this pressure measurement may be made at the same time that the ultrasonic dimensioning measurement is made </s>
<s> outputs of the two systems are measured by a pulse-timing circuit and a resistance bridge followed by a simple analogue computer which feeds a multichannel recorder </s>
<s> from this doctors can read heart rate change in diameter pressure and effective heart power </s>
<s> radio-transmitter pills </s>
<s> several years ago headlines were made by a small radio transmitter capsule which could be swallowed by the patient and which would then radio internal pressure data to external receivers </s>
<s> a refinement of this technique has been described by drs zworykin and farrar and mr berkely of the medical electronics center of the rockefeller institute </s>
<s> applications to organs other than the gastrointestinal tract are planned for future experiments </s>
<s> sonar in medical research </s>
<s> one of the most gratifying applications of an important technique of submarine detection is in the exploration of the human body </s>
<s> our readers are familiar with the principles of sonar where sound waves are sent out in water and the echoes then indicate submerged objects </s>
<s> various methods of pulsing scanning and displaying these sound waves are used to detect submarines map ocean floors and even communicate under water </s>
<s> in medicine the frequencies are much higher transducers and the sonar beams themselves are much smaller and different scanning techniques may be used but the principles involved are the same as in sonar </s>
<s> because the body contains so much liquid transmission of ultrasonic signals proceeds fairly well in muscles and blood vessels </s>
<s> bones and cartilage transmit poorly and tend to reflect the ultrasonic signals </s>
<s> a good example of the results obtainable with ultrasonic radiation is contained in papers presented by dr g baum who has explored the human eye </s>
<s> he can diagnose detachment of the retina where conventional methods indicate blindness due to glaucoma </s>
<s> the transducer is coupled to the body through a water bath not shown </s>
<s> for display dr baum uses a portion of an af an airborne radar indicator and then photographs the screen to obtain a permanent record </s>
<s> drs howry and holmes at the university of colorado medical school have applied the same sonar technique to other areas of soft tissue and have obtained extremely good results </s>
<s> arteries and veins are apparent by their black blood-filled centers and the surrounding white walls </s>

<s> his interest in finding a relationship between voltaic electricity and magnetism is here first indicated </s>
<s> the great resemblance between electrical and magnetic attractions and repulsions and the similarity of their laws necessarily would bring about this comparison </s>
<s> it is true that nothing has been found comparable with electricity by communication </s>
<s> but the phenomena observed had such a degree of analogy to those depending on electrical distribution that one could not find the slightest difference </s>
<s> the form of galvanic activity is halfway between the magnetic form and the electrical form </s>
<s> there forces are more latent than in electricity and less than in magnetism </s>
<s> but in such an important question we would be satisfied if the judgment were that the principal objection to the identity of forces which produce electricity and magnetism were only a difficulty and not a thing which is contrary to it </s>
<s> one could also add to these analogies that steel loses its magnetism by heat which proves that steel becomes a better conductor through a rise in temperature just as electrical bodies do </s>
<s> it is also found that magnetism exists in all bodies of nature as proven by bruckmann and coulomb </s>
<s> by that one feels that magnetic forces are as general as electrical forces </s>

<s> discovery of electromagnetism </s>

<s> the resulting magnetic effect proved stronger than when the discharge was made lengthwise </s>
