<s> not only should every educator above the rank of instructor be expected to be a member of one of the professional organizations but his first qualification for membership as an educator should be so sharply scrutinized that membership would be equivalent to certification to teach the subject </s>
<s> participation for the educator in this case however would have to be raised to full and complete membership </s>
<s> the largest of these organizations at present denies to the full time educator any vote on the conduct and standards of the group and indeed refuses him even the right to attach the customary initials after his name in the college catalog </s>
<s> this anomalous status of the educator cannot fail to lower his standing in the eyes of the students </s>
<s> the professor in turn dares not tolerate the influence in his classes of an organization in the policies and standards of which he has no voice </s>
<s> this seems somewhat shortsighted since if the absolute educational qualifications for membership which the organizations profess are ever enforced the educator will have the molding of the entire profession in his hands </s>
<s> in one way the institutes and societies do a disservice to the schools </s>
<s> when these groups were first formed many prominent and accomplished decorators could not have had the advantage of school training since interior design courses were rare and undeveloped during their youth </s>
<s> the necessity of that day has long disappeared </s>
<s> there is plenty of opportunity for proper education today </s>
<s> it is discouraging for students to realize that the societies do not truly uphold the standards for which they are supposed to stand </s>
<s> beyond any question of curriculum and approach to subject must be the quality of the teachers themselves </s>
<s> it will occur to anyone that the teacher must have adequate education a depth and breadth of knowledge far beyond the immediate necessities of his course plus complete dedication to his subject and to his students </s>
<s> the local decorator who rushes in for a few hours of teaching may but more likely may not have these qualifications </s>
<s> nor will the hack the jack-of-all-trades still found in some of the smaller art schools suffice </s>
<s> only a few years ago a middle western college circulated a request for a teacher of interior design </s>
<s> this kind of irresponsibility toward their students can scarcely build a strong professional attitude in the future designer </s>
<s> considerable specialization in teaching subjects such as architecture furniture design textiles and color is also desirable </s>
<s> it is only fair to demand that teachers of courses in english history psychology and so on be as well informed in matters of art especially interior design as are the art teachers educated in the academic subjects </s>
<s> the proper correlation of the art with the academic can be achieved only if this standard is observed </s>
<s> the matter of sympathy of the academic professors for art objectives also must be taken into account </s>
<s> one technical question of school organization comes to mind here </s>
<s> for proper accreditation of schools teachers in any course must have a degree at least one level above that for which the student is a candidate </s>
<s> since there are almost no schools in the country offering graduate work in interior design this rule cannot at present be observed </s>
<s> indeed it has only been a matter of the last few years that reputable schools of art have granted degrees at all </s>
<s> the question however cannot be ignored for long </s>
<s> the basic problem involved is that a college setting up a graduate school must have an entirely separate faculty for the advanced degree </s>
<s> most professors in the course must naturally again have a higher degree than the course offers </s>
<s> one solution is the aquisition of degrees in education but it is a poor substitute </s>
<s> it is a sort of academic ring-around-a-rosy and you solve it </s>
<s> this brings us to the question of accreditation of art schools in general </s>
<s> only the independent art schools that is those not connected with any university or college receive severe and separate investigation before accreditation by the various regional organizations </s>
<s> it has been the custom for most universities to stretch the blanket of accreditation for their liberal arts school to cover the shivering body of their fine arts department </s>
<s> this plus the habit of many schools of simply adding interior design to the many subjects of their home economics department yet nevertheless claiming that they teach interior design has contributed to the low repute of many university courses in interior design </s>
<s> in spite of this many universities offer adequate and even distinguished courses in the subject </s>
<s> independent art schools granting degrees must naturally follow this with academic accreditation by the appropriate regional group </s>

<s> communications </s>
<s> encourage them to exercise their benefits </s>

<s> insurance </s>
<s> have the insurance company or your own accounting department break down the cost of your insurance package periodically </s>
<s> you may find certain coverage costing much more than is economically feasible thereby alerting you to desirable revisions </s>
<s> use deductable insurance wherever feasible </s>
<s> it can put an end to marginal claims which play havoc with your insurance rates </s>
<s> also beware of open-end policies especially in the medical field </s>
<s> put a dollar-and-cents limit on benefits </s>
<s> generally your employee will greatly appreciate benefits that protect him during his working life or during retirement </s>
<s> special time off </s>
<s> coffee breaks can be a real headache if not regulated </s>
<s> vending machines can alleviate the long hike to the cafeteria during the break with resulting waste of production time </s>
<s> if coffee is sold at the cafeteria let a few workers in each department get it for the whole group </s>
<s> consider installing supplemental serving lines in production areas </s>
<s> make sure milk for the coffee is placed in dispensers rather than in containers if you are supplying the coffee </s>
<s> otherwise you may be saddled with a good-size milk bill by milk drinkers </s>
<s> retirement policies </s>
<s> keep the retirement age flexible so skilled craftsmen such as tool and die makers can be kept on the job for the convenience of the company </s>
<s> and so deadheads on the payroll can be eased out at the earliest possible age </s>
<s> make sure you have minimum age and time-on-the-job requirements tied into your pension plan </s>
<s> choose carefully between contributory or non-contributory pension plans </s>
<s> there are two sides of a coin for this decision </s>
<s> workers usually think more of a plan they contribute to </s>
<s> and they can at least collect the money they put in plus interest when they leave the company </s>
<s> thus there is an added incentive to stay on the job </s>
<s> holidays </s>
<s> these include leaves of absences illnesses and layoffs </s>
<s> consider adopting a system of holidays in which time off is granted with an eye to minimum inconvenience to the operation of the plant </s>
<s> this reduces the number of expensive plant shutdowns and startups </s>
<s> require each employee to work his last shift both before and after the holiday to be eligible for pay </s>
<s> this cuts the absentee rate </s>
<s> eating facilities </s>
<s> consider using vending machines rather than subsidized cafeterias </s>
<s> latest models serve hot meals at reasonable prices and at a profit to you </s>
<s> if a concessionaire runs the cafeteria keep an eye out for quality and price </s>
<s> you may save valuable production minutes with a change </s>
<s> vacations </s>
<s> spread your vacation period over the widest possible span of time or shut the plant down for two weeks </s>
<s> this will cut the expense of vacation replacements </s>
<s> and with the shutdown method there will be no argument as to who gets the choice vacation dates </s>
<s> also make sure you have reasonable requirements as to hours worked before a production employee is entitled to a vacation </s>
<s> you might try providing standard vacation time off but make the vacation pay depend on the number of hours worked in the previous year </s>

<s> they offer exceptional design freedom making it possible to incorporate contours and details which give free range to the talents of the designer </s>
<s> vacuum- and pressure-formed sheet plastics fill the gap between cardboard and molded plastics </s>
<s> pre-decoration low-cost molds and the freedom to form large and small thick and thin materials make plastics tailor-made for the industry </s>
<s> plastic signs work around the clock </s>
<s> internal illumination protected from the elements gives them powerful visual appeal at night </s>
<s> during daylight hours their brilliant colors command attention and interest </s>
<s> among the newest fabrication methods to enter the display field are expandable styrene molding and blow molding </s>
<s> for outdoor signs and displays acrylic with its outstanding optical characteristics weather resistance and formability strongly dominates the picture </s>
<s> sheeting cast from this material reportedly weighs only one-third as much as glass is impervious to all kinds of weather and will not yellow </s>
<s> its high impact strength even at low temperatures resists chipping cracking and crazing according to du pont </s>
<s> cellulose acetate butyrate is used extensively for vacuum-formed signs background panels and molded or formed letters because of its exceptional toughness ease of forming and excellent weathering properties </s>
<s> its clarity and good optical properties are other important factors </s>
<s> new to the field is a duplex type butyrate laminate in which the two sheets of the laminate are of different color </s>
<s> thermoforming the laminate and then sanding away the top layer is a quick and economical way to produce a two-color sign </s>
<s> for specialized types of displays such as large three-dimensional units reproducing a product package human or animal figures etc reinforced plastics and rotationally molded vinyl plastisols are other materials frequently used </s>
<s> for outdoor signs and displays where the problem of weathering resistance is no longer a factor the choice of plastics is almost unlimited </s>
<s> here may be found regular and impact styrene cellulose acetate cellulose butyrate and cellulose propionate acrylic vinyl expandable styrene foam and polyethylene </s>
<s> the final choice of material depends upon such factors as costs method of fabrication degree of complexity number of units required time available for tooling and projected life expectancy of the unit </s>
<s> often the finished sign or display incorporates several types of plastics and two or more fabricating techniques </s>
<s> trans-illuminated billboards </s>
<s> one of the most significant advancements in design of plastics signs is the so-called trans-illuminated billboard now being produced by several large sign manufacturers such as advance neon sign co los angeles and industrial electric inc new orleans la </s>
<s> the essential difference between the new trans-illuminated boards and existing billboards is that the former constructed of translucent plastic panels are lighted from within </s>
<s> with the source of light behind the copy there is no loss of lumen output as with conventional boards illuminated by means of reflected light </s>
<s> also the light sources are shielded from dirt and weather exposure and cannot obstruct the view of the sign </s>
<s> the copy itself including any text or illustrations is reproduced in full color directly on a thin mylar polyester film by a photo screen process </s>
<s> the film has an adhesive on the back which permits it to be stripped onto the acrylic panels forming the sign and also to be stripped off for replacement by new copy as required </s>
<s> spare sets of face panels simplify the change from one copy or message to another </s>
<s> new panels are exchanged for the old right in the field on a single trip </s>
<s> panels with outdated copy are returned to the sign shop so a new message can be applied </s>
<s> signs of this type have already made their appearance in several larger cities and others are on the way </s>
<s> it is believed that these boards will within the next few years replace many of the conventional flood-lighted boards now in use </s>
<s> trans-illuminated signs also show versatility in other directions </s>
<s> thus the film can be applied to back-lighted translucent plastics faces </s>
<s> they can also be applied to opaque panels for use on cutouts or they can be applied directly to painted bulletin faces </s>
<s> in this way the sign maker has an economical means for displaying uniform copy on different sign media </s>
<s> changeable letters fill many needs </s>
<s> signs are meant to convey a message and in most cases this requires words and letters </s>
<s> frequently the message must be changed at intervals to feature new products price changes etc </s>

<s> for those who need or want and can afford another car buying one and driving it on the grand tour then shipping it home is one popular plan for a do-it-yourself pilgrimage </s>
<s> then of course there are those of us who either do not want or need or cannot afford another car </s>
<s> the answer to this diathesis is to pick up a telephone and arrange to rent one </s>
<s> it is that elemental </s>
<s> almost any travel agent will reserve a car for you </s>
<s> with few exceptions your car will be waiting for you at dockside airport railroad station or hotel when you arrive oftentimes at no additional cost </s>
<s> you can wait of course until you arrive in europe before renting your car </s>
<s> the disadvantages to this method are that you may not have as great a choice of models readily available or you may have to wait a few days or during the busy tourist season when cars are in great demand you might find it fairly difficult to get a car at all </s>
<s> since charges are relatively the same reserving a car before you leave for europe will assure you of having one on tap when you want it </s>
<s> for those who plan to travel to europe by one route and return by another some agencies offer a service whereby you can pick up a car in one city on arrival and leave it in another city or even another country when you are ready to return home </s>
<s> at some cities this pick-up and delivery service is without additional charge and if you are budget-wise when you are planning your itinerary you will take advantage of these free delivery and collection stations in major cities within the larger european countries </s>
<s> international touring documents are usually provided with the car as are road maps and touring data </s>
<s> a valid american driving license is accepted in all countries except portugal spain yugoslavia and eastern europe </s>
<s> your insurance too with most agencies is provided with the car covering comprehensive fire theft liability and collision with a deductible clause which varies in different countries </s>
<s> if you would feel happier with full collision insurance there is a small additional charge again varying from country to country and depending on the term of such insurance </s>
<s> rental fees are variable too throughout the countries of europe </s>
<s> there are as many rates as there are countries and models of cars available </s>
<s> as in the united states there is a flat fee-per-day rental charge plus a few cents per kilometer driven and the per-day rate drops if the car is retained for a week </s>
<s> your choice of model will undoubtedly be governed by the number of people travelling in your group </s>
<s> with the exception of the sports cars even the quite tiny sedans will seat four passengers if you are willing to sacrifice comfort and luggage space for really economical transportation </s>
<s> the basic costs are generally pretty much the same regardless of the agency through which you reserve your car but some of them offer supplementary advantages </s>
<s> a little investigation by telephone or reading the travel ads in the newspapers and magazines will give you these pertinent details on the additional money-saving benefits </s>
<s> the investigation will be well worth your time </s>
<s> all model cars are not available in all countries </s>
<s> quite naturally there is a greater availability of those models which are manufactured within a specific country </s>
<s> if you would like to start your tour in italy where the rental fees are actually the lowest in europe fiats in all sizes are available as are alfa romeo giulietta models </s>
<s> with six in the group the cost comes to just a nickel a day per person on the daily fee </s>
<s> the same model car might be available in six or eight countries yet not two countries will have the same rate either for the daily rate or rate per kilometer driven </s>
<s> the variations are not too great </s>
<s> rates in greece and finland are fairly high actually the highest in europe and surprisingly enough they are also quite high in ireland </s>
<s> if you are planning to tour europe for longer than a month it might be wise for you to lease a car </s>
<s> the actual over-all cost for the first month will perhaps not be too much lower than the rental charges for the same period of time but you will receive a new car </s>
<s> you will be entitled to all the advantages of a new car owner which includes the factory guarantee and the services valid at authorized dealers throughout europe </s>
<s> further there is no mileage charge or mileage limitations when you lease a car and you pay only the flat monthly rate plus a nominal charge for documents and insurance since the car is registered and insured individually for your trip </s>
<s> leasing a car is not as common or as popular as renting a car in europe but for long periods it will be unquestionably more economical and satisfactory </s>
<s> there are reasons for some people not wanting to rent cars and going on the do-it-yourself plan </s>

<s> then too european drivers have reputations for being somewhat crazy on the road and some americans are not particularly keen on getting mixed up with them </s>
<s> still there is a way for those who want to see some of the back country of europe by car </s>
<s> the way is to rent a chauffeur-driven car </s>
<s> the big spread is in the charge for each kilometer driven being governed by the rate at which gasoline is consumed </s>
<s> the fees for the rental of chauffeur-driven cars vary in the different countries in the same manner as they do for the drive-yourself cars </s>

<s> every dream and this is true of a mental image of any type even though it may be readily interpreted into its equivalent of wakeful thought is a psychic phenomenon for which no explanation is available </s>

<s> modern physics has developed the theory that all matter consists of minute waves of energy </s>
<s> we know that the number of radio and television impulses sound waves ultra-violet rays etc that may occupy the very same space each solitary upon its own frequency is infinite </s>
<s> so we may conceive the coexistence of the infinite number of universal apparently momentary states of matter successive one after another in consciousness but permanent each on its own basic phase of the progressive frequencies </s>
<s> this theory makes it possible for any event throughout eternity to be continuously available at any moment to consciousness </s>
<s> space in any form is completely measured by the three dimensions </s>
<s> it is not through space nor time that the time machine most approved by science fiction must travel for a visit to the permanent prehistoric past or the ever-existent past-fantasy future </s>
<s> three seconds flat is the usual time and the space is crossed by moderate mileage while the overwhelming immensity of such journeys must be conceived as a static pulsation through an enormous number of coexistent frequencies which perpetuate all events </s>
<s> the body senses and brain in common with all matter have their counterpart on each of a countless number of frequencies </s>
<s> the senses in each counterpart bear the impression only of phenomena that share its own frequency whereas those upon all other frequencies are invisible inaudible and intactible to them </s>
<s> consciousness is the factor that provides the progressive continuity to sensory impressions </s>

<s> ignorance on this point has caused a great deal of needless anxiety misunderstanding and suspicion </s>
<s> the hymen is in essence a fragile membrane that more or less completely covers the entrance to the vagina in most female human beings who have not had sex relations </s>
<s> often it is thin and fragile and gives way readily to the male organ at the first attempt at intercourse </s>

<s> this recommendation was based on the fact that the hymen was not the only barrier to smooth consummation of the sex act </s>
<s> the vagina is an organ capable of remarkable contraction and dilation </s>
<s> this is obvious when it is remembered that during childbirth the vagina must dilate enough to permit the passage of the baby </s>
<s> the intricate system of muscles that manage the contraction and dilatation of the vagina are partly under voluntary control </s>
<s> but an instinctive reflex may work against the conscious intention of the woman </s>
<s> that is when first penetration takes place the pressure and pain signals may involuntarily cause all the vaginal muscles to contract in an effort to bar the intrusion and prevent further pain </s>
<s> the advantages of dilatation by the physician are both physical and psychological </s>
<s> since it is a purely professional situation none of the pain is associated with love-making or the beloved </s>
<s> by using instruments of gradually increasing size the vagina is gently and with minimum pain at each stage taught to yield to an object of the appropriate shape </s>
<s> in this process the vaginal muscles come under better conscious control by the girl </s>

<s> tooth fit explained </s>
<s> malocclusion or a bad fit is what parents need to look out for </s>
<s> one main type of malocclusion is characterized by a receding chin and protruding upper front teeth </s>
<s> a chin too prominent in relation to the rest of the face a thrusting forward of the lower front teeth an overdeveloped lower jawbone and an underdeveloped upper jaw indicate the opposite type of malocclusion </s>
<s> these two basic malformations have of course many variations </s>
<s> a child probably requires some form of treatment if he has any of the following conditions </s>
<s> a noticeable protrusion of the upper or lower jaw </s>
<s> crooked overlapping twisted or widely spaced teeth </s>
<s> front teeth not meeting when the back teeth close </s>
<s> upper teeth completely covering the lowers when the back teeth close </s>
<s> second teeth that have come in before the first ones have fallen out making a double row </s>

<s> malocclusion can also result if baby teeth are lost too soon or retained too long </s>
<s> if a child loses a molar at the age of two the adjoining teeth may shift toward the empty space thus narrowing the place intended for the permanent ones and producing a jumble </s>
<s> if baby teeth are retained too long the incoming second teeth may be prevented from emerging at the normal time or may have to erupt in the wrong place </s>
<s> correction can save teeth </s>
<s> every orthodontist sees children who are embarrassed by their malformed teeth </s>
<s> some such youngsters rarely smile or they try to speak with the mouth closed </s>
<s> bad alignment may result in early loss of teeth through a breakdown of the bony structure that supports their roots </s>

<s> the when and how of straightening </s>
<s> orthodontic work is possible because teeth are held firmly but not rigidly by a system of peridontal membrane with an involved nerve network to the bone in the jaw </s>
<s> they are not anchored directly to the bone </s>
<s> abnormal pressure applied over a period of time produces a change in the bony deposit so a tooth functions normally in the new position into which it has been guided </s>
<s> if he decides to proceed he will custom-make for susie an appliance consisting of bands plastic plates fine wires and tiny springs </s>
<s> this appliance will exert a gentle and continuous or intermittent pressure on the bone </s>
<s> as the tooth moves bone cells on the pressure side of it will dissolve and new ones will form on the side from which the tooth has moved </s>
<s> this must be done at the rate at which new bony tissue grows and no faster </s>

<s> conversely if he gives a heavy rating to his own reading and finds more accurate facts in it than in the others a point is chalked up for the intrinsic objective meaningfulness of this type of mediumistic material </s>
<s> in another approach to the same procedure the content of the readings is analyzed so as to see how the particular medium is likely to slant her statements </s>
<s> mediumistic impressions are evidently of all sorts and seem to involve all the senses </s>
<s> the sensitive often seems to smell definite odors too or subjectively feels emotions </s>
<s> sometimes she displays amazing eidetic imagery and seems to see all details in perspective as if the scene were actually there </s>
<s> if pressed by the sitter for more detail she may be able to bring the picture more into focus and see more sharply almost as if she were physically going closer </s>
<s> perhaps this is not so extraordinary after all </s>
<s> of course there is an element of training here these gifted people by concentration study guidance have learned to develop their power </s>
<s> simply using it increases its intensity i was told by one sensitive </s>
<s> nor does a medium automatically know how to interpret her imagery </s>
<s> impressions often appear in a symbolic form and cannot be taken at face value </s>
<s> it is apparently by symbols that the unconscious speaks to the conscious and the medium has to translate these into meaning </s>
<s> during one reading an image appeared of a prisoner in irons </s>
<s> but this did not necessarily refer to an actual jail </s>
<s> taken with other details it could have referred to a state of mental or spiritual confinement </s>
<s> in this connection it is worth noting how names are sometimes obtained </s>
<s> one medium saw two sheets flapping on a line and found that the name shietz was significant to the sitter </s>
<s> farming is confining </s>
<s> livestock must be tended every day routinely </s>
<s> a slight change in the work schedule may cut the production of cows or chickens </s>
<s> even if there are no livestock the farmer cannot leave the farm for long periods particularly during the growing season </s>
<s> the worker who lives on a farm cannot change jobs readily </s>
<s> he cannot leave the farm to take work in another locality on short notice </s>
<s> such a move may mean a loss of capital </s>
<s> hard physical labor and undesirable hours are a part of life </s>
<s> the farmer must get up early and at times work late at night </s>
<s> frequently he must work long hours in the hot sun or cold rain </s>
<s> no matter how well work is planned bad weather or unexpected setbacks can cause extra work that must be caught up </s>
<s> it may not be profitable for a part-time farmer to own the labor-saving machinery that a full-time farmer can invest in profitably </s>
<s> production may fall far below expectations </s>
<s> drought hail disease and insects take their toll of crops </s>
<s> returns for money and labor invested may be small even in a good year </s>
<s> the high cost of land supplies and labor make it difficult to farm profitably on a part-time basis </s>
<s> land within commuting distance of a growing city is usually high in price higher if it has subdivision possibilities </s>
<s> part-time farmers generally must pay higher prices for supplies than full-time farmers because they buy in smaller quantities </s>
<s> if the farm is in an industrial area where wages are high farm labor costs will also be high </s>
<s> a part-time farmer needs unusual skill to get as high production per hen per cow or per acre as can be obtained by a competent full-time farmer </s>
<s> it will frequently be uneconomical for him to own the most up-to-date equipment </s>
<s> he may have to depend upon custom service for specialized operations such as spraying or threshing and for these he may have to wait his turn </s>
<s> there will be losses caused by emergencies that arise while he is away at his off-farm job </s>
<s> the farm may be an additional burden if the main job is lost </s>
<s> this may be true whether the farm is owned or rented </s>
<s> if the farm is rented the rent must be paid </s>
<s> if it is owned taxes must be paid and if the place is not free of mortgage there will be interest and payments on the principal to take care of </s>
<s> advantages </s>
<s> a farm provides a wholesome and healthful environment for children </s>
<s> it gives them room to play and plenty of fresh air </s>
<s> the children can do chores adapted to their age and ability </s>
<s> caring for a calf a pig or some chickens develops in children a sense of responsibility for work </s>
<s> part-time farming gives a measure of security if the regular job is lost provided the farm is owned free of debt and furnishes enough income to meet fixed expenses and minimum living costs </s>
<s> for some retired persons part-time farming is a good way to supplement retirement income </s>
<s> it is particularly suitable for those who need to work or exercise out of doors for their health </s>
<s> generally the same level of living costs less in the country than in the city </s>
<s> the savings are not as great however as is sometime supposed </s>
<s> usually the cost of food and shelter will be somewhat less on the farm and the cost of transportation and utilities somewhat more </s>
<s> where schools fire and police protection and similar municipal services are of equal quality in city and country real estate taxes are usually about the same </s>
<s> a part-time farmer and his family can use their spare time profitably </s>
<s> some persons consider the work on a farm recreational </s>
<s> for some white-collar workers it is a welcome change from the regular job and a physical conditioner </s>
<s> land labor and equipment needed </s>
<s> it depends on the kind and the scale of the farming operation </s>
<s> general requirements for land labor and equipment are discussed below </s>
<s> land </s>
<s> you could not of course raise feed for the livestock on a plot this small </s>
<s> but consider also how much you and your family can keep up along with your other work </s>
<s> the cost of land and the prospects for appreciation in value may influence your decision </s>
<s> some part-time farmers buy more land than they need in anticipation of suburban development </s>
<s> this is a highly speculative venture </s>
<s> sometimes a desired acreage is offered only as part of a larger tract </s>
<s> when surplus land is not expensive to buy or to keep up it is usually better to buy it than to buy so small an acreage that the development of adjoining properties might impair the residential value of the farm </s>
<s> labor </s>
<s> as a rule part-time farmers hire little help </s>
<s> list the number of hours the family can be expected to work each month </s>
<s> you may want to include your own regular vacation period if you have one </s>
<s> equipment </s>
<s> if you are going to produce for home use only you will need only hand tools </s>
<s> you will probably want to hire someone to do the plowing however </s>
<s> these tractors are not entirely satisfactory for plowing particularly on heavier soils so you may still want to hire someone to do the plowing </s>
<s> cost of power and machinery is often a serious problem to the small-scale farmer </s>
<s> if you are going to farm for extra cash income on a part-time basis you must keep in mind the needed machinery investments when you choose among farm enterprises </s>
<s> you can keep your machinery investment down by buying good secondhand machinery by sharing the cost and upkeep of machinery with a neighbor and by hiring someone with machinery to do certain jobs </s>
<s> selecting a farm </s>
<s> if you are not well acquainted with the area in which you wish to locate or if you are not sure that you and your family will like and make a success of farming usually you would do better to rent a place for a year or two before you buy </s>
<s> discussed below are some of the main things to look for when you select a part-time farm </s>
<s> location </s>
<s> nearness to work </s>
<s> choose a location within easy commuting distance of both the regular job and other employment opportunities </s>
<s> the presence of alternative job opportunities also will make the place easier to sell if that should become desirable </s>
<s> obviously the farm should be on an all-weather road </s>
<s> nearness to markets </s>
<s> if you grow anything to sell you will need markets nearby </s>
<s> if you plan to sell fresh vegetables or whole milk for example you should be close to a town or city </s>
<s> kind of neighborhood </s>
<s> look for a farm in a neighborhood of well-kept homes </s>
<s> there are slums in the country as well as in the city </s>
<s> few rural areas are protected by zoning </s>
<s> a tavern filling station junk yard rendering plant or some other business may go up near enough to hurt your home or to hurt its value </s>
<s> facilities in the area </s>
<s> check on the schools in the area the quality of teaching and the provision for transportation to and from them </s>
<s> find out whether fire protection sewage system gas water mains and electrical lines are available in the locality </s>
<s> if these facilities are not at the door getting them may cost more than you expect </s>
<s> you may have to provide them yourself or get along without them </s>
<s> you cannot get along without an adequate supply of pure water </s>
<s> if you are considering a part-time farm where the water must be provided by a well find out if there is a good well on the farm or the probable cost of having one drilled </s>
<s> a pond may provide adequate water for livestock and garden </s>
<s> pond water can be filtered for human use but most part-time farmers would not want to go to so much trouble </s>
<s> the following amounts of water are needed per day for livestock and domestic uses </s>
<s> topography and soil </s>
<s> soil type drainage or degree of slope can make the difference between good crops and poor ones </s>
<s> the house </s>
<s> if the house is not wired adequately for electricity or if plumbing or a central heating system must be installed check into the cost of making these improvements </s>
<s> buying a farm </s>
<s> its worth as a place to live </s>
<s> the value of the products you can raise on it </s>
<s> the possibilities of selling the property later on for suburban subdivision </s>
<s> decide first what the place is worth to you and your family as a home in comparison with what it would cost to live in town </s>
<s> take into account the difference in city and county taxes insurance rates utility rates and the cost of travel to work </s>
<s> next estimate the value of possible earnings of the farm </s>
<s> to do this set up a plan on paper for operating the farm </s>
<s> list the kind and quantity of things the farm can be expected to produce in an average year </s>
<s> estimate the value of the produce at normal prices </s>
<s> the total is the probably gross income from farming </s>
<s> to find estimated net farm income subtract estimated annual farming expenditures from probable gross income from farming </s>
<s> include as expenditures an allowance for depreciation of farm buildings and equipment </s>
<s> also count as an expense a charge for the labor to be contributed by the family </s>
<s> it may be hard to decide what this labor is worth but charge something for it </s>
<s> otherwise you may pay too much for the farm and get nothing for your labor </s>
<s> to figure the value of the farm in terms of investment income divide the estimated annual net farm income by the percentage that you could expect to get in interest if the money were invested in some other way </s>

<s> instead of catholics being obliged or even encouraged to beget the greatest possible number of offspring as many non-catholics imagine the ideal of responsible parenthood is stressed </s>
<s> family planning is encouraged so that parents will be able to provide properly for their offspring </s>
<s> this means that such factors as the health of the parents particularly the mother their ability to provide their children with the necessities of life the degree of population density of a country and the shortage of housing facilities may legitimately be taken into consideration in determining the number of offspring </s>
<s> these are substantially the same factors considered by non-catholics in family planning </s>

<s> thus man can readily deduce that the primary objective end of the conjugal act is procreation the propagation of the race </s>

<s> it is always a temptation for a religious organization especially a powerful or dominant one to impose through the clenched fist of the law its creedal viewpoint upon others </s>
<s> both roman catholics and protestants have succumbed to this temptation in the past </s>

<s> with the return of our soldiers it soon became apparent that the belief was not shared by the great majority of citizens </s>

<s> that tumultuous painful and costly experience shows clearly that a law expressing a moral judgment cannot be enforced when it has little correspondence with the general view of society </s>

<s> thus at the same time that william henry harrison was preparing to pacify the aborigines of indiana territory and winning fame at the battle of tippecanoe anglo-saxon settlement made a great leap into the center of the north american continent to the west of the american agricultural frontier </s>

<s> selkirk persuaded eighty men and four officers to go to red river where they were to serve as a military force to protect his settlers from the hostile northwest company which resented the intrusion of farmers into the fur traders empire </s>
<s> when late in the summer the full extent of the damage was assessed all but fifty of the scots swiss and metis moved up the red to the mouth of the pembina river </s>
<s> the new site was somewhat warmer than fort douglas and much closer to the great herds of buffalo on which the settlement must depend for food </s>
<s> the selkirk settlers had been anticipated in their move southward by british fur traders </s>
<s> these carts were of a type devised in pembina in the days of alexander henry the younger about a decade before the selkirk colony was begun </s>
<s> they were held together by pegs and withes and in later times drawn by a single ox in thills </s>
<s> it was dickson who suggested to lord selkirk that he return to the atlantic coast by way of the united states </s>
<s> during the trip selkirk decided that the route through illinois territory to indiana and the eastern united states was the best route for goods from england to reach red river and that the united states was a better source of supply for many goods than either canada or england </s>
<s> the route which he had traveled and which he believed might develop into a trade route was followed by his settlers earlier than he might have expected </s>
<s> it was a three-month journey in the dead of winter followed by three months of labor on mackinac boats </s>
<s> nevertheless so short was the supply of seed that the settlers were forced to retreat to fort daer for food </s>
<s> thereafter seed and food became more plentiful and the colony remained in the north the year round </s>
<s> it was from the american outposts that red river shortages of livestock were to be made good </s>
<s> observing their distressing condition colonel snelling allowed these half-starved immigrants to settle on the military reservation </s>
<s> as these swiss were moving from the selkirk settlement to become the first civilian residents of minnesota dousman of michilimackinac michigan and prairie du chien was traveling to red river to open a trade in merchandise </s>
<s> in april came a rapid thaw that produced high waters which did not recede until mid-june </s>
<s> below the fort high bluffs extended uninterruptedly for six miles along the mississippi river </s>

<s> the letters of the common soldiers are rich in humor </s>
<s> indeed no richer humor is to be found in the whole of american literature than in the letters of the semi-literate men who wore the blue and the gray </s>
<s> some of their figures of speech were colorful and expressive </s>
<s> yanks were equally adept at figurative expression </s>
<s> she is a regular stub and twister double geered </s>
<s> humor found many modes of expression </s>
<s> william r stillwell an admirable georgian whose delightful correspondence is preserved in the georgia department of archives and history liked to tease his wife in his letters </s>
<s> charles thiot a splendid georgia soldier differed from most of his comrades in the ranks in that he was the owner of a large plantation well-educated and nearly fifty years of age </s>
<s> but he was very much like his associates in his hatred of camp routine </s>
<s> the soldiers who comprised the rank and file of the civil war armies were an earthy people </s>
<s> they talked and wrote much about the elemental functions of the body </s>
<s> one of the most common of camp maladies was diarrhoea </s>
<s> i eat too much eggs and poark </s>
<s> the letters which poured forth from camps were usually written under adverse circumstances </s>
<s> save for brief periods in garrison or winter quarters soldiers rarely enjoyed the luxury of a writing desk or table </s>
<s> most of the letters were written in the hubbub of camp on stumps pieces of bark drum heads or the knee </s>
<s> in the south after the first year of the war paper and ink were very poor </s>
<s> scarcity of paper caused many southerners to adopt the practice of cross-writing ie after writing from left to right of the page in the usual manner they gave the sheet a half turn and wrote from end to end across the lines previously written </s>
<s> sometimes soldiers wrote letters while bullets were whizzing about their heads </s>
<s> the most common type of letter was that of soldier husbands to their wives </s>
<s> but fathers often addressed communications to their small children </s>
<s> and these full of homely advice are among the most human and revealing of civil war letters </s>
<s> rebs who owned slaves occasionally would include in their letters admonitions or greetings to members of the negro community </s>
<s> occasionally they would write to the slaves </s>
<s> sometimes these servants wrote or dictated for enclosure with the letters of their soldier-masters messages to their relatives and to members of their owners families </s>
<s> unmarried soldiers carried on correspondence with sweethearts at home </s>
<s> occasionally gay young blades would write vividly to boon companions at home about their amorous exploits in richmond petersburg washington or nashville </s>
<s> but these comments are hardly printable </s>
<s> i told them some sweet lies and they believed it all </s>
<s> some of the letters were pungently expressive </s>
<s> alf sed he heard that you and hardy was a runing together all the time and he though he wod gust quit having any thing mor to doo with you for he thought it was no more yuse </s>
<s> i think you made a dam good chouise to turn off as nise a feler as alf dyer and let that orney thefin drunkard damed card playing sun of a bich com to sea you the god damed theaf and lop yeard pigen tode helion he is too orney for hel </s>
<s> initiation into combat sometimes elicited from soldier correspondents choice comments about their experiences and reactions </s>
<s> went out a skouting yesterday </s>
<s> we got to one house where there were five secessionists </s>
<s> some of the choicest remarks made by soldiers in their letters were in disparagement of unpopular officers </s>
<s> his head cannot contain enough sense to command a regiment much less a corps </s>
<s> jackson runs first and his cavalry are well drilled to follow their leader </s>
<s> he is not worth shucks </s>
<s> similar comments about officers are to be found in the letters of northern soldiers </s>
<s> no group of officers came in for more spirited denunciation than the doctors </s>
<s> the attitudes which the rebs and yanks took toward each other were very much the same and ranged over the same gamut of feeling from friendliness to extreme hatred </s>
<s> they looked as if they had been fed on vinegar and shavings </s>
<s> the popularity of folklore in america stands in direct proportion to the popularity of nationalism in america </s>
<s> and the emphasis on nationalism in america is in proportion to the growth of american influence across the world </s>
<s> thus if we are to observe american folklore in the twentieth century we will do well to establish the relationships between folklore nationalism and imperialism at the outset </s>
<s> historians have come to recognize two cardinal facts concerning nationalism and international influence </s>
<s> what actually occurred in the past is seldom as important as what a given generation feels must have occurred </s>
<s> its folklore and legend usually disguised as history are allowed to account for group actions to provide a focal point for group loyalty and to become a cohesive force for national identification </s>
<s> one can apply these facts to britain in the late eighteenth and nineteenth centuries as she spread her dominion over palm and pine and they can be applied again to the united states in more recent years </s>
<s> the popularity of local color literature before the spanish-american war the steady currency of the lincoln myth the increased emphasis on the frontier west in our mass media are cases in point </s>
<s> of course nationalism has really outlived its usefulness in a country as world-oriented as ours and its continued existence reflects one of the major culture lags of the twentieth-century united states </s>
<s> yet nationalism has lost few of its charms for the historian writer or man in the street </s>
<s> it is an understandable paradox that most american history and most american literature is today written from an essentially egocentric and isolationistic point of view at the very time america is spreading her dominion over palm and pine </s>
<s> such identification comes for each group in each crisis by rewriting history into legend and developing appropriate national heroes </s>
<s> in america such self-deception has served a particularly useful purpose </s>
<s> a heterogeneous people have needed it to attain an element of cultural and political cohesion in a new and ever-changing land </s>
<s> but we must never forget most of the appropriate heroes and their legends were created overnight to answer immediate needs almost always with conscious aims and ends </s>
<s> abraham lincoln emerged as an incarnation of the national constitution </s>
<s> robert e lee represented the dignity needed by a rebelling confederacy </s>
<s> and their roles are paralleled by those of patrick henry nathan hale andrew jackson davy crockett theodore roosevelt and many many more </s>
<s> folklore is individually created art that a homogeneous group of people preserve vary and recreate through oral transmission </s>
<s> it has come to mean myths legends tales songs proverbs riddles superstitions rhymes and such literary forms of expression </s>
<s> related to written literature and often remaining temporarily frozen in written form it loses its vitality when transcribed or removed from its oral existence </s>
<s> though it may exist in either literate or illiterate societies it assumes a role of true cultural importance only in the latter </s>
<s> in its propagandistic and commercial haste to discover our folk heritage the public has remained ignorant of definitions such as this </s>
<s> enthusiastically americans have swept subliterary and bogus materials like paul bunyan tales abe lincoln anecdotes and labor union songs up as true products of our american oral tradition </s>
<s> nor have we remembered that in the melting pot of america the hundreds of isolated and semi-isolated ethnic regional and occupational groups did not fuse into a homogeneous national unit until long after education and industrialization had caused them to cast oral tradition aside as a means of carrying culturally significant material </s>
<s> naturally such scholarly facts are of little concern to the man trying to make money or fan patriotism by means of folklore </s>
<s> that much of what he calls folklore is the result of beliefs carefully sown among the people with the conscious aim of producing a desired mass emotional reaction to a particular situation or set of situations is irrelevant </s>
<s> from all this we can now see that two streams of development run through the history of twentieth-century american folklore </s>
<s> on the one side we have the university professors and their students trained in teutonic methods of research who have sought out collected and studied the true products of the oral traditions of the ethnic regional and occupational groups that make up this nation </s>
<s> after all the field is large difficult to define and seldom taught properly to american undergraduates </s>
<s> in addition this country has been settled by many peoples of many heritages and their lore has become acculturated slowly in an age of print and easy communication within an ever-expanding and changing society </s>
<s> the problems confuse even the experts </s>
<s> for that matter the experts themselves are a mixed breed </s>
<s> anthropologists housewives historians and such by profession they approach their discipline as amateurs collectors commercial propagandists analysts or some combination of the four </s>
<s> they have widely varying backgrounds and aims </s>
<s> the outlook for the amateur for instance is usually dependent on his fondness for local history or for the picturesque </s>
<s> folklore is his hobby and he all too rightly wishes it to remain as such </s>
<s> the amateur is closely related to the collector who is actually no more than the amateur who has taken to the field </s>
<s> the collector enjoys the contact with rural life </s>
<s> and only rarely is he acutely concerned with the meaning of what he has located </s>
<s> both are primarily concerned with the uses that can be made of the material that the collector has found </s>
<s> both shudder at the thought of proceeding too far beyond the sewage system and the electric light lines </s>
<s> his standards are of course completely foreign to those of the analyst </s>
<s> to both the amateur and the commercial progandist the analyst lacks a soul lacks appreciation with his endless probings and classifications </s>
<s> dominated by the vicious circle of the university promotion system the analyst looks down on and gets along poorly with the other three groups although he cannot deny his debt to the collector </s>
<s> the knowledge that most americans have of folklore comes through contact with commercial propagandists and a few energetic amateurs and collectors </s>
<s> the work done by the analysts the men who really know what folklore is all about has no more appeal than any other work of a truly scientific sort and reaches a limited learned audience </s>
<s> publishers want books that will sell recording studios want discs that will not seem strange to ears used to hillbilly and jazz music grade and high schools want quaint but moral material </s>
<s> the analyst is apt to be too honest to fit in </s>
<s> they see it as a potpourri of charming moral legends and patriotic anecdotes with a superstition or remedy thrown in here and there </s>
<s> and so well is such ignorance preserved by the amateur and the money-maker that even at the college level most of the hundred-odd folklore courses given in the united states survive on sentiment and nationalism alone </s>
<s> if one wishes to discuss a literary figure who uses folklore in his work the first thing he must realize is that the literary figure is probably part of this ignorant american public </s>
<s> and while every writer must be dealt with as a special case the interested student will want to ask himself a number of questions about each </s>
<s> when he gets the answers to his questions he will be discouraged </s>
<s> in the first place a good many writers who are said to use folklore do not unless one counts an occasional superstition or tale </s>
<s> robert frost for instance writes about rural life in new england but he does not include any significant amount of folklore in his poems </s>
<s> the last two writers introduce strong political bias into their works and not unlike the union leaders that we will discuss soon see folklore as a reservoir of protest by a downtrodden and publically silenced mass </s>
<s> folklore as used by such writers really reflects images engraved into it by the very person using it </s>
<s> the folk are simply not homogeneous with respect to nation or political attitude </s>
<s> the coalition was to prove inadvisable </s>
<s> he killed accurately freely and dispassionately </s>
<s> the police credited him with twenty-five murders but he was never brought to trial for one of them </s>
<s> like a fair number of bootleggers he disliked alcohol </s>
<s> he was an expert florist tenderly dextrous in the arrangement of bouquets and wreaths </s>
<s> he had no apparent comprehension of morality </s>
<s> he walked with a heavy list to the right as that leg was four inches shorter than the other but the lurch did not reduce his feline quickness with his guns </s>
<s> he was also at this time although not so interwoven in high politics and the rackets as torrio and capone the most powerful and most dangerous mob leader in the chicago underworld the roughneck king </s>
<s> the influence of mass was less pervasive than that of the congested slum tenements among the bawdy houses honkytonks and sawdust saloons of his birthplace </s>
<s> he ran wild with the child gangs of the neighbourhood and went through the normal pressure-cooker course of thieving police-dodging and housebreaking </s>
<s> at the age of ten when he was working as a newsboy in the loop he was knocked down by a streetcar which resulted in his permanently shortened leg </s>
<s> he was also at the same time gaining practical experience as a safe breaker and highwayman and learning how to shoot to kill from a neanderthal convicted murderer named gene geary later committed to chester asylum as a homicidal maniac but whose eyes misted with tears when the young dion sang a ballad about an irish mother in his clear and syrupy tenor </s>
<s> two years later he served another three months for assault </s>

<s> but he still showed no intention of sharing with the syndicate </s>
<s> a tsunami may be started by a sea bottom slide an earthquake or a volcanic eruption </s>
<s> the ancient greeks recorded several catastrophic inundations by huge waves </s>
<s> its waves persisted for a week and were felt as far away as the english coast </s>
<s> tsunami are rare however in the atlantic ocean </s>
<s> they are far more common in the pacific </s>
<s> the dimensions of these waves dwarf all our usual standards of measurement </s>
<s> the greater the depth of the water the greater is the speed of the wave </s>
<s> tsunami are so shallow in comparison with their length that in the open ocean they are hardly detectable </s>
<s> their amplitude sometimes is as little as two feet from trough to crest </s>
<s> usually it is only when they approach shallow water on the shore that they build up to their terrifying heights </s>
<s> not until they sailed home at the end of the day through a sea strewn with bodies and the wreckage of houses were they aware of what had happened </s>
<s> the giant waves are more dangerous on flat shores than on steep ones </s>
<s> generally the first salvo of a tsunami is a rather sharp swell not different enough from an ordinary wave to alarm casual observers </s>
<s> this is followed by a tremendous suck of water away from the shore as the first great trough arrives </s>
<s> reefs are left high and dry and the beaches are covered with stranded fish </s>
<s> at hilo large numbers of people ran out to inspect the amazing spectacle of the denuded beach </s>
<s> many of them paid for their curiosity with their lives for some minutes later the first giant wave roared over the shore </s>
<s> when a second quake came they dashed back to the beach fearing that they might be buried under landslides </s>
<s> just as they reached the shore the first huge wave crashed upon them </s>
<s> a tsunami is not a single wave but a series </s>
<s> the waves may keep coming for many hours </s>
<s> usually the third to the eighth waves in the series are the biggest </s>
<s> he was able to make a detailed inspection of the waves </s>
<s> their onrush and retreat he reported was accompanied by a great hissing roaring and rattling </s>
<s> the third and fourth waves seemed to be the highest </s>
<s> on some of the islands beaches the waves came in gently </s>
<s> they were steepest on the shores facing the direction of the seaquake from which the waves had come </s>
<s> scientists and fishermen have occasionally seen strange by-products of the phenomenon </s>
<s> the luminosity of the water is now believed to have been caused by the stimulation of vast numbers of the luminescent organism noctiluca miliaris by the turbulence of the sea </s>
<s> japanese fishermen have sometimes observed that sardines hauled up in their nets during a tsunami have enormously swollen stomachs </s>
<s> the fish have swallowed vast numbers of bottom-living diatoms raised to the surface by the disturbance </s>
<s> gratified fishermen hauled them in by the thousands </s>
<s> it consists of a series of pipes and a pressure-measuring chamber which record the rise and fall of the water surface </s>
<s> ordinary water tides are disregarded </s>
<s> this in turn sets off an alarm notifying the observers at the station that a tsunami is in progress </s>
<s> such equipment has been installed at hilo midway attu and dutch harbor </s>
<s> the moment the alarm goes off information is immediately forwarded to honolulu which is the center of the warning system </s>
<s> this center also receives prompt reports on earthquakes from four coast survey stations in the pacific which are equipped with seismographs </s>
<s> its staff makes a preliminary determination of the epicenter of the quake and alerts tide stations near the epicenter for a tsunami </s>
<s> by means of charts showing wave-travel times and depths in the ocean at various locations it is possible to estimate the rate of approach and probable time of arrival at hawaii of a tsunami getting under way at any spot in the pacific </s>
<s> the civil and military authorities are then advised of the danger and they issue warnings and take all necessary protective steps </s>
<s> all of these activities are geared to a top-priority communication system and practice tests have been held to assure that everything will work smoothly </s>
<s> the warning system immediately went into action </s>
<s> they hurled a cement barge against a freighter in honolulu harbor knocked down telephone lines marooned automobiles flooded lawns killed six cows </s>
<s> there is little doubt that the warning system saved lives and reduced the damage </s>
<s> but it is plain that a warning system however efficient is not enough </s>
<s> in the vulnerable areas of the pacific there should be restrictions against building homes on exposed coasts or at least a requirement that they be either raised off the ground or anchored strongly against waves </s>
<s> the key to the world of geology is change </s>
<s> nothing remains the same </s>
<s> life has evolved from simple combinations of molecules in the sea to complex combinations in man </s>
<s> the land too is changing and earthquakes are daily reminders of this </s>
<s> earthquakes result when movements in the earth twist rocks until they break </s>
<s> sometimes this is accompanied by visible shifts of the ground surface </s>
<s> often the shifts cannot be seen but they are there </s>
<s> and everywhere can be found scars of earlier breaks once deeply buried </s>
<s> the effects of earthquakes on civilization have been widely publicized even overemphasized </s>
<s> the role of an earthquake in starting the destruction of whole cities is tremendously frightening but fire may actually be the principal agent in a particular disaster </s>
<s> superstition has often blended with fact to color reports </s>
<s> two unsolved mysteries are based on these facts </s>
<s> knowledge gained from studying earthquake waves has been applied in various fields </s>
<s> in the search for oil and gas we make similar waves under controlled conditions with dynamite and learn from them where there are buried rock structures favorable to the accumulation of these resources </s>
<s> we have also developed techniques for recognizing and locating underground nuclear tests through the waves in the ground which they generate </s>
<s> the following discussion of this subject has been adapted from the book causes of catastrophe by l don leet </s>
<s> the restless earth and its interior </s>
<s> a sharp tremor was followed by a jerky roll </s>
<s> undoubtedly none of the residents realize the influence their town has had on american military history or the deeds of valor that have been done in its name </s>
<s> bursting from the lips of a charging cavalry trooper was the last sound heard on this earth by untold numbers of cheyennes sioux and apaches mexican banditos under pancho villa japanese in the south pacific and chinese and north korean communists in korea </s>
<s> today a battle cry may seem an anachronism for in the modern army esprit de corps has been sacrificed to organizational charts and tables </s>
<s> wiry and burr-headed with steel blue eyes and a chest splattered with medals chandler is the epitome of the old-time trooper </s>
<s> the truth is however that when mel chandler first reported to the regiment the only steed he had ever ridden was a swivel chair and the only weapon he had ever wielded was a pencil </s>
<s> chandler had been commissioned in the medical service corps and was serving as a personnel officer for the kansas city medical depot when he decided that if he was going to make the army his career he wanted to be in the fighting part of it </s>
<s> though he knew no more about military science and tactics than any other desk officer he managed to get transferred to the combat forces </s>
<s> in combat helping your co make a fool of himself might mean getting yourself killed </s>
<s> chandler understood this and expected the worst </s>
<s> but his first few days with troop h were full of surprises beginning with first sergeant robert early </s>
<s> chandler had expected a tough old trooper with a gravel voice </s>
<s> instead sergeant early was quiet sharp and confident </s>
<s> he had enlisted in the army straight out of high school and had immediately set about learning his new trade </s>
<s> there was no weapon early could not take apart and reassemble blind-folded </s>
<s> he could lead a patrol and he knew his paper work </s>
<s> he not only knew soldiering but mathematics history and literature as well </s>
<s> but for all his erudite confidence sergeant early was right out of the garryowen mold </s>
<s> he was filled with the spirit of the fighting seventh </s>
<s> that saved mel chandler </s>
<s> sergeant early let the new co know just how lucky he was to be in the best troop in the best regiment in the united states army </s>
<s> he fed the captain bits of history about the troops and the regiment </s>
<s> but what made the load lighter was the realization that every officer non-com and trooper was ready and willing to help him carry it for the good of the troop and the regiment </s>
<s> the final proof was a small incident </s>
<s> in the middle of the party chandler looked up to see four smiling faces bearing down upon him each beaming above the biggest greenest shamrock he had ever seen </s>
<s> the faces belonged to lieutenant marvin goulding his wife and their two children </s>
<s> and when the singing began it was the gouldings who sang the old irish songs the best </s>
<s> though there was an occasional good-natured chuckle about marvin goulding the jewish officer from chicago singing tearfully about the ould sod no one really thought it was strange </s>
<s> it was no coincidence that goulding was one of the most beloved platoon leaders in the regiment </s>
<s> and so mel chandler got the spirit of garryowen </s>
<s> he set out to keep troop h the best troop in the best regiment </s>
<s> even the mess sergeant bill brown a dapper cocky transfer from an airborne division went out on the range </s>
<s> the troop received a new leader lieutenant robert m carroll fresh out of rotc and bucking for regular army status </s>
<s> carroll was sharp and military but he was up against tough competition for that ra berth and he wanted to play it cool </s>
<s> so mel chandler set out to sell him on the spirit of garryowen just as he himself had been sold a short time before </s>
<s> from then on the fighting seventh was in the thick of the bitterest fighting in korea </s>
<s> one night on the naktong river mel chandler called on that fabled esprit de corps </s>
<s> the regiment was dug in on the east side of the river and the north koreans were steadily building up a concentration of crack troops on the other side </s>

<s> they came in waves </s>
<s> first came the cannon fodder white-clad civilians being driven into death as a massive human battering ram </s>
<s> they were followed by crack north korean troops who mounted one charge after another </s>
<s> another force flanked the company and took up a position on a hill to the rear </s>
<s> captain chandler saw that it was building up strength </s>
<s> one of the more seriously wounded was lieutenant carroll the young officer bucking for the regular army </s>
<s> chandler left carroll at the bottom of the hill to direct any reinforcements he could find to the fight </s>

<s> he took one step two broke into a trot and then into a run </s>

<s> the koreans fell back but regrouped at the top of the hill and pinned down the cavalrymen with a screen of fire </s>
<s> chandler looking to right and left to see how his men were faring suddenly saw another figure bounding up the hill hurling grenades and hollering the battle cry as he ran </s>
<s> it was bob carroll who had suddenly found himself imbued with the spirit of garryowen </s>
<s> he had formed his own task force of three stragglers and led them up the hill in a fighting seventh charge </s>

<s> i do not mean to suggest that these assumptions are self-evident in the sense that everyone agrees with them </s>
<s> if they were walter lippmann would be writing the same columns as george sokolsky and herb lock would have nothing to draw cartoons about </s>
<s> i do mean however that i take them for granted and that everything i shall be saying would appear quite idiotic against any contrary assumptions </s>
<s> the ultimate objective of american policy is to help establish a world in which there is the largest possible measure of freedom and justice and peace and material prosperity </s>
<s> this is true for two reasons because communism is both doctrinally and in practice antithetical to these conditions </s>
<s> and because communists have the will and as long as soviet power remains intact the capacity to prevent their realization </s>
<s> moreover as communist power increases the enjoyment of these conditions throughout the world diminishes pro rata and the possibility of their restoration becomes increasingly remote </s>
<s> it follows that victory over communism is the dominant proximate goal of american policy </s>
<s> but dominant in the sense that every other objective no matter how worthy intrinsically must defer to it </s>
<s> peace is a worthy objective </s>
<s> but if we must choose between peace and keeping the communists out of berlin then we must fight </s>
<s> freedom in the sense of self-determination is a worthy objective </s>
<s> but if granting self-determination to the algerian rebels entails sweeping that area into the sino-soviet orbit then algerian freedom must be postponed </s>
<s> justice is a worthy objective </s>
<s> but if justice for bantus entails driving the government of the union of south africa away from the west then the bantus must be prepared to carry their identification cards yet a while longer </s>
<s> prosperity is a worthy objective </s>
<s> but if providing higher standards of living gets in the way of producing sufficient guns to resist communist aggression then material sacrifices and denials will have to be made </s>
<s> it may be of course that such objectives can be pursued consisently with a policy designed to overthrow communism </s>
<s> the uses of power </s>
<s> this brings us squarely to the problem of power and the uses a nation makes of power </s>
<s> i submit that this is the key problem of international relations that it always has been that it always will be </s>
<s> in the recent political campaign two charges were leveled affecting the question of power and i think we might begin by trying to put them into proper focus </s>
<s> one was demonstrably false </s>
<s> the other for the most part true </s>
<s> i know i do not have to dwell here on the absurdity of that contention </s>
<s> i have often searched for a graphic way of impressing our superiority on those americans who have doubts and i think mr jameson campaigne has done it well in his new book american might and soviet myth </s>
<s> overwhelming russian naval power would always be within a few hundred miles of our coast </s>
<s> add this to the unrest in the countries around us where oppressed peoples would be ready to turn on us at the first opportunity </s>
<s> add also a comparatively primitive industrial plant which would severely limit our capacity to keep abreast of the soviets even in the missile field which is reputed to be our main strength </s>
<s> the contention needs to be formulated with much greater precision than it ever was during the campaign but once that has been done i fail to see how any serious student of world affairs can quarrel with it </s>
<s> prestige however is only a minor part of the problem </s>
<s> and even then it is a concept that can be highly misleading </s>
<s> prestige is a measure of how other people think of you well or ill </s>
<s> but contrary to what was implied during the campaign prestige is surely not important for its own sake </s>
<s> only the vain and incurably sentimental among us will lose sleep simply because foreign peoples are not as impressed by our strength as they ought to be </s>
<s> the thing to lose sleep over is what people having concluded that we are weaker than we are are likely to do about it </s>
<s> the evidence suggests that foreign peoples believe the united states is weaker than the soviet union and is bound to fall still further behind in the years ahead </s>
<s> this ignorant estimate i repeat is not of any interest in itself </s>
<s> to the extent then that declining us prestige means that other nations will be tempted to place their bets on an ultimate american defeat and will thus be more vulnerable to soviet intimidation there is reason for concern </s>
<s> still these guesses about the outcome of the struggle cannot be as important as the actual power relationship between the soviet union and ourselves </s>
<s> communist gains </s>
<s> success may mean merely the displacement of western influence </s>
<s> communist political warfare we must remember is waged insidiously and in deliberate stages </s>
<s> the soviets understand moreover that the first step in turning a country toward communism is to turn it against the west </s>
<s> and this may be as far as the process will go </s>
<s> to recite the particulars of recent soviet successes is hardly reassuring </s>
