<s> rare indeed is the harlem citizen from the most circumspect church member to the most shiftless adolescent who does not have a long tale to tell of police incompetence injustice or brutality </s>
<s> i myself have witnessed and endured it more than once </s>
<s> the businessmen and racketeers also have a story </s>
<s> and so do the prostitutes </s>
<s> it is hard on the other hand to blame the policeman blank good-natured thoughtless and insuperably innocent for being such a perfect representative of the people he serves </s>
<s> he too believes in good intentions and is astounded and offended when they are not taken for the deed </s>
<s> there is no way for him not to know it there are few things under heaven more unnerving than the silent accumulating contempt and hatred of a people </s>
<s> he moves through harlem therefore like an occupying soldier in a bitterly hostile country </s>
<s> which is precisely what and where he is and is the reason he walks in twos and threes </s>
<s> and he is not the only one who knows why he is always in company the people who are watching him know why too </s>
<s> any street meeting sacred or secular which he and his colleagues uneasily cover has as its explicit or implicit burden the cruelty and injustice of the white domination </s>
<s> and these days of course in terms increasingly vivid and jubilant it speaks of the end of that domination </s>
<s> the white policeman standing on a harlem street corner finds himself at the very center of the revolution now occurring in the world </s>
<s> even if he is gifted with the merest mustard grain of imagination something must seep in </s>
<s> he cannot avoid observing that some of the children in spite of their color remind him of children he has known and loved perhaps even of his own children </s>
<s> he knows that he certainly does not want his children living this way </s>
<s> he can retreat from his uneasiness in only one direction into a callousness which very shortly becomes second nature </s>
<s> he becomes more callous the population becomes more hostile the situation grows more tense and the police force is increased </s>
<s> before the dust has settled or the blood congealed editorials speeches and civil-rights commissions are loud in the land demanding to know what happened </s>
<s> what happened is that negroes want to be treated like men </s>
<s> negroes want to be treated like men a perfectly straightforward statement containing only seven words </s>
<s> people who have mastered kant hegel shakespeare marx freud and the bible find this statement utterly impenetrable </s>
<s> the idea seems to threaten profound barely conscious assumptions </s>
<s> a kind of panic paralyzes their features as though they found themselves trapped on the edge of a steep place </s>
<s> i once tried to describe to a very well-known american intellectual the conditions among negroes in the south </s>
<s> my recital disturbed him and made him indignant </s>
<s> i tried to explain what has happened unfailingly whenever a significant body of negroes move north </s>
<s> they do not escape jim crow they merely encounter another not-less-deadly variety </s>
<s> they do not move to chicago they move to the south side </s>
<s> they do not move to new york they move to harlem </s>
<s> the pressure within the ghetto causes the ghetto walls to expand and this expansion is always violent </s>
<s> white people hold the line as long as they can and in as many ways as they can from verbal intimidation to physical violence </s>
<s> but inevitably the border which has divided the ghetto from the rest of the world falls into the hands of the ghetto </s>
<s> the white people fall back bitterly before the black horde </s>
<s> the landlords make a tidy profit by raising the rent chopping up the rooms and all but dispensing with the upkeep </s>
<s> northerners indulge in an extremely dangerous luxury </s>
<s> they seem to feel that because they fought on the right side during the civil war and won they have earned the right merely to deplore what is going on in the south without taking any responsibility for it </s>
<s> and that they can ignore what is happening in northern cities because what is happening in little rock or birmingham is worse </s>
<s> the guessing games referred to have driven more than one negro into the narcotics ward the madhouse or the river </s>
<s> he was born in the north and did his military training in the south </s>
<s> he found it if anything all too familiar </s>
<s> in the second place though even if birmingham is worse no doubt johannesburg south africa beats it by several miles and buchenwald was one of the worst things that ever happened in the entire history of the world </s>
<s> the world has never lacked for horrifying examples </s>
<s> but i do not believe that these examples are meant to be used as justification for our own crimes </s>
<s> this perpetual justification empties the heart of all human feeling </s>
<s> the emptier our hearts become the greater will be our crimes </s>
<s> thirdly the south is not merely an embarrassingly backward region but a part of this country and what happens there concerns every one of us </s>
<s> as far as the color problem is concerned there is but one great difference between the southern white and the northerner the southerner remembers historically and in his own psyche a kind of eden in which he loved black people and they loved him </s>
<s> historically the flaming sword laid across this eden is the civil war </s>
<s> everything thereafter is permitted him except the love he remembers and has never ceased to need </s>
<s> the resulting indescribable torment affects every southern mind and is the basis of the southern hysteria </s>
<s> none of this is true for the northerner </s>
<s> negroes represent nothing to him personally except perhaps the dangers of carnality </s>
<s> he never sees negroes </s>
<s> southerners see them all the time </s>
<s> northerners never think about them whereas southerners are never really thinking of anything else </s>
<s> negroes are therefore ignored in the north and are under surveillance in the south and suffer hideously in both places </s>
<s> neither the southerner nor the northerner is able to look on the negro simply as a man </s>
<s> the country will not change until it re-examines itself and discovers what it really means by freedom </s>
<s> in the meantime generations keep being born bitterness is increased by incompetence pride and folly and the world shrinks around us </s>
<s> walk through the streets of harlem and see what we this nation have become </s>
<s> east river downtown postscript to a letter from harlem </s>
<s> the fact that american negroes rioted in the un while adlai stevenson was addressing the assembly shocked and baffled most white americans </s>
<s> i had intended to be there myself </s>
<s> and i was curious about the african reaction </s>
<s> however the chaos on my desk prevented my being in the un gallery </s>
<s> had i been there i too in the eyes of most americans would have been merely a pawn in the hands of the communists </s>
<s> nor was it long naturally before prominent negroes rushed forward to assure the republic that the un rioters do not represent the real feeling of the negro community </s>
<s> according then to what i take to be the prevailing view these rioters were merely a handful of irresponsible stalinist-corrupted provocateurs </s>
<s> i find this view amazing </s>
<s> it is a view which even a minimal effort at observation would immediately contradict </s>
<s> one has only for example to walk through harlem and ask oneself two questions </s>
<s> the answer to both questions is immediately obvious </s>
<s> now i do not doubt that among the people at the un that day there were stalinist and professional revolutionists acting out of the most cynical motives </s>
<s> wherever there is great social discontent these people are sooner or later to be found </s>
<s> their presence is not as frightening as the discontent which creates their opportunity </s>
<s> it is a notion which contains a gratuitous insult implying as it does that negroes can make no move unless they are manipulated </s>
<s> movement itself was the chief and often the only attraction of the primitive movies of the nineties </s>
<s> each film consisted of fifty feet which gives a running time of about one minute on the screen </s>
<s> as long as audiences came to see the movement there seemed little reason to adventure further </s>
<s> motion-picture exhibitions took place in stores in a general atmosphere like that of the penny arcade which can still be found in such urban areas as times square </s>
<s> brief snips of actual events were shown parades dances street scenes </s>
<s> the sensational and frightening enjoyed popularity a train rushes straight at the audience or a great wave threatens to break over the seats </s>
<s> an early edison production was the execution of mary queen of scots </s>
<s> the unfortunate queen mounted the scaffold </s>
<s> the headsman swung his axe </s>
<s> the head dropped off </s>
<s> end of film </s>
<s> an early film by a competitor of the wizard of menlo park simply showed a long kiss performed by two actors of the contemporary stage </s>
<s> in the field of entertainment there is no spur to financial daring so effective as audience boredom and the first decade of the new device was not over before audiences began staying away in large numbers from the simple-minded one-minute shows </s>
<s> in response the industry allowed the discovery of the motion picture as a form of fiction and thus gave the movies the essential form they have had to this day </s>
<s> despite the sheer beauty and spectacle of numerous documentaries art films and travelogues despite the impressive financial success of such a recent development as cinerama the movies are at heart a form of fiction like the play the novel or the short story </s>
<s> moreover the most artistically successful of the nonfiction films have invariably borrowed the narrative form from the fiction feature </s>
<s> thus such great american documentaries as the river and the plow that broke the plains were composed as visual stories rather than as illustrated lectures </s>
<s> the discovery that movies are a form of fiction was made in the early years of this century and it was made chiefly by two men a french magician georges melies and an american employee of edison edwin s porter </s>
<s> of the two porter is justly the better known for he went far beyond the vital finding of fiction for films to take the first step toward fashioning a language of film toward making the motion picture the intricate efficient time machine that it has remained since even in the most inept hands </s>
<s> narrative time and film time </s>
<s> melies however out of his professional instincts as a magician discovered and made use of a number of illusionary techniques that remain part of the vocabulary of film </s>
<s> as the first scene begins to fade the succeeding scene begins to appear </s>
<s> for a moment or two both scenes are present simultaneously one growing weaker one growing stronger </s>
<s> in a series of fairy tales and fantasies melies demonstrated that the film is superbly equipped to tell a straightforward story with beginning middle and end complications resolutions climaxes and conclusions </s>
<s> immediately the film improved and it improved because in narrative it found a content based on time to complement its own unbreakable connection with time </s>
<s> linking the smoothly changing images together the eye itself endows them with the illusion of movement </s>
<s> so is the time of the novel </s>
<s> the drama in the theater and the concert in the hall both have a fixed time but the time is fixed by the director and the players the conductor and the instrumentalists subject therefore to much variation as record collectors well know </s>
<s> the time of the motion picture is fixed absolutely </s>
<s> this is the rate of projection </s>
<s> it is also the rate of photographing </s>
<s> time is built into the motion picture which cannot exist without time </s>
<s> the cinematic element of time is merely used to increase the realism of an object which would still be reasonably realistic in a still photo </s>
<s> in narrative time is essential as it is in film </s>
<s> almost everything about the movies that is peculiarly of the movies derives from a tension created and maintained between narrative time and film time </s>
<s> it was porter however who produced the very first movie whose name has lived on through the half century of film history that has since ensued </s>
<s> the movie was the great train robbery and its effects on the young industry and art were all but incalculable </s>
<s> the great train robbery is a one-reel film </s>
<s> the reel itself became and still is the standard of measure for the movies </s>
<s> the material of the porter film is simplicity itself </s>
<s> a band of robbers enters a railroad station overpowers and ties up the telegraph operator holds up the train and escapes </s>
<s> a posse is formed and pursues the robbers who having made their escape are whooping it up with some wild wild women in a honky-tonk hide-out </s>
<s> the robbers run from the hide-out take cover in a wooded declivity and are shot dead by the posse </s>
<s> as a finale is appended a close-up of one of the band taking aim and firing his revolver straight at the audience </s>
<s> all this is simple enough but in telling the story porter did two important things that had not been done before </s>
<s> the plane of the action in the scene is not parallel with the plane of the film in the camera or on the screen </s>
<s> if the change at first sight seems minor we may recall that it took the italian painters about two hundred years to make an analogous change and the italian painters by universal consent were the most brilliant group of geniuses any art has seen </s>
<s> in that apparently simple shift porter opened the way to the sensitive use of the camera as an instrument of art as well as a mechanical recording device </s>
<s> he did more than that </s>
<s> cutting of course takes place automatically in the creation of a film </s>
<s> the meaning of the word is quite physical to begin with </s>
<s> the physical film is cut with a knife at the end of one complete sequence and the cut edge is joined physically by cement to the cut edge of the beginning of the next sequence </s>
<s> if as a home movie maker you shoot the inevitable footage of your child taking its first steps you have merely recorded an historical event </s>
<s> you are employing the basic technique of film </s>
<s> you are cutting </s>
<s> this is what porter did </s>
<s> she dashes around in alarm </s>
<s> the two events are taking place at the same time </s>
<s> time and space have both become cinematic </s>
<s> the chase in itself is a narrative </s>
<s> the simple naked idea of one man chasing another is of its nature better fitted for the film than it is for any other form of fiction </s>
<s> the cowboy films the cops and robbers films and the slapstick comedy films culminating in an insane chase are not only catering to what critics may assume to be a vulgar taste for violence </s>
<s> the creator of the art of the film dw griffith </s>
<s> there still remained the need for one great film artist to explore the full potential of the new form and to make it an art </s>
<s> the man was dw griffith </s>
<s> in about seven years griffith either invented or first realized the possibilities of virtually every resource at the disposal of the film maker </s>
<s> before he was forty griffith had created the art of the film </s>
<s> not that there had not been attempts mostly european to do exactly that </s>
<s> but in general the european efforts to make an art of the entertainment had ignored the slowly emerging language of the film itself </s>
<s> staggeringly condensed versions of famous novels and famous plays were presented </s>
<s> in all of this extensive and expensive effort the camera was downgraded to the status of recording instrument for art work produced elsewhere by the actor or by the author </s>
<s> the phonograph today for all its high fidelity and stereophonic sound is precisely what the early art purveyors in the movies wished to make of the camera </s>
<s> not surprisingly this approach did not work </s>
<s> the effort produced a valuable record of stage techniques in the early years of the century and some interesting records of great theater figures who would otherwise be only names </s>
<s> but no art at all was born of the art effort in the early movies </s>
<s> in general religious interest seems to exist in all parts of the metropolis </s>
<s> congregational membership however is another thing </s>
<s> a congregation survives only if it can sustain a socially homogeneous membership </s>
<s> that is when it can preserve economic integration </s>
<s> religious faith can be considered a necessary condition of membership in a congregation since the decision to join a worshiping group requires some motive force but faith is not a sufficient condition for joining </s>
<s> the presence of other members of similar social and economic level is the sufficient condition </s>
<s> the breakdown of social homogeneity in inner city areas and the spread of inner city blight account for the decline of central city churches </s>
<s> the central city areas in other words exhibit the two characteristics which violate the life principle of congregations of the major denominations they have too few middle-class people </s>
<s> they mix middle-class people with lower-class residents </s>
<s> central city areas have become progressively poorer locales for the major denominations since the exodus of middle-class people from most central cities </s>
<s> with few exceptions the major denominations are rapidly losing their hold on the central city </s>
<s> the key to protestant development therefore is economic integration of the nucleus of the congregation </s>
<s> members of higher and lower social status often cluster around this nucleus so that protestant figures on social class give the impression of spread over all social classes </s>
<s> but this is deceptive for the core of membership is concentrated in a single social and economic stratum </s>
<s> the congregation perishes when it is no longer possible to replenish that core from the neighborhood </s>
<s> moreover residential mobility is so high in metropolitan areas that churches have to recruit constantly in their core stratum in order to survive </s>
<s> they can lose higher- and lower-status members from the church without collapsing but they need adequate recruits for the core stratum in order to preserve economic integration </s>
<s> the congregation is first and foremost an economic peer group </s>
<s> it is secondarily a believing and worshiping fellowship </s>
<s> they survive only when they can recruit social and economic peers </s>
<s> we have seen that the folksy spirit is confined to economic peers </s>
<s> consequently the vulnerability to social difference should not be attributed to the stress on personal community in protestant congregations </s>
<s> actually there is little evidence of such personal community in protestant congregations as we shall see in another connection </s>
<s> the vulnerability of protestantism to social differences stems from the peculiar role of the new religious style in middle-class life where the congregation is a vehicle of social and economic group identity and must conform therefore to the principle of economic integration </s>
<s> this fact is evident in the recruitment of new members </s>
<s> mission as co-optation </s>
<s> the rule of economic integration in congregational life can be seen in the missionary outreach of the major denominations </s>
<s> theologians have been stressing the fact that the church does not exist for its own sake but as a testimony in the world for the healing of the world </s>
<s> a crucial question therefore is what evangelism and mission actually mean in metropolitan protestantism </s>
<s> if economic integration really shapes congregational life then evangelism should be a process of extending economic integration </s>
<s> the task of a congregation would be defined according to economic integration as the work of co-opting individuals and families of similar social and economic position to replenish the nuclear core of the congregation </s>
<s> it can also mean the assimilation of centers of power from an environment in order to strengthen an organization </s>
<s> this recruitment however must follow the pattern of economic integration or it will disrupt the congregation </s>
<s> evangelism and congregational outreach have not been carefully studied in the churches </s>
<s> one study in pittsburgh however has illuminated the situation </s>
<s> on the surface this seems a sound approach to christian mission members of the congregation show by their friendly attitudes that they care for new people </s>
<s> the new people respond in kind by joining the church </s>
<s> missionary outreach by friendly contact looks somewhat different when one reflects on what is known about friendly contact in metropolitan neighborhoods </s>
<s> the majority of such contacts are with people of similar social and economic position </s>
<s> association by level of achievement is the dominant principle of informal relations </s>
<s> this means that the antennae of the congregation are extended into the community picking up the wave lengths of those who will fit into the social and economic level of the congregation </s>
<s> the mission of the church is actually a process of informal co-optation </s>
<s> the lay ministry is a means to recruit like-minded people who will strengthen the social class nucleus of the congregation </s>
<s> churches can be strengthened through this process of co-optation so long as the environs of the church provide a sufficient pool of people who can fit the pattern of economic integration </s>
<s> the transmutation of mission to co-optation is further indicated by the insignificance of educational activities worship preaching and publicity in reaching new members </s>
<s> in general friendly contact with a member followed by contact with a clergyman will account for a major share of recruitment by the churches making it quite evident that the extension of economic integration through co-optation is the principal form of mission in the contemporary church </s>
<s> economic integration and co-optation are the two methods by which protestants associate with and recruit from the neighborhood </s>
<s> the inner life of congregations will prosper so long as like-minded people of similar social and economic level can fraternize together </s>
<s> economic integration ceases when the social and economic statuses in an area become too mixed or conflict with the status of the congregation </s>
<s> in a rapidly changing society congregations will run into difficulties repeatedly since such nice balances of economic integration are hard to sustain in the metropolis for more than a single generation </s>
<s> the fact that metropolitan churches of the major denominations have moved approximately every generation for the last hundred years becomes somewhat more intelligible in the light of this struggle to maintain economic balance </s>
<s> the expense of this type of organization in religious life when one recalls the number of city churches which deteriorated beyond repair before being abandoned raises fundamental questions about the principle of protestant survival in a mobile society </s>
<s> nonetheless the prevalence of economic integration in congregations illumines the nature of the protestant development </s>
<s> these trends seem to be working at cross-purposes in the metropolis </s>
<s> residential associations struggle to insulate themselves against intrusions </s>
<s> the motifs of impersonal interdependence and insulation of residential communities have polarized </s>
<s> the schism between central city and suburb negro and white blue collar and white collar can be viewed as symptomatic of this deeper polarization of trends in the metropolis </s>
<s> it now becomes evident that the denominational church is intimately involved with the economy of middle-class culture for it serves to crystallize the social class identity of middle-class residential groupings </s>
<s> the accelerated pace of metropolitan changes has accentuated the drive to conformity in congregations of the major denominations </s>
<s> this conformity represents a desperate attempt to stabilize a hopelessly unstable environment </s>
<s> more than creatures of metropolitan forces the churches have taken the lead in counteracting the interdependence of metropolitan life crystallizing and perpetuating the stratification of peoples giving form to the struggle for social homogeneity in a world of heterogeneous peoples </s>
<s> since american life is committed above all to productivity and a higher standard of economic life the countervailing forces of residential and religious exclusiveness have fought a desperate rearguard action against the expanding interdependence of the metropolis </s>
<s> consumer communities have suffered at the hands of the productive interests </s>
<s> negroes puerto ricans and rural newcomers are slowly making their way into the cities </s>
<s> soon they will fight their way into the lower middle-class suburbs and the churches will experience the same decay and rebuilding cycle which has characterized their history for a century </s>
<s> mission to the metropolis contradicts survival of the congregation in the residential community because the middle classes are fighting metropolitan interdependence with residential exclusion </s>
<s> this interpretation of the role of residence in the economy of middle-class culture could lead to various projections for the churches </s>
<s> it could be argued that any fellowship which centers in residential neighborhoods is doomed to become an expression of the panic for stable identity among the middle classes </s>
<s> it could be argued that only such neighborhoods can sustain religious activity since worship presupposes some local stabilities </s>
<s> whatever projection one makes the striking fact about congregational and parochial life is the extent to which it is a vehicle of the social identity of middle-class people </s>
<s> attention will be given in the next chapter to the style of association in the denominational churches </s>
<s> this style is characteristically an expression of the communal style of the middle classes </s>
<s> the keynotes of this style are activism and emphasis on achievements in gaining self-esteem </s>
<s> these values give direction to the life of the middle-class man or woman dictating the methods of child rearing determining the pattern of community participation setting the style for the psychiatric treatment of middle-class illness and informing the congregational life of the major denominations </s>
<s> its contents are another matter for they reveal the kinds of interests pursued by the congregation </s>
<s> what goes on in the cage will occupy our attention under the rubric of the organization church </s>
<s> an understanding of the new role of residential association in an industrial society serves to illuminate the forces which have fashioned the iron cage of conformity which imprisons the churches in their suburban captivity </s>
<s> the perplexing question still remains as to why the middle classes turn to the churches as a vehicle of social identity when their clubs and charities should fill the same need </s>
<s> with capital largely squandered there seemed to them no other course to pursue </s>
<s> the directors sold directly to concessionaires who had to make their profits above the high prices asked by the company </s>
<s> these concessionaires traded where they wished and generally dealt with the indians through engages who might be habitants voyageurs or even soldiers </s>
<s> the concessionaires also had to pay a tax of one-tenth on the goods they traded and all pelts were to be taken to company stores and shipped to france in company ships </s>
<s> the company disposed of the pelts but with what profit the records do not show </s>
<s> in accord with its penurious policy the company failed to furnish presents to hold the loyalty of the principal indians </s>
<s> the lavish use of presents had been effective in expanding the indian trade of new france and louisiana in the previous century and the change in liberality aroused resentment in the minds of the red men </s>
<s> traders from the english colonies were far more generous and indian loyalty turned to them </s>
<s> protests from governors and intendants passed unheeded and the parsimonious policy of the company probably let loose indian insurrections that brought ruin to the company </s>
<s> they adopted a program by which louisiana was divided into five districts </s>
<s> in each of these there was to be a strong military post and a trading depot to supply the smaller trading houses </s>
<s> for southeastern louisiana mobile was the principal post and it was to furnish supplies for trade to the north and east in the region threatened by british traders </s>
<s> mobile was to be the anchor of a chain of posts extending northward to the sources of the tennessee river </s>
<s> west of the mobile district was the lower mississippi district of which new orleans was headquarters </s>
<s> dependent upon it were posts on the lower mississippi and the region westward to the frontiers of new spain </s>
<s> on the middle mississippi a principal post was to be located near the mouth of the arkansas </s>
<s> it was hoped that to this post would flow a large quantity of furs from the west principally down the arkansas river </s>
<s> other posts would be established up the ohio and wabash to protect communication with canada </s>
<s> each of the five principal posts was to have a director responsible to a director-general at new orleans </s>
<s> an elaborate system of accounting and reports was worked out and the trade was to be managed in the most scientific way </s>
<s> concessionaires were to be under the supervision of the directors </s>
<s> engages must be loyal to the concessionaires and must serve until the term provided in the engagement was ended </s>
<s> the habitants were to be encouraged to trade and were to dispose of their pelts to the concessionaires </s>

<s> mobile was also supplied by new orleans with goods for the mobile district </s>

<s> regulations for the indian trade were made by the conseil superieure de la louisiane and bienville apparently did not have control of that body </s>

<s> during the first administration of bienville the peltry trade of the mobile district was a lucrative source of revenue </s>
<s> these deerskins were the raw material for the manufacture of leather and were the only articles which the tribes of this district had to exchange for european goods </s>
<s> during his first administration bienville succeeded in keeping carolina traders out of the alabama country and the choctaw country </s>
<s> the director of the post at mobile kept an adequate amount of french goods of a kind to which they were accustomed to supply the indian needs </s>
<s> the alabama and tombigbee rivers furnished a highway by which goods could be moved quickly and cheaply </s>

<s> the chickasaws were the principal source of trouble in the mobile district </s>

<s> the achievement of the desegregation of certain lunch counters not only by wise action by local community leaders but by voluntary action following consultation between attorney general rogers and the heads of certain national chain stores should of course be applauded </s>
<s> but for it to be just to attain this same result by means of the force of a boycott throughout the nation would require the verification of facts contrary to those assumed in the foregoing case </s>
<s> the suppositions in the previous illustration might be sufficiently altered by establishing a connection between general company practice and local practice in the south and by establishing such direct connection between the practice and the economic well-being of stores located in new york and general company policy </s>
<s> then the boycott would not be secondary but a primary one </s>
<s> perhaps this would be sufficient to justify an economic boycott of an entire national chain in order by threatening potential injury to its entire economy to effect an alteration of the policy of its local stores in the matter of segregation </s>
<s> such a general boycott might still be a blunt or indiscriminating instrument and therefore of questionable justification </s>
<s> action located where the evil is concentrated will prove most decisive and is most clearly legitimate </s>
<s> it is true of course that the end or objective of this action was different </s>
<s> but since this is a world in which people disagree about ends and goals and concerning justice and injustice and since in a situation where direct action and economic pressure are called for the justice of the matter has either not been clearly defined by law or the law is not effectively present there has to be a morality of means applied in every case in which people take it upon themselves to use economic pressures or other forms of force </s>
<s> the need that we not give unqualified approval to any but a limited use of economic pressure directed against the actual doers of injustice is clear also in light of the fact that white citizens councils seem resolved to maintain segregation mainly by the use of these same means and not ordinarily by physical violence </s>
<s> an unlimited use of economic pressures for diametrically opposite causes could devastate the pre-conditions of any fellow humanity as surely as this would be destroyed by the use of more obviously brutal means </s>
<s> the end or aim of the action of course is also important especially where it is not alone a matter of changing community customs but of the use of deadly economic power to intimidate a person from stepping forward to claim his legal rights eg against negroes who register to vote in fayette county tennessee at the present moment </s>
<s> here the recourse is in steps to give economic sustenance to those being despoiled and to legal remedies </s>
<s> it is clear that non-violent resistance is a mode of action in need of justification and limitation in christian morality like any other form of resistance </s>
<s> however it is also a christian insight to know that unless charity interpenetrates justice it is not likely to be freedom that marches forward </s>
<s> it also definitely fashions conduct in the way explained above and this means far more than in the choice of non-violent means </s>
<s> a trial of strength however is made quite inevitable by virtue of the fact that anyone engaging in non-violent resistance will be convinced that his action is based on sounder values than those of his opponent </s>
<s> and in warfare with any means men commonly disagree over the justice of the cause </s>
<s> this makes necessary a morality of means and principles governing the conduct of resistance whenever this is thought to be justified </s>
<s> the question then is whether sufficient discrimination in the use of even non-violent means of coercion is to be found in the fact that such conduct demoralizes and overcomes the opponent while re-moralizing and re-establishing him </s>
<s> here it is relevant to remember that men commonly regard some causes as more important than their lives </s>
<s> and to them it will seem insignificant that it is proposed to defeat such causes non-violently </s>
<s> a technique by which it is proposed to enter with compulsion into the very heart of a man and determine his values may often in fact seem the more unlimited aggression </s>
<s> among christian groups the mennonites have commonly been aware more than others of the fact that the nature of divine charity raises decisively the question of the christian use of all forms of pressure </s>
<s> since the will and word of god are for them concentrated in christ-like love it seems clear to them that non-violent resistance is quite another thing </s>
<s> without agreeing with every phrase in this statement we must certainly assert the great difference between christian love and any form of resistance and then go on beyond the mennonite position and affirm that christian love-in-action must first justify and then determine the moral principles limiting resistance </s>
<s> these principles we have now set forth </s>
<s> economy in the use of power needs not only to be asserted but clearly specified </s>
<s> and when this is done it will be found that the principles governing christian resistance cut across the distinction between violent and non-violent means and apply to both alike justifying either on occasion and always limiting either action </s>
<s> economy in the use of power means more than inflicting a barely intolerable pressure upon an opponent and upon the injustice opposed </s>
<s> that would amount to calculating the means and justifying them wholly in terms of their effectiveness in reaching desired goals </s>
<s> there must also be additional and more fundamental discrimination in the use of means of resistance violent or non-violent </s>
<s> we may now take up for consideration a hard case which seems to require either no action employing economic pressure or else action that would seem to violate the principles set forth above </s>
<s> there may be instances in which if economic pressure is to be undertaken at all this would have to be applied without discrimination against a whole people </s>
<s> an excellent article was published recently in the journal of the church peace union by a south african journalist on the inhuman economic conditions of the blacks in south africa amounting to virtual slavery and the economic complicity of both the government and the people of the united states in these conditions </s>
<s> both the conditions and the complicity are documented in considerable detail </s>
<s> northern liberals are the chief supporters of civil rights and of integration </s>
<s> they have also led the nation in the direction of a welfare state </s>
<s> and both in their objectives of non-discrimination and of social progress they have had ranged against them the southerners who are called bourbons </s>
<s> the name presumably derives from the french royal house which never learned and never forgot </s>
<s> since bourbon whiskey though of kentucky origin is at least as much favored by liberals in the north as by conservatives in the south </s>
<s> the nature of the opposition between liberals and bourbons is too little understood in the north </s>
<s> the race problem has tended to obscure other less emotional issues which may fundamentally be even more divisive </s>
<s> i write about northern liberals from considerable personal experience </s>
<s> a southerner married to a new englander i have lived for many years in a connecticut commuting town with a high percentage of artists writers publicity men and business executives of egghead tastes </s>
<s> most of them are democrats and nearly all consider themselves and are viewed as liberals </s>
<s> this is puzzling to an outsider conscious of the classic tradition of liberalism because it is clear that these democrats who are left-of-center are at opposite poles from the liberal jefferson who held that the best government was the least government </s>
<s> yet paradoxically my liberal friends continue to view jefferson as one of their patron saints </s>
<s> when i question them as to what they mean by concepts like liberty and democracy i find that they fall into two categories the simpler ones who have simply accepted the shibboleths of their faith without analysis </s>
<s> i am naive they say to make use of such words </s>
<s> this seems like an attitude favoring a sort of totalitarian bureaucracy which under a president of the same stamp would try to coerce an uncooperative congress or supreme court </s>
<s> as for states rights they have never counted in the thinking of my liberal friends except as irritations of a minor and immoral nature which exist now only as anachronisms </s>
<s> the american liberal may in the world of to-day have a strong case </s>
<s> but he presents it publicly so enmeshed in hypocrisy that it is not an honest one </s>
<s> it appears to be one of intense dislike which he makes little effort to conceal even in the presence of southern friends </s>
<s> his assumption seems to be that any such friends being tolerable humans must be more liberal than most southerners and therefore at least partly in sympathy with his views </s>
<s> theirs is no mere lack of sympathy but something closer to the passionate hatred that was directed against fascism </s>
<s> i do not think that my experience would be typical for southerners living in the north </s>
<s> in business circles usually conservative this sort of atmosphere would hardly be found </s>
<s> in fact it has caused us to give serious thought to moving our residence south because it is not easy for the most objective southerner to sit calmly by when his host is telling a roomful of people that the only way to deal with southerners who oppose integration is to send in troops and shoot the bastards down </s>
<s> accounts have been published of northern liberals in the south up against segregationist prejudice especially in state-supported universities where pressure may be strong to uphold the majority view </s>
<s> but these accounts do not show that northerners have been subjected to embarrassment or provocation by yankee-hatred displayed in social gatherings </s>
<s> the strong feeling is certainly there </s>
<s> but there is a leavening of liberalism among college graduates throughout the south especially among those who studied in the north </s>
<s> and social relations arising out of business ties impose courtesy if not sympathy toward resident and visiting northerners </s>
<s> also among the latter a large percentage soon acquire the prevalent southern attitude on most social problems </s>
<s> there are of course many souths </s>
<s> my definition of this much abused adjective is that a reconstructed rebel is one who is glad that the north won the war </s>
<s> nobody knows how many southerners there are in this category </s>
<s> i suspect that there are far more unreconstructed ones than the north likes to believe </s>
<s> i never heard of a poll being taken on the question </s>
<s> no doubt such a thing would be considered unpatriotic </s>
<s> and if a poll had been taken immediately following the dispatch of troops to little rock i believe the majority would have been for the old south </s>
<s> belief in the traditional way of life persists much more in the older states than in the new ones </s>
<s> probably a larger percentage of virginians and south carolinians remain unreconstructed than elsewhere with georgia north carolina and alabama following along after them </s>
<s> old attitudes are held more tenaciously in the tidewater than the piedmont </s>
<s> so that a line running down the length of the south marking the upper limits of tidewater would roughly divide the old south from the new but with of course important minority enclaves </s>
<s> the long-settled areas of states like virginia and south carolina developed the ante-bellum culture to its richest flowering and there the memory is more precious and the consciousness of loss the greater </s>
<s> also we should not even to-day discount the fact that a region such as the coastal lowlands centering on charleston had closer ties with england and the west indies than with the north even after independence </s>
<s> the social and psychological consequences of this continue to affect the area </s>
<s> in certain respects defeat increased the persistent anglophilia of the old south </s>
<s> poor where they had once been rich humbled where they had been arrogant having no longer any hope of sharing in the leadership of the nation the rebels who would not surrender in spirit drew comfort from the sympathy they felt extended to them by the mother country </s>
<s> and no doubt many people in states like the carolinas and georgia which were among the most tory in sentiment in the eighteenth century bitterly regretted the revolt against the crown </s>
<s> among bourbons the racial issue may have less to do with their remaining unreconstructed than other factors </s>
<s> all southerners agree that slavery had to go </s>
<s> but many historians maintain that except for northern meddling it would have ended in states like virginia years before it did </s>
<s> southern resentment has been over the method of its ending the invasion and reconstruction </s>
<s> their fears now are of miscegenation and negro political control in many counties </s>
<s> and this in effect means most of modern america </s>
<s> it is hard to see how the situation could be otherwise </s>
<s> and therein i feel many northerners delude themselves about the south </s>
<s> for one thing this is not a subject often discussed or analyzed </s>
<s> there seems to be almost a conspiracy of silence veiling it </s>
<s> or else the north really believes that all southerners except a few quaint old characters have come around to realizing the errors of their past and are now at heart sharers of the american dream like everybody else </s>
<s> if the circumstances are faced frankly it is not reasonable to expect this to be true </s>
<s> and the great majority of these people are of anglo-saxon or celtic descent </s>
<s> this is the only case in modern history of a people of britannic origin submitting without continued struggle to what they view as foreign domination </s>
<s> the fact is due mainly to international wars both hot and cold </s>
<s> in every war of the united states since the civil war the south was more belligerent than the rest of the country </s>
<s> and there is no section of the nation more ardent than the south in the cold war against communism </s>
<s> it is extraordinary that a people as proud and warlike as southerners should have been as docile as they have </s>
<s> the north should thank its stars that such has been the case </s>
<s> but at the same time it should not draw false inferences therefrom </s>
<s> the two main charges levelled against the bourbons by liberals is that they are racists and social reactionaries </s>
<s> there is much truth in both these charges and not many bourbons deny them </s>
<s> whatever their faults they are not hypocrites </s>
<s> most of them sincerely believe that the anglo-saxon is the best race in the world and that it should remain pure </s>
<s> many northeners believe this too but few of them will say so publicly </s>
<s> the bourbon economic philosophy moreover is not very different from that of northern conservatives </s>
<s> but those among the bourbons who remain unreconstructed go much further than this </s>
<s> they believe that if the south had been let alone it would have produced a civilization superior to that of modern america </s>
<s> their own easier slower tempo is especially dear to southerners </s>
<s> and i have heard many say that they are content to earn a half or a third as much as they could up north because they so much prefer the quieter habits of their home town </s>
<s> in the past the duties of the state as sir henry maine noted long ago were only two in number internal order and external security </s>
<s> by prevailing over other claimants for the loyalties of men the nation-state maintained an adequate measure of certainty and order within its territorial borders </s>
<s> the enormous changes in world politics have however thrown it into confusion so much so that it is safe to say that all international law is now in need of reexamination and clarification in light of the social conditions of the present era </s>
<s> beyond the two basic tasks mentioned above no attention was paid by statesman or scholar to an idea of state responsibility either internally or externally </s>
<s> this was particularly true in the world arena which was an anarchical battleground characterized by strife and avaricious competition for colonial empires </s>
<s> that any sort of duty was owed by his nation to other nations would have astonished a nineteenth-century statesman </s>
<s> his duty was to his sovereign and to his nation and an extension to peoples beyond the territorial boundaries was not to be contemplated </s>
<s> at the same time all suggestions that some sort of societal responsibility existed for the welfare of the people within the territorial state was strongly resisted </s>
<s> social darwinism was able to stave off the incipient socialist movement until well into the present century </s>
<s> however in recent decades for what doubtless are multiple reasons an unannounced but nonetheless readily observable shift has occurred in both facets of national activity </s>
<s> a concept of responsibility is in process of articulation and establishment </s>
<s> already firmly implanted internally it is a growing factor in external matters </s>
<s> a little more than twenty years ago the american people turned an important corner </s>
<s> of greater importance however is the content of those programs which have had and are having enormous consequences for the american people </s>
<s> labor relations have been transformed income security has become a standardized feature of political platforms and all the many facets of the american version of the welfare state have become part of the conventional wisdom </s>
<s> a national consensus of near unanimity exists that these governmental efforts are desirable as well as necessary </s>
<s> the other of course was the civil war the conflict which a century ago insured national unity over fragmentation </s>
<s> a third one of at least equal and perhaps even greater importance is now being traversed american immersion and involvement in world affairs </s>
<s> internal national responsibility now a truism need not be documented </s>
<s> that guiding principle of the hoover administration fell to the siege guns of the new deal </s>
<s> internal national responsibility is a societal response to the impact of the industrial revolution </s>
<s> reduced to its simplest terms it is an assumption of a collective duty to compensate for the inability of individuals to cope with the rigors of the era </s>
<s> national responsibility for individual welfare is a concept not limited to the united states or even to the western nations </s>
<s> meeting in new delhi under the auspices of the international commission of jurists a body of lawyers from the free world the congress redefined and expanded the traditional rule of law to include affirmative governmental duties </s>
<s> it is noteworthy that the majority of the delegates to the congress were from the less developed former colonial nations </s>
<s> the idea of national responsibility thus has become a common feature of the nations of the non-soviet world </s>
<s> for better or for worse we all now live in welfare states the organizing principle of which is collective responsibility for individual well-being </s>
<s> the hypothesis ventured here is that it does and that evidence is accumulating validating that proposition </s>
<s> external national responsibility involves a burgeoning requirement that the leaders of the western nations so guide their decisions as to further the viability of other friendly nations </s>
<s> if internal responsibility suggests acceptance of the socialist ideal of equality then external responsibility implies adherence to principles of ideological supranationalism </s>
<s> the breakup of the holy roman empire and the downfall of feudalism led not more than two centuries ago to the surge of nationalism </s>
<s> but it is more than that </s>
<s> for it includes the emotional ties that bind men to their homeland and the complex motivations that hold a large group of people together as a unit </s>
<s> today as new nations rise from the former colonial empires nationalism is one of the hurricane forces loose in the world </s>
<s> historically however the concept is one that has been of marked benefit to the people of the western civilizational group </s>
<s> by subduing disparate lesser groups the nation has to some degree at least broadened the capacity for individual liberty </s>
<s> within their confines moreover technological and industrial growth has proceeded at an accelerated pace thus increasing the cornucopia from which material wants can be satisfied </s>
<s> while the pattern is uneven some having gained more than others nationalism has in fact served the western peoples well </s>
<s> but it is more than irony one of the main reasons why nationalism is no longer a tenable concept is because it has spread throughout the planet </s>
<s> in other words nationalism worked well enough when it had limited application both as to geography and as to population </s>
<s> it becomes a perilous anachronism when adopted on a world-wide basis </s>
<s> complementing the political principle of nationalism is the legal principle of sovereignty </s>
<s> the former receives its legitimacy from the latter </s>
<s> operating side by side together they helped shore up the nation-state </s>
<s> while sovereignty has roots in antiquity in its present usage it is essentially modern </s>
<s> jean bodin writing in the sixteenth century may have been the seminal thinker but it was the vastly influential john austin who set out the main lines of the concept as now understood </s>
<s> the nation-state then exemplifies the principle of nationalism and exercises sovereignty supreme power over domestic affairs and independence from outside control </s>
<s> in fact however both principles have always been nebulous and loosely defined </s>
<s> high-level abstractions are always difficult to pin down with precision </s>
<s> nevertheless nationalism and sovereignty are reputed in the accepted wisdom to describe the modern world </s>
<s> both concepts are undergoing alteration </s>
<s> to some degree they are being supplanted by a concept of national responsibility </s>
<s> as evidence to support that view consider the following illustrative instances </s>
<s> there is unceasing pressure but its sources are immediate </s>
<s> each could be the real thing </s>
<s> there is little time for the men in the command centers to reflect about the implications of these clocks </s>
<s> they are preoccupied riding herd on control panels switches flashing colored lights on pale green or gray consoles that look like business machines </s>
<s> they know little about their machinery beyond mechanical details </s>
<s> accidental war is so sensitive a subject that most of the people who could become directly involved in one are told just enough so they can perform their portions of incredibly complex tasks </s>
<s> already accidental war is a silent guest at the discussions within the kennedy administration about the urgency of disarmament and nearly all other questions of national security </s>
<s> work is under way to see whether new restraining devices should be installed on all nuclear weapons </s>
<s> these men are not callous </s>
<s> it is their job to think about the unthinkable </s>
<s> he was and is with the rand corporation a nonprofit pool of thinkers financed by the us air force </s>
<s> his investigations made him the paul revere of accidental war and safety procedures were enormously increased </s>
<s> its radar screens would register soviet missiles shortly after they are launched against the united states </s>
<s> to the sac command and control post forty-five feet below the ground at offutt air force base near omaha nebraska </s>
<s> to the joint war room of the joint chiefs of staff in the pentagon and to the president </s>
<s> telephones teletypes several kinds of radio systems and in some cases television link all vital points </s>
<s> alternate locations exist for all key command centers </s>
<s> multiple circuits routings and frequencies make the chain as unbreakable as possible </s>
<s> and no messages can be transmitted on these circuits until senders and receivers authenticate in advance by special codes that the messages actually come from their purported sources </s>
<s> additional codes can be used to challenge and counterchallenge the authentications </s>
<s> only the president is permitted to authorize the use of nuclear weapons </s>
<s> the president cannot personally remove the safety devices from every nuclear trigger </s>
<s> he makes the momentous decision </s>
<s> hundreds of men are required to pass the word to the button pushers and to push the buttons </s>
<s> nobody can be absolutely certain of the answers </s>
<s> however the system is designed ingeniously and hopefully so that no one man could initiate a thermonuclear war </s>
<s> all can be connected with the gold circuit from their homes </s>
<s> all could help the president make his decision </s>
<s> the talk would not be in code but neither would it ramble </s>
<s> vital questions would be quickly answered according to a preprepared agenda </s>
<s> if communications work his decision would be instantly known in all command posts that would originate the actual go order </s>
<s> for these centers too are on the gold circuit </s>
<s> nato headquarters in europe </s>
<s> air force forward headquarters in europe and in the pacific which control tactical fighters on ships and land bases </s>
<s> and sac which controls long-range bombers and atlas missiles </s>
<s> in a word plenty </s>
<s> he or his deputy or one of their seven assistants all full colonels mans the heart of the command post twenty-four hours a day </s>
<s> movable panels of floor-to-ceiling maps and charts are crammed with intelligence information </s>
<s> his eyes are steady anchors of the deepest brown </s>
<s> his movements and speech are precise clear and quick </s>
<s> no question ruffles him or causes him to hesitate </s>
<s> at least a dozen men some armed are never far away from him </s>

<s> they are mere fragments just one portion of preprepared messages </s>
<s> what these fragments are and how they activate the go order may not be revealed </s>

<s> once we send out the whole pie they can put their pieces into it </s>
<s> the answer is a cryptographic secret </s>
<s> after that it requires several minutes of concentrated work including six separate and deliberate actions by a minimum of three men sitting at three separate stations in a bomber each with another man beside him to help for an armed bomb to be released </s>
<s> suddenly however their posture changed and the game ended </s>
<s> they went as rigid as black statuary six figures lean and tall and angular went still </s>
<s> their heads were in the air sniffing </s>
<s> they all swung at the same instant in the same direction </s>
<s> they saw it before i did even with my binoculars </s>
<s> it was nothing more than a tiny distant rain squall a dull gray sheet which reached from a layer of clouds to the earth </s>
<s> a white man would not have seen it </s>
<s> the aborigines fastened upon it with a concentration beyond pathos </s>
<s> watching they waited until the squall thickened and began to move in a long drifting slant across the dry burning land </s>
<s> at once the whole band set off at a lope </s>
<s> they were chasing a rain cloud </s>
<s> they went after the squall as mercilessly as a wolf pack after an abandoned cow </s>
<s> i followed them in the jeep and now they did not care </s>
<s> the games were over this was life </s>
<s> occasionally for no reason that i could see they would suddenly alter the angle of their trot </s>
<s> sometimes i guessed it was because the rain squall had changed direction </s>
<s> sometimes it was to skirt a gulley </s>
<s> their gait is impossible to convey in words </s>
<s> it has nothing of the proud stride of the trained runner about it it is not a lope it is not done with style or verve </s>
<s> it is the gait of the human who must run to live arms dangling legs barely swinging over the ground head hung down and only occasionally swinging up to see the target a loose motion that is just short of stumbling and yet is wonderfully graceful </s>
<s> it is a barely controlled skimming of the ground </s>
<s> they ran for three hours </s>
<s> finally avoiding hummocks and seeking low ground they intercepted the rain squall </s>
<s> for ten minutes they ran beneath the squall raising their arms and for the first time shouting and capering </s>
<s> then the wind died and the rain squall held steady </s>
<s> they were studying the ground </s>
<s> suddenly one of them shouted ran a few feet bent forward and put his mouth to the ground </s>
<s> he had found a depression with rain water in it </s>
<s> he bent down a black cranelike figure and put his mouth to the ground </s>
<s> with a lordly and generous gesture the discoverer stood up and beckoned to the closest of his fellows </s>
<s> the other trotted over and swooped at the tiny puddle </s>
<s> in an instant he had sucked it dry </s>
<s> the aborigine lives on the cruelest land i have ever seen </s>
<s> which does not mean that it is ugly </s>
<s> part of it is of course </s>
<s> there are thousands of square miles of salt pan which are hideous </s>
<s> they are huge areas which have been swept by winds for so many centuries that there is no soil left but only deep bare ridges fifty or sixty yards apart with ravines between them thirty or forty feet deep and the only thing that moves is a scuttling layer of sand </s>
<s> such stretches have an inhuman moonlike quality </s>
<s> but much of the land which the aborigine wanders looks as if it should be hospitable </s>
<s> it is softened by the saltbush and the bluebush has a peaceful quality the hills roll softly </s>
<s> the malignancy of such a landscape has been beautifully described by the australian charles bean </s>
<s> he tells of three men who started out on a trip across a single paddock a ten-by-ten-mile square owned by a sheep grazer </s>
<s> the countryside looked like a beautiful open park with gentle slopes and soft gray tree-clumps </s>
<s> nothing appalling or horrible rushed upon these men </s>
<s> it might have rained any time </s>
<s> there might have been a fence or a house just over the next rise </s>
<s> they lay with the birds hopping from branch to branch above them and the bright sky peeping down at them </s>
<s> the white men died </s>
<s> and countless others like them have died </s>
<s> even today range riders will come upon mummified bodies of men who attempted nothing more difficult than a twenty-mile hike and slowly lost direction were tortured by the heat driven mad by the constant and unfulfilled promise of the landscape and who finally died </s>
<s> the aborigine is not deceived </s>
<s> he knows that the land is hard and pitiless </s>
<s> there is no room for error or waste </s>
<s> any organism that falters or misperceives the signals or weakens is done </s>
<s> i do not know if such a way of life can come to be a self-conscious challenge but i suspect that it can </s>
<s> perhaps this is what gives the aborigine his odd air of dignity </s>
<s> the family at the boulder </s>
<s> seeing an aborigine today is a difficult thing </s>
<s> many of them have drifted into the cities and towns and seaports </s>
<s> it was a difficult and ambiguous kind of negotiation even though the rancher was said to be expert in his knowledge of the aborigines and their language </s>
<s> finally however the arrangements were made and we drove out into the bush in a land rover </s>
<s> we followed the asphalt road for a few miles and then swung off onto a smaller road which was nothing more than two tire marks on the earth </s>
<s> the rancher went a mile down this road and then when he reached a big red boulder swung off the road </s>

<s> he was over six feet tall and very thin </s>
<s> his legs were narrow and very long </s>
<s> every bone and muscle in his body showed but he did not give the appearance of starving </s>

<s> the ridges over his eyes were huge and his eyelids were half shut </s>

<s> she remained squatting on her heels all the time we were there </s>

<s> her long thin arms moved in a slow rhythmical gesture over the family possessions which were placed in front of her </s>
<s> there were two rubbing sticks for making fire two stones shaped roughly like knives a woven-root container which held a few pounds of dried worms and the dead body of some rodent </s>
<s> there was also a long wooden spear and a woomera a spear-throwing device which gives the spear an enormous velocity and high accuracy </s>
<s> there was also a boomerang elaborately carved </s>
<s> everything was burnished with sweat and grease so that all of the objects seemed to have been carved from the same material and to be ageless </s>
<s> the two children both boys wandered around the australian and me for a few moments and then returned to their work </s>
<s> they squatted on their heels with their heads bent far forward their eyes only a few inches from the ground </s>
<s> they had located the runway of a colony of ants and as the ants came out of the ground the boys picked them up one at a time and pinched them dead </s>
<s> the tiny bodies dropped onto a dry leaf made a pile as big as a small apple </s>
<s> the odor here was more powerful than that which surrounded the town aborigines </s>
<s> the smell at first was more surprising than unpleasant </s>
<s> it was also subtly familiar for it was the odor of the human body but multiplied innumerable times because of the fact that the aborigines never bathed </s>

<s> it was a fortunate time in which to build for the seventeenth century was a great period in persian art </s>
<s> travelers entering from the desert were confounded by what must have seemed an illusion a great garden filled with nightingales and roses cut by canals and terraced promenades studded with water tanks of turquoise tile in which were reflected the glistening blue curves of a hundred domes </s>
<s> in the early eighteenth century this fantastic city then the size of london started to decline </s>
<s> the afghans invaded </s>
<s> the safavids fell from power </s>
<s> the capital went elsewhere </s>
<s> the desert encroached </s>
<s> isfahan became more of a legend than a place and now it is for many people simply a name to which they attach their notions of old persia and sometimes of the east </s>
<s> they think of it as a kind of spooky museum in which they may half see and half imagine the old splendor </s>
<s> but even for them it remains a museum or perhaps it would be more accurate to say a tomb a tomb in which persia lies well preserved but indeed dead </s>
<s> everyone is ready to grant the persians their history but almost no one is willing to acknowledge their present </s>
<s> it seems that for persia and especially for this city there are only two times the glorious past and the corrupt depressing sterile present </s>
<s> however just as all the buildings have not fallen and flowed back to their original mud so the values which wanted them and saw that they were built have not all disappeared </s>
<s> the values and talents which made the tile and the dome the rug the poem and the miniature continue in certain social institutions which rise above the ordinary life of this city as the great buildings rise above blank walls and dirty lanes </s>
<s> they are the places where persians live </s>
<s> it takes place as well along the terraces and through the arcades of the khaju bridge and also in the gardens of the square </s>
<s> but more important and the thing which the casual traveler and the blind sojourner often do not see is that these places and activities are often the settings in which persians exercise their extraordinary aesthetic sensibilities </s>
<s> these things are important to almost all persians and perhaps most important to the most ordinary </s>
<s> a few months ago it was a fairly typical landlord who in the dead of night lugged me up a mountainside to drink from a spring famous in the neighborhood for its clarity and flavor </s>

<s> a cigarette would taste particularly good </s>
<s> it was a nice day granted </s>
<s> but he knew </s>

<s> the natural world then plus poetry and some kinds of art receives from the most ordinary of persians a great deal of attention </s>
<s> nowhere in isfahan is this rich aesthetic life of the persians shown so well as during the promenade at the khaju bridge </s>
<s> there has probably always been a bridge of some sort at the southeastern corner of the city </s>
<s> for one thing there is a natural belt of rock across the river bed </s>
<s> for another it was here that one of the old caravan routes came in </s>
<s> it is a splendid structure </s>
<s> from upstream it looks like a long arcaded box laid across the river </s>
<s> from downstream where the water level is much lower it is a high elaborately facaded pavilion </s>
<s> the top story contains more than thirty alcoves separated from each other by spandrels of blue and yellow tile </s>
<s> at either end and in the center there are bays which contain nine greater alcoves as frescoed and capacious as church apses </s>
<s> below twenty vaults tunnel through the understructure of the bridge </s>
<s> these are traversed by another line of vaults and thus rooms arched on all four sides are formed </s>
<s> down through the axis of the bridge there is a long diminishing vista like a visual echo of piers and arches while the vaults fronting upstream and down frame the sunset and sunrise the mountains and river pools </s>
<s> here on the hottest day it is cool beneath the stone and fresh from the water flowing in the sluices at the bottom of the vaults </s>
<s> out of water brick and tile they have made far more than just a bridge </s>
<s> on spring and summer evenings people leave their shops and houses and walk up through the lanes of the city to the bridge </s>

<s> dervishes who stand with the stillness of the blind their eyes filmed with rheum and visions </s>

<s> once again as in the days of the founding fathers america faces a stern test </s>
<s> incapable of self-delusion the founding fathers found the crisis of their time to be equally grave and yet they had confidence that america would surmount it and that a republic of free peoples would prosper and serve as an example to a world aching for liberty </s>

<s> strong men with strong opinions frank to the point of being refreshingly indiscreet the founding seven were essentially congenial minds and their agreements with each other were more consequential than their differences </s>
<s> even though in most cases the completion of the definitive editions of their writings is still years off enough documentation has already been assembled to warrant drawing a new composite profile of the leadership which performed the heroic dual feats of winning american independence and founding a new nation </s>
<s> before merging them into a common profile it is well to remember that their separate careers were extraordinary </s>
<s> certainly no other seven american statesmen from any later period achieved so much in so concentrated a span of years </s>
<s> eldest of the seven benjamin franklin a new englander transplanted to philadelphia wrote the most dazzling success story in our history </s>
<s> author of the albany plan of union which had it been adopted might have avoided the revolution he fought the colonists front-line battles in london negotiated the treaty of alliance with france and the peace that ended the war headed the state government of pennsylvania and exercised an important moderating influence at the federal convention </s>
<s> commanding the continental army for six long years of the revolution he was the indispensable factor in the ultimate victory </s>
<s> retiring to his beloved mount vernon he returned to preside over the federal convention and was the only man in history to be unanimously elected president </s>

<s> john adams fashioned much of pre-revolutionary radical ideology wrote the constitution of his home state of massachusetts negotiated with franklin and jay the peace with britain and served as our first vice president and our second president </s>
<s> his political opponent and lifetime friend thomas jefferson achieved immortality through his authorship of the declaration of independence but equally notable were the legal and constitutional reforms he instituted in his native virginia his role as father of our territorial system and his acquisition of the louisiana territory during his first term as president </s>
<s> if franklin was an authentic genius then alexander hamilton with his exceptional precocity consuming energy and high ambition was a political prodigy </s>
