<s> we knew that it was as reassurance the ironic fruit of a deeply moral nature </s>
<s> but the fact remains that even the unconscious acceptance of himself as a man of destiny divinely protected must be censored in any man who evades the responsibility for his major decisions and thus for imposing his will on the people </s>
<s> and in the context of drifting personal utterances we have examined there was occasional evidence of the origin of all such evasions </s>
<s> when the possibility that he had not given reconsideration to so weighty a decision seemed to disconcert his questioners mr eisenhower was known to make his characteristic statement to the press that he was not going to talk about the matter any more </s>
<s> thinking had stopped </s>
<s> it was not to be resumed </s>
<s> the portrait that had developed fragmentarily but consistently was the portrait of a man to whom serious thinking is alien enough that the making of a decision inhibits when it does not forestall any ability to review the decision in the light of new evidence </s>
<s> this does not mean that the decision to run for office should inevitably have been revoked </s>
<s> instead it means that the thinking in which decision issues has the power to determine the morality of the decision as in this instance the pressure for renewed practical or legislative attention to the constitutional problems the decision had uncovered might have done </s>
<s> drifting through a third illness apparently without any provision for the handling of a major national emergency other than a talk with the vice-president eisenhower revealed the singularly static quality of his thinking </s>
<s> by contrast the energetic reaction of the leader to the full demands his decision imposes upon him strengthens the moral intuition and gives us the measure of the man </s>
<s> only by means of an intensive preoccupation with the detailed considerations following from any decision can he ensure attention to the practical details to be dealt with if the implications of immorality in the major decision are effectively to be checked </s>
<s> in the incessant struggle with recalcitrant political fact he learns to focus the essence of a problem in the significant detail and to articulate the distinctions which clarify the detail as significant with what is sometimes astounding rapidity </s>
<s> like lincoln he can distinguish his relation to god from the constitutional responsibilities a questionable decision exacts of him </s>
<s> like roosevelt he can distinguish an attitude toward a russian leader he may share with a host of americans from the responsibilities diplomatic convention may impose upon him </s>
<s> he chooses to subordinate one to the other sometimes reluctantly accepting criticism for the lesser immoralities facts breed </s>
<s> the very nature of a choice so grounded in distinction and fact leads to the valid convictions which become force of will in the manifest leader </s>
<s> the making of distinctions like the perception of the great distinctions made is an inordinately difficult business </s>
<s> but because it is the function of the mind to turn the one into the other by means of the capacities with which words endow it we do not unwisely examine the type of distinction in the sphere of politics on which decisions hang </s>
<s> for this change is not a change from one positive position to another but a change from order and truth to disorder and negation </s>
<s> the liberal-conservative division we might observe in passing is not of itself directly involved in a private interest conflict nor even in struggle between ruling groups </s>
<s> rather it is rooted in a difference of response to the threat of social disintegration </s>
<s> the division is not between those who wish to preserve what they have and those who want change </s>
<s> on the most primitive level </s>
<s> for the answer cannot be derived from any socially cohesive element in the disrupting community </s>
<s> there is no socially existential answer to the question </s>
<s> for the truth formerly experienced by the community no longer has existential status in the community nor does any answer elaborated by philosophers or theoriticians </s>
<s> in this phase of change no idea has social acceptance and so none has ontological status in the community </s>
<s> an interregnum ensues in which not men but ideas compete for existence </s>
<s> if we examine the three types of change from the point of view of their internal structure we find an additional profound difference between the third and the first two one that accounts for the notable difference between the responses they evoke </s>
<s> the first two types of change occur within the inward and immanent structure of the society </s>
<s> the first involves a simple shift of interests in the society </s>
<s> the second involves something deeper but its characteristic form focuses on a shift in policy for the community not in the truth on which the community rests </s>
<s> thus in both types attention is focused on the community itself and its phenomenological life </s>
<s> the third type however wrenches attention from the life of action and interests in the community and focuses it on the ground of being on which the community depends for its existence </s>
<s> voegelin has analyzed this experience in the case of the stable healthy community </s>
<s> there the community faced with the need to formulate policy on the level of absolute justice can find the answer to its problem in the absolute truth which it holds as partially experienced </s>
<s> this however cannot be done by a community whose very experience of truth is confused and incoherent it has no absolute standard and consequently cannot distinguish the absolute from the contingent </s>
<s> it has lost its ground of being and floats in a mist of appearances </s>
<s> relativism and equality are its characteristic diseases </s>
<s> precisely at the moment when it has lost its vision the mind of the community turns out from itself in a search for the ontological standard whereby it can measure itself </s>
<s> the liberal-conservative split to define it further derives from a basic difference concerning the existential status of standard sought and about the spiritual experience that leads to its identification </s>
<s> when disruptive change has penetrated to the third level of social order the process of disruption rapidly reaches a point of no return </s>
<s> indeed it is probable that this point is reached the moment the third level of change begins </s>
<s> the reasons for this experience are rooted in the metaphysical characteristics of such a change </s>
<s> of all forms of being society or community has the greatest element of determinability </s>
<s> the content of that psychological status determines ultimately the content of civilization </s>
<s> those social civilizational factors not rooted in the human spirit of the group ultimately cease to exist </s>
<s> civilization is what man has made of himself </s>
<s> its massive contours are rooted in the simple need of man since he is always incomplete to complete himself </s>
<s> it is not enough for man to be an ontological esse </s>
<s> he needs existential completion he needs that is to move in the direction of completion </s>
<s> and the direction of that movement is determined by his perception of the truth about himself </s>
<s> he must consequently exist as a self-perceived substantive developing agent or he does not exist as man </s>
<s> thus human perception and human volition is the immanent cause of all social change and this most truly when the change reaches the civilizational level </s>
<s> thus with regard to the loss of tradition in the change from order to disorder the metaphysics of change works itself out as a disruption of the individual soul a change in which man continues as an objective ontological existent but no longer as a man </s>
<s> further change is a form of motion it occurs as the act of a being in potency insofar as it is in potency and has not yet reached the terminus of the change </s>
<s> a number of considerations suggest that this occurs early in the process </s>
<s> change involves the displacement of form </s>
<s> this means that the inception of change itself can begin only when the factors conducive to change have already become more powerful than those anchoring the existent form in being </s>
<s> if the existent form is to be retained new factors that reinforce it must be introduced into the situation </s>
<s> in the case of social decay form is displaced simply by the process of dissolution with no form at the terminus of the process </s>
<s> now in the mere fact of the beginning of such displacement we have prima-facie evidence of the ontological weakness of the fading form </s>
<s> and when we consider the tenuous hold tradition has on existence any weakening of that hold constitutes a crisis of existence </s>
<s> the retention of a tradition confronted with such a crisis necessitates the introduction of new spiritual forces into the situation </s>
<s> however the crisis occurs precisely as a weakening of spiritual forces </s>
<s> it would seem therefore that in a civilizational crisis man cannot save himself </s>
<s> the emergence of the crisis itself would seem to constitute a warranty for the victory of disorder </s>
<s> and it would seem that history is a witness to this truth </s>
<s> as a further characterization of the liberal conservative split we may observe that it involves differences in the formula for escaping inevitabilities in history </s>
<s> these differences in turn derive from prior differences concerning the friendly or hostile character of change </s>
<s> unanalyzed responses </s>
<s> anxiety and deep insecurity are the characteristic responses evoked by the crisis in tradition </s>
<s> to experience them it is not necessary for a people to be actively aware of what is happening to it </s>
<s> the process of erosion need only undermine the tradition and a series of consequences begin unfolding within the individual while in institutions a quiet but deep transformation of processes occurs </s>
<s> within the individual the reaction has been called various names all however pointing to the same basic experience </s>
<s> within institutions there is a marked decline of the process of persuasion and the substitution of a force-fear process which masquerades as the earlier one of persuasion </s>
<s> within this context of spontaneous and unanalyzed responses to the experience of civilizational crisis two basic organizations of response are observable reaction and ideological progressivism </s>
<s> these responses are explicable in terms of characteristics inherent in the crisis </s>
<s> both are predictably destined to fail </s>
<s> the response of reaction is dominated by a concern for what is vanishing </s>
<s> its essence lies in its attempt to recover previous order through the repression of disruptive forces </s>
<s> to this end political authority is called upon to exercise its negative and coercive powers </s>
<s> the implicit assumption of this response is that history is reversible </s>
<s> seemingly order is perceived as a kind of subsistent entity now covered by adventitious accretions </s>
<s> the problem is to remove the accretions and thereby uncover the order that was always there </s>
<s> such a response of course misses the point that in crisis order is going out of existence </s>
<s> moreover its posture of stubborn but simple resistance is doomed to failure because of the metaphysical weakness of the existent form of order once the activation of change has reached visible proportions </s>
<s> the most reaction can achieve is stasis and a stasis that can be maintained only by the expenditure of an effort which ultimately exhausts itself </s>
<s> despite the hopelessness of the response it is explicable in terms of the crisis of tradition itself </s>
<s> since a civilizational crisis involves also a crisis in private interests and in the ruling class reaction is normally found among those who feel themselves to be among the ruling class </s>
<s> their great error is to mingle the responses typical of each of the three types of change </s>
<s> since civilizational change is the most difficult to perceive and analyze it seldom is given adequate attention </s>
<s> and the anxiety it generates is misinterpreted as anxiety over private interest and threatened social status </s>
<s> the basic truth in the reactionary response is to be found in its realistic assumption of the primacy of the real over the ideational </s>
<s> but this truth is distorted by its extreme application the assumption of the separate existence of tradition </s>
<s> the reactionary misses the point that tradition exists ontologically only in the form of psychological-intellectual relations </s>
<s> reactionary theories for this reason usually assume some form of organismic theory </s>
<s> in its defensive formulations the theory will attack conscious change on the grounds of the independent existence of the community </s>
<s> in both cases the individual tends to be treated as an instrument of the organic reality </s>
<s> when the reactionary response is thus bolstered by an intellectual defense the characteristics of that defense are explicable only in terms of the basic attitudes of unanalyzed reaction </s>
<s> reaction is rooted in a perception of tradition as a whole </s>
<s> there is no selectivity </s>
<s> even the questionable features of the past are defended </s>
<s> the point is that the reactionary for whatever motive perceives himself to have been part or a partner of something that extended beyond himself something which consequently he was not able to accept or reject on the basis of subjective preference </s>
<s> the reactionary is confused about the existential status of a decaying tradition but he does perceive the unity tradition had when it was healthy </s>
<s> all of which brings up another problem in the use of psychoanalytic insight in a literary work </s>
<s> a man in a novel who is defeated in his childhood and condemned by unconscious forces within him to tiredly repeat his earliest failure in love only makes us a little weary of man </s>
<s> his tragedy seems unworthy and trivial </s>

<s> but a novel in which one man karamazov explored the divisions within his personality would scarcely merit publication in the psychoanalytic quarterly </s>

<s> whatever the psychological truth in the oedipus myth an oedipus who is drawn to his fate by irresistible external forces can carry the symbol of humanity and its archaic crime and the incest that is unknowing renews the mystery of the eternal dream of childhood and absorbs us in the secret </s>
<s> but a modern oedipus who is doomed because he cannot oppose his own childhood is only pathetic and for renouncing the mystery in favor of psychological truth he gives up the claim on our sympathies </s>

<s> it is the story of the hopeless love of a little boy for his cold and vain mother </s>
<s> there are ghostly scenes in which the little boy on his rocking horse rocks madly toward the climax that will magically give him the name of the winning horse </s>
<s> the child grows rich on his winnings and conspires with his uncle to make secret gifts of his money to his mother </s>

<s> it conceals and yet is suggestive </s>
<s> a perfect symbol </s>

<s> copernicus did not question it ptolemy could not </s>
<s> the reasons for this are partly observational partly philosophical and reinforced by other aesthetic and cultural factors </s>
<s> first the observational reasons </s>
<s> the obvious natural fact to ancient thinkers was the diurnal rotation of the heavens </s>
<s> not only did constellations like draco cepheus and cassiopeia spin circles around the pole but stars which were not circumpolar rose and set at the same place on the horizon each night </s>
<s> this was clear from the contour of the shadow traced by a gnomon before and after noon </s>
<s> ships disappear hull-first over the horizon </s>
<s> approaching shore their masts appeared first </s>
<s> earth being at the center of the universe would have the same shape as the latter </s>
<s> so eg did aristotle argue although this may not be an observational reason in favor of circularity </s>
<s> the discoid shapes of sun and moon were also felt to indicate the shape of celestial things </s>
<s> in light of all this one would require special reasons for saying that the paths of the heavenly bodies were other than circular </s>
<s> there were no reasons for such suppositions then </s>
<s> this conjoined with the considerations above made the circular motions of heavenly bodies appear an almost directly observed fact </s>
<s> additional philosophical considerations advanced notably by aristotle supported further the circularity principle </s>
<s> it must apparently be motion without termini </s>
<s> circular motion however since it is eternal and perfectly continuous lacks termini </s>
<s> it is never motion towards something </s>
<s> only imcomplete imperfect things move towards what they lack </s>
<s> perfect complete entities if they move at all do not move towards what they lack </s>
<s> they move only in accordance with what is in their natures </s>
<s> thus circular motion is itself one of the essential characteristics of completely perfect celestial existence </s>
<s> to return now to the four-element physics a mixture of muddy frothy water will when standing in a jar separate out with earth at the bottom water on top and the air on top of that </s>
<s> a candle alight in the air directs its flame and smoke upwards </s>
<s> this gives a clue to the cosmical order of elements </s>
<s> thus earth has fallen to the center of the universe </s>
<s> when combined with the metaphysical notion that pure forms of this universe are best appreciated when least embodied in a material substratum it becomes clear that while earth will be dross on a scale of material-formal ratios celestial bodies will be of a subtle quickened ethereal existence in whose embodiment pure form will be the dominant component and matter will be absent or remain subsidiary </s>
<s> the stars constitute an order of existence different from what we encounter on earth </s>
<s> this is clear when one distinguishes the types of motion appropriate to both regions </s>
<s> a projectile shot up from earth returns rectlinearly to its natural place of rest </s>
<s> but the natural condition for the heavenly bodies is neither rest nor rectilinear motion </s>
<s> being less encumbered by material embodiments they partake more of what is divine </s>
<s> their motion will be eternal and perfect </s>
<s> let us re-examine the publicized contrasts between ptolemaic and copernican astronomy </s>
<s> bluntly there never was a ptolemaic system of astronomy </s>
<s> copernicus achievement was to have invented systematic astronomy </s>
<s> they all have this in common the earth is situated near the center of the deferent </s>
<s> he might even suppose the planets to move at infinity </s>
<s> his problem concerns longitudes latitudes and angular velocities </s>
<s> the distances of these points of light is a problem he cannot master beyond crude conjectures as to the orderings of the planetary orbits viewed outward from earth </s>
<s> but none of this has prevented scientists philosophers and even historians of science from speaking of the ptolemaic system in contrast to the copernican </s>
<s> this is a mistake </s>
<s> it is engendered by confounding the aristotelian cosmology in the almagest with the geocentric astronomy </s>
<s> ptolemy recurrently denies that he could ever explain planetary motion </s>
<s> this is what necessitates the nonsystematic character of his astronomy </s>
<s> it is the chief merit in copernicus work that all his planetary calculations are interdependent </s>
<s> he cannot describe eclipses without entertaining some form of a three-body problem </s>
<s> in ptolemaic terms however eclipses and retrograde motion were phenomena simpliciter to be explained directly as possible resultants of epicyclical combinations </s>
<s> in a systematic astronomy like that of copernicus retrogradations become part of the conceptual structure of the system </s>
<s> they are no longer a puzzling aspect of intricately variable local planetary motions </s>
<s> another contrast stressed when discussing ptolemaic vs copernican astronomy turns on the idea of simplicity </s>
<s> it is often stated that copernican astronomy is simpler than ptolemaic </s>
<s> some even say that this is the reason for the ultimate acceptance of the former </s>
<s> copernicus by placing the sun at the center of the planetary universe was able to reduce the number of epicycles from eighty-three to seventeen </s>
<s> historical records indicate that copernicus was unaware of the fundamental aspects of his so-called revolution unaware perhaps of its historical importance he rested content with having produced a simpler scheme for prediction </s>
<s> as an illustration of the principle of simplicity the heliocentric discovery has a peculiar appeal because it allows simplicity to be arithmetized </s>
<s> without careful qualification this can be misleading </s>
<s> but no single planetary problem ever required of ptolemy more than six epicycles at one time </s>
<s> this of course results from the non-systematic cellular character of ptolemaic theory </s>
<s> calculations within the copernican framework always raised questions about planetary configurations </s>
<s> these could be met only by considering the dynamical elements of several planets at one time </s>
<s> this is more ambitious than ptolemy is ever required to be when he faces his isolated problems </s>
<s> thus in no ordinary sense of simplicity is the ptolemaic theory simpler than the copernican </s>
<s> the latter required juggling several elements simultaneously </s>
<s> but simplicity here refers to systematic simplicity </s>
<s> the number of primitive ideas in systematically-simple theories is reduced to a minimum </s>
<s> the axioms required to make the theoretical machinery operate are set out tersely and powerfully so that all permissible operations within the theory can be traced rigorously back to these axioms rules and primitive notions </s>
<s> there are in the almagest no rules for determining in advance whether a new epicycle will be required for dealing with abberations in lunar solar or planetary behavior </s>
<s> the strongest appeal of the copernican formulation consisted in just this ideally the justification for dealing with special problems in particular ways is completely set out in the basic rules of the theory </s>
<s> the lower-level hypotheses are never ad hoc never introduced ex post facto just to sweep up within the theory some recalcitrant datum </s>
<s> de revolutionibus is not just a collection of facts and techniques </s>
<s> it is an organized system of these things </s>
<s> solving astronomical problems requires for copernicus not a random search of unrelated tables but a regular employment of the rules defining the entire discipline </s>
<s> hence noting the simplicity achieved in copernicus formulation does not provide another reason for the acceptance of de revolutionibus another reason beyond its systematic superiority </s>
<s> it provides exactly the same reason </s>
<s> it is really the funeral day of scholastic science </s>
<s> but considered within technical astronomy a different pattern can be traced </s>
<s> no </s>
<s> copernicus required a systematically integrated physically intelligible astronomy </s>
<s> his objective was essentially to repair those aspects of orthodox astronomy responsible for its deficiencies in achieving these ends </s>
<s> the latter looked backward upon inherited deficiencies </s>
<s> without abandoning too much copernicus sought to make orthodox astronomy systematically and mechanically acceptable </s>
<s> he did not think himself to be firing the first shot of an intellectual revolution </s>

<s> he was the son of a scottish father and an american jewish mother long widowed with whom he lived in a comfortable home in flushing </s>
<s> he had worked in the newspaper business since he was nineteen years old always for the hearst service </s>
<s> it was said that the hetman plotted to take over the entire hearst newspaper empire one day by means of various coups the destruction of editors who tried to halt his course the unfrocking of publishers whose mistakes of judgment might be magnified in secret reports to mr hearst </s>
<s> among the outstanding members of the hearst cabinet whom he successfully opposed for a time were the great arthur brisbane bradford merrill ss carvalho and colonel van hamm </s>

<s> he supported his mother and his brother who afterwards committed suicide </s>

<s> about the only time the hetman seemed excited was when one of his own pet ideas was born </s>

<s> when i returned to make my report the hetman did not remember having sent me on the secret mission </s>
<s> he was busy he said in having someone submit to a monkey-gland operation </s>
<s> and i was to go to work on that odd matter </s>
<s> i shall tell of it later on </s>
<s> the hetman had a strong liking for a story any story which was to be had by means of much sleuthing or by roundabout methods </s>
<s> most of my stories were obtained by simply seeking out the person who could give me the facts and not as a rule by playing clever tricks </s>

<s> the hetman told me to take the story over the phone and to write it </s>

<s> impressive as this enumeration is it barely hints at the diverse perceptions of jews collectively or individually that have been attested by their gentile environment </s>
<s> it is reasonable to affirm two propositions jews have been perceived by non-jews as all things to all men </s>
<s> some jews have in fact been all things to all men </s>
<s> they have observed correct neutrality </s>
<s> in the market place jews have in fact under various circumstances been valued customers and suppliers or clannish monopolists and cutthroat competitors </s>
<s> and so on through the roles referred to in the previous paragraph </s>
<s> diversity of perception yes </s>
<s> diversity of fact yes </s>
<s> but the two do not invariably or even typically coincide </s>
<s> conventional images of jews have this in common with all perceptions of a configuration in which one feature is held constant images can be both true and false </s>
<s> they are self-correcting in the sense that they are subject to disciplined procedures that check and recheck against error </s>
<s> in accounting for realism or distortion two sets of factors can be usefully distinguished current intelligence </s>
<s> predispositions regarding intelligence </s>
<s> general grant may have been the victim of false information in the instance reported in this book </s>
<s> if so he would not be the first or last commanding officer who has succumbed to bad information and dubious estimates of the future </s>
<s> but general grant may have been self-victimized </s>
<s> he may have entered the situation with predispositions that prepared him to act uncritically in the press of affairs </s>
<s> predispositions in turn fall conveniently into two categories for purposes of analysis </s>
<s> to some extent predispositions are shaped by exposure to group environments </s>
<s> in some measure they depend upon the structure of individual personality </s>
<s> after allowing for group exposures it is apparent that other factors must be considered if we are to comprehend fanaticism </s>
<s> these are personality factors </s>
<s> they include harmonies and conflicts within the whole man and mechanisms whereby inner components are more or less smoothly met </s>
<s> modern psychiatric knowledge provides us with many keys to unlock the significance of behavior of the kind </s>
<s> the foregoing factors are pertinent to the analysis of perceptual images and the broad conditions under which they achieve realism or fall short of it </s>
<s> undoubtedly one merit of the vast panorama of gentile conceptions of the jew unfolded in the present anthology is that it provides a formidable body of material that invites critical examination in terms of reality </s>
<s> many selections are themselves convincing contributions to this appraisal </s>
<s> undoubtedly however the significance of the volume is greater than the foregoing paragraphs suggest </s>
<s> speaking as a non-jew i believe that its primary contribution is in the realm of future policy </s>
<s> since we can neither undo nor redo the past we are limited to the events of today and tomorrow </s>
<s> in this domain the simple fact of coexistence in the same local national and world community is enough to guarantee that we cannot refrain from having some effect large or small upon gentile-jewish relations </s>
<s> i am deliberately raising the policy problems involved in gentile-jewish relations </s>
<s> comprehensive examination of any policy question calls for the performance of the intellectual tasks inseparable from any problem-solving method </s>
<s> it is beyond the province of this epilogue to cover policy questions of such depth and range </s>
<s> the discussion is therefore limited to a suggested procedure for realizing at least some of the potential importance of this volume for future policy </s>
<s> as a groundwork for the proposal i give some attention to the first task enumerated above the clarification of goal </s>
<s> my reply is that i associate myself with all those who affirm that gentile-jewish relations should contribute to the theory and practice of human dignity </s>
<s> the basic goal finds partial expression in the universal declaration of human rights a statement initiated and endorsed by individuals and organizations of many religious and philosophical traditions </s>
<s> within this frame of reference policies appropriate to claims advanced in the name of the jews depend upon which jewish identity is involved as well as upon the nature of the claim the characteristics of the claimant the justifications proposed and the predispositions of the community decision makers who are called upon to act </s>
<s> if jews are identified as a religious body in a controversy that comes before a national or international tribunal it is obviously compatible with the goal of human dignity to protect freedom of worship </s>
<s> when decision makers act within this frame they determine whether a claim put forward in the name of religion is to be accepted by the larger community as appropriate to religion </s>
<s> since the recognition of israel as a nation state claims are made in many cases which identify the claimant as a member of the new body politic </s>
<s> community decision makers must make up their minds whether a claim is acceptable to the larger community in terms of prevailing expectations regarding members of nation states </s>
<s> the decision maker who acts for the community as a whole must decide whether the objectives pursued and the methods used are appropriate to public policy regarding cultural groups </s>
<s> we know that much is made of the multiplicity and ambiguity of the identities that cluster around the key symbol of the jew </s>
<s> many public and private controversies will undoubtedly continue to reflect these confusions in the mind and usage of gentile and jew </s>
<s> however in the context of legal and civic policy these controversies are less than novel </s>
<s> they involve similar uncertainties regarding the multiple identities of any number of non-jewish groups </s>
<s> so far as the existing body of formal principle and procedure is concerned categorical novelties are not to be anticipated in jewish-gentile relationships </s>
<s> claims are properly disposed of according to norms common to all parties </s>
<s> it is not implied that formal principles and procedures are so firmly entrenched within the public order of the world community or even of free commonwealths that they will control in all circumstances involving jews and gentiles during coming years </s>
<s> social process is always anchored in past predisposition </s>
<s> but it is perennially restructured in situations where anchors are dragged or lost </s>
<s> in conformance with the maximization principle we affirm that gentile-jewish relations will be harmonious or inharmonious to the degree that one relation or the other is expected by the active participants to yield the greatest net advantage taking all value outcomes and effects into consideration </s>
<s> it is not difficult to anticipate circumstances in which negative tensions will cumulate </s>
<s> for instance imagine the situation if israel ever joins an enemy coalition </s>
<s> the formal position of americans who identify themselves with one or more of the several identities of the jewish symbol is already clear </s>
<s> the future weight of informal factors cannot be so easily assessed </s>
<s> when we consider the disorganized state of the world community and the legacy of predispositions adversely directed against all who are identified as jews it is obvious that the struggle for the minds and muscles of men needs to be prosecuted with increasing vigor and skill </s>
<s> during moments of intense crisis the responsibility of political leaders is overwhelming </s>
<s> but their freedom of policy is limited by the pattern of predisposition with which they and the people around them enter the crisis </s>
<s> by the same test predispositions destructive of human personality exercise their most sinister impact with the result that men of good will are often trapped and nullified </s>
<s> among measures in anticipation of crisis are plans to inject into the turmoil as assistants of key decision makers qualified persons who are cognizant of the corrosive effect of crisis upon personal relationships and are also able to raise calm and realistic voices when overburdened leaders near the limit of self-control </s>
<s> we are learning how to do these things in some of the vast organized structures of modern society </s>
<s> the process can be accelerated </s>
<s> a truism is that the time to prepare for the worst is when times are best </s>
<s> during intercrisis periods the educational facilities of the community have the possibility of remolding the perspectives and altering the behavior of vast numbers of human beings of every age and condition </s>
<s> as more men and women are made capable of living up to the challenge of decency the chances are improved that the pattern of predisposition prevailing in positions of strength in future crises can be favorably affected </s>
<s> now an abiding difficulty of paragraphs like the foregoing is that they appear to preach </s>
<s> and in contemporary society we often complain of too much reaffirmation of the goodness of the good </s>
<s> in any case i do not intend to let the present occasion pass without dealing more directly with the problem of implementing good intentions </s>
<s> i assume that the number of readers of this anthology who regard themselves as morally perfect is small and that most readers are willing to consider procedures by which they may gain more insight into themselves and better understanding of others </s>
<s> properly used the present book is an excellent instrument of enlightenment </s>
<s> the traditional method proceeds by the technique of free association punctuated by interpretations proposed by the psychoanalytic interviewer </s>
<s> what we have in mind does have something in common with the goals of psychoanalysis and with the methods by which they are sought </s>
<s> for this purpose a degree of intellectual and emotional involvement is necessary </s>
<s> but involvement needs to be accompanied by a special frame of mind </s>
<s> the relatively long and often colorful selections in this anthology enable the reader to become genuinely absorbed in what is said whether he responds with anger or applause </s>
<s> but simple involvement is not enough </s>
<s> self-discovery calls for an open permissive inquiring posture of self-observation </s>
<s> an advantage of being exposed to such specificity about an important and recurring feature of social reality is that it can be taken advantage of by the reader to examine covert as well as overt resonances within himself resonances triggered by explicit symbols clustering around the central figure of the jew </s>
<s> two facets of this aspect of the literary process have special significance for our time </s>
<s> one a reservation on the point i have just made is the phenomenon of pseudo-thinking pseudo-feeling and pseudo-willing which fromm discussed in the escape from freedom </s>
<s> there is a risk that instead of teaching a person how to be himself reading fiction and drama may teach him how to be somebody else </s>
<s> clearly what the person brings to the reading is important </s>
<s> moreover if the critic instructs his audience in what to see in a work he is contributing to this pseudo-thinking </s>
<s> if he instructs them in how to evaluate a work he is helping them to achieve their own identity </s>
<s> the second timely part of this sketch of literature and the search for identity has to do with the difference between good and enduring literary works and the ephemeral mass culture products of today </s>
<s> in the range and variety of characters who in their literary lives get along all right with life styles one never imagined possible there is an implicit lesson in differentiation </s>
<s> and find in the answer a license to be a variant of the human species </s>
<s> the observer of television or other products for a mass audience has only a permit to be like the models he sees even more like everybody else </s>
<s> and this i think holds for values as well as life styles </s>
<s> one would need to test this proposition carefully </s>
<s> scientists often turn out to be idiosyncratic too </s>
<s> but still the proposition is worth examination </s>
<s> i do not know that this is true </s>
<s> both flugel and ranyard west deal with the development and nature of conscience as do such theologians as niebuhr and buber </s>
<s> it forms the core of many perhaps most problems of psychotherapy </s>
<s> certainly the awakened alarm over the comic books and the continuous concern over prurient literature indicate some peripheral aspects of this influence </s>
<s> probably the most important thing to focus on is not the development of conscience which may well be almost beyond the reach of literature but the contents of conscience the code which is imparted to the developed or immature conscience available </s>
<s> this is in large part a code of behavior and a glossary of values what is it that people do and should do and how one should regard it </s>
<s> in a small way this is illustrated by the nineteenth-century novelist who argued for the powerful influence of literature as a teacher of society and who illustrated this with the way a girl learned to meet her lover how to behave how to think about this new experience how to exercise restraint </s>
<s> literature may be said to give people a sense of purpose dedication mission significance </s>
<s> men seem almost universally to want a sense of function that is a feeling that their existence makes a difference to someone living or unborn close and immediate or generalized </s>
<s> feeling useless seems generally to be an unpleasant sensation </s>
<s> a need so deeply planted asking for direction so to speak is likely to be gratified by the vivid examples and heroic proportions of literature </s>
<s> one of the most salient features of literary value has been deemed to be its influence upon and organization of emotion </s>
<s> let us differentiate a few of these ideas </s>
<s> the aristotelian notion of catharsis the purging of emotion is a persistent and viable one </s>
<s> a third idea is that artistic literature serves to reduce emotional conflicts giving a sense of serenity and calm to individuals </s>
<s> it is possible that the idea of enrichment of emotion is a fifth idea </s>
<s> i take the central meaning here to be the contrast between the drab empty quality of life without literature and a life enriched by it </s>
<s> richards view of the aesthetic experience might constitute a sixth variety for him it constitutes in part the organization of impulses </s>
<s> a sketch of the emotional value of the study of literature would have to take account of all of these </s>
<s> but there is one in particular which it seems to me deserves special attention </s>
<s> in the wide range of experiences common to our earth-bound race none is more difficult to manage more troublesome and more enduring in its effects than the control of love and hate </s>
<s> the study of literature contributes to this control in a curious way </s>
<s> the rehearsal through literature of emotional life under controlled conditions may be a most valuable human experience </s>
<s> here i do not mean catharsis the discharge of emotion </s>
<s> there is a second feature of the influences of literature good literature on emotional life which may have some special value for our time </s>
<s> perhaps it is only an analogy but one of the most obvious differences between cheap fiction and fiction of an enduring quality is the development of a theme or story with leisure and anticipation </s>
<s> anyone who has watched children develop a taste for literature will understand what i mean </s>
<s> it is at least possible that the capacity to postpone gratification is developed as well as expressed in a continuous and guided exposure to great literature </s>
<s> these are if the research is done with subtlety and skill researchable topics but the research is missing </s>
<s> one of the most frequent views of the value of literature is the education of sensibility that it is thought to provide </s>
<s> sensibility is a vague word covering an area of meaning rather than any precise talent quality or skill </s>
<s> among other things it means perception discrimination sensitivity to subtle differences </s>
<s> both the extent to which this is true and the limits of the field of perceptual skill involved should be acknowledged </s>
<s> its truth is illustrated by the skill sensitivity and general expertise of the english professor with whom one attends the theatre </s>
<s> the limits are suggested by an imaginary experiment contrast the perceptual skill of english professors with that of their colleagues in discriminating among motor cars political candidates or female beauty </s>
<s> along these lines the particular point that sensitivity in literature leads to sensitivity in human relations would require more proof than i have seen </s>
<s> in a symposium and general exploration of the field of personal perception and interpersonal behavior the discussion does not touch upon this aspect of the subject with one possible exception </s>
<s> but to go from here to the belief that those more sensitive to metaphor and language will also be more sensitive to personal differences is too great an inferential leap </s>
<s> i would say too that the study of literature tends to give a person what i shall call depth </s>
<s> i use this term to mean three things a search for the human significance of an event or state of affairs a tendency to look at wholes rather than parts and a tendency to respond to these events and wholes with feeling </s>
<s> it is the obverse of triviality shallowness emotional anaesthesia </s>
<s> i think these attributes cluster but i have no evidence </s>
<s> in fact i can only say this seems to me to follow from a wide continuous and properly guided exposure to literary art </s>
<s> we are all though many of us are snobbish enough to wish to deny it in far closer sympathy with the art of the music-hall and picture-palace than with chaucer and cimabue or even shakespeare and titian </s>
<s> by an effort of historical sympathy we can cast our minds back into the art of a remote past or an alien present and enjoy the carvings of cavemen and japanese colour-prints </s>
<s> but the possibility of this effort is bound up with that development of historical thought which is the greatest achievement of our civilization in the last two centuries and it is utterly impossible to people in whom this development has not taken place </s>
<s> one might argue that the ultimate purpose of literary scholarship is to correct this spontaneous provincialism that is likely to obscure the horizons of the general public of the newspaper critic and of the creative artist himself </s>
<s> there results a study of literature freed from the tyranny of the contemporary </s>
<s> such study may take many forms </s>
<s> the study of ideas in literature is one of these </s>
<s> of course it goes without saying that no student of ideas can justifiably ignore the contemporary scene </s>
<s> he will frequently return to it </s>
<s> the continuities contrasts and similarities discernible when past and present are surveyed together are inexhaustible and the one is often understood through the other </s>
<s> when we assert the value of such study we find ourselves committed to an important assumption </s>
<s> most students of literature whether they call themselves scholars or critics are ready to argue that it is possible to understand literary works as well as to enjoy them </s>
<s> many will add that we may find our enjoyment heightened by our understanding </s>
<s> he may also consider ideas </s>
<s> it is true that this distinction between style and idea often approaches the arbitrary since in the end we must admit that style and content frequently influence or interpenetrate one another and sometimes appear as expressions of the same insight </s>
<s> but in general we may argue that the student can direct the primary emphasis of his attention toward one or the other </s>
<s> at this point a working definition of idea is in order although our first definition will have to be qualified somewhat as we proceed </s>
<s> the term idea refers to our more reflective or thoughtful consciousness as opposed to the immediacies of sensuous or emotional experience </s>
<s> it is through such reflection that literature approaches philosophy </s>
<s> an idea let us say may be roughly defined as a theme or topic with which our reflection may be concerned </s>
<s> outstanding among these is the idea of human nature itself including the many definitions that have been advanced over the centuries </s>
<s> also secondary notions such as the perfectibility of man the depravity of man and the dignity of man </s>
<s> one might indeed argue that the history of ideas in so far as it includes the literatures must center on characterizations of human nature and that the great periods of literary achievement may be distinguished from one another by reference to the images of human nature that they succeed in fashioning </s>
<s> we need not to be sure expect to find such ideas in every piece of literature </s>
<s> an idea of the sort that we have in mind although of necessity readily available to imagination is more general in connotation than most poetic or literary images especially those appearing in lyric poems that seek to capture a moment of personal experience </s>
<s> understanding a work of art involves recognition of the ideas that it reflects or embodies </s>
<s> thus the student of literature may sometimes find it helpful to classify a poem or an essay as being in idea or in ideal content or subject matter typical or atypical of its period </s>
<s> again he may discover embodied within its texture a theme or idea that has been presented elsewhere and at other times in various ways </s>
<s> our understanding will very probably require both these commentaries </s>
<s> in recent years we have come increasingly to recognize that ideas have a history and that not the least important chapters of this history have to do with thematic or conceptual aspects of literature and the arts although these aspects should be studied in conjunction with the history of philosophy of religion and of the sciences </s>
<s> when these fields are surveyed together important patterns of relationship emerge indicating a vast community of reciprocal influence a continuity of thought and expression including many traditions primarily literary religious and philosophical but frequently including contact with the fine arts and even to some extent with science </s>
<s> such an understanding although it must seek to be sympathetic is not a matter of intuition </s>
<s> this is what was meant above by describing history as inferential </s>
<s> it is obvious that the historian who seeks to recapture the ideas that have motivated human behavior throughout a given period will find the art and literature of that age one of his central and major concerns by no means a mere supplement or adjunct of significant historical research </s>
<s> the student of ideas and their place in history will always be concerned with the patterns of transition which are at the same time patterns of transformation whereby ideas pass from one area of activity to another </s>
<s> we may thus trace the notion of individual autonomy from its manifestation in religious practice and theological reflection through practical politics and political theory into literature and the arts </s>
<s> finally we may note that the idea appears in educational theory where its influence is at present widespread </s>
<s> no one will deny that such broad developments and transitions are of great intrinsic interest and the study of ideas in literature would be woefully incomplete without frequent reference to them </s>
<s> still we must remember that we cannot construct and justify generalizations of this sort unless we are ready to consider many special instances of influence moving between such areas as theology philosophy political thought and literature </s>
<s> the actual moments of contact are vitally important </s>
<s> these moments are historical events in the lives of individual authors with which the student of comparative literature must be frequently concerned </s>
<s> perhaps the most powerful and most frequently recurring literary influence on the western world has been that of the old and new testament </s>
<s> certainly one of the most important comments that can be made upon the spiritual and cultural life of any period of western civilization during the past sixteen or seventeen centuries has to do with the way in which its leaders have read and interpreted the bible </s>
<s> this reading and the comments that it evoked constitute the influence </s>
<s> a contrast of the scripture reading of let us say st augustine john bunyan and thomas jefferson all three of whom found in such study a real source of enlightenment can tell us a great deal about these three men and the age that each represented and helped bring to conscious expression </s>
<s> we may also recognize cases in which the poets have influenced the philosophers and even indirectly the scientists </s>
<s> again the student of evolutionary biology will find a fascinating if to our minds grotesque anticipation of the theory of chance variations and the natural elimination of the unfit in lucretius who in turn seems to have borrowed the concept from the philosopher empedocles </s>
<s> here an important caveat is in order </s>
<s> if within one year you can make a success out of the american you can practically name your own salary thereafter </s>

<s> gorton said they were preparing to deport her as a vagabond and to escape the shame she fled to the woods for several days returning at night </s>
<s> he advised the poor woman not to appear in court as what she was charged with was not in violation of law </s>
<s> gorton appeared for her however and what he told the magistrates must have been plenty for he was charged with deluding the court fined and told to leave the colony within fourteen days </s>
<s> his wife was in delicate health and nursing an infant with measles </s>
<s> the unconquerable mrs hutchinson was residing at pocasset after having been excommunicated by the boston church and thrown out of the colony </s>
<s> one can imagine that with her and gorton there it was no place for anyone with weak nerves </s>

<s> the next week forty soldiers were sent to get the miscreants </s>
<s> the latter tried to arbitrate through a delegation from providence which offer was declined by the invaders </s>

<s> the men fortified a blockhouse and got ready to fight but meanwhile appealed to the king and again tried to arbitrate </s>

<s> the attackers sent for more soldiers and the defenders to save bloodshed surrendered under the promise that they would be treated as neighbors </s>

<s> gorton and ten of his friends were thrown in jail </s>

<s> the magistrates were determined to compel them </s>

<s> the three others got off easier </s>
<s> when fred wheeled him back into his room the big one looking out on the back porch and put him to bed papa told him he was very tired but that he had enjoyed greatly the trip downtown </s>
<s> getting out again seeing old friends had given his spirits a lift </s>

<s> in the spring of his second year at harvard tom had been offered a job at northwestern university as an instructor in the english department </s>

<s> he wanted to go back to harvard for another year of playwriting </s>

<s> that third year he wrote plays with a fury </s>
<s> i believe there are seventeen short plays by tom now housed in the houghton library at harvard </s>
<s> that fall he submitted to professor baker the first acts and outlines of the following acts of several plays six of them according to some of his associates and he also worked on a play that he first called niggertown the material for which he had collected during the summer at home </s>
<s> later this play would be called welcome to our city </s>
<s> in the spring it must have been he began working on the play that he called the house which later would be mannerhouse </s>
<s> it ran two nights and though it was generally praised there was considerable criticism of its length </s>
<s> it was demonstrated many critics would later point out in the length of his novels </s>

<s> he was always concerned with life and he tried to picture it whole </s>
<s> he wanted nothing compressed tight </s>
<s> he was a big man and he wanted nothing little squeezed </s>
<s> he despised parsimony and particularly of words </s>

<s> on returning to new york he had a job for several weeks </s>

<s> well the theatre guild kept that play and kept it and finally in december they turned it down </s>

<s> it was fantastic writing beautiful writing the man declared but the public he insisted wanted realism </s>
<s> tom was not willing to revise the play according to the plan the man suggested </s>
<s> such a revision he said would ruin it would change his whole conception of the play as well as the treatment </s>
<s> there are millions who accept this doctrine but few indeed are those who accept it so truly that the fate of humanity lies as a weight on their souls night and day </s>
<s> this group in park place church was made up of the earnest few </s>
<s> i was drawn deeper and deeper into these concerns and responsibilities </s>
<s> i engaged more and more in religious activities </s>
<s> besides church and sunday school i went to out-of-door meetings on the sidewalk at the church door </s>
<s> i went to an afternoon service at the aj </s>
<s> i went to the christian endeavor society and to the evening service of the church </s>
<s> much of this lacked the active support of the pastor </s>
<s> the young people were self-energizing and i was energized </s>
<s> meanwhile i myself was not yet saved </s>
<s> at least i had been unable to lay hold on the experience of conversion </s>
<s> try as i might to confess my sins and accept salvation no answer came to me from heaven </s>
<s> finally after years i gave up </s>
<s> the basic difficulty i suppose was in my ultimate inability to feel a burden of sin from which i sought relief </s>
<s> no load of sin had been laid on my shoulders nor did earnest effort enable me to become conscious of one </s>
<s> there is of course the doctrine of original sin which asserts that each of us as individuals partakes of the guilt of our first ancestor </s>
<s> this doctrine was repugnant to my moral sense </s>
<s> i did not feel it presumptuous to expect that the creator would be at least as just as the most righteous of his creatures </s>
<s> and the doctrine of original sin is compounded of injustice </s>
<s> the actual impelling force which severed me from evangelical effort was of another sort </s>
<s> i became disgusted at being so preoccupied with the state of my own miserable soul </s>
<s> they have remained on the opened page of my mind in all the years which since have passed </s>
<s> i do not claim to be free from sin or from the need for repentance and forgiveness </s>
<s> in my experience the assurance of forgiveness comes only when i have confessed to the wronged one and have made as full reparation as i can devise </s>
<s> there was one further step in my religious progress </s>
<s> this was taken after i came to live in springfield and it was made under the guidance of the reverend raymond beardslee a young preacher who came to the congregational church there at about the same time that i moved from new york </s>
<s> his father was a professor at hartford theological seminary and from him he acquired a conviction which he passed along to me that there is in the universe of persons a moral law the law of love which is a natural law in the same sense as is the physical law </s>
<s> it is most important that we recognize the law of love as being unbreakable in all personal relationships whether individually socially or as between whole nations of people </s>
<s> if obeyed the law brings order and satisfaction </s>
<s> if disobeyed the result is turmoil and chaos </s>
<s> as we observe moral law and physical law they appear as being inevitable </s>
<s> we can conceive of no alternatives </s>
<s> their basis seems deeper than mere authority </s>
<s> they are not true because scientists or prophets say they are true </s>
<s> it is not the authority of god himself which makes them true </s>
<s> because god is what he is the laws of the universe material and spiritual are what they are </s>
<s> deity and law are one and inseparable </s>
<s> with this conviction the partition between the sacred and the secular disappears </s>
<s> in his book civilization and ethics albert schweitzer faces the moral problems which arise when moral law is recognized in business life for example </s>
<s> one serves society by conducting a business from which a certain number of employees draw their means of subsistence </s>
<s> another by giving away his property in order to help his fellow man </s>
<s> each will decide on his own course somewhere between these two extreme cases according to the sense of responsibility which is determined for him by the particular circumstances of his own life </s>
<s> he is uncompromising in assigning guilt to the man who finds it necessary to inflict or permit injury to one individual or group for the sake of a larger good </s>
<s> for this decision a man must take personal responsibility </s>
<s> or to let the ethical be superseded by the purposive </s>
<s> schweitzer seems in fact to acquire for himself a burden of sin not bequeathed by adam but accumulated in the inevitable judgments which life requires of him as between greater and lesser responsibilities </s>
<s> this viewpoint i find interesting but it has never weighed on my soul </s>
<s> perhaps it should have </s>
<s> my own experience has followed simpler lines </s>
<s> an uncompromising belief in the moral law has the advantage of making religion natural even as physical law is natural </s>
<s> neither the engineer nor the ordinary citizen feels any self-consciousness in obeying the laws of matter and energy nor can he achieve a sense of self-righteousness in such obedience </s>
<s> to obey the moral law is just ordinary common sense applied to a neglected field </s>
<s> religion thus becomes integrated with life </s>
<s> this truth that the moral law is natural has other important corollaries </s>
<s> one of them is that it gives meaning and purpose to life </s>
<s> these lives are in themselves outside of the moral order and are unburdened with moral responsibility </s>
<s> one cannot read the records of scientists officials and travelers who have penetrated to the minds of the most savage races without realizing that each individual met with is a person </s>
<s> the australian aborigine is the conventional exemplar of degraded humanity </s>
<s> yet here was a depth of sensibility which is lacking in a considerable portion of the beneficiaries of our civilization </s>
<s> persons whether white black brown or yellow are a concern of god </s>
<s> respect for personality is a privilege and a duty for us as brothers </s>
<s> such is the field for exercising our reverence </s>
<s> with the knowledge that the kingdom comes by obedience to the moral law in our relations with all people we have a firm intellectual grasp on both the means and the ends of our lives </s>
<s> this intellectual approach to spiritual life suited me well because i was never content to lead a divided life </s>
<s> let us now give some thought to the soul </s>
<s> when the young biologist dr ballard began to show interest in our daughter elizabeth this induced a corresponding interest on our part in him </s>
<s> i asked one day what he was doing </s>
<s> he told me that he had a big newt and a little newt and that he was transplanting a big eye of the big newt onto the little newt and a little eye of the little newt onto the big newt </s>
<s> he was then noting that the big eye on the little newt hung back until the little eye had grown up to it while the little eye on the big newt grew rapidly until it was as big as the other </s>
<s> this was a profound statement </s>
<s> in the face of the unfolding universe our ultimate attitude is that of wonder </s>
<s> wonder is indeed the intellectual gateway to the spiritual world </s>
<s> gone are the days when in the nineteenth century scientists thought that they were close to the attainment of complete knowledge of the physical universe </s>
<s> for them only a little more needed to be learned and then all physical knowledge could be neatly sorted packaged and put in the inventory to be drawn on for the solution of any human problem </s>
<s> this complacency was blown to bits by the relativity of einstein the revelation of the complex anatomy of the atom and the discovery of the expanding universe </s>
<s> none of these discoveries were neatly rounded off bits of knowledge </s>
<s> each faded out into the unexplored areas of the future </s>
<s> it is as if we in our center of human observation from time to time penetrate more deeply into the unknown </s>
<s> as our radius of penetration r increases the area of new knowledge increases by af and the total of human knowledge becomes measured in terms of af </s>
<s> wonder grows </s>
<s> it is endless </s>
<s> there are some people intelligent people who seem to be untouched by the sea of wonder in which we are immersed and in which we spend our lives </s>
<s> one such is abraham meyer the writer of a recent book speaking of man </s>
<s> this is a straightforward denial of the spiritual world and a vigorous defense of pure materialism </s>
<s> his inability to wonder vitiates his argument </s>
<s> criticism is as old as literary art and we can set the stage for our study of three moderns if we see how certain critics in the past have dealt with the ethical aspects of literature </s>
<s> i have chosen five contrasting pairs ten men in all and they are arranged in roughly chronological order </s>
<s> such a list must naturally be selective and the treatment of each man is brief for i am interested only in their general ideas on the moral measure of literature </s>
<s> altogether the list will give us considerable variety in attitudes and some typical ones for these critics range all the way from censors to those who consider art above ethics all the way from plato to poe </s>
<s> and most of the great periods are represented because we will compare plato and aristotle from the golden age of greece </s>
<s> stephen gosson and sir philip sidney from renaissance england </s>
<s> dr johnson and william hazlitt of the eighteenth and early nineteenth centuries in england </s>
<s> and james russell lowell and edgar allan poe of nineteenth century american letters </s>
<s> plato and aristotle </s>
<s> plato and aristotle agree on some vital literary issues </s>
<s> they both measure literature by moral standards and in their political writings both allow for censorship but the differences between them are also significant </s>
<s> while aristotle censors literature only for the young plato would banish all poets from his ideal state </s>
<s> even more important in his poetics aristotle differs somewhat from plato when he moves in the direction of treating literature as a unique thing separate and apart from its causes and its effects </s>
<s> all through the republic plato attends to the way art relates to the general life and ultimately to a good life for his citizens </s>
<s> in short he is constantly concerned with the ethical effects </s>
<s> when he discusses the subject matter of poetry he asks what moral effect the scenes will have </s>
<s> when he turns briefly to literary style in the third book he again looks to the effect on the audience </s>
<s> plato is at times just as suspicious of the poets themselves as he is of their work </s>
<s> when he discusses tyrants in the eighth book of the republic he pictures the poets as willing to praise the worst rulers </s>
<s> but the most fundamental objection he has to poets appears in the tenth book and it is derived from his doctrine of ideal forms </s>
<s> true reality of course is the ideal and the poet knows nothing of this </s>
<s> only the philosopher knows the truth </s>
<s> poets moreover dwell on human passions </s>
<s> the same sort of thinking plays so large a part in both babbitt and more that we must examine it in some detail </s>
<s> plato feels that man has two competing aspects his rational faculty and his irrational </s>
<s> we can be virtuous only if we control our lower natures the passions in this case and strengthen our rational side </s>
<s> and poetry with all its emphasis on the passions encourages the audience to give way to emotion </s>
<s> for this reason then poetry tends to weaken the power of control the reason because it tempts one to indulge his passions and even the best of men he maintains may be corrupted by this subtle influence </s>
<s> his whole objection indeed seems to rise out of a deep conviction that the poets do have great power to influence but plato seldom pays any attention to what might be called the poem itself </s>
<s> he is rather concerned with the effect on society and he wants the poets to join his fight for justice </s>
<s> while plato finally allows a few acceptable hymns to the gods and famous men still he clearly leaves the way open for further discussion of the issue </s>
<s> he even calls upon the poets to defend the muse and to show that poetry may contribute to virtue </s>
<s> in the ideal state for instance he argues that the young citizens should hear only the most carefully selected tales and stories </s>
<s> for this reason he would banish indecent pictures and speeches from the stage </s>
<s> and the young people should not even be permitted to see comedies till they are old enough to drink strong wine and sit at the public tables </s>
<s> by the time they reach that age however aristotle no longer worries about the evil influence of comedies </s>
<s> once the poetic arts are separated from the other forms he lays down his famous definition of tragedy which sets up standards and so lends direction to the remainder of the work </s>
<s> a tragedy by his definition is an imitation of an action that is serious of a certain magnitude and complete in itself </s>
<s> it should have a dramatic form with pleasing language and it should portray incidents which so arouse pity and fear that it purges these emotions in the audience </s>
<s> throughout the rest of the poetics aristotle continues to discuss the characteristics of these six parts and their interrelationship and he refers frequently to the standards suggested by his definition of tragedy </s>
<s> the chicago contingent of modern critics follow aristotle so far in this direction that it is hard to see how they can compare one poem with another for the purpose of evaluation </s>
<s> for one thing aristotle mentions that plays may corrupt the audience </s>
<s> in addition his definition of a tragedy invites our attention because a serious and important action may very well be one that tests the moral fiber of the author or of the characters </s>
<s> he rejects certain plots because they do not contribute to that end </s>
<s> the point is that an ethical critic with an assist from freud can seize on this theory to argue that tragedy provides us with a harmless outlet for our hostile urges </s>
<s> if krutch is correct tragedy may have quite the opposite effect </s>
<s> it may allay our passions and so restore the rule of reason </s>
<s> or in more freudian terms the experience may serve to sublimate our destructive urges and strengthen the ego and superego </s>
<s> gosson and sidney </s>
<s> the second half of the sixteenth century in england was the setting for a violent and long controversy over the moral quality of renaissance literature especially the drama </s>
<s> no one suggested that the ethical effects of the art were irrelevant </s>
<s> both sides agreed that the theater must stand a moral test but they could not agree on whether the poets were a good or a bad influence </s>
<s> both sides claimed that plato and aristotle supported their cause </s>
<s> many students of literature know that classical defense </s>
<s> what is not so well known however and what is quite important for understanding the issues of this early quarrel is the kind of attack on literature that sidney was answering </s>
<s> with that act of parliament the opponents of the stage won the day and for more than two decades after that england had no legitimate public drama </s>
<s> in the early days of this controversy over the theater one of the interested parties stephen gosson published a little tract in which he objected mildly to the abuses of art rather than the art itself </s>
<s> he does not really approve of levity and laughter but sex is the deadly sin </s>
<s> but it would not be very satisfactory to leave our conclusions at the point just reached </s>
<s> fortunately it is possible to be somewhat more concrete and factual in diagnosing the involvement of values in education </s>
<s> for this purpose we now draw upon data from sociological and psychological studies of students in american colleges and universities and particularly from the cornell values studies </s>
<s> hence changes in attitudes and values can be analyzed for identical individuals at two points in time </s>
<s> we find in the first place that the students overwhelmingly approve of higher education positively evaluate the job their own institution is doing do not accept most of the criticisms levelled against higher education in the public prints and on the whole approve of the way their university deals with value-problems and value inculcation </s>
<s> it is not our impression that these evaluations are naively uncritical resultants of blissful ignorance </s>
<s> rather the generality of these students find their university experience congenial to their own sense of values </s>
<s> students are approximately equally divided between those who regard vocational preparation as the primary goal of an ideal education and those who chose a general liberal education </s>
<s> other conceivable goals such as character-education and social adjustment are of secondary importance to them </s>
<s> the ideal of a liberal education impresses itself upon the students more and more as they move through college </s>
<s> even in such technical curricula as engineering the senior is much more likely than the freshman to choose as an ideal liberal education over specific vocational preparation </s>
<s> students choices of ideal educational goals are not arbitrary or whimsical </s>
<s> there is a clear relationship between their educational evaluations and their basic pattern of general values </s>
<s> the same patterned consistency shows itself in occupational choices </s>
<s> and contrary to many popular assertions the goal-values chosen do not seem to us to be primarily oriented to materialistic success nor to mere conformity </s>
<s> our students want occupations that permit them to use their talents and training to be creative and original to work with and to help other people </s>
<s> they also want money prestige and security </s>
<s> but they are optimistic about their prospects in these regards </s>
<s> within the fixed frame of these aspirations they can afford to place a high value on the expressive and people-oriented aspects of occupation and to minimize the instrumental-reward values of power prestige and wealth </s>
<s> the purely cognitive or informational problems are often acute </s>
<s> furthermore many reluctant recruits are yielding to social demands or compromising in the face of their own limitations of opportunity or of ability and performance </s>
<s> thus many a creativity-oriented aspirant for a career in architecture drama or journalism resigns himself to a real estate business </s>
<s> and many a hopeful incipient business executive decides it were better to teach the theory of business administration than to practice it </s>
<s> in their views on dating courtship sex and family life our students prefer what they are expected to prefer </s>
<s> for them in the grim words of a once-popular song love and marriage go together like a horse and carriage </s>
<s> but these terms are treacherous </s>
<s> in the field of political values it is certainly true that students are not radical not rebels against their parents or their peers </s>
<s> and as they go through college the students tend to bring their political position in line with that prevalent in the social groups to which they belong </s>
<s> the students who are most willing to acquiesce in the suppression of civil liberties are also those who are most likely to be prejudiced against minority groups to be conformist and traditionalistic in general social attitudes and to lack a basic faith in people </s>
<s> but the correlation is substantial only among upperclassmen </s>
<s> this finding is consistent also with the fact that student leaders are more likely to be supporters of the values implicit in civil liberties than the other students </s>
<s> there is now substantial evidence from several major studies of college students that the experience of the college years results in a certain selective homogenization of attitudes and values </s>
<s> detached from their prior statuses and social groups and exposed to the pervasive stimuli of the university milieu the students tend to assimilate a new common culture to converge toward norms characteristic of their own particular campus </s>
<s> furthermore in certain respects there are norms common to colleges and universities across the country </s>
<s> for instance college-educated people consistently show up in study after study as more often than others supporters of the bill of rights and other democratic rights and liberties </s>
<s> the interesting thing in this connection is that the norms upon which students tend to converge include toleration of diversity </s>
<s> our data indicate that these students of today do basically accept the existing institutions of the society and in the face of the realities of complex and large-scale economic and political problems make a wary and ambivalent delegation of trust to those who occupy positions of legitimized responsibility for coping with such collective concerns </s>
<s> although we have no measures of its strength or intensity the heritage of the doctrine of inalienable rights is retained </s>
<s> in this sense also they are surely conformists </s>
<s> but the extent of ethical robotism is easily overestimated </s>
<s> few students are really so faceless in the not-so-lonely crowd of the swelling population in our institutions of higher learning </s>
<s> in the field of religious beliefs and values the college students seem to faithfully reflect the surrounding culture </s>
<s> their commitments are for the most part couched in a familiar idiom </s>
<s> students testify to a felt need for a religious faith or ultimate personal philosophy </s>
<s> avowed atheists or freethinkers are so rare as to be a curiosity </s>
<s> the religious quest is often intense and deep and there are students on every campus who are seriously wrestling with the most profound questions of meaning and value </s>
<s> at the same time a major proportion of these young men and women see religion as a means of personal adjustment an anchor for family life a source of emotional security </s>
<s> these personal and social goals often overshadow the goals of intellectual clarity and spiritual transcendence </s>
<s> still another segment of the student population consists of those who seek in what they regard as religion intellectual clarity rational belief and ethical guidance and reinforcement </s>
<s> our first impression of the data was that the students were surprisingly orthodox and religiously involved </s>
<s> as we looked more intently at the content of our belief and the extent of religious participation we received the impression that many of the religious convictions expressed represented a conventional acceptance of low intensity </s>
