<s> the turn of the century or to be more precise the two decades preceeding and following it marks a great change in the history of early english scholarship </s>
<s> at the bottom of this change were great strides forward in the technical equipment and technical standards of the historian </s>
<s> in archaeology for example the contributions of frederick haverfield and reginald smith to the various volumes of the victoria county histories raised the discipline from the status of an antiquarian pastime to that of the most valuable single tool of the early english historian </s>
<s> and with the publication of e t leeds archaeology of the anglo-saxon settlements the student was presented with an organized synthesis of the archaeological data then known </s>
<s> what was true for archaeology was also true of place-name studies </s>
<s> the value of place-names in the reconstruction of early english history had long been recognized </s>
<s> place-names in fact had been extensively utilized for this purpose from the time of camden onwards </s>
<s> without a precise knowledge of germanic philology however it is debatable whether their use was not more often a source of confusion and error than anything else </s>
<s> even in the nineteenth century such accomplished philologists as kemble and guest were led into what now seem ludicrous errors because of their failure to recognize that modern forms of place names are not necessarily the result of logical philological development </s>
<s> diplomatic is another area for which the dawn of the twentieth century marks the beginning of modern standards of scholarship </s>
<s> although because of the important achievements of nineteenth century scholars in the field of textual criticism the advance is not so striking as it was in the case of archaeology and place-names the editorial principles laid down by stevenson in his great edition of asser and in his crawford charters were a distinct improvement upon those of his predecessors and remain unimproved upon today </s>
<s> in sum it can be said that the techniques and standards of present day have their origin at the turn of the century </s>
<s> and it is this particularly the establishment of archaeology and place-name studies on a scientific basis which are immediately pertinent to the saxon shore </s>
<s> even before the century was out the tide of reaction had set in </s>
<s> early in the present century w h stevenson continued the attack with a savage article against guest </s>
<s> following him in varying degrees of scepticism were tw shore hm chadwick thomas hodgkin and f g beck </s>
<s> it would seem that the wheel had turned full circle </s>
<s> in fact modern scholarly opinion in the main has not retreated all the way back to the destructive scepticism of the first half of the nineteenth century </s>
<s> although one meets with occasional extremists like zachrisson or very recently arthur wade-evans the majority of scholars have taken a middle position between the extremes of scepticism and gullibility </s>
<s> most now admit that bede gildas nennius and the anglo-saxon chronicles cannot be the infallible guides to early english history that guest freeman and green thought them to be </s>
<s> on the other hand the consensus of opinion is that used with caution and in conjunction with other types of evidence the native sources still provide a valid rough outline for the english settlement of southern britain </s>
<s> therefore in one way kemble and lappenberg have been vindicated </s>
<s> their conclusions concerning the untrustworthiness of the west saxon annals the confused chronology of bede the unreliability of the early positions of the anglo-saxon genealogies and the mythological elements contained in nennius are now mostly accepted </s>
<s> nevertheless in another way modern historians still labor in the vineyard of the oxford school </s>
<s> at this point of course the issue has become complicated by a development unforeseen by lappenberg and kemble </s>
<s> they however much they were in disagreement with the late victorians over the method by which britain was germanized agreed with them that the end result was the complete extinction of the previous celtic population and civilization </s>
<s> against seebohm formidable foes have taken the field notably f w maitland whose domesday book and beyond was written expressly for this purpose and sir paul vinogradoff whose the growth of the manor had a similar aim </s>
<s> largely due to their efforts the catastrophic invasion-theory has maintained its position although seebohm has always found supporters </s>
<s> this is nevertheless a minority view </s>
<s> therefore it is plain that the clear distinctions of the nineteenth century are no longer with us </s>
<s> in the main stream of historical thinking is a group of scholars hm chadwick rh hodgkin sir frank stenton et al who are in varying degrees sceptical of the native traditions of the conquest but who defend the catastrophic type of invasion suggested by them </s>
<s> they in effect have compromised the opposing positions of the nineteenth century </s>
<s> on the other side are the celtic survivalists who have taken a tack divergent from both these schools of nineteenth century thought </s>
<s> as a group they should be favorable to a concept of gradual germanic infiltration although the specialist nature of much of their work eg seebohm gray and finberg tends to obscure their sympathies </s>
<s> those who do have occasion to deal with the invasions in a more general way like tw shore and arthur wade-evans are on the side of a gradual and often peaceful germanic penetration into britain </s>
<s> now omitting for a moment some recent developments we can say the saxon shore hypothesis of lappenberg and kemble has undergone virtual eclipse in this century </s>
<s> one reason is of course that the new scepticism has been willing to maintain the general picture of the invasions as portrayed in the traditional sources </s>
<s> moreover they have done so in rather special circumstances </s>
<s> even earlier haverfield had come to the same conclusion </s>
<s> what they meant was that there was no evidence to show that the south and east coasts of britain received germanic settlers conspicuously earlier than some other parts of england </s>
<s> that is there was no trace of anglo-saxons in britain as early as the late third century to which time the archaeological evidence for the erection of the saxon shore forts was beginning to point </s>
<s> in recent years however a wind of change seems to be blowing through early english historical circles </s>
<s> the great increase in the amount of archaeological activity and therefore information in the years immediately preceeding and following the second world war has brought to light data which has changed the complection of the saxon shore dispute </s>
<s> we must therefore have a look at the new archaeological material and re-examine the literary and place-name evidence which bears upon the problem </s>
<s> we know that the saxon shore was a phenonenon of late roman defensive policy </s>
<s> in other words its existence belongs to the period of roman britain </s>
<s> so whenever the romans finally withdrew from the island the saxon shore disappeared in the first decade of the fifth century </s>
<s> my argument is that there was no saxon shore prior to that time even though the forts had been in existence since the time of carausius </s>
<s> therefore what we must prove or disprove is that there were saxons in the broad sense in which we must construe the word in the area of the saxon shore at the time it was called the saxon shore </s>
<s> that is we must find saxons in east anglia kent sussex and hampshire in the last half of the fourth century </s>
<s> the problem in other words is strictly a chronological one </s>
<s> in gaul the saxon element on its saxon shore was plainly visible because there the saxons were an intrusive element in the population </s>
<s> in britain obviously the archaeological and place-name characteristics of the saxon shore region are bound to be saxon </s>
<s> it is a matter of trying to sort out an earlier fourth-century saxon element from the later fifth-century mainstream of anglo-saxon invasions </s>
<s> this naturally will be difficult to do since both the archaeological and place-name evidence in this period with some fortunate exceptions is insufficient for precise chronological purposes </s>
<s> it might be well to consider the literary evidence first because it can provide us with an answer to one important question </s>
<s> to do so something was necessary beyond volunteering because there was little glamour or romance in the european war </s>
<s> it meant instead hardship dirt and death </s>
<s> baker gave leonard wood credit for the initiation of the draft of soldiers </s>
<s> wood took the proposal to chief of staff hugh l scott who passed it on to baker a month before the actual declaration of war against germany </s>
<s> the result was that by secret agreement draft machinery was actually ready long before the country knew that the device was to take the place of the volunteering method which theodore roosevelt favored </s>
<s> general crowder proposed that regular army officers select the draftees in cities and towns throughout the nation </s>
<s> even so the draft act encountered rough sledding in its progress through the congress </s>
<s> democratic speaker champ clark saw little difference between a conscript and a convict </s>
<s> democrat stanley h dent chairman of the house military affairs committee declined to introduce the bill </s>
<s> democratic floor leader claude kitchin would have no part of the measure </s>
<s> he was julius kahn for whom the chief of staff thought no honor could be too great </s>
<s> in early june ten million young men registered by name and number </s>
<s> secretary of war baker blindfolded put his hand into a large glass bowl and drew the initial number of those to be called </s>
<s> it was one thing to call men to the colors </s>
<s> it was another to house feed and train them </s>
<s> the existing army posts were wholly inadequate </s>
<s> it was a gargantuan task </s>
<s> a typical cantonment in the north had twelve hundred buildings an electric-sewer-water system and twenty-five miles of roads </s>
<s> at camp taylor in kentucky a barracks was built in an hour and a half from timber that had been standing in mississippi forests one week before </s>
<s> this enviable record would have been maintained but for a great and unexpected disaster which struck the world with murderous stealth </s>
<s> both secretary of war baker and secretary of navy daniels devoted much time and effort to the problem of providing reasonably normal and wholesome activities in camp for the millions of men who had been removed from their home environment </s>
<s> baker moved first </s>
<s> fosdick a brother of minister harry emerson fosdick was a graduate of princeton and a member of phi beta kappa and the american philosophical association </s>
<s> the problem involved military necessity as much as morality for in pre-penicillin days venereal disease was a crippling disability </s>
<s> fosdick insisted that a strong word was needed from washington and it was immediately forthcoming </s>
<s> both baker and fosdick knew that a substitute was necessary that a verboten approach was not the real answer </s>
<s> they were aware that soldiers went to town in more ways than one because of the monotony of camp life to find the only release available in the absence of movies reading rooms and playing fields with adequate athletic equipment </s>
<s> both knew that when trains stopped at texan crossroads bored soldiers would sometimes enter to ask the passengers if they had any reading material to spare even a newspaper </s>
<s> there was no time in the short mexican encounter to evolve a solution but the area provided a proving ground for new departures in the near future </s>
<s> even so fosdick as the new chairman of the commission on training camp activities encountered strong and vociferous opposition </s>
<s> the result was that the rate of venereal disease in the american army was the lowest in our military history </s>
<s> this was the negative side of the situation </s>

<s> he was placed in charge of athletics and among other things adapted the type of calisthenics known as the daily dozen </s>
<s> in the imagination of the nineteenth century the greek tragedians and shakespeare stand side by side their affinity transcending all the immense contrarieties of historical circumstance religious belief and poetic form </s>
<s> we no longer use the particular terms of lessing and victor hugo </s>
<s> but we abide by their insight </s>
<s> the sense of relationship overreaches the historical truth that shakespeare may have known next to nothing of the actual works of aeschylus sophocles and euripides </s>
<s> it transcends the glaring fact that the elizabethans mixed tragedy and comedy whereas the greeks kept the two modes severely distinct </s>
<s> it overcomes our emphatic awareness of the vast difference in the shape and fabric of the two languages and styles of dramatic presentation </s>
<s> the intimations of a related spirit and ordering of human values are stronger than any sense of disparity </s>
<s> comparable visions of life are at work in antigone and romeo and juliet </s>
<s> we see at once what victor hugo means when he calls macbeth a northern scion of the house of atreus </s>
<s> elsinore seems to lie in a range of mycenae and the fate of orestes resounds in that of hamlet </s>
<s> oedipus and lear attain similar insights by virtue of similar blindness </s>
<s> it is not between euripides and shakespeare that the western mind turns away from the ancient tragic sense of life </s>
<s> it is after the late seventeenth century </s>
<s> the image of man which enters into force with aeschylus is still vital in phedre and athalie </s>
<s> it is the triumph of rationalism and secular metaphysics which marks the point of no return </s>
<s> shakespeare is closer to sophocles than he is to pope and voltaire </s>
<s> to say this is to set aside the realness of time </s>
<s> but it is true nevertheless </s>
<s> the modes of the imagination implicit in athenian tragedy continued to shape the life of the mind until the age of descartes and newton </s>
<s> it is only then that the ancient habits of feeling and the classic orderings of material and psychological experience were abandoned </s>
<s> in greek tragedy as in shakespeare mortal actions are encompassed by forces which transcend man </s>
<s> the reality of orestes entails that of the furies </s>
<s> the weird sisters wait for the soul of macbeth </s>
<s> we cannot conceive of oedipus without a sphinx nor of hamlet without a ghost </s>
<s> the shadows cast by the personages of greek and shakespearean drama lengthen into a greater darkness </s>
<s> and the entirety of the natural world is party to the action </s>
<s> the thunderclaps over the sacred wood at colonus and the storms in king lear are caused by more than weather </s>
<s> in tragedy lightning is a messenger </s>
<s> the tragic stage is a platform extending precariously between heaven and hell </s>
<s> those who walk on it may encounter at any turn ministers of grace or damnation </s>
<s> oedipus and lear instruct us how little of the world belongs to man </s>
<s> mortality is the pacing of a brief and dangerous watch and to all sentinels whether at elsinore or on the battlements at mycenae the coming of dawn has its breath of miracle </s>
<s> it banishes the night wanderers to fire or repose </s>
<s> modern roosters have lost the art of crowing restless spirits back to purgatory </s>
<s> the wheel of social life spun around the royal or aristocratic centre </s>
<s> from it spokes of order and degree led to the outward rim of the common man </s>
<s> tragedy presumes such a configuration </s>
<s> its sphere is that of royal courts dynastic quarrels and vaulting ambitions </s>
<s> the same metaphors of swift ascent and calamitous decline apply to oedipus and macbeth because they applied also to alcibiades and essex </s>
<s> and the fate of such men has tragic relevance because it is public </s>
<s> agamemnon creon and medea perform their tragic actions before the eyes of the polis </s>
<s> similarly the sufferings of hamlet othello or phedre engage the fortunes of the state </s>
<s> they are enacted at the heart of the body politic </s>
<s> hence the natural setting of tragedy is the palace gate the public square or the court chamber </s>
<s> princes and factions clashed in the open street and died on the open scaffold </s>
<s> with the rise to power of the middle class the centre of gravity in human affairs shifted from the public to the private </s>
<s> the art of defoe and richardson is founded on an awareness of this great change </s>
<s> heretofore an action had possessed the breadth of tragedy only if it involved high personages and if it occurred in the public view </s>
<s> behind the tragic hero stands the chorus the crowd or the observant courtier </s>
<s> in la nouvelle-heloise and werther tragedy is made intimate </s>
<s> and private tragedy became the chosen ground not of drama but of the new unfolding art of the novel </s>
<s> the novel was not only the presenter of the new secular rationalistic private world of the middle class </s>
<s> it served also as a literary form exactly appropriate to the fragmented audience of modern urban culture </s>
<s> i have said before how difficult it is to make any precise statements with regard to the character of the greek and elizabethan public </s>
<s> but one major fact seems undeniable </s>
<s> until the advent of rational empiricism the controlling habits of the western mind were symbolic and allegoric </s>
<s> available evidence regarding the natural world the course of history and the varieties of human action were translated into imaginative designs or mythologies </s>
<s> classic mythology and christianity are such architectures of the imagination </s>
<s> they order the manifold levels of reality and moral value along an axis of being which extends from brute matter to the immaculate stars </s>
<s> there had not yet supervened between understanding and expression the new languages of mathematics and scientific formulas </s>
<s> the poet was by definition a realist his imaginings and parables being natural organizations of reality </s>
<s> and in these organizations certain primal notions played a radiant part radiant both in the sense of giving light and of being a pole toward which all perspectives converge </s>
<s> i refer to the notion that the structure of society is a microcosm of the cosmic design and that history conforms to patterns of justice and chastisement as if it were a morality play set in motion by the gods for our instruction </s>
<s> these conceptions and the manner in which they were transposed into poetry or engendered by poetic form are intrinsic to western life from the time of aeschylus to that of shakespeare </s>
<s> and although they were as i have indicated under increasing strain at the time of racine they are still alive in his theatre </s>
<s> they are the essential force behind the conventions of tragedy </s>
<s> they are as decisively present in the oresteia and oedipus as in macbeth king lear and phedre </s>
<s> after the seventeenth century the audience ceased to be an organic community to which these ideas and their attendant habits of figurative language would be natural or immediately familiar </s>
<s> concepts such as grace damnation purgation blasphemy or the chain of being which are everywhere implicit in classic and shakespearean tragedy lose their vitality </s>
<s> they become philosophic abstractions of a private and problematic relevance or mere catchwords in religious customs which had in them a diminishing part of active belief </s>
<s> after shakespeare the master spirits of western consciousness are no longer the blind seers the poets or orpheus performing his art in the face of hell </s>
<s> they are descartes newton and voltaire </s>
<s> and their chroniclers are not the dramatic poets but the prose novelists </s>
<s> the romantics were the immediate inheritors of this tremendous change </s>
<s> they were not yet prepared to accept it as irremediable </s>
<s> from this action sprang the idea of somehow uniting greek and shakespearean drama into a new total form capable of restoring to life the ancient moral and poetic responses </s>
<s> the dream of achieving a synthesis between the sophoclean and the shakespearean genius inspired the ambitions of poets and composers from the time of shelley and victor hugo to that of bayreuth </s>
<s> it could not really be fulfilled </s>
<s> the conventions into which the romantics tried to breath life no longer corresponded to the realities of thought and feeling </s>
<s> but the attempt itself produced a number of brilliant works and these form a transition from the early romantic period to the new age of ibsen and chekhov </s>
<s> the dream of a descent into the gardens of the south always drew german ambitions toward rome and sicily </s>
<s> goethe asks in wilhelm meister whether we know the land where the lemon trees flower and the light of the mediterranean glows through torquato tasso and the roman elegies </s>
<s> goethe believed that the germanic spirit with its grave strength but flagrant streaks of brutality and intolerance should be tempered with the old sensuous wisdom and humanism of the hellenic </s>
<s> on the narrower ground of poetic form he felt that in the drama of the future the greek conception of tragic fate should be joined to the shakespearean vision of tragic will </s>
<s> the wager between god and satan brings on the destiny of faust but faust assumes his role voluntarily </s>
<s> it tells us of the ancient human desire to see the highest wisdom joined to the highest sensual beauty </s>
<s> there can be no greater magic than to wrest from death her in whom the flesh was all in whom beauty was entirely pure because it was entirely corruptible </s>
<s> goethe used the fable to more elaborate ends </s>
<s> faust rescuing helen from menelaus vengeance is the genius of renaissance europe restoring to life the classic tradition </s>
<s> this seems to refer not to the loan richard had asked for but to a proposed bargain with shakespeare </s>
<s> william parsons and william walford drapers asked quiney to see to business matters in london </s>
<s> he asked quiney to find out whether the money had been paid and if not to send to the lodging of sir edward and entreat him to pay what he owed </s>
<s> further letters in november mention that sir edward paid forty pounds </s>
<s> and i was six days going thither and coming homewards </s>
<s> he was allowed forty-four pounds in all including fees to the masters of requests mr fanshawe of the exchequer the solicitor general and other officials and their clerks </s>
<s> if he borrowed money from shakespeare or with his help he would now have been able to repay the loan </s>
<s> he also sued them for taking toll of grain at their market </s>
<s> the corporation proposed chief justice anderson for an arbiter sending him a gift of sack and claret </s>
<s> lady greville daughter of the late lord chancellor bromley and niece of sir john fortescue was offered twenty pounds by the townsmen to make peace </s>
<s> the fall of rome the discovery of precious metals and the protestant reformation were all links and could only be explained and understood by comprehending the links that preceded and those that followed </s>
<s> often the historian must consider the use of intuition or instinct by those individuals or nations which he is studying </s>
<s> unconsciously governments or races or institutions may enter into some undertaking without fully realizing why they are doing so </s>
<s> they react in obedience to an instinct or urge which has itself been impelled by natural law </s>
<s> a court may strike down a law on the basis of an intuitive feeling that the law is inimical to the numerical majority </s>
<s> a nation may go to war on some trifling pretext when in reality it may have been guided by an unconscious instinct that its very life was at stake </s>
<s> when the historian encounters a situation in which he can perceive no visible cause and effect sequence he should be alert to intuition and unconscious instinct as possible guides </s>
<s> adams firmly contended that the historian must never underrate the impact of the geographical environment on history </s>
<s> here was another indispensable tool </s>
<s> the failure of greece to reach the imperial destiny that periclean athens had seemed to promise was almost directly attributable to her physical conformation </s>
<s> all areas of history were either favorably or adversely affected by the geographical environment and no respectable historian could pursue the study of history without a thorough knowledge of geography </s>
<s> brooks adams was consistent in his admonishments to historians about the necessary tools or insights they needed to possess </s>
<s> however as a practicing historian he himself has left few clues to the amount of professional scholarship that he used when writing history </s>
<s> in fact if judgments are to be rendered upon the soundness of his historicism they must be based on scanty evidence </s>
<s> what evidence is available would seem to indicate that brooks unlike his older brother henry had most of the methodological vices usually found in the amateur </s>
<s> a credulousness a distaste for documentation an uncritical reliance on contemporary accounts and a proneness to assume a theory as true before adequate proof was provided were all evidences of his failure to comprehend the use of the scientific method or to evaluate the responsibilities of the historian to his reading public </s>
<s> this is not to assume that his work was without merit but the validity of his assumptions concerning the meaning of history must always be considered against this background of an unprofessional approach </s>
<s> his credulity is perhaps best illustrated in his introduction to the emancipation of massachusetts which purports to examine the trials of moses and to draw a parallel between the leader of the israelite exodus from egypt and the leadership of the puritan clergy in colonial new england </s>
<s> in light of the scholarly reappraisals engendered by the higher criticism this is a most remarkable statement particularly coming from one who was well known for his antifundamentalist views </s>
<s> the desire to substantiate a thesis at the expense of sound research technique smacks more of the propagandist than the historian </s>
<s> a similar amateurish characteristic is revealed in adams failure to check the accuracy and authenticity of his informational sources </s>
<s> if he found data that fitted his general plan he used it and counted his sources trustworthy </s>
<s> conversely if statistics were uncovered which contradicted a cherished theory the sources were denounced as faulty </s>
<s> such manipulations are frequently encountered in his essay on the suppression of the monasteries during the english reformation </s>
<s> adams depended largely on the dispatches of foreign ambassadors and observers in england claiming that the reports of such agents had to be accurate because there were no newspapers </s>
<s> this is certainly an irrational dogmatism in which the modern mind attempts to understand the spirit of the sixteenth century on twentieth-century terms </s>
<s> what is exposited by this observation is not the inherent prejudices of englishmen but the anglophobia of brooks adams </s>
<s> in all fairness it must be admitted that adams made no pretense at being an impartial historian </s>
<s> impartiality to him meant an unwillingness to generalize and to search for a synthesis </s>
<s> ranke and his disciples had reduced history to a profession of dullness </s>
<s> brooks adams preferred the chronicles of froissart or the style and theorizing of edward gibbon for at least they took a stand on the issues about which they wrote </s>
<s> he wrote eloquently to william james that impartial history was not only impossible but undesirable </s>
<s> if the historian was convinced of his own correctness then he should not allow his vision to become fogged by disturbing facts </s>
<s> it was history that must be in error not the historian </s>
<s> all of adams work reflects this dogmatic characteristic </s>
<s> no page seems to be complete without the statement of at least one unproved generalization </s>
<s> he cites the french revolution as typifying this rigidity but makes no mention of the italians who have been able to adapt to all types of circumstances </s>
<s> it made no difference that most evidence points to an opposite conclusion </s>
<s> for adams had made up his mind before all the facts were available </s>
<s> all critics of adams and his methods have observed this particular deficiency </s>
<s> a m wergeland called the adams method literally antihistorical while clive day maintained that the assumptions were not confined to theories alone but were also applicable to straight factual evidence </s>
<s> even d a wasson who compared the emancipation of massachusetts to the lifting of a fog from ancient landscapes was also forced to admit the methodological deficiencies of the author </s>
<s> in summary brooks adams felt that the nature of history was order and that the order so discovered was as much subject to historical laws as the forces of nature </s>
<s> moreover he believed that most professional historians lacked some of the essential instruments for a proper study of history </s>
<s> however despite the insight of many of his observations his own conclusions are open to suspicion because of his failure to employ at all times the correct research methods </s>
<s> this should not prejudice an evaluation of his findings but they were not the findings of a completely impartial investigator </s>
<s> what was perhaps more important than his concept of the nature of history and the historical method were those forces which shaped the direction of his thought </s>
<s> in the final analysis his contribution to american historiography was founded on almost intuitive insights into religion economics and darwinism the three factors which conditioned his search for a law of history </s>
<s> religion without supernaturalism </s>
<s> but it was nothing more than that </s>
<s> religion and the churches were institutions which had been created by man not god </s>
<s> he did not deny god </s>
<s> he simply did not believe that a creator intervened or interfered in human affairs </s>
<s> the historian need not be concerned with the philosophical problems suggested by religion </s>
<s> there was no evidence either of a positive or negative type of the actions of a divine being in this world </s>
<s> and since the historian should only be interested in strictly terrestrial activity his research should eliminate the supernatural </s>
<s> furthermore he must regard religion as the expression of human forces </s>
<s> certainly he must recognize its power and attempt to ascertain its influence on the flow of history but he must not confuse the natural and the mundane with the divine </s>
<s> students of anthropology and comparative religion had long been aware that there was indeed a direct connection </s>
<s> but adams was one of the first to suggest that this human incompetence was the only motivating factor behind religion </s>
<s> it was this fear which explained the development of a priestly caste whose function in society was to mollify and appease the angry deities </s>
<s> to keep themselves entrenched in power the priests were forced to demonstrate their unique status through the miracle </s>
<s> it was the use of the supernatural that kept them in business </s>
<s> the german barbarians of the fourth century offered an excellent example </s>
<s> this intervention could only be controlled by priests and thus the invasions caused a rapid rise in the influence of the sacred class </s>
<s> adams contended that once such a special class had been created it became a vested interest and sought to maintain itself by assuming exclusive control over the relationships between god and man </s>
<s> thus the church was born and because of its intrinsic character was soon identified as a conservative institution determined to resist the forces of change to identify itself with the political rulers and to maintain a kind of splendid isolation from the masses </s>
<s> doctrine was not only mysterious </s>
<s> these basic ideas concerning the nature of religion were adams believed some of the major keys to the understanding of history and the movement of society </s>
<s> the dark views about the puritans found in the emancipation of massachusetts were never altered </s>
<s> despite their adherence to the status quo the forces of organized religion were compelled to make adjustments as increasing civilization augmented human knowledge </s>
<s> in the law of civilization and decay brooks adams traced this evolution always pointing to the fact that although the forms became more rational the substance remained unchanged </s>
<s> the relic worship and monasticism of the middle ages were more advanced forms than were primitive fetish worship and nature myths </s>
<s> yet the idea imbedded in each was identical to surround the unknown with mystery and to isolate that class which had been given special dominion over the secrets of god </s>
<s> catherwood an architect in new york had been forgotten like stephens and victor reconstructed their lives as one reconstructs for a museum a dinosaur from two or three petrified bones </s>
<s> victor had been stirred by my account of him in makers and finders for stephens was one of the lost writers whom melville had seen in his childhood and whom i was bent on resurrecting </s>
<s> victor had led an adventurous life </s>
<s> his metier was the american tropics and he had lived all over latin america and among the primitive tribes on the amazon river </s>
<s> well he knew the sleepless nights the howling sore-ridden dogs and the biting insects in the villages of the kofanes and huitotoes </s>
<s> he had not yet undertaken the great exploit of his later years the rediscovery of the ancient inca highway the route of pizarro in peru but he had climbed to the original el dorado the andean lake of guatemala and he had scaled the southern sierra nevada with its tibetan-like people and looked into the emerald mines of muzo </s>

<s> of course it was not meant to be </s>
<s> two or three times c c burlingham came to lunch with us in weston that wonderful man who lived to be more than a hundred years old and whose birthplace had been my wall street suburb </s>
<s> his reading ranged from agatha christie to the book of job and he had an insatiable interest in his fellow-creatures while his letters were full of gossip about new politicians and old men of letters with whom he had been intimately thrown six decades before </s>

<s> while it is hazardous to project the trend of history it seems clear that a genuine community is painfully emerging in the western world particularly among the countries of western europe </s>
<s> the excesses of nationalism had brought down upon europe a generation of tyranny and war and a return to the old order of things seemed unthinkable </s>
<s> under these conditions a new generation of europeans began to discover the bonds of long association and shared values that for so long had been subordinated to nationalist xenophobia </s>
<s> a slow and painful trend toward unification has taken hold a trend which may at any time be arrested and reversed but which may also lead to a binding federation of europe </s>
<s> it may well be that the unification of europe will prove inadequate that the survival of free society will require nothing less than the confederation of the entire western world </s>
<s> the movement toward european unity has been expressed in two currents federalism and functionalism one looking to the constitution of a united states of europe the other building on wartime precedents of practical cooperation for the solution of specific problems </s>
<s> thus far the advances made have been almost entirely along functional lines </s>
<s> many factors contributed to the growth of the european movement </s>

<s> another powerful factor in the european movement was the threat of soviet aggression </s>

<s> the problem of nato is not one of machinery of which there is an abundance but of the will to use it </s>
<s> the nato council is available as an executive agency the standing group as a high military authority </s>
<s> the unofficial conference of parliamentarians is available as a potential legislative authority </s>
<s> this machinery will not become the instrument of an atlantic community by fiat but only when that community evolves from potentiality to reality </s>
<s> an equally promising avenue toward atlantic community may lie through the development and expansion of the oecd </s>
<s> conceived as an organ of economic cooperation there is no reason why oecd cannot evolve into a broader instrument of union if its members so desire </s>

<s> underlying these hopes and prescriptions is a conviction that the nations of the north atlantic area do indeed form a community at least a potential community </s>
<s> there is nothing new in this </s>
<s> for centuries the north atlantic nations dominated the world and as long as they did they could afford the luxury of fighting each other </s>
<s> the burden of these reflections is that a broader unity among the free nations is at the core of our needs </s>
<s> and if we do not aspire to too much it is also within our capacity </s>
<s> history has demonstrated many times that concerts of nations based solely on the negative spur of common danger are unlikely to survive when the external danger ceases to be dramatically urgent </s>
<s> only when a concert of nations rests on the positive foundations of shared goals and values is it likely to form a viable instrument of long-range policy </s>
<s> it follows that the solution to the current disunity of the free nations is only to a very limited extent a matter of devising new machinery of consultation and coordination </s>
<s> it is very much a matter of building the foundations of community </s>
<s> i believe that these proposals however meritorious in terms of world needs go far beyond our capacity to realize them </s>
<s> the defect of these proposals is in their attempt to outrun history and their assumption that because something may be desirable it is also possible </s>
<s> a working concept of the organic evolution of community must lead us in a different direction </s>
<s> the failures of the un and of other international organs suggest that we have already gone beyond what was internationally feasible </s>
<s> our problem therefore is to devise processes more modest in their aspirations adjusted to the real world of sovereign nation states and diverse and hostile communities </s>
<s> the history of the un demonstrates that in a pluralistic world we must develop processes of influence and persuasion rather than coercion </s>
<s> it is possible that international organization will ultimately supplant the multi-state system but its proper function for the immediate future is to reform and supplement that system in order to render pluralism more compatible with an interdependent world </s>
<s> the trouble with this machinery is that it is not used and the reason that it is not used is the absence of a conscious sense of community among the free nations </s>
<s> our proper objective then is the development of a new spirit the realization of a potential community </s>
<s> constitutions of and by themselves mean little </s>
<s> the history of both the league of nations and the united nations demonstrates that </s>
<s> but a powerful sense of community even with little or no machinery means a great deal </s>

<s> but the best known exploiters of the new medium are kenneth rexroth and kenneth patchen </s>
<s> rexroth and patchen are far apart musically and poetically in their experiments </s>
<s> rexroth is a longtime jazz buff a name-dropper of jazz heroes and a student of traditional as well as modern jazz </s>
<s> although patchen has given previous evidence of an interest in jazz the musical group that he works with the chamber jazz sextet is often ignored by jazz critics </s>
<s> however his subject matter and basic themes have remained surprisingly consistent and these together with certain key poetic images may be traced through all his work including the new jazz experiments </s>
<s> from the beginning of his career patchen has adopted an anti-intellectual approach to poetry </s>
<s> patchen believes that the world is being destroyed by power-hungry and money-hungry people </s>
<s> running counter to the destroying forces in the world are all the virtues that are innate in man the capacity for love and brotherhood the ability to appreciate beauty </s>
<s> beauty as well as love is redemptive and patchen preaches a kind of moral salvation </s>
<s> this salvation does not take the form of a christian heaven </s>
<s> the dark kingdom sends angels of death and other fateful messengers down to us with stern tenderness </s>
<s> actually heaven and the dark kingdom overlap </s>
<s> they form two aspects of heavenly life after death </s>
<s> patchen has almost never used strict poetic forms </s>
<s> he has experimented instead with personal myth-making </s>
<s> these early experiments were evidently not altogether satisfying to patchen </s>
<s> many of his poems purported to be exactly contemporary and political </s>
<s> he is usually something of an underdog he must battle the organized police force as well as recognized criminals </s>
<s> the private detective must rely as the youngest son or trickster hero does in primitive myth on his wits </s>
<s> the private detective is militant against injustice a humorous and ironic explorer of the underworld </s>
<s> most important to patchen he was a non-literary hero and very contemporary </s>
<s> he has become friday on dragnet a mouthpiece of arbitrary police authority </s>
<s> he has like so many other secular and religious culture symbols gone over to the side of the ruling classes </s>
<s> it was logical that he would come up with the figure of the modern jazz musician </s>
<s> the immense amount of interest that the new jazz had for the younger generation must have impressed him and he began working toward the merger of jazz and poetry as he had previously attempted the union of graphic art and poetry </s>
<s> in addition to his experiments in reading poetry to jazz patchen is beginning to use the figure of the modern jazz musician as a myth hero in the same way he used the figure of the private detective a decade ago </s>
<s> rexroth uses many of his early poems when he reads to jazz including many of his chinese and japanese translations </s>
<s> patchen does read some of his earlier works to music but he has written an entire book of short poems which seem to be especially suited for reading with jazz </s>
<s> it is difficult to draw the line between stereotype and the reality of the jazz musician </s>
<s> everyone knows that private detectives in real life are not like sam spade and pat novak but the real and the imaginary musician are closely linked </s>
<s> seen by the public the musician is the underdog par excellence </s>
<s> he is forced to play for little money and must often take another job to live </s>
<s> his approach to music is highly individualistic </s>
<s> the accent is on improvisation rather than arrangements </s>
<s> while he is worldly the musician often cultivates public attitudes of childlike astonishment and naivete </s>
<s> the musician is non-intellectual and non-verbal </s>
<s> he is far from being a literary hero yet is a creative artist </s>
<s> many of these aspects will be seen as comparable to those of the ideal detective but where the detective is active and militant the jazz musician is passive almost a victim of society </s>
<s> he must become one who knows all about the injustice in the world but who declines doing anything about it </s>
<s> he has shown considerable ingenuity in adapting his earliest symbols and devices to the new work and the fact that he has kept a body of constant symbols through all of his experiments gives an unexpected continuity to his poetry </s>
<s> his revolutionary anger is apparent in most of his early poems </s>
<s> i was born angry </s>
<s> angry that my father was being burnt alive in the mills </s>
<s> angry that none of us knew anything but filth and poverty </s>
<s> this angry and exasperated stance which patchen has maintained in his poetry for almost fifteen years has been successfully modulated into a kind of woe that is as effective as anger and still expresses his disapproval of the modern world </s>
<s> although it does not follow the metrical rules for a blues to be sung the phrases themselves carry a blues feeling </s>
<s> yes i went to the city and there i did bitterly cry men out of touch with the earth and with never a glance at the sky </s>
<s> neither of these poems is an aberration </s>
<s> patchen is repeatedly preoccupied with death </s>
<s> in many of his poems death comes by train a strongly evocative visual image </s>

<s> small business management </s>
<s> practical management problems and their suggested solutions are dealt with in a series of sba publications </s>
<s> these publications written especially for the managers or owners of small businesses indirectly aid in community development programs </s>
<s> they are written by specialists in numerous types of business enterprises cover a wide range of subjects and are directed to the needs and interests of the small firm </s>
<s> sba cosponsors these courses with educational institutions and community groups </s>
<s> one-day conferences covering some specific phase of business management also part of the continuing activities of the small business administration aid community economic development programs </s>

<s> processing methods </s>

<s> this may be helpful in improving the competitive position of established firms through diversification and expansion or through more economical utilization of plant capacity </s>
<s> production assistance </s>
<s> production specialists are available in sba regional offices to help individual small business concerns with technical production problems </s>
<s> these problems frequently arise where a firm is making items for the government not directly along the lines of its normal civilian business or where the government specifications require operations that the firm did not understand when it undertook the contract </s>
<s> production assistance often takes the form of locating tools or materials which are urgently needed </s>
<s> advice is given also on problems of plant location and plant space </s>
<s> property sales assistance </s>
<s> the property sales assistance program is designed to assist small business concerns that may wish to buy property offered for sale by the federal government </s>
<s> under this program property sales specialists in the small business administration regional offices help small business concerns to locate federal property for sale and insure that small firms have the opportunity to bid competitively for surplus personal and real property and certain natural resources including timber from the national forests </s>
<s> sba works closely with the principal property disposal installations of the federal government in reviewing proposed sales programs and identifying those types of property that small business concerns are most likely to be interested in purchasing </s>
<s> when suitable equipment is located by the sba representative the small business concern is contacted and advised on when where and how to bid on such property </s>
<s> facilities inventory </s>
<s> the administration maintains a productive facilities inventory of small business industrial concerns that have voluntarily registered </s>
<s> it is kept in each regional office for the small firms within the region </s>
<s> these services include procurement and technical assistance and notice of surplus sales and invitations to bid on government contracts for products and services within the registrants field of operations </s>
<s> sba can make complete facilities inventories of all small business concerns in labor surplus areas within budgetary and staff limitations </s>

<s> loan policies </s>

<s> evidence that other sources of financing are unavailable must be provided </s>
<s> types of loans </s>
<s> participation loans are those made jointly by the sba and banks or other private lending institutions </s>
<s> direct loans are those made by sba alone </s>
<s> a small business is defined as one which is independently owned and operated and which is not dominant in its field </s>
<s> in addition the sba uses such criteria as number of employees and dollar volume of the business </s>
<s> credit requirements </s>
<s> the credit requirements stipulate that the applicant must have the ability to operate the business successfully and have enough capital in the business so that with loan assistance from the sba it will be able to operate on a sound financial basis </s>
<s> a proposed loan must be for sound purposes or sufficiently secured so as to assure a reasonable chance of repayment </s>
<s> the record of past earnings and prospects for the future must indicate it has the ability to repay the loan out of current and anticipated income </s>
<s> loan amount </s>
<s> the amount which may be borrowed from the sba depends on how much is required to carry out the intended purpose of the loan </s>

<s> to cooperatives </s>
<s> the farm credit administration an independent agency located within the department of agriculture supervises and coordinates a cooperative credit system for agriculture </s>
<s> this system provides long- and short-term credit to farmers and their cooperative marketing purchasing and business service organizations </s>
<s> as a source of investment capital the system is beneficial to local communities and encourages the development of industries in rural areas </s>
<s> the credit provdied by the first two services in the system outlined above is primarily for general agricultural purposes </s>
<s> the banks for cooperatives were established to provide a permanent source of credit on a sound basis for farmers cooperatives </s>
<s> types of loans </s>
<s> three distinct classes of loans are made available to farmers cooperatives by the banks for cooperatives commodity loans operating capital loans and facility loans </s>
<s> eligibility </s>
<s> interest rates </s>
<s> interest rates are determined by the board of directors of the bank with the approval of the farm credit administration </s>

<s> printed material </s>
<s> minerals exploration </s>
<s> requirements </s>
<s> this help is offered to applicants who ordinarily would not undertake the exploration under present conditions or circumstances at their sole expense and who are unable to obtain funds from commercial sources on reasonable terms </s>
<s> each applicant is required to own or have sufficient interest in the property to be explored </s>
<s> the government will contract with an eligible applicant to pay up to one-half of the cost of approved exploration work as it progresses </s>
<s> the applicant pays the rest of the cost but his own time spent on the work and charges for the use of equipment which he owns may be applied toward his share of the cost </s>
<s> repayment </s>
<s> funds contributed by the government are repaid by a royalty on production from the property </s>
<s> if nothing is produced there is no obligation to repay </s>

<s> in most of the less developed countries however such programing is at best inadequate and at worst nonexistent </s>
<s> only a very few of the more advanced ones such as india and pakistan have developed systematic techniques of programing </s>
<s> others have so-called development plans but some of these are little more than lists of projects collected from various ministries while others are statements of goals without analysis of the actions required to attain them </s>
<s> only rarely is attention given to accurate progress reports and evaluation </s>
<s> we can help in the planning process </s>
<s> neither growth nor a development program can be imposed on a country </s>
<s> nevertheless we can administer an aid program in such a manner as to promote the development of responsible programing </s>
<s> first we can encourage responsibility by establishing as conditions for assistance on a substantial and sustained scale the definition of objectives and the assessment of costs </s>
<s> second we can make assistance for particular projects conditional on the consistency of such projects with the program </s>
<s> surveying the needs and requirements over time of broad sectors of the economy such as transport agriculture communication industry and power </s>
<s> designing the financial mechanisms of the economy in ways that will promote growth without inflation </s>
<s> and administrative practices which will make possible the more effective review and implementation of programs once established </s>
<s> we must use common sense in applying conditions </s>
<s> the application of conditions in the allocation of aid funds cannot of course be mechanical </s>
<s> it must be recognized that countries at different stages of development have very different capabilities of meeting such conditions </s>
<s> to insist on a level of performance in programing and budgeting completely beyond the capabilities of the recipient country would result in the frustration of the basic objective of our development assistance to encourage more rapid growth </s>
<s> in the more primitive areas where the capacity to absorb and utilize external assistance is limited some activities may be of such obvious priority that we may decide to support them before a well worked out program is available </s>
<s> thus we might provide limited assistance in such fields as education essential transport communications and agricultural improvement despite the absence of acceptable country programs </s>
<s> d </s>
<s> encouraging self-help </s>
<s> the reasons for stressing self-help </s>
<s> a systematic approach to development budgeting and programing is one important kind of self-help </s>
<s> there are many others </s>
<s> it is vitally important that the new us aid program should encourage all of them since the main thrust for development must come from the less developed countries themselves </s>
<s> external aid can only be marginal although the margin as in the case of the marshall plan can be decisive </s>
<s> external aid can be effective only if it is a complement to self-help </s>
<s> us aid therefore should increasingly be designed to provide incentives for countries to take the steps that only they themselves can take </s>
<s> aid advice is not interference </s>
<s> in establishing conditions of self-help it is important that we not expect countries to remake themselves in our image </s>
<s> open societies can take many forms and within very broad limits recipients must be free to set their own goals and to devise their own institutions to achieve those goals </s>
<s> on the other hand it is no interference with sovereignty to point out defects where they exist such as that a plan calls for factories without power to run them or for institutions without trained personnel to staff them </s>
<s> the range of self-help </s>
<s> this includes not only development programing but also establishing tax policies designed to raise equitably resources for investment </s>
<s> fiscal and monetary policies designed to prevent serious inflation </s>
<s> and regulatory policies aimed to attract the financial and managerial resources of foreign investment and to prevent excessive luxury consumption by a few </s>
<s> this includes foreseeing balance-of-payments crises with adequate attention to reducing dependence on imports and adopting realistic exchange rates to encourage infant industries and spur exports </s>
<s> it also includes providing for the training of nationals to operate projects after they are completed </s>
<s> for both economic and political reasons all segments of the population must be able to share in the growth of a country </s>
<s> otherwise development will not lead to longrun stability </s>
<s> in many societies what we regard as corruption favoritism and personal influence are so accepted as consistent with the mores of officialdom and so integral a part of routine administrative practice that any attempt to force their elimination will be regarded by the local leadership as not only unwarranted but unfriendly </s>
<s> yet an economy cannot get the most out of its resources if dishonesty corruption and favoritism are widespread </s>
<s> moreover tolerance by us of such practices results in serious waste and diversion of aid resources and in the long run generates anti-american sentiment of a kind peculiarly damaging to our political interest </s>
<s> a requirement of reasonably honest administration may be politically uncomfortable in the short run but it is politically essential in the long run </s>
<s> us position on self-help </s>
<s> the united states can use its aid as an incentive to self-help by responding with aid on a sustained basis tailored to priority needs to those countries making serious efforts in self-help </s>
<s> in many instances it can withhold or limit its aid to countries not yet willing to make such efforts </s>
<s> there are other countries where with skillful diplomacy we may be able by our aid to give encouragement to those groups in government which would like to press forward with economic and social reform measures to promote growth </s>
<s> governments are rarely monolithic </s>
<s> but there will be still other countries where despite the inadequacy of the level of self-help we shall deem it wise for political or military reasons to give substantial economic assistance </s>
<s> even in these cases we should promote self-help by making it clear that our supporting assistance is subject to reduction and ultimately to termination </s>
<s> e </s>
<s> encouraging a long-term approach </s>
<s> development requires a long-term approach </s>
<s> the most fundamental concept of the new approach to economic aid is the focusing of our attention our resources and our energies on the effort to promote the economic and social development of the less developed countries </s>
<s> this is not a short-run goal </s>
<s> to have any success in this effort we must ourselves view it as an enterprise stretching over a considerable number of years and we must encourage the recipients of our aid to view it in the same fashion </s>
<s> most of our aid will go to those nearing self-sufficiency </s>
<s> how long it will take to show substantial success in this effort will vary greatly from country to country </s>
<s> in several significant cases such as india a decade of concentrated effort can launch these countries into a stage in which they can carry forward their own economic and social progress with little or no government-to-government assistance </s>
<s> these cases in which light is already visible at the other end of the tunnel are ones which over the next few years will absorb the bulk of our capital assistance </s>
<s> gradually others will move up to the same level </s>
<s> the number of countries thus favorably situated is small but their peoples constitute over half of the population of the underdeveloped world </s>
<s> meantime over the decade of the sixties we can hope that many other countries will ready themselves for the big push into self-sustaining growth </s>
<s> in still others which are barely on the threshold of the transition into modernity the decade can bring significant progress in launching the slow process of developing their human resources and their basic services to the point where an expanded range of developmental activities is possible </s>
<s> aid is a long-term process </s>
<s> the whole program must be conceived of as an effort stretching over a considerable number of years to alter the basic social and economic conditions in the less developed world </s>
<s> it must be recognized as a slow-acting tool designed to prevent political and military crises such as those recently confronted in laos and cuba </s>
<s> it is not a tool for dealing with these crises after they have erupted </s>
<s> the specific reasons for a long-term approach </s>
<s> many of the individual projects for which development assistance is required call for expenditures over lengthy periods </s>
<s> dams river development schemes transportation networks educational systems require years to construct </s>
<s> moreover on complex projects design work must be completed and orders for machinery and equipment placed months or even years before construction can commence </s>
<s> thus as a development program is being launched commitments and obligations must be entered into in a given year which may exceed by twofold or threefold the expenditures to be made in that year </s>
<s> the capital expansion programs of business firms involve multi-year budgeting and the same is true of country development programs </s>
<s> without such forward planning investment funds are wasted because manufacturing facilities are completed before there is power to operate them or before there is transport to service them </s>
<s> or a skilled labor force is trained before there are plants available in which they can be employed </s>
<s> most important of all the less developed countries must be persuaded to take the necessary steps to allocate and commit their own resources </s>
<s> they must be induced to establish the necessary tax fiscal monetary and regulatory policies </s>
<s> they must be persuaded to adopt the other necessary self-help measures which are described in the preceding section </s>
<s> the taking of these steps involves tough internal policy decisions </s>
<s> moreover once these steps are taken they may require years to make themselves felt </s>
<s> they must therefore be related to long-range development plans </s>
<s> providing an incentive </s>
<s> if the less developed countries are to be persuaded to adopt a long-term approach the united states as the principal supplier of external aid must be prepared to give long-term commitments </s>
<s> in this as in so many aspects of our development assistance activities the incentive effects of the posture we take are the most important ones </s>
<s> the extent to which we can persuade the less developed countries to appraise their own resources to set targets toward which they should be working to establish in the light of this forward perspective the most urgent priorities for their immediate attention and to do the other things which they must do to help themselves all on a realistic long-term basis will depend importantly on the incentives we place before them </s>
<s> if they feel that we are taking a long-term view of their problems and are prepared to enter into reasonably long-term association with them in their development activities they will be much more likely to undertake the difficult tasks required </s>
<s> perhaps the most important incentive for them will be clear evidence that where other countries have done this kind of home work we have responded with long-term commitments </s>
<s> then i have seen the pride of country well in the eyes of these young people </s>
<s> so i say mr speaker god bless you and keep you for many years not only for this body but for the united states of america and the free world </s>
<s> general leave to extend </s>
<s> mr mccormack </s>
<s> mr speaker i ask unanimous consent that all members who desire to do so may extend their remarks at this point in the record </s>

<s> there was no objection </s>

<s> i purposely refrained from adding the usual distinction of saying that he was from the state of texas </s>
<s> i did so because i agree with so many here today that he is the beloved speaker of all the people of the united states </s>

<s> remarks of hon wayne l hays of ohio </s>
<s> mr hays </s>
<s> it is a matter of deep personal satisfaction for me to add my voice to the great and distinguished chorus of my colleagues in this paean of praise respect and affection for speaker sam rayburn </s>
<s> in this hour of crisis the wisdom the dedication the stabilizing force that he represents in current american government is an almost indispensable source of strength </s>
<s> he has become in this half century the grand old man of american history </s>
<s> here briefly in this humble tribute i have sought for some simple and succinct summation that would define the immense service of this patriot to his country </s>
<s> but the task is beyond me because i hold it impossible to compress in a sentence or two the complicated and prodigious contributions sam rayburn has made as an individual as a legislator as a statesman and as a leader and conciliator to the majestic progress of this nation </s>
<s> it happens that i am a legislator from ohio and that i feel deeply about the needs the aspirations the interests of my district and my state </s>
<s> for sam rayburn never forgot bonham his home community and he never forgot texas </s>
<s> in the same way i like to think we owe our loyalty as legislators to our community our district our state </s>
<s> and if we follow the rayburn pattern as consciously or by an instinctual political sense i like to think i have followed it then the very nature of our loyalty to our own immediate areas must necessarily be reflected in the devotion of our services to our country </s>
<s> there is no such thing as being diligent about national affairs but indifferent about home needs </s>
<s> the two are as one </s>
<s> more than that sam rayburn is the very living symbol of an iron-clad integrity so powerful in his nature and so constantly demonstrated that he can count some of his best friends in the opposition </s>
<s> through the most rancorous battles of political controversy and the most bitterly fought national and presidential campaigns his character shines as an example of dignity and honesty forthrightness and nobility </s>
<s> sam rayburn has never had to look back at any of his most devastating fights and ever feel ashamed of his conduct as a combatant under fire or his political manners in the heat of conflicting ambitions </s>
<s> this means much to the american tradition </s>
<s> it is an answer in its way individual and highly dramatic to the charge that the democratic process is necessarily vicious in its campaign characteristics </s>
<s> and the name rayburn is one of the most dominant in the history of american politics for the last half century </s>
<s> it is i insist hard to define the rayburn contribution to our political civilization because it is so massive and so widespread and so complicated and because it goes so deep </s>
<s> but this we know here is a great life that in every area of american politics gives the american people occasion for pride and that has invested the democratic process with the most decent qualities of honor decency and self-respect </s>
<s> i pray to god that he may be spared to us for many years to come for this is an influence the united states and the whole world can ill afford to lose </s>
