<s> these societies can expect to face difficult times </s>
<s> as the historic processes of modernization gradually gain momentum their cohesion will be threatened by divisive forces the gaps between rulers and subjects town and country will widen </s>
<s> new aspirants for power will emerge whose ambitions far exceed their competence </s>
<s> old rulers may lose their nerve and their sense of direction </s>
<s> nevertheless with foresight and careful planning some of the more disruptive and dangerous consequences of social change which have troubled other countries passing through this stage can be escaped </s>
<s> the united states can help by communicating a genuine concern with the problems these countries face and a readiness to provide technical and other appropriate forms of assistance where possible </s>
<s> our central goal should be to provide the greatest positive incentive for these societies to tackle boldly the tasks which they face </s>
<s> at the same time we should recognize that the obstacles to change and the lack of cohesion and stability which characterize these countries may make them particularly prone to diversions and external adventures of all sorts </s>
<s> it may seem to some of them that success can be purchased much less dearly by fishing in the murky waters of international politics than by facing up to the intractable tasks at home </s>
<s> we should do what we can to discourage this conclusion both by offering assistance for their domestic needs and by reacting firmly to irresponsible actions on the world scene </s>
<s> when necessary we should make it clear that countries which choose to derive marginal advantages from the cold war or to exploit their potential for disrupting the security of the world will not only lose our sympathy but also risk their own prospects for orderly development </s>
<s> as a nation we feel an obligation to assist other countries in their development </s>
<s> but this obligation pertains only to countries which are honestly seeking to become responsible members of a stable and forward-moving world community </s>
<s> transitional societies </s>
<s> when we look at countries like iran iraq pakistan and burma where substantial progress has been made in creating a minimum supply of modern men and of social overhead capital and where institutions of centralized government exist we find a second category of countries with a different set of problems and hence different priorities for policy </s>
<s> the men in power are committed in principle to modernization but economic and social changes are proceeding only erratically </s>
<s> isolated enterprises have been launched but they are not yet related to each other in a meaningful pattern </s>
<s> the society is likely to be characterized by having a fairly modernized urban sector and a relatively untouched rural sector with very poor communications between the two </s>
<s> progress is impeded by psychological inhibitions to effective action among those in power and by a failure on their part to understand how local resources human and material can be mobilized to achieve the national goals of modernization already symbolically accepted </s>
<s> most countries in this second category share the difficulty of having many of the structures of a modern political and social system without the modern standards of performance required to make them effective </s>
<s> in these rapidly changing societies there is also too little appreciation of the need for effort to achieve goals </s>
<s> for example in accordance with the fashion of the times most transitional societies have announced economic development plans of varying numbers of years </s>
<s> such is the mystique of planning that people expect that fulfillment of the plan will follow automatically upon its announcement </s>
<s> the civil services in such societies are generally inadequate to deal competently with the problems facing them </s>
<s> and their members often equate a government career with security and status rather than with sacrifice self-discipline and competence </s>
<s> american policy should press constantly the view that until these governments demand efficiency and effectiveness of their bureaucracies there is not the slightest hope that they will either modernize of democratize their societies </s>
<s> we should spread the view that planning and national development are serious matters which call for effort as well as enthusiasm </s>
<s> above all we should seek to encourage the leaders of these societies to accept the unpleasant fact that they are responsible for their fates </s>
<s> only within the framework of a mature relationship characterized by honest appraisals of performance can we provide telling assistance </s>
<s> with respect to those countries whose leaders prefer to live with their illusions we can afford to wait for in time their comparative lack of progress will become clear for all to see </s>
<s> our technical assistance to these countries should place special emphasis on inducing the central governments to assume the role of advisor and guide which at an earlier stage foreign experts assumed in dealing with the central governments </s>
<s> we should encourage the governments to develop their own technical assistance to communities state and provincial governments rural communities and other smaller groups making certain that no important segment of the economy is neglected </s>
<s> simultaneously we should be underlining the interrelationships of technical progress in various fields showing how agricultural training can be introduced into education how health affects labor productivity how small business can benefit the rural farm community and above all how progress in each field relates to national progress </s>
<s> efforts such as the community development program in the philippines have demonstrated that transitional societies can work toward balanced national development </s>
<s> to achieve this goal of balanced development communications between the central government and the local communities must be such that the needs and aspirations of the people themselves are effectively taken into account </s>
<s> if modernization programs are imposed from above without the understanding and cooperation of the people they will encounter grave difficulties </s>
<s> land reform is likely to be a pressing issue in many of these countries </s>
<s> it should be american policy not only to encourage effective land reform programs but also to underline the relation of such reforms to the economic growth and modernization of the society </s>
<s> as an isolated policy land reform is likely to be politically disruptive </s>
<s> as part of a larger development effort however it may gain wide acceptance </s>
<s> it should also be recognized that the problem of rural tenancy cannot be solved by administrative decrees alone </s>
<s> land reform programs need to be supplemented with programs for promoting rural credits and technical assistance in agriculture </s>
<s> lastly governmental and private planners will at this stage begin to see large capital requirements looming ahead </s>
<s> by holding out prospects for external capital assistance the united states can provide strong incentives to prepare for the concerted economic drive necessary to achieve self-sustaining growth </s>
<s> actively modernizing societies </s>
<s> at a third stage in the modernization process are such countries as india brazil the philippines and taiwan which are ready and committed to move into the stage of self-sustaining growth </s>
<s> they must continue to satisfy basic capital needs </s>
<s> and there persists the dual problem of maintaining operational unity around a national program of modernization while simultaneously decentralizing participation in the program to wider and wider groups </s>
<s> but these countries have made big strides toward developing the necessary human and social overhead capital </s>
<s> they have established reasonably stable and effective governmental institutions at national and local levels </s>
<s> and they have begun to develop a capacity to deal realistically and simultaneously with all the major sectors of their economies </s>
<s> on the economic front the first priority of these countries is to mobilize a vastly increased volume of resources </s>
<s> several related tasks must be carried out if self-sustaining growth is to be achieved </s>
<s> these countries must formulate a comprehensive long-term program covering the objectives of both the private and the public sectors of the economy </s>
<s> they must in their planning be able to count on at least tentative commitments of foreign capital assistance over periods of several years </s>
<s> capital imports drawn from a number of sources must be employed and combined skillfully enough to permit domestic investment programming to go forward </s>
<s> capital flows must be coordinated with national needs and planning </s>
<s> finally a balance must be effected among project finance utilization of agricultural surpluses and general balance of payments support </s>
<s> thus although the agenda of external assistance in the economic sphere are cumulative and many of the policies suggested for nations in the earlier stages remain relevant the basic purpose of american economic policy during the later stages of development should be to assure that movement into a stage of self-sustaining growth is not prevented by lack of foreign exchange </s>
<s> there remain many political and administrative problems to be solved </s>
<s> for one thing although considerable numbers of men have been trained bureaucracies are still deficient in many respects </s>
<s> even the famed indian civil service is not fully adequate to the tremendous range of tasks it has undertaken </s>
<s> technical assistance in training middle- and upper-level management personnel is still needed in many cases </s>
<s> there are also more basic problems </s>
<s> this is the stage at which democratic developments must take place if the society is to become an open community of creative people </s>
<s> nevertheless impulses still exist among the ruling elite to rationalize and thus to perpetuate the need for centralized and authoritarian practices </s>
<s> another great danger is that the emerging middle class will feel itself increasingly alienated from the political leaders who still justify their dominance by reference to the struggle for independence or the early phase of nationalism </s>
<s> the capacity of intellectuals and members of the new professional classes to contribute creatively to national development is likely to be destroyed by a constraining sense of inferiority toward both their own political class and their colleagues and professional counterparts in the west </s>
<s> particularly when based upon a single dominant party governments may respond to such a situation by claiming a monopoly of understanding about the national interest </s>
<s> convinced of the wisdom of their own actions and reassured by the promises of their economic development programs governments may fail to push outward to win more and more people to the national effort becoming instead more rigid and inflexible in their policies </s>
<s> american policy toward such societies should stress our sympathy for the emerging social and professional classes </s>
<s> it should attempt to communicate both an appreciation of professional standards and an understanding of the tremendous powers and potentialities of genuinely open and pluralistic societies </s>
<s> we have every obligation to take seriously their claims to being democratic and free countries </s>
<s> we also have in consequence the duty to appraise realistically and honestly their performance and to communicate our judgments to their leaders in frank but friendly ways </s>
<s> the time factor </s>
<s> we have emphasized that the modernizing process in each society will take a considerable period of time </s>
<s> with the exception of treaty-making foreign relations were historically concerned for the most part with conditions of short or at least measurable duration </s>
<s> foreign policy now takes on a different perspective and must become skilled not merely at response but also at projection </s>
<s> american and free-world policies can marginally affect the pace of transition </s>
<s> but basically that pace depends on changes in the supply of resources and in the human attitudes political institutions and social structure which each society must generate </s>
<s> it follows that any effective policy toward the underdeveloped countries must have a realistically long working horizon </s>
<s> it must be marked by a patience and persistence which have not always been its trademark </s>
<s> this condition affects not only the conception but also the legislative and financial support of foreign policy especially in the context of economic aid </s>
<s> some of the major functions of religion </s>
<s> the place of religion in the simple preliterate societies is quite definite </s>
<s> as a complex it fits into the whole social organization and functions dominantly in every part of it </s>
<s> in societies like ours however its place is less clear and more complex </s>
<s> with the diversity of religious viewpoints there are differences of opinion as to the essential features of religion </s>
<s> and there are different opinions as to the essential functions of religion </s>
<s> nevertheless for most of the population of heterogeneous advanced societies though less for the less religious portion religion does perform certain modal individual and social functions </s>
<s> although the inner functions of religion are not of direct significance in social organization they have important indirect consequences </s>
<s> if the inner functions of religion are performed the individual is a composed ordered motivated and emotionally secure associate </s>
<s> he is not greatly frustrated and he is not anomic </s>
<s> he is better fitted to perform his social life among his fellows </s>
<s> there are several closely related inner functions </s>
<s> man is first religious </s>
<s> the instrumentalities follow </s>
<s> religion seeks to satisfy human needs of great pertinence </s>
<s> the significant things in it at the higher religious levels are the inner emotional mental and spiritual occurrences that fill the pressing human needs of self-preservation self-pacification and self-completion </s>
<s> the chief experience is the sensing of communion and in the higher religions of a harmonious relationship with the supernatural power </s>
<s> related to this is the fact that most of the higher religions define for the individual his place in the universe and give him a feeling that he is relatively secure in an ordered dependable universe </s>
<s> man has the experience of being helpfully allied with what he cannot fully understand </s>
<s> he is a coordinate part of all of the mysterious energy and being and movement </s>
<s> the universe is a safe and permanent home </s>
<s> a number of religions also satisfy for many the need of being linked with the ultimate and eternal </s>
<s> death is not permanent defeat and disappearance </s>
<s> man has a second chance </s>
<s> he is not lost in the abyss of endless time </s>
<s> he has endless being </s>
<s> religion at its best also offers the experience of spiritual fulfillment by inviting man into the highest realm of the spirit </s>
<s> there is also the possibility among higher religions of experiencing consistent meaning in life and enjoying guidance and expansiveness </s>
<s> the kind of religious experience that most moderns seek not only provides clarifies and relates human yearnings values ideals and purposes </s>
<s> it also provides facilities and incitements for the development of personality sociality and creativeness </s>
<s> under the religious impulse whether theistic or humanistic men have joy in living </s>
<s> life leads somewhere </s>
<s> at the same time that religion binds the individual helpfully to the supernatural and gives him cosmic peace and a sense of supreme fulfillment it also has great therapeutic value for him </s>
<s> it gives him aid comfort even solace in meeting mundane life situations where his own unassisted practical knowledge and skill are felt by him to be inadequate </s>
<s> he has to cope with frustration and other emotional disturbance and anomie </s>
<s> his religious beliefs provide him with plausible explanations for many conditions which cause him great concern and his religious faith makes possible fortitude equanimity and consolation enabling him to endure colossal misfortune fear frustration uncertainty suffering evil and danger </s>
<s> religion usually also includes a principle of compensation mainly in a promised perfect future state </s>
<s> the belief in immortality where held functions as a redress for the ills and disappointments of the here and now </s>
<s> the tensions accompanying a repressive consciousness of wrongdoing or sinning or some tormenting secret are relieved for the less self-contained or self-sufficient by confession repentance and penance </s>
<s> the feeling of individual inferiority defeat or humilation growing out of various social situations or individual deficiencies or failures is compensated for by communion in worship or prayer with a friendly but all-victorious father-god as well as by sympathetic fellowship with others who share this faith and by opportunities in religious acts for giving vent to emotions and energies </s>
<s> in providing for these inner individual functions religion undertakes in behalf of individual peace of mind and well-being services for which there is no other institution </s>
<s> in addition to the functions of religion within man there have always been the outer social functions for the community and society </s>
<s> the two have never been separable </s>
<s> religion is vitally necessary in both societal maintenance and regulation </s>
<s> the value-system of a community or society is always correlated with and to a degree dependent upon a more or less shared system of religious beliefs and convictions </s>
<s> the religion supports re-enforces reaffirms and maintains the fundamental values </s>
<s> even in the united states with its freedom of religious belief and worship and its vast denominational differentiation there is a general consensus regarding the basic christian values </s>
<s> this is demonstrated especially when there is awareness of radically different value orientation elsewhere </s>
<s> for example americans rally to christian values vis-a-vis those of atheistic communism </s>
<s> in america also all of our major religious bodies officially sanction a universalistic ethic which is reflective of our common religion </s>
<s> furthermore religion tends to integrate the whole range of values from the highest or ultimate values of god to the intermediary and subordinate values </s>
<s> for example those regarding material objects and pragmatic ends </s>
<s> finally it gives sanctity more than human legitimacy and even through super-empirical reference transcendent and supernatural importance to some values </s>
<s> for example marriage as a sacrament much law-breaking as sinful occasionally the state as a divine instrument </s>
<s> it places certain values at least beyond questioning and tampering </s>
<s> closely related to this function is the fact that the religious system provides a body of ultimate ends for the society which are compatible with the supreme eternal ends </s>
<s> this something leads to a conception of an over-all social plan with a meaning interpretable in terms of ultimate ends </s>
<s> for example a plan that fulfills the will of god which advances the kingdom of god which involves social life as part of the grand design </s>
<s> this explains some group ends and provides a justification of their primacy </s>
<s> it gives social guidance and direction and makes for programs of social action </s>
<s> finally it gives meaning to much social endeavor and logic consistency and meaning to life </s>
<s> in general there is no society so secularized as to be completely without religiously inspired transcendental ends </s>
<s> religion integrates and unifies </s>
<s> some of the oldest most persistent and most cohesive forms of social groupings have grown out of religion </s>
<s> these groups have varied widely from mere families primitive totemic groups and small modern cults and sects to the memberships of great denominations and great widely dispersed world religions </s>
<s> religion fosters group life in various ways </s>
<s> the common ultimate values ends and goals fostered by religion are a most important factor </s>
<s> without a system of values there can be no society </s>
<s> where such a value system prevails it always unifies all who possess it </s>
<s> it enables members of the society to operate as a system </s>
<s> the beliefs of a religion also reflecting the values are expressed in creeds dogmas and doctrines and form what durkheim calls a credo </s>
<s> as he points out a religious group cannot exist without a collective credo and the more extensive the credo the more unified and strong is the group </s>
<s> the credo unifies and socializes men by attaching them completely to an identical body of doctrine </s>
<s> the more extensive and firm the body of doctrine the firmer the group </s>
<s> the religious symbolism and especially the closely related rites and worship forms constitute a powerful bond for the members of the particular faith </s>
<s> the religion in fact is an expression of the unity of the group small or large </s>
<s> the common codes for religious action as such and in their ethical aspects for everyday moral behavior bind the devotees together </s>
<s> these are ways of jointly participating in significantly symbolized standardized and ordered religiously sanctified behavior </s>
<s> the codes are mechanism for training in and directing and enforcing uniform social interaction and for continually and publicly reasserting the solidarity of the group </s>
<s> his view is that every religion pertains to a community and conversely every community is in one aspect a religious unit </s>
<s> this is brought out in the common religious ethos that prevails even in the denominationally diverse audiences at many secular semi-public and public occasions in the united states </s>
<s> and it is evidenced in the prayers offered in the frequent religious allusions and in the confirmation of points on religious grounds </s>
<s> the unifying effect of religion is also brought out in the fact that historically peoples have clung together as more or less cohesive cultural units with religion as the dominant bond even though spatially dispersed and not politically organized </s>
<s> religion usually exercises a stabilizing-conserving function </s>
<s> as such it acts as an anchor for the people </s>
<s> there is a marked tendency for religions once firmly established to resist change not only in their own doctrines and policies and practices but also in secular affairs having religious relevance </s>
<s> it has thus been a significant factor in the conservation of social values though also in some measure an obstacle to the creation or diffusion of new ones </s>
<s> it tends to support the longstanding precious sentiments the traditional ways of thinking and the customary ways of living </s>
<s> historically religion has also functioned as a tremendous engine of vindication enforcement sanction and perpetuation of various other institutions </s>
<s> at the same time that religion exercises a conserving influence it also energizes and motivates both individuals and groups </s>
<s> much of the important individual and social action has been owing to religious incentives </s>
<s> the great ultimate ends of religion have served as magnificent beacon lights that lured people toward them with an almost irresistible force mobilizing energies and inducing sacrifices </s>
<s> for example the crusades mission efforts just wars </s>
<s> much effort has been expended in the sincere effort to apply the teaching and admonitions of religion </s>
<s> the insuperable reward systems that most religions embody have great motivating effects </s>
<s> religion provides the most attractive rewards either in this world or the next for those who not merely abide by its norms but who engage in good works </s>
<s> religion usually acts as a powerful aid in social control enforcing what men should or should not do </s>
<s> among primitive peoples the sanctions and dictates of religion were more binding than any of the other controls exercised by the group </s>
<s> and in modern societies such influence is still great </s>
<s> religion has its own supernatural prescriptions that are at the same time codes of behavior for the here and now </s>
<s> thus the lack of effective recognition of the responsibilities involved in caring for two babies showed signs of becoming a disabling problem </s>
<s> clearly this was a family in crisis </s>
<s> her previous traumatic experiences flashed through her mind as if they had happened yesterday </s>
<s> abreaction of her anxiety and guilt concerning the death of her parents when linked up with her current feelings of anger and her fears of loss abandonment and annihilation produced further relief of tension </s>
<s> as seen in the b family there must be an attempt to help the client develop conscious awareness of the problem especially in the absence of a formal request for assistance </s>
<s> the unhealthy use of denial in the initial reaction to a stress must be handled through the medium of a positive controlled transference </s>
<s> in general the approach is more active than passive more out-reaching than reflective </s>
<s> while some regression is inevitable it is discouraged rather than encouraged so that the transference does not follow the stages of planned regression associated with certain casework adaptations of the psychoanalytic model for insight therapy </s>
<s> these needs usually concern the reduction of guilt and some relief of tension </s>
<s> the initial interview must be therapeutic rather than purely exploratory in an information-seeking sense </s>
<s> in so doing he implicitly offers the positive contagion of hope as a kind of maturational dynamic to counteract feelings of helplessness and hopelessness generally associated with the first stages of stress impact </s>
<s> thus the client receives enough ego support to engage in constructive efforts on his own behalf </s>
<s> here there is a specific preventive component which applies in a more generalized sense to any casework situation </s>
<s> we are preventing or averting pathogenic phenomena such as undue regression unhealthy suppression and repression excessive use of denial and crippling guilt turned against the self </s>
<s> in steering the family toward ego-adaptive and away from maladaptive responses the worker uses time-honored focused casework techniques of specific emotional support clarification and anticipatory guidance </s>
<s> then too the utmost clinical flexibility is necessary in judiciously combining carefully timed family-oriented home visits single and group office interviews and appropriate telephone follow-up calls if the worker is to be genuinely accessible and if the predicted unhealthy outcome is to be actually averted in accordance with the principles of preventive intervention </s>
<s> at certain critical stages and only for sound diagnostic reasons it may be important to accompany family members in their use of these resources if their problem-solving behavior is to be constructive rather than defeating </s>
<s> finally whatever the techniques used a twin goal is common to all preventive casework service to cushion or reduce the force of the stress impact while at the same time to encourage and support family members to mobilize and use their ego capacities </s>
<s> we should first recognize our tendency to develop a hierarchy of values locating brief treatment at the bottom and long-term intensive service at the top instead of seeing the services as part of a continuum each important in its own right </s>
<s> this problem is perhaps as old as social casework itself </s>
<s> almost three decades ago bertha reynolds undertook a study of short-contact interviewing because of her conviction that short-term casework had an important but neglected place in our network of social services </s>
<s> thus casework involving a limited number of interviews is still to be regarded in terms of the quality of service rendered rather than of the quantity of time expended </s>
<s> that we are experiencing an upsurge of interest in the many formulations and preventive adaptations of brief treatment in social casework is evident from even a small sampling of current literature </s>
<s> for example the level of improvement noted in a recent experiment with a short course of immediate treatment for parent-child relationship problems compared favorably with the results reported by typical child guidance clinics where the hours spent in purely diagnostic study may equal or exceed the number of hours devoted to actual treatment interviews in the experimental project </s>
<s> these reports refer to a level of secondary prevention in a child guidance clinic approached by the customary route of voluntary referral by the family or by other professional people </s>
<s> in some programs treatment is concentrated over a short period of time while in others after the initial contact is established flexible spacing of interviews has been experimentally used with apparent success </s>
<s> ideally brief treatment should be arrived at as a treatment of choice rather than as a treatment of chance </s>
<s> our literature is already replete with a fantastic number of suggestions for preventive agency programming ranging from the immediately practical to the globally utopian </s>
<s> probably in the immediate future we will have to settle for middle-range efforts that fall short of utopian models </s>
<s> increased experimentation with multipurpose agencies especially those that combine afresh the traditional functions of family and child welfare services holds rich promise for the future </s>
<s> for example child welfare experience abounds with cases in which the parental request for substitute care is precipitated by a crisis event which is meaningfully linked with a fundamental unresolved problem of family relationships </s>
<s> sentiment </s>
<s> tension management and communication of sentiment are the processes involved in the functioning of the element of sentiment or feeling </s>
<s> one of the devices for tension management is preferential mating </s>
<s> the preferential mating of this particular population has been analyzed in a separate study </s>
<s> the relative geographical isolation of the brandywine population makes for a limited choice in mating </s>
<s> it would seem necessary that members of this population provide support for one another since it is not provided by the larger society </s>
<s> the supportive relations can apparently be achieved in geographical and social isolation </s>
<s> the newlyweds building homes on the same land with either set of parents and the almost exclusive use of members of the population as sponsors for baptisms and weddings illustrate this supportive relationship </s>
<s> achieving </s>
<s> maintenance of the status quo might seem to be the appropriate goal or objective of this population today </s>
<s> yet the object of the element of achieving through the process of goal attaining for this population appears to have been changed by circumstances brought about by the war </s>
<s> norms </s>
<s> the process of evaluation assigns varying positive and negative priorities or values to elements </s>
<s> the elements and processes become evident in a study of mate selection in this population </s>
<s> core - marginal marriages still belong in the category of permissive unions </s>
<s> status-roles </s>
<s> the element of status-roles and associated processes have not been sufficiently investigated for this population to permit any type of conjectures about them </s>
<s> power </s>
<s> there is some indication from a limited number of interviews with members of the population that the element of power primarily the voluntary influence of non-authoritative power has been exerted on actors in the system particularly in regard to mate selection </s>
<s> again size of the group may have some influence on the strength of group controls </s>
<s> ranking </s>
<s> interviews with members of the brandywine population were attempted in order to discover the ranking of the various families in the population </s>
<s> the large majority of the interviewees placed core families in the upper positions </s>
<s> loomis considers ranking a product of the evaluation process </s>
<s> despite the increasing rate of exogamous marriages the population has been able to sustain at least to some degree the consciousness of its intermediate status in society </s>
<s> the adherence of many in the population to the indian background in their pedigree and emphasis upon the fact that their ancestors had never been slaves becomes of prime interest in determining how far these elements promote the self-image of the intermediate status of the group in society </s>
<s> sanctions </s>
<s> the negative sanctions applied to core - negro marriages for core members act as indicators of expected adherence to group norms </s>
<s> however because of church laws lately more stringently enforced which forbid the marriage of cousins closely related consanguineously a means of facilitating the goal of in-group relations may be that of recourse to illegitimate unions </s>
<s> a cursory survey of available material indicates a high rate of illegitimate births occurring to parents who have a close consanguineous relationship </s>
<s> subsystems </s>
<s> the comprehensive or master processes activate all or some of the elements within the social system and subsystems </s>
<s> within the larger social system are the structural and functional subsystems </s>
<s> subgroups of various types interconnected by relational norms </s>
<s> regulative norms governing subgroups and roles </s>
<s> cultural values </s>
<s> subgroups of various types have been found within this system </s>
<s> each family line can be considered a substructure </s>
<s> there seems to be an implied cultural value attached to the fact of core status within the group </s>
<s> additionally the proscription of core - negro marriages for core families discussed above would seem to act as a regulative norm governing subgroups and roles </s>
<s> the scope of this study does not provide for the study of roles of various types within the larger system or within the subgroups </s>
<s> however it cannot be presumed informal though the structure of the population seems that there are not well-defined roles within the system </s>
<s> the present study relates to the theory of functional systems </s>
<s> it is hypothesized that fertility is a function of the social system when the population as a whole is considered and a function of the subsystems when the two-fold division of core families and marginal families is considered </s>
<s> the four functional problems of a social system are to some extent solved by the subsystems within this population </s>
<s> by means of geographical isolation and high fertility rates inbreeding can be fostered and the pattern of isolation from the greater society maintained </s>
<s> in order to attain the goal of group solidarity and to relieve tension the high fertility rate provides more group members for mate selection and the clustering of members in groups fosters acceptance of group controls </s>
<s> as mentioned above where families are concentrated in larger numbers group controls seem strongest and most effective </s>
<s> adaptation to the social and non-social environment through the economy has been met to a degree through a type of occupational segregation </s>
<s> this provides the necessary contact with the larger society while supporting a type of control over members in terms of social contacts </s>
<s> the problem of solidarity and morale again involves the concept of values </s>
<s> the values placed by the brandywine population upon maintaining a certain homogeneity a certain separate racial identity and therefore a certain separate social status are important for the morale of the system </s>
<s> since morale is closely related to pattern maintenance and integration the higher the morale and solidarity the better the system can solve the problems of the system </s>
<s> in this respect it would seem that the greater the social distance between the brandywine population and the white and negro populations within the same general locality the greater the possibility for higher morale and solidarity within the brandywine population </s>
<s> it is conceived that one of the means to attain this social distance is that of physical and social isolation </s>
<s> in turn higher fertility rates for this population provide a means of increasing the numerical quantity of the population allowing for the possibility of greater stability and unity </s>
<s> the population can thereby replenish itself and actually grow larger </s>
<s> master processes </s>
<s> of particular utility in the analysis of the development persistence and change of social systems has been the use of the master or comprehensive processes </s>
<s> loomis considers six such processes in his paradigm </s>
<s> communication </s>
<s> boundary maintenance </s>
<s> systemic linkage </s>
<s> socialization </s>
<s> social control </s>
<s> institutionalization though undoubtedly all six processes are operative within the whole social system and its subsystems two processes that are of crucial importance to this study will be singled out for particular emphasis </s>
<s> communication </s>
<s> communication may be facilitated by means of the high visibility within the larger community </s>
<s> intense interaction is easier where segregated living and occupational segregation mark off a group from the rest of the community as in the case of this population </s>
<s> however the factor of physical isolation is not a static situation </s>
<s> urbanization appears to be an important factor in the disintegration of this group </s>
<s> this conclusion is however an over-simplification </s>
<s> a more realistic analysis must take into account the fact that brandywine people in the urban-fringe area are in general less segregated locally than group members in rural areas </s>
<s> in the urban area in other words they unlike some urban ethnic groups do not concentrate in ghetto colonies </s>
<s> group pressures toward conformity are slight or non-existent and deviant behavior in mate selection incurs few if any social sanctions </s>
<s> in such a setting social contacts and associations are likely to be heterogamous resulting in a change of values and almost necessarily in mate selection behavior </s>
<s> social control </s>
<s> by means of this social control deviance is either eliminated or somehow made compatible with the function of the social group </s>
<s> examples from this population indicate that deviance seems to be sanctioned by ostracism from the group </s>
<s> socialization </s>
<s> there is an oral tradition among the members of the population in regard to the origin and subsequent separate status of the group in the larger society </s>
<s> confused and divided though this tradition may be it is an important part of the social and cultural heritage of the group and acts as a means of socialization particularly for members of the rural community </s>
<s> boundary maintenance </s>
<s> the process of boundary maintenance identifies and preserves the social system or subsystems and the characteristic interaction is maintained </s>
<s> the fertility rate pattern would seem to be a function though a latent one of the process of maintaining the boundary </s>
<s> it is also expressed in the proscription against deviants in the matter of endogamy particularly in rural areas </s>
<s> by their pattern of endogamy and exogamy the core families and the marginal families show distinct limits to the intergroup contact they maintain </s>
<s> systemic linkage </s>
<s> but specific procedures for carrying out this plan were left to the discretion of the provincial governors </s>
<s> tribal authorities the chiefs and their secretaries were held responsible for maintaining the registers of indigenous persons within their territories under the general supervision of district officials </s>
<s> the district officials along with their other duties were obliged to organize special demographic inquiries in selected areas and to supervise the annual tabulations of demographic statistics </s>
<s> additional entries must be made from time to time </s>
<s> different cards are used for males and females and a corner is clipped from the cards of adults and of children when they reach puberty </s>
<s> so a quick count could be made at any time even by an illiterate clerk of the number of registered persons in four age-and-sex classes </s>
<s> personal identification cards are issued to all adult males on which tax payments inoculations periods of employment and changes of residence are recorded </s>
<s> each adult is held personally responsible for assuring his inscription and obtaining an identification card which must be shown on demand </s>
<s> the registration card of a person leaving his home territory for a short period is put into a special file for absent persons </s>
<s> the cards of permanent out-migrants are in theory sent to an office in the place of new residence </s>
<s> finally the registration of births and deaths by nearest relatives was made compulsory in most regions </s>
<s> numbers of registered persons in four age-and-sex classes were counted each year </s>
<s> the results of these inquiries were used to adjust compilations of data from the registers and to provide various ratios and rates by districts including birth and death rates general fertility rates distributions by marital status fertility of wives separately in polygynous and non-polygynous households infant mortality and migration </s>
<s> the areas to be examined in these inquiries were selected by local officials supposedly as representative of a larger population </s>
<s> averages of the ratios obtained in a few selected areas were applied to the larger population </s>
<s> the scheme in theory is an ingenious adaptation of european registration systems to the conditions of african life </s>
<s> the sampling program was instituted before the principles of probability sampling were widely recognized in population studies </s>
<s> the system was not well adapted to conditions of life in urban centers </s>
<s> so the results are subject to considerable confusion </s>
<s> the system tended to break down during the war but was reactivated </s>
<s> but the information on the dynamics of population was often quite misleading </s>
<s> the same system with minor modifications was developed in ruanda-urundi under belgian administration </s>
<s> here again it seems that useful approximations of the size and geographical distribution of the population were obtained in this way in the late pre-war and early post-war periods </s>
<s> before considering more recent activities we should note another important aspect of demography in belgian africa </s>
<s> a number of strong independent agencies established in some cases with governmental or royal support have conducted large medical social educational and research operations in particular parts of the congo and ruanda-urundi </s>
<s> somewhat similar investigations have been made by medical officers in other areas </s>
<s> other independent or partially independent agencies have promoted investigations on topics directly or indirectly related to demography </s>
<s> these studies vary widely in scope and precision </s>
<s> the results are now being analyzed </s>
<s> statistics have been recognized as a matter of strategic importance in the congo and in ruanda-urundi during the post-war years in connection with long-term economic and social programs </s>
<s> the aimo organizations of both countries which maintain administrative services throughout the territories retained immediate responsibility for the collection and publication of demographic information </s>
<s> however the statistical offices of both governments were assigned responsibility for the planning and analysis of these statistics </s>
<s> eventually responsibility for demographic inquiries in the congo was transferred to the demographic division of the central statistical office </s>
<s> we will deal first with the program in the congo though this was put into operation later than the other </s>
<s> the radical nature of the innovation in the congo was not emphasized in the official announcements </s>
<s> the term enquetes demographiques previously used for the supplementary investigations carried out in connection with the administrative censuses was used for the new investigations </s>
<s> however the differences in procedure are fundamental </s>
<s> these teams carried out the same operations successively in different areas </s>
<s> sample areas in the new investigations were selected strictly by application of the principles of probability theory so as to be representative of the total population of defined areas within calculable limits </s>
<s> in short scientific sampling was introduced in place of subjective sampling </s>
<s> different sampling ratios were applied under different conditions </s>
<s> higher proportions were sampled in urban and mixed communities than in rural areas </s>
<s> uniform questions definitions and procedures were enforced throughout the whole country </s>
<s> the population registration system still has important functions </s>
<s> it supplies local data which are useful in administration and which can be used as a basis for intensive studies in particular situations </s>
<s> it provides a frame for the sampling census </s>
<s> it is still used in making current population estimates in post-census years though the value of these estimates is open to question </s>
<s> finally it may have certain very important less obvious values </s>
<s> the quality of the census data can therefore be greatly improved by the use of the registration records in conjunction with the field inquiries </s>
<s> it is proposed that in the future complete sampling censuses be carried out at five-year intervals </s>
<s> other reports in identical form but with somewhat varying content have been issued </s>
<s> these area reports will be followed according to present plans by a summary report which will include a detailed statement on methods </s>

<s> guilford-martin personality inventories </s>
<s> guilford-martin </s>
<s> these were the same subjects who were given the rorschach test </s>
<s> some predictions had been made concerning factors r n i and co on these inventories which appeared to be directly related to control and security aspects of personality functioning which were hypothesized as being of importance in differential kohnstamm reactivity </s>

<s> level </s>
<s> discussion </s>
<s> individual differences </s>
<s> individual differences in kohnstamm reactivity to controlled kohnstamm situations were found among the subjects used in the study </s>
<s> among this latter group there were also differences in the amount and kind of information necessary before a shift in reaction occurred </s>
<s> one subject changed when given only the information that some people have something happen to their arm when they relax </s>
<s> those who responded with an arm-elevation in the naive state did not change their reaction when told that there were some normal people who did not react in this fashion </s>
<s> this information was accepted with the frequent interpretation that those persons who did not show arm-levitation must be preventing it </s>
<s> these subjects implied that they too could prevent their arms from rising if they tried </s>
<s> in no way either verbally or behaviorally did the experimenter indicate to the subjects any preferred mode of responding to the voluntary contraction </s>
<s> moreover when the experimenter did inform those subjects that there were some normal people who did not have their arm rise once they relaxed the kohnstamm-positive subjects were uninfluenced in their subsequent reactions to the kohnstamm situation </s>
<s> they continued to give an arm-elevation </s>
<s> a differential suggestibility would have to be invoked to explain the failure of this additional information to influence the kohnstamm-positive reactors and yet attribute their naive kohnstamm reactivity to suggestion </s>
<s> while they were told that there were some normal people who reacted differently than they had they were also informed that there were other normals who reacted as they had </s>
<s> they were not free to be themselves in this situation an interpersonal one where there was an observer of their reactions and they had no guide for acceptable behavior </s>
<s> while other conditions might be even more effective in bringing about a change from immobility to mobility in kohnstamm reactivity it is our hypothesis that all such conditions would have as a common factor the capacity to induce an attitude in the subject which enabled him to divorce himself temporarily from feelings of responsibility for his behavior </s>
<s> this subject who has been undergoing psychoanalytic psychotherapy for five years did not give a positive kohnstamm reaction under any of the four standardized conditions used in this experiment while sober </s>
<s> after two drinks containing alcohol her arm flew upward very freely </s>
<s> there was evident delight on the part of the subject in response to her experience of the freedom of movement </s>
<s> she ascribed her delight with both experiences to the effect they seemed to have of temporarily removing from her the controls which she felt so compulsively necessary to maintain even when it might seem appropriate to relax these controls </s>
<s> these suggested interpretations were given by the subjects spontaneously when they were told that there were people who reacted differently than they had </s>
<s> the kohnstamm-positive subjects described the vivid experience of having their arms rise as one in which they exercised no control </s>
<s> they explained its absence in others on the basis of an intervention of control factors </s>
<s> they felt that they too could counteract the upward arm movement by a voluntary effort after they had once experienced the reaction </s>
<s> this subject was one who gave an arm-elevation on the second trial in the naive state but not in the first </s>
<s> she had felt that her arm wanted to go up in the first trial but had consciously prevented it from so doing </s>
<s> in contrast to this voluntary-control explanation for nonreactivity given by the kohnstamm-positive subjects the kohnstamm-negative subjects offered an involuntary-control hypothesis to explain nonreactivity </s>
<s> they felt that they were relaxing as much as they could and that any control factors which might be present to prevent response must be on an unconscious level </s>
<s> the above discussion does not mean to imply that control factors were completely in abeyance in the kohnstamm-positive subjects </s>
<s> but rather that they could be diminished sufficiently not to interfere with arm-levitation </s>
<s> she then described her experience as one in which she first had difficulty accepting for herself a state of being in which she relinquished control </s>
<s> however she was able to relax and yield to the moment </s>
<s> it is our hypothesis that kohnstamm-positive subjects are less hesitant about relinquishing control than are kohnstamm-negative subjects </s>
<s> that they can give up their control and allow themselves to be reactors rather than actors </s>
<s> it is our belief that this readiness to relinquish some control was evidenced by the kohnstamm-positive subjects in some of the other experimental situations to be discussed below </s>
<s> thus this readiness to relax controls evidenced in the kohnstamm situation appears to be a more general personality factor </s>
<s> aniseikonic illusion </s>
<s> the kohnstamm-positive subjects seemed to be freer to experience the unusual and seemingly impossible in the external world </s>
<s> there was a significantly greater number in this group who reported a desk as being in a tilted position while a tennis ball resting on it remained stationary on the incline </s>
<s> this occurred in spite of the rational awareness that the ball should be going downhill </s>
<s> they knew that their perceptual experience differed from objective reality since they had seen the desk and ball prior to putting on the aniseikonic lenses </s>
<s> yet they were not so bound by past experience and constriction as to deny their immediate perceptions and to be dominated by their knowledge of what the experience should be </s>
<s> the change in perceptions by some of the kohnstamm-negative subjects after they had been informed of the possibilities of normal reactions suggests that their constriction and guardedness is associated with their general mode of responding to strange or unknown situations </s>
<s> they were able to experience at first in terms of past conventionality </s>
<s> when informed as to the various possibilities of normal reactions they were then able to experience the uniqueness of the present </s>
<s> it might be postulated that these subjects are unduly afraid of being wrong </s>

<s> control of socioeconomic status </s>
<s> it would have been desirable for the two communities to have differed only in respect to the variable being investigated the degree of structure in teaching method </s>
<s> the structured schools were in an industrial city with three-family tenement houses typical of the residential areas but with one rather sizable section of middle-class homes </s>
<s> the unstructured schools were in a large suburban community predominantly middle- to upper-middle class but fringed by an industrial area </s>
<s> in order to equate the samples on socioeconomic status we chose schools in both cities on the basis of socioeconomic status of the neighborhoods </s>
<s> school principals and guidance workers made ratings of the various neighborhoods and the research team made independent observations of houses and dwelling areas </s>
<s> an objective scale was developed for rating school neighborhoods from these data </s>

<s> subjects </s>
<s> individual differences in maturation and the development of readiness for learning to read indicate that not until the third grade have most children had ample opportunity to demonstrate their capacity for school achievement </s>
<s> therefore third-grade children were chosen as subjects for this study </s>
<s> the subjects for this study were randomly selected from stratified areas of the distribution one-third as underachievers one-third medium and one-third over-achievers </s>
<s> children whose reading scores were at least one standard deviation below the regression line of each total third-grade school population were considered under-achievers for the purposes of sample selection </s>
<s> over-achievers were at least one standard deviation above the regression line in their school system </s>
<s> the final sample was not significantly different from a normal distribution in regard to reading achievement or intelligence test scores </s>
<s> administrative restrictions necessitated the smaller sample size in the structured schools </s>
<s> it was assumed that the sampling procedure was purely random with respect to the personality variables under investigation </s>
<s> rating scale of compulsivity </s>
<s> an interview schedule of open-ended questions and a multiple-choice questionnaire were prepared and one parent of each of the sample children was seen in the home </s>
<s> the rating scale of compulsivity was constructed by first perusing the interview records categorizing all evidence related to compulsivity then arranging a distribution of such information apart from the case records </s>
<s> final ratings were made on the basis of a point system which was developed after studying the distributions of actual behaviors recorded and assigning weight values to each type of behavior that was deviant from the discovered norms </s>
<s> children scoring high in compulsivity were those who gave evidence of tension or emotionality in situations where there was lack of organization or conformity to standards and expectations or who made exaggerated efforts to achieve these goals </s>
<s> the low compulsive child was one who appeared relatively unconcerned about such matters </s>
<s> measurement of anxiety </s>
<s> castaneda et al revised the taylor anxiety scale for use with children </s>
<s> the taylor scale was adapted from the minnesota multiphastic personality inventory with item selection based upon clinical definitions of anxiety </s>
<s> there is much research evidence to validate the use of the instrument in differentiating individuals who are likely to manifest anxiety in varying degrees </s>
<s> although the taylor scale was designed as a group testing device in this study it was individually administered by psychologically trained workers who established rapport and assisted the children in reading the items </s>
<s> relationship of anxiety to compulsivity </s>
<s> the question may be raised whether or not we are dealing with a common factor in anxiety and compulsivity </s>
<s> the two ratings yield a correlation of which is not significantly different from zero </s>
<s> therefore we have measured two different characteristics </s>
<s> in theory compulsive behavior is a way of diminishing anxiety and one might expect a negative association except for the possibility that for many children the obsessive-compulsive defenses are not sufficient to quell the amount of anxiety they suffer </s>
<s> the issue of interaction between anxiety and compulsivity will be taken up later </s>
<s> criterion measurement </s>
<s> in establishing criterion measurements it was therefore thought best to broaden the scope beyond the reading act itself </s>
<s> the predicted interaction effect should if potent extend its influence over all academic achievement </s>
<s> the stanford achievement test form j was administered by classroom teachers consisting of a battery of six sub-tests paragraph meaning word meaning spelling language arithmetic computation and arithmetic reasoning </s>
<s> all of these sub-tests involve reading except arithmetic computation </s>
<s> scores are stated in grade-equivalents on a national norm </s>
<s> the battery median grade-equivalent was used in data analysis in this study </s>
<s> the wechsler intelligence scale for children was administered to each sample third-grade child by a clinical worker </s>
<s> therefore in the investigation of the present hypothesis it was necessary to control this factor </s>
<s> the criterion score used in the statistical analysis is an index of over- or under-achievement </s>
<s> it is the discrepancy between the actual attained achievement test score and the score that would be predicted by the iq </s>
<s> in this manner the factors measured by the intelligence test were controlled allowing discovered differences in achievement to be interpreted as resulting from other variables </s>
<s> results </s>
<s> test of interaction of compulsivity and teaching methods </s>
<s> no significant difference was found in achievement between high and low compulsive children within the unstructured school </s>
<s> the hypothesis of there being an interaction between compulsivity and teaching method was supported in this case at the level </s>
<s> while we had expected that compulsive children in the unstructured school setting would have difficulty when compared to those in the structured we were surprised to find that the achievement of the high compulsives within the schools where the whole-word method is used in beginning reading compares favorably with that of the low compulsives </s>
<s> indeed their achievement scores were somewhat better on an absolute basis although the difference was not significant </s>
<s> possibly their compulsivity was not strong enough to cause them to build their own structure </s>
<s> our conjecture is then that regardless of the manner in which school lessons are taught the compulsive child accentuates those elements of each lesson that aid him in systematizing his work </s>
<s> when helped by a high degree of structure in lesson presentation then and only then does such a child attain unusual success </s>
<s> test of interaction of anxiety and teaching methods </s>
<s> the interaction effect which is significant at the level can be seen best in the contrast of mean scores </s>
<s> the most striking aspect of the interaction demonstrated is the marked decrement in performance suffered by the highly anxious children in unstructured schools </s>
<s> according to the theory proposed this is a consequence of the severe condition of perceived threat that persists unabated for the anxious child in an ambiguous sort of school environment </s>
<s> the fact that such threat is potent in the beginning reading lessons is thought to be a vital factor in the continued pattern of failure or under-achievement these children exhibit </s>
<s> the child with high anxiety may first direct his anxiety-released energy toward achievement but because his distress severely reduces the abilities of discrimination and memorization of complex symbols the child may fail in his initial attempts to master the problem </s>
<s> failure confirms the threat and the intensity of anxiety is increased as the required learning becomes more difficult so that by the time the child reaches the third grade the decrement in performance is pronounced </s>
<s> the individual with high anxiety in the structured classroom may approach the learning task with the same increased energy and lowered powers of discrimination </s>
<s> but the symbols he is asked to learn are simple </s>
<s> as shown earlier the highly anxious individual may be superior in his memorizing of simple elements </s>
<s> success reduces the prospect of threat and his powers of discrimination are improved </s>
<s> by the time the child first attacks the actual problem of reading he is completely familiar and at ease with all of the elements of words </s>
<s> apparently academic challenge in the structured setting creates an optimum of stress so that the child with high anxiety is able to achieve because he is aroused to an energetic state without becoming confused or panicked </s>
<s> sarason et al present evidence that the anxious child will suffer in the test-like situation and that his performance will be impaired unless he receives supporting and accepting treatment from the teacher </s>
<s> although the present study was not a direct replication of their investigations the results do not confirm their conclusion </s>
<s> observers in the two school systems studied here judged the teachers in the structured schools to be more impersonal and demanding while the atmosphere in the unstructured schools was judged to be more supporting and accepting </s>
<s> yet the highly anxious child suffered a tremendous disadvantage only in the unstructured school and performed as well or better than average in the structured setting </s>
<s> analysis </s>
<s> analysis means the evaluation of subparts the comparative ratings of parts the comprehension of the meaning of isolated elements </s>
<s> analysis in roleplaying is usually done for the purpose of understanding strong and weak points of an individual or as a process to eliminate weak parts and strengthen good parts </s>
<s> impersonal purposes </s>
<s> up to this point stress has been placed on roleplaying in terms of individuals </s>
<s> roleplaying can be done for quite a different purpose to evaluate procedures regardless of individuals </s>
<s> for example a sales presentation can be analyzed and evaluated through roleplaying </s>
<s> examples </s>
<s> let us now put some flesh on the theoretical bones we have assembled by giving illustrations of roleplaying used for evaluation and analysis </s>
<s> one should keep in mind that many of the exciting possiblities of roleplaying are largely unexplored and have not been used in industry to the extent that they have been in military and other areas </s>
<s> evaluation </s>
<s> the president of a small firm selling restaurant products had considerable difficulty in finding suitable salesmen for his business </s>
<s> in place of asking salesmen to fill questionnaires checking their references interviewing them asking them to be tried out he told them he would prefer to test them </s>
<s> each person was to enter the testing room carrying a suitcase of samples </s>
<s> each salesman was to read a sheet containing a description of the product </s>
<s> in the testing room he was to make successively three presentations to three different people </s>
<s> in the testing room three of the veteran salesmen served as antagonists </s>
<s> one handled the salesman in a friendly manner another in a rough manner and the third in a hesitating manner </s>
<s> each was told to purchase material if he felt like it </s>
<s> the antagonists came in one at a time and did not see or hear the other presentations </s>
<s> after each presentation the antagonist wrote his judgment of the salesmen </s>
<s> and so did the observers consisting of the president three of his salesmen and a psychologist </s>
<s> ten salesmen were tested in the morning and ten more in the afternoon </s>
<s> this procedure was repeated one day a month for four months </s>
<s> the batting average of one success out of seven increased to one out of three </s>
<s> the president of the firm calculating expenses alone felt his costs had dropped one-half while success in selection had improved over one hundred per cent </s>
<s> another use of roleplaying for evaluation illustrates how this procedure can be used in real life situations without special equipment or special assistants during the daily course of work </s>
<s> the position of receptionist was opened in a large office and an announcement was made to the other girls already working that they could apply for this job which had higher prestige and slightly higher salary than typing and clerking positions </s>
<s> all applicants were generally familiar with the work of the receptionist </s>
<s> somewhat to his surprise he found that one girl whom he would never have considered for the job since she had appeared somewhat mousy and also had been in the office a relatively short time did the most outstanding job of playing the role of receptionist showing wit sparkle and aplomb </s>
<s> she was hired and was found to be entirely satisfactory when she played the role eight hours a day </s>
<s> analysis </s>
<s> in considering roleplaying for analysis we enter a more complex area since we are now no longer dealing with a simple over-all decision but rather with the examination and evaluation of many elements seen in dynamic functioning </s>
<s> some cases in evidence of the use of roleplaying for analysis may help explain the procedure </s>
<s> an engineer had been made the works manager of a firm supplanting a retired employee who had been considered outstandingly successful </s>
<s> however he turned out to be a complete failure in his new position </s>
<s> he seemed to antagonize everyone </s>
<s> turnover rates of personnel went up production dropped and morale was visibly reduced </s>
<s> despite the fact that he was regarded as an outstanding engineer he seemed to be a very poor administrator although no one quite knew what was wrong with him </s>
<s> he played a number of typical situations before observers other supervisors who kept notes and then explained to him in detail what he did they thought was wrong </s>
<s> entirely concerned with efficiency he was merciless in criticizing people who made mistakes condemning them to too great an extent </s>
<s> the entire group of managers explained in great detail a number of human relations errors that he made </s>
<s> one by one these errors were discussed and one by one he rejected accepting them as errors </s>
<s> he admitted his behavior and defended it </s>
<s> after the diagnosing he left the course convinced that it could do him no good </s>
<s> we may say that his problem was diagnosed but that he refused treatment </s>
<s> we may say that his attitude was foolish since he may have been a success had he learned some human relations skills </s>
<s> or we may say that his attitude was commendable showing his independence of mind in his refusal to adjust to the opinions of others </s>
<s> in any case he refused to accept the implications of the analysis that he needed to be made over </s>
<s> another case may be given in illustration of a successful use of analysis and also of the employment of a procedure for intensive analysis </s>
<s> in a course for supermarket operators a district manager who had been recently appointed to his position after being outstandingly successful as a store manager found that in supervising other managers he was having a difficult time </s>
<s> on playing some typical situations before a jury of his peers he showed some characteristics rated as unsatisfactory </s>
<s> in short as frequently happens in analyses the individual feels threatened and defends himself </s>
<s> however in this case the district manager was led to see the errors of his ways </s>
<s> the necessary step between diagnosis and training is acceptance of the validity of the criticisms </s>
<s> how this was accomplished may be described since this sometimes is a crucial problem </s>
<s> these errors were then collected and written on a blackboard condensing similar ideas </s>
<s> eighteen errors were located and then the director asked each individual to vote whether or not they felt that this manager had made the particular errors </s>
<s> the manager sat behind the group so he could see and count the hands that went up and the director wrote the numbers on the blackboard </s>
<s> no comments were made during the voting </s>
<s> the results looked as follows af </s>
<s> the first eight of these eighteen statements which received at least one-half of the votes were duplicated to form an analysis checklist for the particular manager and when this particular manager roleplayed in other situations the members checked any items that appeared </s>
<s> summary </s>
<s> we can see others more clearly than we can see ourselves and others can see us better than we see ourselves </s>
<s> to learn what we do is the first step for improvement </s>
<s> to accept the validity of the judgments of others is the second step </s>
<s> to want to change is the third step </s>
<s> to practice new procedures under guided supervision and with constant feedback is the fourth step </s>
<s> to use these new ways in daily life is the last step </s>
<s> roleplaying used for analysis follows these general steps leading to training </s>
<s> when an evaluative situation is set up and no concern is with the details that lead to an over-all estimate we say that roleplaying is used for evaluation </s>
<s> observers can see a person engaged in spontaneous behavior and watch him operating in a totalistic fashion </s>
<s> while roleplaying for testing is not too well understood at the present time it represents one of the major uses of this procedure </s>
<s> the objective of this chapter is to clarify the distinctions between spontaneity theory and other training concepts </s>
<s> in addition the basic approach utilized in applying roleplaying will be reviewed </s>
<s> the goal will be to provide the reader with an integrated rationale to aid him in applying roleplaying techniques in this unique training area </s>
<s> the reasons for extracting this particular roleplaying application from the previous discussion of training are twofold </s>
<s> spontaneity training theory is unique and relatively new </s>
<s> the content of his words may lapse back into monotonous repetition as if a phonograph needle were stuck in one groove </s>
<s> only seldom is it so simple as to be a matter of his obviously parroting some timeworn axiom common to our culture which he has evidently heard over and over from a parent until he experiences it as part of him </s>
<s> one hebephrenic woman often became submerged in what felt to me like a somehow phony experience of pseudo-emotion during which despite her wracking sobs and streaming cheeks i felt only a cold annoyance with her </s>
<s> at first i did not know what she meant </s>
<s> i thought she must be seeing me as some one who had just come from seeing her grandmother in their distant home-city </s>
<s> then i realized that she had been deliberately showing me this time what granny was like </s>
<s> and when i replied in this spirit she corroborated my hunch </s>
<s> i could evoke no further elaboration from her about this </s>
<s> again i at first misconstrued this disconcertingly intense communication and i quickly cast through my mind to account for her being able to speak with such utter conviction of an opinion held by my father now several years deceased </s>
<s> she looked confused at this and i felt sure it had been a wrong response for me to make </s>
<s> she clearly agreed that this had been the case </s>
<s> i realized now that she had been showing me in what impressed me as being a very accurate way something her mother had once said to her </s>
<s> it was as if she was showing me one of the reasons why she hated that woman inside her </s>
<s> what had been an unmanageably powerful introject was now despite its continuing charge of energy disconcerting to me sufficiently within control of her ego that she could use it to show me what this introjected mother was like </s>
<s> earlier this woman had been so filled with a chaotic variety of introjects that at times when she was in her room alone it would sound to a passerby as though there were several different persons in the room as she would vocalize in various kinds of voice </s>
<s> particularly hard for the therapist to grasp are those instances in which the patient is manifesting an introject traceable to something in the therapist some aspect of the therapist of which the latter is himself only poorly aware and the recognition of which as a part of himself he finds distinctly unwelcome </s>
<s> i have found time and again that some bit of particularly annoying and intractable behavior on the part of a patient rests in the final analysis on this basis </s>
<s> another patient a paranoid woman for many months infuriated not only me but the ward-personnel and her fellow patients by arrogantly behaving as though she owned the whole building as though she were the only person in it whose needs were to be met </s>
<s> condensation </s>
<s> here a variety of meanings and emotions are concentrated or reduced in their communicative expression to some comparatively simple-seeming verbal or nonverbal statement </s>
<s> one finds for example that a terse and stereotyped verbal expression seeming at first to be a mere hollow convention reveals itself over the months of therapy as the vehicle for expressing the most varied and intense feelings and the most unconventional of meanings </s>
<s> one cannot assume of course that all these accumulated meanings were inherent in the stereotype at the beginning of the therapy or at any one time later on when the stereotype was uttered </s>
<s> but it is true that the therapist can sense when he hears this stereotype that there are at this moment many emotional determinants at work in it a blurred babel of indistinct voices which have yet to become clearly delineated from one another </s>
<s> a hebephrenic man used to give a repetitious wave of his hand a number of times during his largely-silent hours with his therapist </s>
<s> of all the possible forms of nonverbal expression that which seems best to give release and communicational expression to complex and undifferentiated feelings is laughter </s>
<s> and which more often than all these conveys a welter of feelings which could in no way be conveyed by any number of words words which are so unlike this welter in being formed and discrete from one another </s>
<s> in working with these patients the therapist eventually gets to do some at least private mulling over of the possible meaning of a belch or the passage of flatus not only because he is reduced to this for lack of anything else to analyze but also because he learns that even these animal-like sounds constitute forms of communication in which from time to time quite different things are being said long before the patient can become sufficiently aware of these as distinct feelings and concepts to say them in words </s>
<s> thus he may be referring to some concrete thing or incident in his immediate environment by some symbolic-sounding hyperbolic reference to transcendental events on the global scene </s>
<s> of such hidden meanings the patient himself is more often than not entirely unaware </s>
<s> his subjective experience may be a remarkably concretistic one </s>
<s> a borderline schizophrenic young man told me that to him the various theoretical concepts about which he had been expounding in a most articulate fashion during session after session with me were like great cubes of almost tangibly solid matter up in the air above him </s>
<s> as he spoke i was reminded of the great bales of cargo which are swung high in the air from a docked steamship </s>
<s> a significant reduction in the voume of store information is thus realized especially for a highly inflected language such as russian </s>
<s> for english the reduction in size is less striking </s>
<s> the logical scheme used to accomplish the former influences the placement of information in the dictionary file </s>
<s> implementation of the latter requires storage of information needed only for synthesis </s>
<s> we suggest the application of certain data-processing techniques as a solution to the problem </s>
<s> we propose a method for selecting only dictionary information required by the text being translated and a means for passing the information directly to the occurrences in text </s>
<s> we accomplish this by compiling a list of text forms as text is read by the computer </s>
<s> a random-storage scheme based on the spelling of forms provides an economical way to compile this text-form list </s>
<s> dictionary forms found to match forms in the text list are marked </s>
<s> a location in the computer store is also named for each marked form </s>
<s> dictionary information about the form stored at this location can be retrieved directly by occurrences of the form in text </s>
