<s> in such circumstances it may well be to the advantage of the industry to allow an increase in the basic wage rate </s>
<s> since marginal costs rise when the wage rate rises the profit-maximizing price also rises when the public-limit price is elevated and is likely to remain well above the latter </s>
<s> the entry-limiting price will also be raised for potential domestic competition but unless general inflation permits profit margins to increase proportionately throughout the economy we might expect the public-limit price to approach the entry-limit price </s>
<s> the foreign-entry-limit price would be approached more rapidly since domestic wage-rates do not enter foreign costs directly </s>
<s> the extent to which the public-limit price is raised by a given increase in the basic wage rate is itself a function of three things the passage of time the level of gnp and the size of the wage increase </s>
<s> we are abstracting from the fact of strikes here but it should be obvious that the extent to which the public-limit price is raised by a given increase in the basic wage rate is also a function of the show of resistance put up by the industry </s>
<s> as a strike continues these parties increase their pressure on the industry to reach an agreement </s>
<s> they become increasingly willing to accept the price increase that the industry claims the wage bargain would entail </s>
<s> thus the public-limit price is raised further by a given wage increase the longer it has been since the previous price increase </s>
<s> notice however that the passage of time does not permit the raising of prices per se without an accompanying wage increase </s>
<s> similarly higher levels of gnp do not in themselves provide grounds for raising prices but they do relax some of the pressure on the industry so that it can raise prices higher for a given wage increase </s>
<s> d </s>
<s> industry costs </s>
<s> the level of this average cost is determined by factor prices technology and so forth </s>
<s> as we have noted however we are abstracting from changes in all determinants of this level except for changes in the wage rate </s>
<s> e </s>
<s> union policies and collective bargaining issues </s>
<s> the single union which faces the industry does not restrict its membership and there is an adequate supply of labor available to the firms of the industry at the going wage rate </s>
<s> the union vigorously demands wage increases from productivity increases and wage increases to offset cost-of-living increases but we abstract from these forces here </s>
<s> productivity is something of an amorphous concept and the amount of productivity increase in a given time period is not even well known to the industry much less to the union or to the public </s>
<s> disagreement on the amount of productivity increase exacerbates the problem of agreeing how an increase in profit margins related to a productivity increase should be shared </s>
<s> the existence of conflict and of vigorous union demand for an increase in money wages does not contradict the assumption that the union is willing to settle for cost-of-living and productivity-share increases as distinct from a cost-raising increase in the basic wage rate </s>
<s> changes in the basic wage rate are cost-raising and they constitute an argument for raising prices </s>
<s> however it is not known to either the union or the public precisely how much of a cost increase is caused by a given change in the basic wage rate although the companies are presumed to have reliable estimates of this magnitude </s>
<s> thus for non-negative changes in the basic wage rate the industry becomes the active wage-setter since any increase in the basic wage rate can occur only by reason of industry acquiescence </s>
<s> from this presumption it is an easy step to the conclusion that any observed increases in the basic wage rate must be due to union behavior different and more aggressive than assumed in our model </s>
<s> it is this conclusion that we challenge </s>
<s> we do so by disproving the presumption on which it is based </s>
<s> several factors contributed to this change </s>
<s> the congress of vienna is a convenient starting point because it both epitomized and symbolized what was to follow </s>
<s> thus the congress marks a formal recognition of the political system that was central to world politics for a century </s>
<s> international law had to fit the conditions of europe and nothing that could not fit this system or the interests of the great european nations collectively could possibly emerge as law in any meaningful sense </s>
<s> essentially this imposed two conditions first international law had to recognize and be compatible with an international political system in which a number of states were competitive suspicious and opportunistic in their political alignments with one another </s>
<s> second it had to be compatible with the value system that they shared </s>
<s> in both respects international law was europeanized </s>
<s> it was not always easy to develop theory and doctrine which would square the two conditions </s>
<s> but there was no pressing need to maintain these same standards with regard to most of the rest of the world </s>
<s> thus theory and doctrine applicable among the great nations and the smaller european states did not really comfortably fit less developed and less powerful societies elsewhere </s>
<s> a nation such as switzerland could be neutralized by agreement and could be relied upon to protect its neutrality </s>
<s> out of the question was the neutralization of asia and africa </s>
<s> of course it had always been of european origin in fact but it had maintained a universal outlook under the natural law theory </s>
<s> now with virtually every writer not only was the european origin of public law acknowledged as a historical phenomenon but the rules thus established by the advanced civilizations of europe were to be imposed on others </s>
<s> the european customs on which international law was based were to become by force and fiat the customs that others were to accept as law if they were to join this community as sovereign states </s>
<s> hall for example was quite explicit on this point when he said states outside european civilization must formally enter into the circle of law-governed countries </s>
<s> during the nineteenth century these views were protested by virtually all the latin american writers though ineffectively just as the new nations of africa and asia protest them with more effect today </s>
<s> a number of other nineteenth-century developments contributed to the transmutation of the law of nations into international law </s>
<s> that is from aspects of a universal system of justice into particular rules governing the relations of sovereign states </s>
<s> the difference is important for although the older law of nations did cover relationships among sovereigns this was by no means its exclusive domain </s>
<s> the law of nature governed sovereigns in their relationship to their own citizens to foreigners and to each other in a conceptually unified system </s>
<s> the theory of international law which in the nineteenth century became common to virtually all writers in europe and america broke this unity and this universality </s>
<s> it lost sight of the individual almost entirely and confined itself to rules limiting the exercise of state power for reasons essentially unconnected with justice or morality save as these values might affect international relations </s>
<s> no longer did the sovereign look to the law of nations to determine what he ought to do </s>
<s> his search was merely for rules that might limit his freedom of action </s>
<s> to appreciate this development we must relate it to other aspects of nineteenth-century philosophy </s>
<s> national identification was not new but it was accelerating in intensity and scope throughout europe as new unifications occurred </s>
<s> national identification was reflected jurisprudentially in law theories which incorporated this hegelian abstraction and saw law domestic and international simply as its formal reflection </s>
<s> a state the highest form of human organization in fact and theory could be subjected to law only by a manifestation of self-will or consent </s>
<s> he no longer sought to find the law </s>
<s> he made it </s>
<s> he could be subjected to law only because he agreed to be </s>
<s> there was no law domestic or international except that willed by acknowledged by or consented to by states </s>
<s> hidden behind hegelian abstractions were more practical reasons for a changing jurisprudence </s>
<s> related to but distinguishable from nationalism was the growth of democracy in one form or another </s>
<s> increased participation in politics and the demands of various groups for status and recognition had dramatic effects upon law institutions </s>
<s> the efforts of various interest groups to control or influence governmental decisions particularly when taken in conjunction with the impact of industralization led to a concentration of attention on the legislative power and the means whereby policy could be formulated and enforced as law through bureaucratic institutions </s>
<s> law became a conscious process something more than simply doing justice and looking to local customs and a common morality for applicable norms </s>
<s> particularly was this true when the norms previously applied were no longer satisfactory to many when customs were rapidly changing as the forces of the new productivity were harnessed </s>
<s> the old way of doing things which depended on a relatively stable community with stable ideas dealing with familiar situations was no longer adequate to the task </s>
<s> codification was followed in all countries by a growing amount of legislation some changing and adjusting the older law much dealing with entirely new situations </s>
<s> the legislative mills have been grinding ever since and when its cumbersome processes were no longer adequate to the task a limited legislative authority was delegated in one form or another to the executive </s>
<s> whereas the eighteenth century had been a time in which man sought justice the nineteenth and twentieth have been centuries in which men are satisfied with law </s>
<s> indeed with developed positivism the separation of law from justice or from morality generally became quite specific </s>
<s> it is true that initially the task was to remove restrictions that it was thought inhibited the free flow of money goods and labor </s>
<s> but even laissez-faire was a conscious policy </s>
<s> however the sovereign was not hobbes absolute monarch but rather the parliamentary sovereign of austin </s>
<s> it was too an optimistic philosophy and though it separated law from morality it was by no means an immoral or amoral one </s>
<s> man through democratic institutions of government and economic freedom was master of his destiny </s>
<s> the theory did not require though it unfortunately might acquire a hegelian mystique </s>
<s> it was merely a rationalization and ordering of new institutions of popular government </s>
<s> it was not opposed to either justice or morality </s>
<s> it merely wished to minimize subjective views of officials who wielded public authority </s>
<s> particularly was this true as laissez-faire capitalism became the dominant credo of western society </s>
<s> that old customs which inhibited trade be abrogated </s>
<s> that business be free from governmental supervision and notions of morality which might clog the automatic adjustments of the free market </s>
<s> that obligations of status that were inconsistent with the new politics and the new economics be done away with </s>
<s> indeed contract was the dominant legal theme of the century the touchstone of the free society </s>
<s> government itself was based upon contract </s>
<s> trade was based on freedom of contract and money was lent and borrowed on contractual terms </s>
<s> even marriage and the family was seen as a contractual arrangement </s>
<s> it is not surprising that the international obligations of states were also viewed in terms of contract </s>
<s> in the first place the new doctrine brought a formal separation of international from municipal law rejecting the earlier view that both were parts of a universal legal system </s>
<s> one result was to nationalize much that had been regarded as the law of nations </s>
<s> admiralty law the law merchant and the host of problems which arise in private litigation because of some contact with a foreign country were all severed from the older law of nations and made dependent on the several national laws </s>
<s> the change was not quite so dramatic as it sounds because in fact common norms continued to be invoked by municipal courts and were only gradually changed by legislation and then largely in marginal situations </s>
<s> federal question jurisdiction </s>
<s> one purpose of the change was to attain sympathetic enforcement of rights insured by the civil war amendments against state interference </s>
<s> serious difficulty arose with the advent of substantive due process </s>
<s> a flood of federal lower court injunctions seriously impeded the processes of local government </s>
<s> such legislation was clarified and extended from time to time thereafter </s>
<s> three years later similar restraints were imposed upon injunctions against collection of state taxes </s>
<s> this saved for state adjudication in the first instance the two major areas where federal injunctions had been most obnoxious but other areas remained vulnerable </s>
<s> meanwhile the supreme court like congress showed misgivings concerning this aspect of government by injunction </s>
<s> whereas the earlier cases turned rather narrowly upon the availability of adequate state remedies the new emphasis is upon the nature of the state policy at issue </s>
<s> the classic case is railroad commission v pullman </s>
<s> the commission had issued an administrative order which was challenged as discriminatory against negroes </s>
<s> its enforcement was enjoined by a federal trial court </s>
<s> an alternative was found in the vagueness of state law as to whether the offending order had in fact been authorized </s>
<s> but it is crucial that here unlike burford the trial court was ordered to retain the case until the state courts had had a reasonable opportunity to settle the state-law question </s>
<s> temporary abstention ie postponement is one thing </s>
<s> refusal to adjudicate is another </s>
<s> the railroad claiming deprivation of property without due process of law sought injunctive relief </s>
<s> the court held that federal jurisdiction should not be exercised lest the domestic policy of the state be obstructed </s>
<s> this in the name of equitable discretion </s>
<s> but they objected vigorously to the proposition that federal courts may refuse to exercise jurisdiction conferred in a valid act of congress </s>
<s> a most revealing recent case is textile workers union v lincoln mills </s>
<s> on its face this merely provides a federal forum </s>
<s> in short congressional power to grant federal-question authority to federal courts is now apparently so broad that congress need not create or specify the right to be enforced </s>
<s> to avoid these constitutional difficulties mr justice frankfurter was prepared to read the taft-hartley provision as concerned with diversity rather than federal question jurisdiction </s>
<s> it would also leave intact the states traditional authority in the realm of contract law </s>
<s> if congress wants to displace the states from areas which they have customarily occupied let it do so knowingly and explicitly </s>
<s> and let it do its own lawmaking and not leave that to federal judges </s>
<s> there is a common problem behind most of these federal question and diversity cases </s>
<s> congress has not clearly defined the bounds between state and federal court competence </s>
<s> it has the power to do so but for the most part has left the matter for solution by judges on a case-by-case basis </s>
<s> the same rule of specialization and division of labor guides him in the fela certiorari cases in the administrative law area and indeed in the whole realm of judicial review </s>
<s> federal review of state decisions </s>
<s> with few exceptions congress has not given federal courts exclusive authority to enforce rights arising under federal law </s>
<s> to put it differently state and federal courts have concurrent jurisdiction with respect to most claims of federal right </s>
<s> to insure uniformity in the meaning of national law however state interpretations are subject to supreme court review </s>
<s> the result of course would be that federal law inevitably would mean different things in different states </s>
<s> we consider here only a few of many problems involved in this crucial federal-state relationship </s>
<s> the first is that enforcement of national law in state litigation raises in reverse the old diversity puzzle of the relation of procedure to substance </s>
<s> subject to certain constitutional restraints in favor of fair trials each level of government is free to devise its own judicial procedures </s>
<s> litigants who choose to assert federal claims in a state court go into that court subject to its rules of procedure </s>
<s> a similar canon applies to those who press state claims in federal tribunals eg in diversity cases </s>
<s> in other words the burden of pleading clearly rested upon the pleader by state law </s>
<s> here as in the byrd case another element of state procedure was subsumed to federal judge-made law </s>
<s> terminiello v chicago involved a conviction for disorderly conduct under a local ordinance </s>
<s> the conduct in question was a speech </s>
<s> though the accused raised many other objections he did not object on this crucial point at any stage of the proceedings </s>
<s> that is he did not claim in any of the four courts through which his case progressed that the jury charge had denied him any federal right </s>
<s> there does not seem to be any reasonable basis for distinction either in terms of the nature of the tax attribute or in terms of tax-avoidance possibilities </s>
<s> to this extent some stretching of the literal meaning of the committee report seems justified since the literal meaning conflicts with the clear implication if not the language of the statute </s>
<s> such an interpretation could not be justified by a construction of the statute alone </s>
<s> it would certainly violate the intention of congress as expressed in the committee report </s>
<s> and in at least one instance involving refund claims it might be contrary to another provision of the united states code </s>
<s> refund claims </s>
<s> a clearly recognized exception is a statutory merger or consolidation </s>
<s> the leading case seaboard air line railway v united states held that the transferee could sue for a refund of taxes paid by the transferor and it has been consistently followed </s>
<s> the court said the purpose of the section was principally to spare the government the embarrassment and trouble of dealing with several parties one of them a stranger to the claim and to prevent traffic in claims particularly tenuous claims against the government </s>
<s> neither reason said the court applied to the case at hand </s>
<s> furthermore congress could not be presumed to have intended to obstruct mergers approved by the states </s>
<s> other exceptions are assignments for the benefit of creditors corporate dissolutions transfers by descent or transfers by subrogation </s>
<s> a recent case in point is mitchell canneries v united states in which a claim against the government was transferred first from a corporation to a partnership whose partners were former stockholders and then to another corporation formed by the partners </s>
<s> the anti-assignment statute was held not to prevent the american corporation from suing for a refund of taxes paid by the british corporation </s>
<s> the court nevertheless relied on the seaboard case and also mentioned that the shareholders of the two corporations were the same </s>
<s> in substance said the court there was no transfer of equitable title </s>
<s> proper evidence of the liquidation and succession must also be filed </s>
<s> if the succession is a matter of public record certificates of the secretaries of state or other public officials having custody of the documents will suffice </s>
<s> if the succession is not of record all documents relating to such succession properly certified are required </s>
<s> the former proof seems applicable to a statutory merger or consolidation the latter to a contractual acquisition </s>
<s> the ruling would not however apply to an acquisition of assets for cash </s>
<s> the ruling suggests also that it applies to either a statutory or contractual reorganization </s>
<s> these results appear sound </s>
<s> the cases have allowed transfer of claims if beneficial ownership is not changed </s>
<s> in virtually every case the transferor corporation is liquidated and its former stockholders either own outright or have a continuing stock interest in the assets which gave rise to the tax </s>
<s> in these circumstances the possibility of multiple or conflicting claims is exceedingly remote </s>
<s> furthermore in a c reorganization the continuing interest of stockholders of the corporation which paid the tax must be greater than is necessary in a statutory merger to which the statute is clearly inapplicable </s>
<s> if the transferor has substantial assets other than the claim it seems reasonable to assume no corporation would be willing to acquire all of its properties in the dim hope of collecting a claim for refund of taxes </s>
<s> if such an unlikely transaction were to take place it would more logically be accomplished by a stock purchase followed by the prosecution of the claim by the wholly-owned subsidiary followed by liquidation </s>
<s> the successor corporations have been held entitled to sue on such claims </s>
<s> other tax attributes of the transferor </s>
<s> there are certain tax attributes of a corporation whose nature and effect might depend on the facts of the particular reorganization involved </s>
<s> attributes similar to a loss carryover </s>
<s> there may be certain items which are quite similar to a net operating loss carryover or operating deficit and whose right to survive a reorganization should perhaps be subject to the conditions applicable to those items </s>
<s> for example suppose another excess profits tax similar to prior laws is enacted providing for carryover of excess profits credits </s>
<s> this carryover right has a number of things in common with a net operating loss carryover </s>
<s> it is an averaging device intended to ease the tax burden of fluctuating income </s>
<s> it is a tax benefit which might be of substantial value to a corporation which expects to have a high excess profits tax </s>
<s> actually there do not presently appear to be items in the statute comparable to a net operating loss carryover </s>
<s> probably the primary reason for special treatment of a net operating loss carryover is the unique opportunity it presents for tax avoidance </s>
<s> a </s>
<s> reasons for selecting mail questionnaire method </s>
<s> as a result it was decided that a mail questionnaire sent to a large number of companies would be more effective in determining the general practices and opinions of small firms and in highlighting some of the fundamental and recurring problems of defense procurement that concern both industry and government </s>
<s> it was also hoped that responses to a mail questionnaire would suggest fruitful inquiries that might be made in subsequent studies of a more detailed nature </s>
<s> it is recognized that a mail questionnaire has inherent limitations </s>
<s> there is the danger that the questions will mean different things to different respondents </s>
<s> a respondent may want to make alternative answers because he does not know the precise circumstances assumed in the question </s>
<s> there is also the question of whether the respondent based his answers on factual information and carefully considered judgment or whether his answers were casual guesses </s>
<s> the research team was very mindful of these dangers and limitations of a mail questionnaire </s>
<s> under the circumstances however the team considered it would provide the most useful information at this point </s>
<s> in the preparation of the questionnaire the problems noted above were carefully considered and the structure and phraseology used were designed to minimize the effects of these limitations </s>
<s> b </s>
<s> design of the questionnaire </s>
<s> it was hoped that the facts concerning the characteristics and practices of the respondents would offer clues to the reasons why they took the positions and made the recommendations which they did </s>
<s> the questionnaire provided a place for the name of the respondent but stated that identification of the respondent was optional </s>
<s> the questionnaire also stated that in any event all replies would be treated confidentially </s>
<s> c </s>
<s> preparation and pretest of the questionnaire </s>
<s> the research team prepared and then revised the questionnaire over a period of six months </s>
<s> several days after the companies had received the questionnaire members of the research team contacted the presidents of eleven of these companies in person or by phone to discuss any ambiguities or difficulties the addressees might have experienced in completing the questionnaire </s>
<s> this test resulted in further revisions of the questionnaire </s>
<s> the research team was concerned that responses from firms in the state of washington might not be typical of those throughout the country or that the results might be different when no phone or personal follow-up was made </s>
<s> accordingly another test of the questionaire was made </s>
<s> the method of compiling the aia and tr lists will be described later </s>
<s> ten days after the questionnaires were mailed follow-up airmail postcards were sent urging those companies which had not yet returned their questionnaires to do so at once </s>
<s> twenty-eight returns in all were received </s>
<s> the responses were carefully checked for obvious errors in the answers or for questions that were apparently not understood by the respondent </s>
<s> d </s>
<s> compilation of mailing lists </s>
<s> the objective of the study was to determine the opinions and practices of small firms selling to defense programs </s>
<s> the firms to receive the questionnaires were selected with this objective in mind </s>
<s> three lists of companies were made and used in the study </s>
<s> the first was a list of fourteen manufacturing companies located in the state of washington which were personally known to the research team to be active in defense work </s>
<s> the primary consideration in the compilation of this list was convenience in discussing the questionnaire with company officers </s>
<s> these names were secured from member companies by the association from the forty-four sources listed in appendix aj </s>
<s> where possible the name of an executive was supplied along with the company name and address </s>
<s> the forty-four lists supplied by the aia member companies were merged and duplicate names were eliminated </s>
<s> there was further elimination of all companies that were not accompanied by the name of a responsible company executive </s>
<s> the third list was selected by the research team on a random basis from the thomas register </s>
<s> it was compiled as a control sample to determine if the opinions and practices of companies on the lists submitted by the members of the aerospace industries association were materially different from those of other small firms selling to defense programs </s>
<s> the fact that the aerospace industries association members whose lists were used did not comprise all firms engaged in defense programs </s>
<s> the fact that companies on the aia lists were already participating in the defense program because of the manner of their selection </s>
<s> the fact that aia lists might not have been selected on a random basis </s>
<s> the control sample was selected by taking the bottom name of each of the two columns of names on each page of the alphabetical listing of manufacturers in the thomas register </s>
<s> if the bottom name in each column did not have a responsible executive identified the next name above which identified such a responsible executive was substituted </s>
<s> fifteen hundred names were selected in this fashion </s>
<s> e </s>
<s> mailing the questionnaire </s>
<s> each questionnaire was mailed with a cover letter addressed personally to the president or other executive of each firm </s>
<s> the questionnaires were mailed in seattle washington and sent by regular mail to addresses in the states of idaho montana oregon and washington </s>
<s> airmail was used for the addresses outside the pacific northwest </s>
<s> each letter contained a postage-prepaid return envelope by regular mail for addresses in the pacific northwest and by airmail for those outside the pacific northwest </s>
<s> approximately ten days after the questionnaire was mailed a follow-up airmail postcard was sent to each of the original names </s>
<s> f </s>
<s> returns received </s>
<s> fifty-seven returns could not be used because they were incomplete or received too late to be processed </s>
<s> g </s>
<s> processing the returns </s>
<s> each questionnaire was audited for obvious mistakes and for comments and was identified by a serial number by the source list from which the company name was selected and by the geographical location of the company as determined by the postmark on the return envelope </s>
<s> all responses except comments were numerically coded to permit use of data-processing equipment </s>
<s> the codes were key-punched into ibm punch cards and verified </s>
<s> in order to be able to properly relate the data for a single company each of the three cards comprising the set for each firm was identified with the appropriate serial number of the respondent </s>
<s> the returns from companies classified as large businesses were set aside and not used because they were not relevant to a study of the opinions and practices of small firms </s>
<s> the second step in processing was to compare the responses from companies on the aia list with those from companies on the tr list in order to determine whether it would be appropriate to merge the responses for the purposes of the study </s>
<s> the methods and results of this comparative analysis are described in appendix aj </s>
<s> it was concluded that it would be appropriate to process the two groups of responses as a single sample of all small businesses engaged in or wishing to sell to defense programs </s>
<s> in the first place the two groups of firms when combined had characteristics and practices that were more representative of companies that were the subject of this study than did the firms from the aia list alone </s>
<s> the vast central valley of california is one of the most productive agricultural areas in the world </s>
<s> by virtue of the legal responsibilities of the department of employment in the farm placement program we necessarily found ourselves in the middle between these two forces </s>
<s> it is not a pleasant or easy position but one we have endeavored to maintain </s>
<s> we have sought to be strictly neutral as between the parties but at the same time we have been required frequently to rule on specific issues or situations as they arose </s>
<s> inevitably one side was pleased and the other displeased regardless of how we ruled </s>
<s> often the displeased parties interpreted our decision as implying favoritism toward the other </s>
<s> we have consoled ourselves with the thought that this is a normal human reaction and is one of the consequences of any decision in an adversary proceeding </s>
<s> for a number of years there have been sporadic attempts in california to organize farm workers </s>
<s> these attempts met with little sucess for a variety of reasons </s>
<s> they were inadequately financed without experienced leadership and lacked the general support of organized labor as a whole </s>
<s> this past year the pattern has been different the organizing program had the full support of the afl-cio which supplied staff and money to the awoc as well as moral support </s>
<s> leadership was experienced and skillful and financial resources were significant </s>
<s> regardless of where personal sympathies may lie as between the parties failure to recognize these changed conditions would be to ignore the facts of life </s>
<s> as a result of these changed conditions the impact of the organizational effort on agricultural labor-management relations has been much greater than in the past </s>
<s> by the very nature of the situation it is the union which has been able to select the time and place to bring pressure upon management </s>
<s> to date at least the strategy of the awoc has been selective </s>
<s> that is to say to concentrate on a particular crop or activity in a particular area at a strategic time rather than any broadside engagement with management throughout an area or the state </s>
<s> primarily we became involved in these disputes because of our referral obligations under our farm placement program </s>
<s> normally because agricultural labor is not covered by unemployment insurance we would not expect any issues to arise regarding benefit payments under the trade dispute provision of the unemployment insurance code although such a situation is quite within the realm of possibility </s>
<s> most of us remember and think of the wagner-peyser act in its historical sense as a major milestone in the development of public placement services </s>
<s> infrequently do we think of it as a living continuing operating control over the system </s>
<s> however when labor disputes arise its provisions come clearly into play </s>
<s> the state of california accepts the provisions of the wagner-peyser act and will observe and comply with the requirements of that act </s>
<s> with respect to labor disputes the wagner-peyser act states only </s>
<s> in carrying out the provisions of this act the secretary is authorized and directed to provide for the giving of notice of strikes or lock-outs to applicants before they are referred to employment </s>
<s> other provisions of the act empower the secretary to adopt regulations necessary to carry out its provisions and he has done so </s>
<s> referrals in labor dispute situations </s>
<s> in analyzing this regulation let us take the last sentence first </s>
<s> it permits referrals under certain circumstances even when there is a labor dispute provided the individual is given written notice of such a dispute </s>
<s> assume for example a situation where a farm has a packing shed and fields </s>
<s> the packing shed workers go on strike </s>
<s> there is no dispute involving fieldwork </s>
<s> so far no troublesome cases have arisen under this provision </s>
<s> it is the first part of the regulation that is currently at issue </s>
<s> employer representatives have contended that the secretary has gone beyond his authority by such a prohibition on the grounds that the wagner-peyser act requires only written notice to the prospective worker that a dispute exists </s>
<s> into court </s>
<s> the matter got into the courts this way one of the early strikes called by the awoc was at the digiorgio pear orchards in yuba county </s>
<s> we found that a labor dispute existed and that the workers had left their jobs which were then vacant because of the dispute </s>
<s> the court issued a temporary restraining order directing us to resume referrals </s>
<s> we of course obeyed the court order </s>
<s> however the federal court held that since the state had accepted the provisions of the wagner-peyser act into its own code and presumably therefore also the regulations it was now a state matter </s>
<s> it accordingly refused to assume jurisdiction whereupon the california superior court made the restraining order permanent </s>
<s> under that order we have continued referring workers to the ranch </s>
<s> a similar case arose at the bowers ranch in butte county and the superior court of that county issued similar restraining orders </s>
<s> i cannot accept that view either as a lawyer or as an administrator </s>
<s> legal considerations </s>
<s> first let us examine briefly some of the legal considerations involved </s>
<s> it is an accepted juridical principle in california that a superior court decision does not constitute a binding legal precedent </s>
<s> it is conclusive unless appealed only upon the particular parties to the particular action which was heard </s>
<s> it is not binding upon another superior court which could rule to the contrary </s>
<s> in that event we can correctly say that we have received an authoritative interpretation of the matter and one which we can follow statewide with confidence that the policy will not be overthrown in other superior courts </s>
<s> i believe i am in good company in this view </s>
<s> the attorney general of california concurs in this interpretation and has filed an appeal from these decisions to the district court of appeal </s>
<s> the attorney general of the united states in considering the power of the secretary to issue similar regulations under the wagner-peyser act relating to the interstate recruitment of farm workers has rendered an opinion sustaining his authority </s>
<s> next let us consider briefly the program and administrative implications of a failure on our part to pursue our appeals </s>
<s> there is far too much at stake for all of the parties concerned to leave the matter hanging in midair </s>
<s> the ramifications of the issue are enormous </s>
<s> a decision to refer workers to jobs vacant because of a strike would have to be applied equally to nonagricultural situations and might in effect place the public employment services in the position of acting as strikebreakers </s>
<s> the public interest is so dominant in such an issue that i cannot be so presumptuous as to attempt to settle it by an administrative order based upon conclusions reached in a summary action in one or two superior courts in the state </s>
<s> it is an issue which may well reach the supreme court of the united states before judicial finality is achieved </s>
<s> as an administrator i cannot place the employment service in california in jeopardy of being out of compliance with the federal laws by my failure to pursue the avenues of appeal open to me </s>
<s> to have applied statewide the decisions of the two cases heard in superior court in my opinion would have placed us clearly out of compliance with the wagner-peyser act and would have immediately opened the way for the secretary of labor were he so inclined to notify the governor of such noncompliance set a date for hearing and issue his finding </s>
<s> because of the uncertainty of this definition i solicited the interpretation of the secretary of labor </s>
<s> he has advised me that the narrower interpretation is the proper one </s>
<s> that is that if wages for example is the only issue in a labor dispute and no workers have left their jobs because of the dispute we may continue to make referrals </s>
<s> martin and stendler present evidence that infants and young children can and do solve many problems at a relatively simple perceptual level simply by combining objects and counting them </s>
<s> after they have developed concepts they are free from the necessity of manipulating objects </s>
<s> they do symbolically what they once had to do concretely </s>
<s> the ability to think seems to increase consistently with age </s>
<s> one experiment showed the greatest one-year difference occurring between the eleventh and twelfth years </s>
<s> that their questions indicate a genuine interest in social processes and events </s>
<s> and that as they mature their interests and capabilities change and broaden </s>
<s> emotional characteristics </s>
<s> how a child feels about himself about other people and about the tasks confronting him in school may have as much influence on his success in school as his physical and intellectual characteristics </s>
<s> a considerable amount of evidence exists to show that an unhappy and insecure child is not likely to do well in school subjects </s>
<s> however the teacher who understands the influence of emotions on behavior may be highly influential in helping pupils gain confidence security and satisfaction </s>
<s> the following generalizations about the emotional characteristics of elementary-school children may be helpful </s>
<s> ridiculing a child for being afraid or forcing him to meet the feared situation alone are poor ways of dealing with the problem </s>
<s> more effective solutions include explanations the example of another child or conditioning by associating the feared object place or person with something pleasant </s>
<s> children need help in learning to control their emotions </s>
<s> the young child learns from parents and teachers that temper tantrums screaming kicking and hitting will not get him what he wants </s>
<s> the older child learns that intense emotional outbursts will not win approval by his peers and therefore makes a real effort to control his emotions </s>
<s> children differ widely in their emotional responses </s>
<s> among infants the patterns of emotional responses are similar </s>
<s> as the influence of learning and environment are felt emotional behavior becomes individualized </s>
<s> social characteristics </s>
<s> although no national norms exist for the social development of children the teacher can find a great deal of information concerning types of social behavior normally displayed by children at various age levels </s>
<s> the following summary will give the student some idea about the social characteristics of elementary-school children </s>
<s> the student will certainly want to explore more deeply into the fascinating study of immature individuals struggling to meet their developmental needs and at the same time trying to learn the rules of the game in the ever-expanding number of groups in which they hold membership </s>
<s> during early childhood children are more interested in the approval of their parents and teachers than they are in the approval of other children </s>
<s> after they have been in school a few years their interest in playmates of their own age increases and their interest in adults decreases </s>
<s> the child who had once considered it a treat to accompany his parents on picnics and family gatherings now considers it a bore </s>
<s> in late childhood the influence of the group on the social behavior of the child continues to increase </s>
<s> the group sets the styles in clothing the kind of play engaged in and the ideals of right and wrong behavior </s>
<s> in early childhood the choice of a companion is likely to be for another child of his own age or a year or two older who can do the things he likes to do </s>
<s> such factors as sex intelligence and status in the group do not influence his choice much at this time </s>
<s> in later childhood an interest in team games replaces individual play </s>
<s> loyalty to the group a feeling of superiority over those who are not members and unwillingness to play with members of the opposite sex become dominant traits </s>
<s> during early childhood boys tease and bully on the average more than girls </s>
<s> those who feel inferior or insecure engage in these activities more than do well-adjusted children </s>
<s> during late childhood boys like to tease jostle and talk smart to girls </s>
<s> girls who are more mature than boys frown upon the youthful antics of boys of their own age </s>
<s> by the time pupils reach the sixth grade their ethical and moral standards are fairly well developed </s>
<s> they exhibit a keen interest in social political and economic problems but they frequently have vague and incorrect notions about the terms they use rather glibly in their routine school work </s>
<s> between the ages of two and four years negativism or resistance to adult authority is noticeable </s>
<s> after the fourth year it begins to decline </s>
<s> however as we have seen in later childhood the child begins to substitute the standards of the peer group for those of parents and teachers </s>
<s> the elementary-school child grows gradually in his ability to work in groups </s>
<s> the child in the primary grades can play harmoniously with one companion but his desire to be first in everything gets him into trouble when the group gets larger </s>
<s> in the middle grades however he begins to participate more effectively in group activities such as selecting a leader helping to make plans and carry on group activities and setting up rules governing the enterprise </s>
<s> why the teacher should study the individual pupil </s>
<s> much progress has been made in the last two decades in developing techniques for understanding children yet in almost any classroom today can be found children whose needs are not being met by the school program </s>
<s> some are failing to achieve as much as their ability would permit </s>
<s> others never seem able to enter fully into the life of the classroom </s>
<s> these children have been described as those who were trying to say something to adults who did not understand </s>
<s> many school systems now employ school psychologists and child guidance specialists </s>
<s> these specialists perform valuable services by helping teachers learn to identify children who need special attention by suggesting ways of meeting the needs of individual children in the regular classroom and by providing clinical services for severely maladjusted children </s>
<s> it is the classroom teacher however who has daily contacts with pupils and who is in a unique position to put sound psychological principles into practice </s>
<s> indeed a study of the individual child is an integral part of the work of the elementary-school teacher rather than merely an additional chore </s>
<s> teachers and administrators in many elementary schools have assumed that dividing the pupils in any grade into groups on the basis of test scores solves the problem of meeting the needs of individuals </s>
<s> what they should recognize is that children who have been placed in one of these groups on a narrow academic basis still differ widely in attributes that influence success and that they still must be treated as individuals </s>
<s> although the teacher must be concerned with maintaining standards he must also be concerned about understanding differences in ability background and experience </s>
<s> factors that inhibit learning and lead to maladjustment </s>
<s> studies conducted in various sections of the united states indicate that many children in elementary schools are maladjusted emotionally and that many of them are failing to make satisfactory progress in school subjects </s>
<s> it is apparent therefore that the teacher needs to know what factors have a vital bearing on the learning and adjustment of children </s>
<s> when a child fails to meet the standards of the school in his rate of learning insecurity unhappiness and other forms of maladjustment frequently follow </s>
<s> these maladjustments in turn inhibit learning and a vicious cycle is completed </s>
<s> it is easy for the teacher to rationalize that the child who is not achieving in accordance with his known ability is just plain lazy or that the child who lacks interest in school who dislikes the teacher or who is overaggressive is a hopeless delinquent </s>
<s> the causes of retardation and maladjustment may be found in physical factors such as defective speech or hearing impaired vision faulty motor coordination a frail constitution chronic disease malnutrition and glandular malfunctioning </s>
<s> they may be caused by poor health habits such as faulty eating and sleeping habits </s>
<s> they may be related to mental immaturity or lack of aptitude for certain types of school work </s>
<s> the curriculum may be too difficult for some and too easy for others </s>
<s> teaching methods learning materials and promotion policies may inhibit learning and lead to maladjustments for some children </s>
<s> unwholesome family relations broken homes and undesirable community influences may also be contributing factors </s>
<s> this is only a minimum list of the factors that inhibit learning and contribute to maladjustment among children </s>
<s> moreover these conditions do not influence all children in the same manner </s>
<s> a vision handicap that may produce nervous tension and reading disability for one child may spur another child on to even greater achievement in reading </s>
<s> an impoverished home that may discourage one child may constitute the motivation causing another to work harder for successful achievement in school </s>
<s> at any rate the teacher who recognizes common causes of retardation and maladjustment can frequently do a great deal to eliminate the causes of pupil discouragement failure and maladjustment </s>
<s> sources of information about children </s>
<s> successful teaching involves getting enough information about each pupil to understand why he behaves as he does in certain situations and how his achievement in school is being influenced by various factors in his environment </s>
<s> the classroom teacher cannot be expected to be as proficient in the use of the techniques of child study as the clinical psychologist </s>
<s> he cannot be expected to administer all the tests and gather all the information needed about each child in his classroom </s>
<s> he can be expected however to examine and interpret the information already available </s>
<s> to refine and extend his own techniques for studying individual children </s>
<s> and to utilize opportunities arising in connection with regular classroom activities for gaining a better understanding of his pupils </s>
<s> this section deals with some of the sources of information that can be tapped by the classroom teacher </s>
<s> cumulative records </s>
<s> most school systems today maintain a system of cumulative records of pupils </s>
<s> these records when systematically maintained provide much information about the children which the teacher can use in guidance instruction grouping and reporting to parents </s>
<s> each teacher has in his classroom a metal file equipped with a lock which is used to store cumulative record folders </s>
<s> during summer vacation periods these records are stored in the office of the principal </s>
<s> only the teacher and other professional personnel are permitted to see or use these records </s>
<s> each new teacher to whom the pupil goes is expected to study the information in the cumulative record and to bring it up to date </s>
<s> some school systems provide written instructions to principals and teachers designating when certain information is to be recorded on cumulative record forms and explaining how the information is to be summarized and used </s>
<s> the summary report which was prepared for this conference indicates first that actual or pending school desegregation is increasing </s>
<s> second that both actual and pending desegregation is with few exceptions the product or result of court order </s>
<s> the report together with other information suggests that desegregation in the schools is slow </s>
<s> but the region also embraces some of the staunchest opposition </s>
<s> desegregation and court order </s>
<s> first kentucky </s>
<s> elementary school desegregation came to owen and union counties which already had high school desegregation </s>
<s> in maryland the harford county board of education had prepared a desegregation plan which the court approved but which a plaintiff had challenged </s>
<s> thus county school board and federal court joined hands here to promote school desegregation </s>
<s> additional school desegregation in tennessee resulted from a court order opening a school serving children of military personnel </s>
<s> similarly further desegregation may come from suits pending in three tennessee cities chattanooga knoxville and memphis </s>
<s> in west virginia the number of white and negro children attending the same school has increased almost twofold </s>
<s> there are no court decisions here </s>
<s> as in maryland a district court has approved an official plan of school desegregation in delaware </s>
<s> as a result of the state board of education plan negro children entered heretofore white elementary schools in five districts </s>
<s> the third circuit court of appeals is reviewing an appeal from the plan </s>
<s> in virginia court orders led to desegregation in charlottesville and floyd counties </s>
<s> desegregation in pulaski county is pending because of court order although date of admission is not yet determined </s>
<s> negro parents have filed application for admission of additional children to schools in alexandria arlington fairfax and warren counties </s>
<s> desegregation can also result from additional suits brought by negro plaintiffs against school boards in newport news fairfax county arlington county and norfolk </s>
<s> this recapitulation makes it clear that school desegregation continues including the old dominion state in spite of its stern resistance </s>
<s> the record is clear that increase in school desegregation last year came largely as a result of a court order </s>
<s> before turning to my views as to the problems and issues before us at this regional conference i wish to note a small item in the summary report as it refers to the district of columbia </s>
<s> i see no real prospects for an all-negro school population </s>
<s> nearby foggy bottom is ousting negroes </s>
<s> in fact short of fleeing to warrenton virginia or rockville maryland white people may have to live with negroes </s>
<s> problems to solve </s>
<s> from the summary report before us at this conference a number of problems are apparent </s>
<s> they vex us and perplex us but generally do not divide us like the issues which follow the problems </s>
<s> it is slow </s>
<s> i believe we all want more schools where white and negro together can and do attend </s>
<s> i believe we all want no child denied admission to a school on account of his color </s>
<s> in general members of nairo would certainly want a child admitted to a school nearest his residence or within his residence zone </s>
<s> how to achieve this objective is a problem but we are not divided on what we want </s>
<s> it may be county school board or state school board action as well as that of municipal school boards </s>
<s> this is a problem and i believe there is little difference of opinion that wherever possible a local school board should devise and effect a plan of desegregation </s>
<s> not simply a brief program when the schools are actually desegregated but a continuing program that also promotes integration that encourages the children and teachers not to look at each other as white or negro but as human beings </s>
<s> again the problem is how to get it done and in what form to offer the group relations education </s>
<s> not whether it should be done </s>
<s> this is a problem but we are not divided over its importance or by its existence </s>
<s> now the issues </s>
<s> if we have five problems whose solution we seek in relatively united fashion then there are twice as many issues which i judge sharply divide us intergroup relations practitioners and lay people </s>
<s> pupil assignment </s>
<s> on the basis of pupil assignment criteria judge albert bryan has assigned negro children to formerly white schools in arlington and alexandria virginia </s>
<s> teacher assignment in order to desegregate </s>
<s> we can argue that where residence makes pupil desegregation impossible teacher assignment can create a partially desegregated situation </s>
<s> the plaintiff in school desegregation cases </s>
<s> the earlier part of my statement deals with the court orders that resulted in desegregation </s>
<s> in each instance the plaintiff was a private citizen </s>
<s> in thousands of school districts indeed in the entire state of mississippi no plaintiff has come forth </s>
<s> and i have established that the action of municipal county or state school boards or boards of education is small infinitesimally small in comparison with the number of districts </s>
<s> this is an issue for it divides people rather sharply </s>
<s> withholding of funds to schools that deny children on account of race </s>
<s> this is softer than earlier powell amendments which would have denied funds to all segregated school districts </s>
<s> there is nonetheless considerable argument against the clause softened though it be on the grounds that federal aid is so necessary to the public schools </s>
<s> the federal funds limitation enlists the support of many the opposition of quite a few </s>
<s> required public education </s>
<s> even if we marshal substantial agreement behind mandatory public education we likely cannot expect that all the states will enact the legislation </s>
<s> federal responsibility for education of the citizens </s>
<s> nearly half the children still receive no education </s>
<s> the next question is whether board members favor their own social classes in their roles as educational policy-makers </s>
<s> on the whole it appears that they do not favor their own social classes in an explicit way </s>
<s> seldom is there an issue in which class lines can be clearly drawn </s>
<s> a hypothetical issue of this sort might deal with the establishment of a free public junior college in a community where there already was a good private college which served the middle-class youth adequately but was too expensive for working-class youth </s>
<s> in situations of this sort the board generally favors the expansion of free education </s>
<s> the few cases of clear favoritism along social-class lines are as likely as not to involve representatives of the working class on the school board who favor some such practice as higher wages for janitors rather than pay increases for teachers and such issues are not issues of educational policy </s>
<s> in general it appears that trustees and board members attempt to represent the public interest in their administration of educational policy and this is made easier by the fact that the dominant values of the society are middle-class values which are generally thought to be valid for the entire society </s>
<s> there have been very few cases of explicit conflict of interest between the middle class and any other class in the field of educational policy </s>
<s> if there were more such cases it would be easier to answer the question whether the policy-makers favor their own social classes </s>
<s> there is currently a major controversy of public education in which group interests and values are heavily engaged </s>
<s> this is the issue of segregated schools in the south </s>
<s> in this case it is primarily a matter of conflict of racial groups rather than social-class groups </s>
<s> thus the white middle and lower classes are arrayed against the negro middle and lower classes </s>
<s> this conflict may be resolved in a way which will suit white middle-class people better than it suits white lower-class people </s>
<s> if this happens there may be some class conflict in the south with school boards and school teachers taking the middle-class position </s>
<s> the educational profession </s>
<s> the members of the educational profession have a major voice in the determination of educational policy their position being strongest in the universities </s>
<s> they are mostly upper-middle- and lower-middle-class people with a few in the upper class </s>
<s> in a society dominated by middle-class values and working in an institution which transmits and strengthens these social values it is clear that the educational profession must work for the values which are characteristic of the society </s>
<s> there is no problem here </s>
<s> the problem arises if it does arise when the educator has to make a choice or a decision within the area of his professional competence but which bears some relation to the social structure </s>
<s> one upward-mobile teacher may be a hard taskmaster for lower-class pupils because she wants them to develop the attitudes and skills that will enable them to climb while another upward-mobile teacher may be a very permissive person with lower-class pupils because he knows their disadvantages and deprivations at home and he hopes to encourage them by friendly treatment </s>
<s> one social-class factor which plays a large part in educational policy today is the fact that a great many school and college teachers are upward mobile from urban lower-class and lower-middle-class families </s>
<s> their own experience in the social system influences their work and attitudes as teachers </s>
<s> while this influence is a complex matter depending upon personality factors in the individual as well as upon his social-class experience there probably are some general statements about social-class background and educational policy that can be made with a fair degree of truth </s>
<s> teachers who have been upward mobile probably see education as most valuable for their students if it serves students as it has served them </s>
<s> that is they are likely to favor a kind of education that has vocational-advancement value </s>
<s> there are several causes for this one being rapid economic development with increasing numbers of of middle-class positions requiring engineering or scientific training </s>
<s> but another cause may lie in the experience of so many new postwar faculty members with their own use of education as a means of social advancement </s>
<s> their experience is quite in contrast with that of children of upper- and upper-middle-class native-born parents who are more likely to regard education as good for its own sake and to discount the vocational emphases in the curriculum </s>
<s> educational policies are formed by several groups who are officially or unofficially appointed to act in the public interest </s>
<s> legislators are one such group and state legislators have major responsibility for educational legislation </s>
<s> they generally vote so as to serve their own constituency and if the constituency should be solidly middle class or solidly lower class they might be expected to vote and work for middle- or for lower-class interests in education </s>
<s> however there are relatively few such political constituencies and as has been pointed out there is seldom a clear-cut distinction between the educational interests of one social class and those of another </s>
<s> another public interest group is the commission of laymen or educators which is appointed to study an educational problem and to make recommendations </s>
<s> generally these commissions work earnestly to represent the interest of the entire society as they conceive it </s>
<s> nevertheless their conclusions and recommendations cannot please everybody and they often represent a particular economic or political point of view </s>
<s> both commissions consisted of upper-middle- and upper-class people who attempted to act in the public interest </s>
<s> an example of a more definite class bias is noted in proceedings of the commission on the financing of higher education sponsored by the association of american universities and supported by the rockefeller foundation and the carnegie corporation </s>
<s> this commission recommended against the use of federal government funds for the assistance of private universities and against a broad program of government-supported scholarships </s>
<s> which recommended a federal government scholarship program </s>
<s> furthermore the commission set up the council for financial aid to education as a means of encouraging private business to increase its support of private higher education </s>
<s> thus the commission acted with a sense of social responsibility within the area of its own convictions about the problem of government support to private education </s>
<s> then there are the trustees and officers of the great educational foundations who inevitably exert an influence on educational decisions by their support or refusal to support various educational programs experiments and demonstrations </s>
<s> these people are practically always upper- or upper-middle-class persons who attempt to act in what they regard as the interest of the entire society </s>
<s> these have an upper-middle-class leadership and a middle-class membership with rare exceptions where working-class parents are active in local p-ta matters </s>
<s> like the other policy-making groups these are middle class in their educational attitudes and they attempt to act in the general public interest as they see it </s>
<s> in general it appears that educational decisions and educational policies are made by people who intend to act in the interests of the society as a whole </s>
<s> they are predominantly middle- and upper-class people and undoubtedly share the values and attitudes of those classes </s>
<s> they may be unaware of the existence of lower-class values and consequently fail to take them into account </s>
<s> but there is very little frank and conscious espousal of the interests of any one social class by the people who have the power to make decisions in education </s>
<s> they think of themselves as trustees for the entire society and try to serve the entire society </s>
<s> attempts to influence social structure through education </s>
<s> educational policy in the united states has as an explicit goal the maximization of economic and cultural opportunity </s>
<s> in so far as this goal is achieved the society becomes more fluid artificial barriers to social mobility are reduced and people at the lower end of the social hierarchy share more fully in the material and cultural goods of society </s>
<s> on the other hand there is a counterbalancing purpose in education which is to pass on the advantages of the parents to their children </s>
<s> this leads to efforts at exclusiveness through private schools and to the maintenance of social stratification in the schools </s>
<s> both of these purposes exist side by side without much overt conflict under present conditions </s>
<s> maximizing economic and cultural opportunity </s>
<s> the broad expansion of free education results both in raising the average economic and cultural level of the society and in promoting fluidity within the social structure </s>
<s> fifty years ago the general raising of the school-leaving age to sixteen was an example of this movement </s>
<s> during the past decade the program has been carried on through expansion of free higher education in state universities state colleges and community colleges </s>
<s> the reaffirmation of american faith in the comprehensive high school as expressed in the conant study is another indication of the liveliness of the ideal of maximizing opportunity through the equalizing of educational opportunity </s>
<s> meanwhile the private colleges have increased their tuition rates so much that they have raised an economic barrier which dwarfs their scholarship funds </s>
<s> the gains in educational opportunity during the past decade have taken place largely in the publicly supported institutions </s>
<s> unfortunately however and for reasons to be discussed in the following chapter no rate relationships can be made completely nondiscriminatory as long as all or some of the rates must be set above marginal costs in order to yield adequate revenues </s>
<s> and this fact may explain some of the disagreements among the experts as to the more rational formulas for the apportionment of total costs among different units of service </s>
<s> one such disagreement which will receive attention in this next chapter concerns the question whether rates for different kinds of service in order to avoid the attribute of discrimination must be made directly proportional to marginal costs or whether they should be based instead on differences in marginal costs </s>
<s> here the choice is that between the horns of a dilemma </s>
<s> two major types of fully distributed cost analysis </s>
<s> the double-step type </s>
<s> for more explicit expositions one must distinguish different types of analyses </s>
<s> by all means the most important distinction is that between those total-cost apportionments which superimpose a distribution of admittedly unallocable cost residues on estimates of incremental or marginal costs and those other apportionments which recognize no difference between true cost allocation and mere total-cost distribution </s>
<s> since this book is concerned only incidentally with railroad rates it will not attempt to analyze the methods by which the staff of the interstate commerce commission has estimated out-of-pocket costs and apportioned residue costs </s>
<s> suffice it to say that the usefulness of the latter apportionment is questionable </s>
<s> but in any event full credit should be given to the cost section for its express and overt recognition of a vital distinction too often ignored in utility-cost analyses namely that between a cost allocation designed to reflect the actual behavior of costs in response to changes in rates of output of different classes of utility service </s>
<s> and a mere cost apportionment which somehow spreads among the classes and units of service even those costs that are strictly unallocable from the standpoint of specific cost determination </s>
<s> the single-step type </s>
<s> instead all of the total costs are treated as variable costs although these costs are divided into costs that are deemed to be functions of different variables </s>
<s> as already noted in an earlier paragraph the more familiar cost analyses of utility enterprises or utility systems divide the total costs among a number of major classes of service such as residential commercial industrial power street lighting etc </s>
<s> high-tension industrial power service for example would not be charged with any share of the maintenance costs or capital costs of the low-tension distribution lines </s>
<s> but the major portions of the total costs of a utility business are common or joint to all or nearly all classes of customers </s>
<s> and these costs must somehow be apportioned among the various classes and then must somehow be reapportioned among the units of service in order to report unit costs that can serve as tentative measures of reasonable rates </s>
<s> the general basis on which these common costs are assigned to differently measured units of service will be illustrated by the following highly simplified problem of an electric-utility cost analysis </s>
<s> but before turning to this example we must distinguish two subtypes of analysis both of which belong to the single-step type rather than to the double-step type </s>
<s> other services will show different rates of return some probably much lower and some higher </s>
<s> but the practice is likely to be misleading since it may seem to support a conclusion that as long as the revenues from any class of service cover the imputed operating expenses plus some return on capital investment however low the rates of charge for this service are compensatory </s>
<s> needless to say any such inference would be quite unwarranted </s>
<s> for the reason just suggested i shall assume the use of the first subtype of fully distributed cost apportionment in the following simplified example </s>
<s> three-part analysis of the costs of an electric utility business </s>
<s> in order to simplify the exposition of a typical fully apportioned cost analysis let us assume the application of the analysis to an electric utility company supplying a single city with power generated by its own steam-generation plant </s>
<s> let us also assume the existence of only one class or type of service all of which is supplied at the same voltage phase etc to residential commercial and industrial customers </s>
<s> since the company under review is supplying what we are here regarding as only one kind of service we might suppose that the problem of total cost apportionment would be very simple </s>
<s> indeed that it would be limited to a finding of the total annual operating and capital costs of the business followed by a calculation of this total in terms of annual cost per kilowatt-hour of consumption </s>
<s> in fact however the problem is not so simple </s>
<s> a recognition of multiple cost functions is therefore required </s>
<s> if this threefold division of costs were to have its counterpart in the actual rates of charge for service as it actually does have in some rates there would result a three-part rate for any one class of service </s>
<s> but our present interest lies in the measurement of costs of service and only indirectly in rates that may or may not be designed to cover these costs </s>
<s> let us therefore consider each of the three types of cost in turn recognizing that this simplified classification is used only for illustrative purposes </s>
<s> costs actually vary in much more complex ways </s>
<s> the customer costs </s>
<s> these are those operating and capital costs found to vary with number of customers regardless or almost regardless of power consumption </s>
<s> included as a minimum are the costs of metering and billing along with whatever other expenses the company must incur in taking on another consumer </s>
<s> the preconditions of sociology have remained largely unexamined by the sociologist </s>
<s> like primitive numbers in mathematics the entire axiological framework is taken to rest upon its operational worth </s>
<s> it has become painfully clear that the very attempt to make the language of social research free of values by erecting mathematical and physical models is itself a conditioned response to a world which pays a premium price for technological manipulation </s>
<s> the simple pragmatic success of the sociology of small groups needs to be questioned </s>
<s> for if the small group notion involves the implicit claim that the phenomena of sociological investigations are of atomic or subatomic proportions the philosopher needs to know the extent to which such entities are valid </s>
<s> the mere exploration of the unconscious ground of present-day sociology offers a rich vein of philosophical and logical investigation </s>
<s> a parallel function for philosophy is the study of the relation between perceptions experientially received and conceptions logically formed </s>
<s> philosophy can supply adequate criteria of meaning in the selection of socially viable categories </s>
<s> this involves a sifting of the empirical and rational elements entering into each social science statement </s>
<s> the purpose of this sort of philosophical study of sociology is not to tyrannize but to clarify the principles of social science </s>
<s> it is absurd to speak of philosophy as a superior enterprise to sociology since the former is a logical rational discipline where sociology is essentially descriptive and empirical </s>
<s> such a position entails the negation of philosophy in its platonic form as something soaring above and embracing the empirical and mathematical sciences </s>
<s> but contrary to whitehead philosophy is not a synonym for plato </s>
<s> the uses of philosophy as a logical clearing house are manifest to any approach that does not descend to pure sensationalism </s>
<s> however when philosophy attempts to stand above the sciences to dictate the conditions of empirical research it becomes formal metaphysics </s>
<s> shaping the contours of life to fit the needs of legends </s>
<s> the notion of philosophy as queen bee may fit well with authoritarian modes of political ideology but it has been noted that the price of such an imperial notion of philosophy is the frustration and flagellation of the social sciences </s>
<s> metaphysics is no longer a direct grappling with nature as it was in antiquity </s>
<s> science is mocked for wishing to know nothing of nothing in a last ditch effort to save the gods at the expense of men </s>
<s> it is not positivism which has isolated metaphysics from reality by distinguishing between description and prescription </s>
<s> it is simply revealing the state to which metaphysical thinking has fallen during this century </s>
<s> it is a commonplace that to the degree these special preserves of past philosophic hunting grounds establish an empirical content and suitable methodological criteria they move away from philosophy as such </s>
<s> what is left to traditional systems of philosophy is in effect only the history of these fields prior to their becoming rigorous enough to abide by the canons of scientific method </s>
<s> in this situation philosophy has survived by separating itself from metaphysics by showing the ultimate questions to be the meaningless questions </s>
<s> the relinquishing by philosophy of pretentious claims to empirical priority gives it an ability to treat problems of meaning and truth which in the past it was unable to examine because of its missionary attitude to knowledge of more humble sorts </s>
<s> in the new situation philosophy is able to provide the social sciences with the same guidance that mathematics offers the physical sciences a reservoir of logical relations that can be used in framing hypotheses having explanatory and predictive value </s>
<s> beyond this philosophy may urge the social sciences forward by asking the type of question that falls outside the present scope of social inquiry but within its potential domain of relevance </s>
<s> in this connection it might be noted that the theory of games was a mathematical discovery long before its uses in political science were exploited </s>
<s> likewise kant formulated the nebular hypothesis according to which the solar system was evolved from a rotating mass of incandescent gas nearly a half century before its scientific value was made plain by laplace in his systeme du monde </s>
<s> but the forceful presentation of new issues for the sciences to work on is itself a monumental task </s>
<s> however modesty and triviality are different qualities </s>
<s> philosophy conceived of as servant to the sciences might appear as less dramatic than philosophy which jeers as the sciences evolve </s>
<s> the ceaseless effort to understand and measure the distance mankind has traversed since its primitive anthropological status offers a more durable sort of drama </s>
<s> by clarifying fundamental premises in the social sciences and defining the logical problems emergent at the borderlands of each new scientific discipline philosophy can offer the sort of distinction that can accelerate growth in human understanding </s>
<s> philosophy can prevent the working scientist from becoming slothful and self-content by noting the assumptions and level at which a hypothesis or theory is framed </s>
