<s> the dissection of scientific theory the examination of a theory from the vantage-points of language epistemology and ethics is itself a distinct contribution to knowledge no less so because of its removal from empirical research </s>
<s> the realm of science whatever the degree of precision in formulations covers the range of prediction and explanation </s>
<s> for some forms of philosophy this very division between the empirical and the rational becomes a sign of the metaphysical superiority of the latter </s>
<s> this is simply a confession of intellectual sterility spruced up to look virtuous </s>
<s> in this philosophy and science share a common goal </s>
<s> the hypostatization of the secret nonetheless guarantees that the division of analytical and synthetic philosophies shall not be overcome by even the most persuasive argument </s>
<s> for this division is but an abstract representation of the social struggle between mysticism and science </s>
<s> the mystification of metaphysical systems does not imply the demise of philosophy only the close of a philosophic age which demanded metaphysics to be rational and logical </s>
<s> the tenacity with which present metaphysical attitudes fetishize private intuition offers the strongest evidence that the gulf between scientific and delphic ways of philosophizing is built into the present conflict over the limits and purpose of science religion and ideology </s>
<s> philosophic systems by the very nature of their completeness are overthrown by rival systems </s>
<s> in addition to the incompleteness of science and the completeness of metaphysics they differ in that science is essentially descriptive while philosophy in its inherited forms tends to be goal-oriented teleological and prescriptive </s>
<s> the threadbare notion that belief unlike behaviour is not subject to objective analysis has placed intuitive metaphysics squarely against the sociology of knowledge since it is precisely the job of the sociology of knowledge to treat beliefs as social facts no less viable than social behaviour </s>
<s> when dealing with the actual relation of philosophy to the sociology of knowledge or better the role of philosophy in assisting research on the social sources of ideas one has to become necessarily selective </s>
<s> certain features we have touched upon philosophy as a logical deductive system from which a social science methodology can be built up </s>
<s> philosophic analysis of the assumptions and presumptions of the social sciences </s>
<s> and philosophy as a guide to possible integration of supposedly disparate sociological investigations </s>
<s> the objection will be raised that the most important role of philosophy in relation to social science has been omitted namely the status of ultimate value questions and norms operative in the social sciences </s>
<s> i think it must be said that contrary to metaphysical insistence these are questions so framed as to defy either empirical exploration or rational solutions </s>
<s> such pseudo-questions assume that answers of concrete significance can be supplied to statements involving undefined universals </s>
<s> social theory has no more right to expect results from meaningless questions than physics has the right to expect a theological solution to the wave-particle controversy </s>
<s> it is not that such questions are not asked </s>
<s> it is rather that introducing them into social analysis reflects not so much a search for truth as for certainty </s>
<s> an operational approach to sociology can never expect abstract certainty since it is certainty which every new discovery in science either replaces or reshapes </s>
<s> to raise the added objection that men require certainty on psychological grounds answers to ultimate questions having an irrational rather than scientific basis is in a real sense to undermine the objection itself </s>
<s> for what concerns all scientific disciplines is precisely that which can be captured for the rational ie for the scientific determination of what in past ages was considered ultimate and irrational </s>
<s> a philosophy which attempts to supply ultimate answers in an ultimate way reveals its acquiescence in the shortcomings of men an impatience with partial tentative solutions </s>
<s> men have always lived in a tentative world and in suspension of ultimate judgments where and when necessary </s>
<s> uncertainty overcoming itself is the precondition of the quest for new and more precise information about the world </s>
<s> without such uncertainty we are left with a set of dogmas and myths </s>
<s> the functional interplay of philosophy and science should as a minimum guarantee a meaningful option to myth-making </s>
<s> a degree of indefiniteness is a salutary condition for the growth of science </s>
<s> but neither was the statement empirical for goodness was not a quality like red or squeaky that could be seen or heard </s>
<s> to find a place for them in their theory of knowledge would require them to revise the theory radically and yet that theory was what they regarded as their most important discovery </s>
<s> it appeared that the theory could be saved in one way only </s>
<s> this is the course the positivists took </s>
<s> they explained value judgments by explaining them away </s>
<s> now i do not think their view will do </s>
<s> but before discussing it i should like to record one vote of thanks to them for the clarity with which they have stated their case </s>
<s> it has been said of john stuart mill that he wrote so clearly that he could be found out </s>
<s> this theory has been put so clearly and precisely that it deserves criticism of the same kind and this i will do my best to supply </s>
<s> i shall argue that we do mean to do just that </s>
<s> let us work through an example and the simpler and commoner the better </s>
<s> there is perhaps no value statement on which people would more universally agree than the statement that intense pain is bad </s>
<s> let us take a set of circumstances in which i happen to be interested on the legislative side and in which i think every one of us might naturally make such a statement </s>
<s> we come upon a rabbit that has been caught in one of the brutal traps in common use </s>
<s> there are signs that it has struggled for days to escape and that in a frenzy of hunger pain and fear it has all but eaten off its own leg </s>
<s> the attempt failed the animal is now dead </s>
<s> the positivist tells us that when we say this we are only expressing our present emotion </s>
<s> consider what follows from the positivist view </s>
<s> on that view nothing good or bad happened in the case until i came on the scene and made my remark </s>
<s> for what i express in my remark is something going on in me at the time and that of course did not exist until i did come on the scene </s>
<s> the pain of the rabbit was not itself bad </s>
<s> nothing evil was happening when that pain was being endured </s>
<s> badness in the only sense in which it is involved at all waited for its appearance till i came and looked and felt </s>
<s> now that this is at odds with our meaning may be shown as follows </s>
<s> let us put to ourselves the hypothesis that we had not come on the scene and that the rabbit never was discovered </s>
<s> clearly not </s>
<s> if so then it is clear that in saying the suffering was bad we are not expressing our feelings only </s>
<s> we are saying that the pain was bad when and as it occurred and before anyone took an attitude toward it </s>
<s> the first argument is thus an ideal experiment in which we use the method of difference </s>
<s> it removes our present expression and shows that the badness we meant would not be affected by this whereas on positivist grounds it should be </s>
<s> the second argument applies the method in the reverse way </s>
<s> it ideally removes the past event and shows that this would render false what we mean to say whereas on positivist grounds it should not </s>
<s> let us suppose that the animal did not in fact fall into the trap and did not suffer at all but that we mistakenly believe it did and say as before that its suffering was an evil thing </s>
<s> on the positivist theory everything i sought to express by calling it evil in the first case is still present in the second </s>
<s> in the only sense in which badness is involved at all whatever was bad in the first case is still present in its entirety since all that is expressed in either case is a state of feeling and that feeling is still there </s>
<s> clearly it is not </s>
<s> if anyone asked us after we made the remark that the suffering was a bad thing whether we should think it relevant to what we said to learn that the incident had never occurred and no pain had been suffered at all we should say that it made all the difference in the world that what we were asserting to be bad was precisely the suffering we thought had occurred back there that if this had not occurred there was nothing left to be bad and that our assertion was in that case mistaken </s>
<s> the suggestion that in saying something evil had occurred we were after all making no mistake because we had never meant anyhow to say anything about the past suffering seems to me merely frivolous </s>
<s> on the theory before us such relief would be groundless for in that suffering itself there was nothing bad at all and hence in its nonoccurrence there would be nothing to be relieved about </s>
<s> the positivist theory would here distort our meaning beyond recognition </s>
<s> so far as i can see there is only one way out for the positivist </s>
<s> he holds that goodness and badness lie in feelings of approval or disapproval </s>
<s> and there is a way in which he might hold that badness did in this case precede our own feeling of disapproval without belonging to the pain itself </s>
<s> the pain in itself was neutral </s>
<s> but unfortunately the rabbit on no grounds at all took up toward this neutral object an attitude of disapproval and that made it for the first time and in the only intelligible sense bad </s>
<s> this way of escape is theoretically possible but since it has grave difficulties of its own and has not so far as i know been urged by positivists it is perhaps best not to spend time over it </s>
<s> i come now to a third argument which again is very simple </s>
<s> when we come upon the rabbit and make our remark about its suffering being a bad thing we presumably make it with some feeling </s>
<s> the positivists are plainly right in saying that such remarks do usually express feeling </s>
<s> but suppose that a week later we revert to the incident in thought and make our statement again </s>
<s> and suppose that the circumstances have now so changed that the feeling with which we made the remark in the first place has faded </s>
<s> the pathetic evidence is no longer before us </s>
<s> and we are now so fatigued in body and mind that feeling is as we say quite dead </s>
<s> in these circumstances since what was expressed by the remark when first made is on the theory before us simply absent the remark now expresses nothing </s>
<s> and this seems to me untrue </s>
<s> when we repeat the remark that such suffering was a bad thing the feeling with which we made it last week may be at or near the vanishing point but if we were asked whether we meant to say what we did before we should certainly answer yes </s>
<s> we should say that we made our point with feeling the first time and little or no feeling the second time but that it was the same point we were making </s>
<s> and if we can see that what we meant to say remains the same while the feeling varies from intensity to near zero it is not the feeling that we primarily meant to express </s>
<s> i come now to a fourth consideration </s>
<s> we all believe that toward acts or effects of a certain kind one attitude is fitting and another not </s>
<s> but on the theory before us such a belief would not make sense </s>
<s> broad and ross have lately contended that this fitness is one of the main facts of ethics and i suspect they are right </s>
<s> but that is not exactly my point </s>
<s> my point is this whether there is such fitness or not we all assume that there is and if we do we express in moral judgments more than the subjectivists say we do </s>
<s> let me illustrate </s>
<s> in his novel the house of the dead dostoevsky tells of his experiences in a siberian prison camp </s>
<s> most of us would say that in this delight at the killing of others or the causing of suffering there is something very unfitting </s>
<s> if we were asked why we thought so we should say that these things involve great evil and are wrong and that to take delight in what is evil or wrong is plainly unfitting </s>
<s> now on the subjectivist view this answer is ruled out </s>
<s> for before someone takes up an attitude toward death suffering or their infliction they have no moral quality at all </s>
<s> there is therefore nothing about them to which an attitude of approval or condemnation could be fitting </s>
<s> they are in themselves neutral and so far as they get a moral quality they get it only through being invested with it by the attitude of the onlooker </s>
<s> in such a case any attitude would be as fitting or unfitting as any other which means that the notion of fitness has lost all point </s>
<s> indeed we are forced to go much farther </s>
<s> if goodness and badness lie in attitudes only and hence are brought into being by them those men who greeted death and misery with childishly merry laughter are taking the only sensible line </s>
<s> to greet them with repulsion would turn what before was neutral into something bad </s>
<s> it would needlessly bring badness into the world </s>
<s> and even on subjectivist assumptions that does not seem very bright </s>
<s> on the other hand to greet them with delight would convert what before was neutral into something good </s>
<s> it would bring goodness into the world </s>
<s> the injured german veteran was a former miner twenty-four years old who had been wounded by shrapnel in the back of the head </s>
<s> this resulted in damage to the occipital lobe and very probably to the left side of the cerebellum also </s>
<s> psychical blindness is a condition in which there is a total absence of visual memory-images a condition in which for example one is unable to remember something just seen or to conjure up a memory-picture of the visible appearance of a well-known friend in his absence </s>
<s> we do not arrive at spatial images by means of the sense of touch by itself </s>
<s> the underlying assumption of course is that only sight and touch enable us in any precise and fully dependable way to locate objects in space beyond us the other senses being decidedly inferior if not totally inadequate in this regard </s>
<s> this is an assumption with which few would be disposed to quarrel </s>
<s> therefore if the sense of touch is functioning normally and there is a complete absence of spatial awareness in a psychically-blind person when the eyes are closed and an object is handled the conclusion seems unavoidable that touch by itself cannot focus and take possession of the third-dimensionality of things and that actual sight or visual representations are necessary </s>
<s> we shall consider these in the inverse order of their presentation </s>
<s> the answer the authors give to it therefore is of supreme importance </s>
<s> the authors insist however that these abnormalities in the sense of touch were due absolutely to no organic disorders in that sense faculty but rather to the injuries which the patient had sustained to the sense of sight </s>
<s> and he could tell simply by the feel of it whether it was made of wood iron cloth rubber and so on </s>
<s> and he could recognize by touch alone articles which he had handled immediately before even though they were altogether unfamiliar to him and could not be identified by him </s>
<s> that is he was unaware what kind of objects they were or what their use was </s>
<s> because of his brain injury and the extreme damage suffered to his sight the patient had to train himself for a new line of work that of a portfolio-maker an occupation requiring a great deal of precision in the making of measurements and a fairly well-developed sense of form and contour </s>
<s> then we shall perhaps be in a position to provide something like a complete answer to the question at hand </s>
<s> he could not see objects as unified self-contained and organized figures as a person does with normal vision </s>
<s> the meaning of this as we shall see is that he had no fund of visual memory-images of objects as objects </s>
<s> and therefore he could not recognize even long-familiar things upon seeing them again </s>
<s> at their edges they slipped pretty much out of focus altogether </s>
<s> but by the tracing procedure he could in a strange obviously kinesthetic manner find the unseen form </s>
<s> could piece as it were the jumbled mass together into an organized whole and then recognize it as a man or a triangle or whatever it turned out to be </s>
<s> if however the figure to be discerned were complicated composed of several interlocking subfigures and so on even the tracing process failed him and he could not focus even relatively simple shapes among its parts </s>
<s> the patient himself denied that he had any visual imagery at all </s>
<s> and there was ample evidence of the following sort to corroborate him </s>
<s> after a conversation with another man he was able to recount practically everything that had been said but could not describe at all what the other man looked like </s>
<s> nor could he call up memory-pictures of close friends or relatives </s>
<s> in short both his own declarations and his figural blindness when he looked at objects seem to present undeniable evidence that he had simply no visual memory at all </s>
<s> he was oblivious of the form of the object actually being viewed precisely because he could not assign it to a visual shape already learned and held in visual memory as persons of normal vision do </s>
<s> he could not recognize it </s>
<s> he was absolutely unfamiliar with it because he had no visual memory at all </s>
<s> therefore his only recourse was to learn the shape all over again for each new visual experience of the same individual object or type of object </s>
<s> and this he could do only by going over its mass with the tracing procedure </s>
<s> then he might finally recognize it apparently by combining the visual blot actually being seen with tactual feelings in the head or body accompanying the tracing movements </s>
<s> this would mean it can readily be seen that again for each new visual experience the tracing motions would have to be repeated because of the absence of visual imagery </s>
<s> as one would surmise the procedure however could be repeated with the same object or with the same type of object often enough so that the corresponding visual blots and the merest beginning of the tracing movement would provide clues as to the actual shape which the patient then immediately could determine by a kind of inference </s>
<s> dice for example he inferred from black dots on a white surface </s>
<s> he evidently could not actually see the corners of these objects but their size and the dots gave them away </s>
<s> often he seems even to have been able to guess correctly without the tracing motions solely on the basis of qualitative differences among the blot-like things which appeared in his visual experience </s>
<s> if the patient can perceive figure kinesthetically when he cannot perceive it visually then it would seem the sense of touch has immediate contact with the spatial aspects of things in independence of visual representations at least in regard to two dimensions and as we shall see even this much spatial awareness on the part of unaided touch is denied by the authors </s>
<s> quite naturally they make the investigation first by prohibiting the patient from making any movements at all and then later by repeating it and allowing the patient to move in any way he wanted to </s>
<s> when the patient was not allowed to move his body in any way at all the following striking results occurred </s>
<s> a schematic abstract treatment of men and animals by intent rose only in the late eighth century </s>
<s> to speak of this underlying view of the world is to embark upon matters of subjective judgment </s>
<s> at the least however one may conclude that geometric potters sensed a logical order </s>
<s> their principles of composition stand very close to those which appear in the homeric epics and the hexameter line </s>
<s> their world again was a still simple traditional age which was only slowly beginning to appreciate the complexity of life </s>
<s> and perhaps an observer of the vases will not go too far in deducing that the outlook of their makers and users was basically stable and secure </s>
<s> throughout the work of the later ninth century a calm severe serenity displays itself </s>
<s> in the vases this spirit may perhaps at times bore or repel one in its internal self-satisfaction but the best of the geometric pins have rightly been considered among the most beautiful ever made in the greek world </s>
<s> geometric pottery has not yet received the thorough detailed study which it deserves partly because the task is a mammoth one and partly because some of its local manifestations as at argos are only now coming to light </s>
<s> the general intellectual outlook which had appeared in the eleventh century was now consolidated to a significant degree </s>
<s> in this process the minoan-mycenaean inheritance had been transmuted or finally rejected </s>
<s> but all too many observers have been misled by this fact into minimizing the degree of change which took place in the early first millennium </s>
<s> attica though important was not the only teacher of this age </s>
<s> imitation and borrowing of motifs now become ascertainable </s>
<s> the potters of the aegean islands thus stood apart from those of the mainland and in greece itself argive corinthian attic boeotian and other geometric sequences have each their own hallmarks </s>
<s> these local variations were to become ever sharper in the next century and a half </s>
<s> the same conclusions can be drawn from the other physical evidence of the dark ages from linguistic distribution and from the survivals of early social political and religious patterns into later ages </s>
<s> on these pillars rested that solid basis for life and thought which was soon to be manifested in the remarkably unlimited ken of the iliad </s>
<s> everywhere within the common pattern however one finds local diversity </s>
<s> greek history and culture were enduringly fertilized and plagued by the interplay of these conjoined yet opposed factors </s>
<s> further we cannot go for the dark ages deserve their name </s>
<s> many aspects of civilization were not yet sufficiently crystallized to find expression nor could the simple economic and social foundations of this world support a lofty structure </s>
<s> what we have seen in this chapter we have seen only dimly and yet the results however general are worth the search </s>
<s> these are the centuries in which the inhabitants of the aegean world settled firmly into their minds and into their institutions the foundations of the hellenic outlook independent of outside forces </s>
<s> if we could see more deeply we probably would find many side issues and wrong turnings which came to an end within the period </s>
<s> the historian can only point out those lines which were major enough to find reflection in our limited evidence and must hope that future excavations will enrich our understanding </s>
<s> throughout the dark ages it is clear the greek world had been developing slowly but consistently </s>
<s> the pace could now be accelerated for the inhabitants of the aegean stood on firm ground </s>
<s> the first slanting rays of the new day cannot yet dispel all the dark shadows which lie across the aegean world </s>
<s> but our evidence grows considerably in variety and shows more unmistakably some of the lines of change </s>
<s> for this period as for earlier centuries pottery remains the most secure source </s>
<s> the ceramic material of the age is more abundant more diversified and more indicative of the hopes and fears of its makers who begin to show scenes of human life and death </s>
<s> figurines and simple chapels presage the emergence of sculpture and architecture in greece </s>
<s> objects in gold ivory and bronze grow more numerous </s>
<s> since writing was practiced in the aegean before the end of the century we may hope that the details of tradition will now be occasionally useful </s>
<s> the dipylon geometric pottery of athens and the iliad are amazing manifestations of the inherent potentialities of greek civilization </s>
<s> but both were among the last products of a phase which was ending </s>
<s> greek civilization was swirling toward its great revolution in which the developed qualities of the hellenic outlook were suddenly to break forth </s>
<s> the era however is janus-faced </s>
<s> while many tokens point forward the main achievements stand as a culmination of the simple patterns of the dark ages </s>
<s> the dominant pottery of the century was geometric </s>
<s> political organization revolved about the basileis </s>
<s> trade was just beginning to expand </s>
<s> the gods who protected the greek countryside were only now putting on their sharply anthropomorphic dress </s>
<s> the modern student who knows what was to come next is likely to place first the factors of change which are visible in the eighth century </s>
<s> not all men of the period would have accepted this emphasis </s>
<s> many potters clung to the past the more determinedly as they were confronted with radically new ideas </s>

<s> although it is not possible to sunder old and new in this era i shall consider in the present chapter primarily the first decades of the eighth century and shall interpret them as an apogee of the first stage of greek civilization </s>
<s> on this principle of division i must postpone the evolution of sculpture architecture society and politics </s>
<s> for the developments in these areas make sense only if they are connected to the age of revolution itself </s>
<s> we shall not be able entirely to pass over these connections to the east as we consider ripe geometric pottery the epic and the myth and the religious evolution of early greece </s>
<s> the important point however is that these magnificent achievements unlike those of later decades were only incidentally influenced by oriental models </s>

<s> dipylon pottery </s>
<s> the pottery of the first half of the eighth century is commonly called ripe geometric </s>
<s> the severe yet harmonious vases of the previous fifty years the strong geometric style of the late ninth century display as firm a mastery of the principles underlying geometric pottery </s>
<s> but artists now were ready to refine and elaborate their inheritance </s>
<s> the vases which resulted had different shapes far more complex decoration and a larger sense of style </s>
<s> beyond the aesthetic and technical aspects of this expansion we must consider the change in pottery style on broader lines </s>
<s> in earlier centuries men had had enough to do in rebuilding a fundamental sense of order after chaos </s>
<s> they had had to work on very simple foundations and had not dared to give rein to impulses </s>
<s> the potters in particular had virtually eschewed freehand drawing elaborate motifs and the curving lines of nature while yet expressing a belief that there was order in the universe </s>
<s> in their vases were embodied the basic aesthetic and logical characteristics of greek civilization at first hesitantly in protogeometric work and then more confidently in the initial stages of the geometric style </s>
<s> it was time to take bigger steps to venture on experiments </s>
<s> ripe geometric potters continued to employ the old syntax of ornaments and shapes and made use of the well-defined though limited range of motifs which they had inherited </s>
<s> in these respects the vases of the early eighth century represent a culmination of earlier lines of progress </s>
<s> to the ancestral lore however new materials were added </s>
<s> painters left less and less of a vase in a plain dark color </s>
<s> instead they divided the surface into many bands or covered it by all-over patterns into which freehand drawing began to creep </s>
<s> the rows of animals and birds in particular suggest awareness of oriental animal friezes transmitted perhaps via syrian silver bowls and textiles but the specific forms of these rows on local vases and metal products are nonetheless greek </s>
<s> though the spread of this type of decoration in the aegean has not yet been precisely determined it seems to appear first in the cyclades which were among the leading exporters of pottery throughout the century </s>
<s> as the material at the command of the potters grew and the volume of their production increased the local variations within a common style became more evident </s>

<s> with respect to this view two points are worth making </s>
<s> more believed that a man could be both serious and gay </s>
<s> that a writer who is gay cannot be serious is a common professional illusion sedulously fostered by all too many academics who mistakenly believe that their frivolous efforts should be taken seriously because they are expressed with that dreary solemnity which is the only mode of expression their authors are capable of </s>
<s> indeed it is even surprising in the canon of christ church and regius professor of ecclesiastical history who fathered this most peculiar view and in the brilliant professor of medieval and renaissance english at cambridge who inherited it and is now its most eminent proponent </s>

<s> similar literary exercises were the common doings of a christian humanist of the first two decades of the sixteenth century </s>

<s> we want to know why that book has kept on selling the way it has </s>
<s> we want to know what is perennially new about utopia </s>
<s> to that question the answer is simple </s>
<s> it can be made in two words utopian communism </s>
<s> but it is an answer which opens the door wide to an onrush of objections and denials </s>
<s> surely there is nothing new about communism </s>
<s> this conception was taken up by the early church fathers and by canon lawyers and theologians in the middle ages </s>
<s> and more was far too well read not to have come across it in one or several of the forms thus given it </s>
<s> we are concerned not with the genus communism nor with other species of the genus platonic stoic early christian monastic canonist or theological communism </s>
<s> perhaps one way to sharpen our sense of the modernity of utopian communism is to contrast it with the principal earlier types of communistic theory </s>
<s> we will achieve a more vivid sense of what it is by realizing what it is not </s>
<s> its function is to separate from the base ruled mass among whom private ownership prevails the governing warrior elite </s>
<s> and it is to this problem that the republic ultimately returns </s>
<s> utopian communism applies to all utopians </s>
<s> and in the economy of the book it is not peripheral but central </s>
<s> the concern of utopia is with the optimo reipublicae statu the best ordering of a civil society </s>
<s> and it is again and again made clear that utopian communism provides the institutional array indispensible to that best ordering </s>
<s> the apostolic community was literally an elite chosen by christ himself </s>
<s> and the monastic communities were supposed to be made up of volunteers selected only after a novitiate which would test their religious aptitude for monastic rigors their spiritual athleticism </s>
<s> in that tradition communism lay a safe distance back in the age of innocence before the fall of man </s>
<s> it did not serve to contrast the existing order of society with a possible alternative order because the age of innocence was not a possible alternative once man had sinned </s>
<s> the actual function of patristic communism was adequately set forth by st gregory almost a millenium before more wrote utopia </s>
<s> when we give the necessities of life to the poor we restore to them what is already theirs </s>
<s> because community not severalty of property is the law of nature no man can assert an absolutely unalterable right to what is his </s>
<s> indeed of all that is his every man is by nature and reason and therefore by conscience obligated to regard himself as a custodian </s>
<s> he is a trustee for the common good however feeble the safeguards which the positive or municipal law of property provides against his misuse of that share of the common fund wisely or unwisely entrusted to his keeping </s>
<s> in contrast to this stoic-patristic view utopia implies that the nature of man is such that to rely on individual conscience to supply the deficiencies of municipal law is to embark on the bottomless sea of human sinfulness in a sieve </s>
<s> the utopians brace conscience with legal sanctions </s>
<s> in a properly ordered society the massive force of public law performs the function which in natural law theory ineptly is left altogether to a small voice so often still </s>
<s> in all the respects just indicated utopian communism differs from previous conceptions in which community of possessions and living plays a role </s>
<s> neither from one of these conceptions nor from a combination of them can it be deduced </s>
<s> we do not deny originality to the agamemnon because aeschylus found the tales of the house of atreus among the folk lore of the greeks </s>
<s> it is not merely a new thing </s>
<s> it is one of the very few new things in utopia </s>
<s> most of the rest is medieval or humanist or part of an old tradition of social criticism </s>
<s> but to say that at a moment in history something is new is not necessarily to say that it is modern </s>
<s> consider the features of utopian communism generous public provision for the infirm </s>
<s> democratic and secret elections of all officers including priests meals taken publicly in common refectories </s>
<s> a common habit or uniform prescribed for all citizens </s>
<s> even houses changed once a decade </s>
<s> six hours of manual labor a day for all but a handful of magistrates and scholars and careful measures to prevent anyone from shirking </s>
<s> no private property no money </s>
<s> no sort of pricing at all for any goods or services and therefore no market in the economic sense of the term </s>
<s> whatever the merits of its intent utopian communism is far too naive far too crude to suit any modern socialist or communist </s>
<s> it is not the details of utopian communism that make utopia modern it is the spirit the attitude of mind that informs those details </s>
<s> what that spirit and attitude were we can best understand if we see more precisely how it contrasts with the communist tradition with the longest continuous history the one which reached christianity by the way of stoicism through the church fathers of late antiquity </s>

<s> to reinforce and sometimes to replace the simulated typography braque and picasso began to mix sand and other foreign substances with their paint </s>
<s> the granular texture thus created likewise called attention to the reality of the surface and was effective over much larger areas </s>
<s> in certain other pictures however braque began to paint areas in exact simulation of wood graining or marbleizing </s>
<s> that is by being placed in such relation to the forms depicted within the illusion that these forms left no room for the typography except near the surface </s>
<s> the accumulation of such devices however soon had the effect of telescoping even while separating surface and depth </s>
<s> the process of flattening seemed inexorable and it became necessary to emphasize the surface still further in order to prevent it from fusing with the illusion </s>
<s> but it is also true that braque was the consistent pioneer in the use of simulated textures as well as of typography </s>
<s> when we examine what each master says was his first collage we see that much the same thing happens in each </s>
<s> but here again the surface-declaring device both overshoots and falls short of its aim </s>
<s> because of the size of the areas it covers the pasted paper establishes undepicted flatness bodily as more than an indication or sign </s>
<s> literal flatness now tends to assert itself as the main event of the picture and the device boomerangs the illusion of depth is rendered even more precarious than before </s>
<s> instead of isolating the literal flatness by specifying and circumscribing it the pasted paper or cloth releases and spreads it and the artist seems to have nothing left but this undepicted flatness with which to finish as well as start his picture </s>
<s> and the surface is driven back in its very surfaceness only by this contrast </s>
<s> at the same time the wallpaper strips themselves seem to be pushed into depth by the lines and patches of shading charcoaled upon them and by their placing in relation to the block capitals </s>
<s> and these capitals seem in turn to be pushed back by their placing and by contrast with the corporeality of the woodgraining </s>
<s> thus every part and plane of the picture keeps changing place in relative depth with every other part and plane </s>
<s> and it is as if the only stable relation left among the different parts of the picture is the ambivalent and ambiguous one that each has with the surface </s>
<s> in later collages of both masters a variety of extraneous materials are used sometimes in the same work and almost always in conjunction with every other eye-deceiving and eye-undeceiving device they can think of </s>
<s> planes defined as parallel to the surface also cut through it into real space and a depth is suggested optically which is greater than that established pictorially </s>
<s> all this expands the oscillation between surface and depth so as to encompass fictive space in front of the surface as well as behind it </s>
<s> rather it underpins and reinforces that literalness re-creates it </s>
<s> out of this re-created literalness the cubist subject reemerged </s>
<s> for it had turned out by a further paradox of cubism that the means to an illusion of depth and plasticity had now become widely divergent from the means of representation or imaging </s>
<s> in the analytical phase of their cubism braque and picasso had not only had to minimize three-dimensionality simply in order to preserve it </s>
<s> in order to be saved plasticity had had to be isolated </s>
<s> and as the aspect of the subject was transposed into those clusters of more or less interchangeable and contour-obliterating facet-planes by which plasticity was isolated under the cubist method the subject itself became largely unrecognizable </s>
<s> it was then that picasso and braque were confronted with a unique dilemma they had to choose between illusion and representation </s>
<s> it was the collage that made the terms of this dilemma clear the representational could be restored and preserved only on the flat and literal surface now that illusion and representation had become for the first time mutually exclusive alternatives </s>
<s> in the end picasso and braque plumped for the representational and it would seem they did so deliberately </s>
<s> left in their previous atom-like smallness they would have cut away too abruptly into depth </s>
<s> and the broad opaque shapes of pasted paper would have been isolated in such a way as to make them jump out of plane </s>
<s> large planes juxtaposed with other large planes tend to assert themselves as independent shapes and to the extent that they are flat they also assert themselves as silhouettes </s>
<s> analytical cubism came to an end in the collage but not conclusively </s>
<s> nor did synthetic cubism fully begin there </s>
<s> only when the collage had been exhaustively translated into oil and transformed by this translation did cubism become an affair of positive color and flat interlocking silhouettes whose legibility and placement created allusions to if not the illusion of unmistakable three-dimensional identities </s>
<s> this was the point at which he finally took the lead in cubist innovation away from braque never again to relinquish it </s>
<s> but even before that picasso had glimpsed and entered for a moment a certain revolutionary path in which no one had preceded him </s>
<s> to this he glued and fitted other pieces of paper and four taut strings thus creating a sequence of flat surfaces in real and sculptural space to which there clung only the vestige of a picture plane </s>
<s> the affixed elements of collage were extruded as it were and cut off from the literal pictorial surface to form a bas-relief </s>

<s> the open ceiling with allegorical and classical figures thrown in masses against the sky the closed frieze formally divided into historical scenes and tightly tied to the stone walls belong in their large ordering to the line of correggio and his baroque followers </s>
<s> the descent may be remote but this is surely the only full-scale example of that vigorous inheritance in the united states </s>
<s> constantino brumidi designed the decorative scheme as a whole in collaboration with the architect charles u walter at the time when plans were being made to replace the wooden dome of bullfinch with the present much larger iron structure </s>
<s> after many years and many interruptions he was able to finish the canopy fresco and slightly less than half the frieze beginning with the liberty group opposite the east door and ending with william penn all but one leg when a tragic accident ended his career </s>
<s> he left at his death sketches drawn to scale for the rest of the circle </s>
<s> when costaggini had used up all the sketches thirty-six feet of empty frieze were left over </s>
<s> later the cleaning and restoration were ordered first of the older part of the frieze finally of the canopy </s>
<s> what follows is therefore a description of three separate undertakings the new frescoing of the gap and the successive essays in conservation with some discussion of problems that arose in connection with each </s>
<s> for the use of students and future restorers a full day-by-day record was kept of all three undertakings complete technical reports on what we found and what we did </s>
<s> these may be consulted in the office of the architect of the capitol or the library of congress </s>
<s> the first preliminary was inspecting the unfinished length of frieze a jumble of roughcast and finish coats all in bad condition </s>
<s> it was decided to strip the whole area down to the bricks and to replace the rough coats up to one inch thickness to agree with the older artists preparation with a mortar one part slaked lime three parts sand to be put on in two layers </s>
<s> cartoons were drawn full size after sketches had been made to satisfy all the authorities </s>
<s> there was some difficulty here </s>
<s> moreover all three representations must be squeezed comfortably into little more than the length brumidi allowed for each one of his </s>
<s> when it was all arranged to fit and not to interrupt the lengthwise flow of movement in the frieze the cartoons were tried in place </s>
<s> the scaffolding a confusion of heavy beams hanging from the gallery above was strong and safe but obscured visibility </s>
<s> nothing could be seen from the floor but by moving around the gallery one could get glimpses </s>
<s> and we were able to decide on some amplification of scale </s>
<s> to be sure of matching color as well as form pieces of cartoon were traced on the roughcast and large samples painted in fresco then left two months to dry out to their final key </s>
<s> later it was gratifying to note that they had set so solidly as to be hard to remove when the time came </s>
<s> the scaffold was the length of the space to be painted </s>
<s> what bits of brumidi and costaggini could be reached at either end seemed in good order though the roughish sandy surface was thick with dust </s>
<s> washed they came out surprisingly clear and bright </s>
<s> that is they used opaque color throughout getting solid highlights with active lime white </s>
<s> a brown hatching reinforces and broadens shadows and much of the background is solidly covered with a dark coat </s>
<s> this brown is sometimes so rich in medium as to appear to be oil paint </s>
<s> the mortar was three parts sand to two of lime </s>
<s> some of the lime that is always on hand in the capitol basement for plaster repairs was slaked several months for us </s>
<s> i am told that a mortar longer slaked might have remained longer in condition for painting </s>
<s> as it was it took the pigment well for six hours enough for our purpose and held it firmly in setting </s>
<s> it was obvious that to match brumidi white must be mixed with all but the darkest tones </s>
<s> other pigments were mostly raw umber some burnt umber and a little yellow ochre </s>
<s> experience showed however that it is very difficult to paint a dark umber background in fresco that will not dry out spotty and uneven </s>
<s> later brumidi and costaggini will be seen coping with this same problem </s>
<s> we were forced as they were to work a good deal of tempera into background and dark areas </s>
<s> ground together they made a strong adhesive which became waterproof in drying </s>
<s> the new part is finished </s>
<s> on the right is the brumidi liberty group as it looked after cleaning operations which had not yet come around to the other end </s>
<s> where of costaggini only some foliage has been washed at the point where his work stopped </s>
<s> one is led to speculate as to why the empty space was there left for our century to finish </s>
<s> the startlingly bright effect of the first washings led the committee to order the rest of the brumidi-costaggini cycle cleaned and restored to go with them </s>
<s> the fixed wooden scaffold was removed and so as to reach all the frieze one of pipe on wheels built up from the floor </s>
<s> every few days in the early morning as the work progressed twenty men would appear to push it ahead and to shift the plank foundation that distributed its weight widely on the rotunda pavement supported as it is by ancient brick vaulting </s>
<s> on this giddy and oscillating platform over fifty feet from the floor after a first dusting we began to wash </s>
<s> a valve in the handle let us cut the pressure still lower </s>
<s> one man sprayed with a sponge in hand to check excess wetting </s>
<s> a second assistant mopped with two sponges </s>
<s> in parts a repeated sponging was needed but everywhere we found that water alone was enough to restore the original brightness </s>
<s> no soap or other cleaning agent was used that might bring in unwanted chemical reactions </s>
<s> necessary retouching was put on at once </s>
<s> we were greatly helped by there being no traces of former restoring </s>
<s> apparently not more than dusting had ever been done and not much of that </s>
<s> the plaster was sound the intonaco firmly attached all over and the pigment solidly incorporated with it in all but a few unimportant places </s>
<s> here the architect referring to the use of the capitol as a public building not a museum requested some repainting to maintain decorative effect rather than leaving blank unsightly patches </s>
<s> these frescos have had no care for eighty years </s>
<s> with naked gas jets below and leaky windows above enough to ruin wall paintings in any medium they have survived in a building long unheated in winter hot and damp under the iron dome in summer </s>
<s> those whom i wish to address with this letter are for the most part unknown to me </s>
<s> it may well be that when rudy pozzatti and i visited your country last spring you were living and working close to the places we saw and the streets we walked </s>
<s> as american artists it was natural that we would want to meet as many soviet artists as possible </s>
<s> this letter might not have been necessary had our efforts to meet and talk with you been more successful </s>
<s> even though we did not see many of your faces it appears now quite evident that a considerable number of your profession heard from those whom we had the fortune to encounter that we had been in your midst </s>
<s> i am very pleased that quite a number of you found ways to communicate to me your desire to hear of our reactions and experiences in the ussr </s>
<s> i can well understand your curiosity </s>
<s> we ourselves are always eager to know how others feel about us and the way in which we live </s>
<s> it is my hope that this written message and report will reach you through the good offices of the union of soviet artists </s>
<s> there should be no reason to misinterpret or ignore the intent of this letter </s>
<s> pozzatti and i endeavored earnestly to record our impressions without the prejudice that the anxiety of our time so easily provokes </s>
<s> the time-span of little more than a month cannot entitle me to pose as an expert on anything i saw </s>
<s> nevertheless i consider it reasonable because of my commitment as an artist to assume that the rights and responsibilities of creative individuals are related to humanity as a whole rather than to specific geo-political interests </s>
<s> if this attitude is seriously questioned in the soviet union it does not necessarily follow that the majority of the society in which i live is too aware of the necessity for clarity on this ethical as well as aesthetic point of view </s>
<s> it is a matter of some disappointment to me that still many of my own countrymen are too shortsighted to ascribe any symbolic significance to the plight of a minority such as artists in any social order </s>
<s> i encountered many questions and great interest upon my return from the soviet union about my reactions to that experience </s>
<s> that which i found most profound and most disturbing appeared to evoke a curiously muted reaction </s>
<s> almost as if i were talking about something quite unreal </s>
<s> apparently this is not the time and the climate in which people will listen objectively or at least dispassionately to individual impressions of a subject which preoccupies a good deal of their waking moments </s>
<s> personal predispositions tend to blunt the ear and in turn the voice as well </s>
<s> i cannot be content with the anecdotal small talk of a somewhat unusual travelogue </s>
<s> i am equally impatient with the shrug of the shoulder shake of the head of those who no longer care because they have known it for so long </s>
<s> the belligerent denunciations by the sick fanatics of ignorance who try to build a papier-mache wall of pseudo-patriotism on our physical horizons </s>
<s> difficult as it may have been at times pozzatti and i saw enough talked to enough artists historians and others to realize that the issue is quite clear </s>
<s> artists and poets are the raw nerve-ends of humanity </s>
<s> they are small in number and their contribution is not immediately decisive in everyday life </s>
<s> by themselves they may not be able to save the life on this planet but without them there would be very little left worth saving </s>
<s> it cannot be said that our very first day in the soviet union turned out to be an ordinary one </s>
<s> if we thus spent our very first day in the midst of a large number of your people honoring a new hero and a great national achievement our last day to us at least was equally impressive and very moving even though the crowds were absent and there was almost complete silence </s>
<s> we stood under a gigantic tree in the rolling country just outside of moscow looking at silent flowers on the grave of a russian poet and writer who cherished the love for his country to the point of foregoing the highest international honor </s>
<s> the grave about half-way between his home and the blue turrets of a small church rose above the forms and spaces of gently undisciplined pastures of green the sounds of birds the silence of other graves and the casual paths through small forests </s>
<s> just yesterday we had met and talked with a living writer a contemporary of the dead poet who is known for his ability of manipulating his ideas and his craft more advantageously </s>
<s> but today we were aware of only two men </s>
<s> one had taken a flight into uncharted space in the service of science to return as a living hero </s>
<s> the other had assumed the right to explore the equally uncharted space of the human spirit </s>
<s> these two recollections form the frame around a series of experiences and sights which to me at least symbolize the extremes in the aesthetic as well as ethical conflict between materialism and humanism </s>
<s> a struggle that is being waged all over the world in the half-light of disinterest </s>
<s> the prevalent opinion which we encountered in a variety of expressions in your country denied not only the existence of this conflict but it was elaborated even further with an incredible semantic dexterity </s>
<s> the socialist environment it was stated had cross-fertilized these two extreme seeds and was about to produce a new plant and fruit </s>
<s> when i speculated on one such occasion that the new growth like other mutations might be unable to propagate i was immediately accused of preaching racial prejudice </s>
<s> this kind of reasoning and logic takes a little time to get used to </s>
<s> after a while we were perhaps less surprised but still puzzled when a friendly discussion would suddenly jump the track into the most irrelevant and illogical comparisons </s>
<s> theories of the behavior pattern of population masses were compared to scientific discoveries concerning the motion-pattern of gaseous masses </s>
<s> no wonder that pozzatti and i had at times difficulty in remembering the real purpose of our presence namely cultural exchange </s>
<s> typical of such an experience was the occasion of a somewhat formal official welcome in the offices of the union of soviet artists </s>
<s> instead we became involved in a series of friendly but overly formal welcoming addresses to which we had no choice but to reply in kind </s>
<s> the terms of friendship understanding cooperation etc tend to become somewhat shopworn because of constant and indiscriminate use </s>
<s> i can only hope that the continuing exchange of groups and individuals between our countries will not wear out all language pertinent to the occasion </s>
<s> the presiding female functionary of massive proportions and forbidding appearance initially did not contribute to the expressions of friendship and welcome by a number of dignified gentlemen representing the arts </s>
<s> it was only after we had responded with what i fear were similar cliches that she went into action by questioning our desire for friendship and understanding with a challenge about aggressive and warlike actions by the us government in cuba and laos </s>
<s> she retreated by leaving the room when we suggested that our meeting might well terminate right then and there </s>
<s> unfortunately she returned later just as i had taken advantage of the friendlier atmosphere in the room by stating that perhaps an unexpected result of the cultural exchange program would be the re-emergence of abstract art in russia with social realism regaining dominance in the us </s>
<s> this gave her an opportunity to ring down the curtain with the petulant admonition that we should not presume to lecture her on abstraction </s>
<s> she did not go so far as to say as was done on other occasions that abstraction as well as impressionism were a russian invention that had been discarded as unwanted by the people of the ussr </s>
<s> pozzatti and i could not know then that we would experience this sort of treatment more often in moscow than elsewhere </s>
<s> until our moscow experience i had not considered it necessary to prepare any argument formally or informally </s>
<s> artists simply do not talk to each other in that fashion </s>
<s> and furthermore i could not presume the implication that i spoke for american artists as a group </s>
<s> to save time some clarification seemed necessary </s>
<s> the following is a statement read to a large and friendly group of your fellow artists in leningrad </s>
<s> our presence here should also be considered further sincere evidence of the attempts by our people and their chosen government to seek any and all possible ways to effect closer peaceful ties among all people </s>
<s> we are quite convinced that one of the main hopes for the future depends upon the informal contacts and exchanges of ideas between individuals </s>
<s> in spite of the relatively short period of time that we have experienced among you we have already seen many indications of your character and spirit </s>
<s> we are acutely aware that yours is a society which in spite of several wars and many privations has developed itself into one of the foremost nations of the world </s>
<s> your past history is resplendent with the fruits of the intellect </s>
<s> your present history is equally admirable for its industrial and scientific achievements </s>
<s> we have come to you to experience something of your way of life while also attempting to acquaint you with that of ours </s>
<s> while we as american artists believe deeply in the universal character of all intellectual activity we would be less than honest with you or ourselves if we failed to state a specific attitude toward our own society as well as the international community as a whole </s>
<s> in stating this position we should like to make it clear to you that we cannot expect artists and intellectuals in other lands to share our opinion in every respect </s>
<s> as a matter of fact we prize the diversity among our own people so much that we will not presume to speak for all other american artists </s>
<s> but certainly all will agree that it is not so much the knowledge and search for similarities between you and us but rather the thoughtful exploration and acceptance of our differences which may lead us to our respective and desired goals with a minimum of misunderstanding </s>
<s> like yourselves we have pride and love for our country </s>
<s> to many of us this is a land to which we or our parents fled from totalitarian terror in order to live in dignified freedom </s>
<s> as artists we feel the same obligation as do other individuals in considering ourselves responsible citizens of a great nation </s>
<s> the sane society is an ambitious work </s>
<s> even a hasty reader will easily find in it numerous blind spots errors of fact and argument important exclusions areas of ignorance and prejudice undue emphases on trivia examples of broad positions supported by flimsy evidence and the like </s>
<s> such books are easy prey for critics </s>
<s> nor need the critic be captious </s>
<s> a careful and orderly man who values precision and a kind of tough intellectual responsibility might easily be put off by such a book </s>
<s> it is a simple matter for one so disposed to take a work like the sane society and shred it into odds and ends </s>
<s> that could be easily done but there is little reason in it </s>
<s> it would come down to saying that fromm paints with a broad brush and that after all is not a conclusion one must work toward but an impression he has from the outset </s>
<s> it would be superfluous to build a critique around them </s>
<s> almost no empirical work has been done on the problem of alienation </s>
<s> despite its rather long intellectual history alienation is still a promising hypothesis and not a verified theory </s>
<s> the idea has received much attention in philosophy in literature and in a few works of general social criticism such as the sane society </s>
<s> until such work is done there must remain the nagging suspicion that alienation may be little more than an expression of the malaise of the intellectual who rejected by and in turn rejecting the larger society projects his own fear and despair onto the broader social screen </s>
<s> i am not suggesting that fromm ought to do this kind of work </s>
<s> nor do i think that alienation is nothing more than a projection of the malaise of the intellectual </s>
<s> i am saying only that until a fuller and different kind of evidence comes in any discussion of alienation must be understood to have certain important limitations </s>
<s> until such evidence appears we must make do with the evidence we have </s>
<s> here perhaps fromm is vulnerable for he does not always use the best and most recent evidence available and he sometimes selects and interprets the evidence in rather special ways </s>
<s> three examples follow </s>
<s> the broad conclusions of that pioneering work remain undisturbed but subsequent research has expanded and somewhat altered their empirical support has suggested important revisions in the general analytic frame of reference and has sharpened the meaning of particular analytic concepts in this area </s>
<s> fromm seems unaware of these developments </s>
<s> another example is his very infrequent use of the large amount of data from surveys designed to discover what and how people actually do feel and think on a broad range of topics he cites such survey-type findings just three times </s>
<s> moreover the conclusions he draws from the findings are not always the only ones possible </s>
<s> fromm says these data show that job dissatisfaction and resentment are widespread </s>
<s> that is one way to read the findings but again there are other ways </s>
<s> he seems to use the term alienation in two different ways </s>
<s> sometimes he uses it as a subjective descriptive term and sometimes as an objective diagnostic one </s>
<s> that is sometimes it is used to describe felt human misery and other times it is postulated to explain unfelt anxiety and discontent </s>
<s> the failure to keep these two usages distinct presents hazards to the reader </s>
<s> it also permits fromm to do some dubious things with empirical findings </s>
<s> when alienation is used as an objective and diagnostic category for example it becomes clear that fromm would have to say that awareness of alienation goes far toward conquering it </s>
<s> thus in the example cited above fromm rests his whole case on the premise that the workers are being deprived unconsciously unknowingly of fulfillment and then supports this with survey data reporting conscious experienced frustrations </s>
<s> he has his cake and eats it too if the workers say they are dissatisfied this shows conscious alienation </s>
<s> if they say they are satisfied this shows unconscious alienation </s>
<s> there is nothing remarkable about this at all </s>
<s> glance at the list burckhardt tolstoy proudhon thoreau london marx tawney mayo durkheim tannenbaum mumford a r heron huxley schweitzer and einstein </s>
<s> this is a delightfully motley collection </s>
<s> one can make them say the same thing only by not listening to them very carefully and hearing only what one wants to hear </s>
<s> the method of selection fromm uses achieves exactly that </s>
<s> furthermore the list is interesting for its omissions </s>
<s> it omits for example practically the whole line of great nineteenth century english social critics nearly all the great writers whose basic position is religious and all those who are with more or less accuracy called existentialists </s>
<s> these almost by definition are spokesmen for an alienated ideology </s>
<s> it is not hard to find that concurrence of opinion which fromm finds so remarkable when you ignore all who hold a different opinion </s>
<s> one such instance has already been presented his use of alienation </s>
<s> the only other one i shall mention here is his use of the term capitalism </s>
<s> for fromm capitalism is the enemy the root of all evil </s>
<s> in this he followed a path that led back to the very source of opera </s>
<s> such composers as monteverdi lully and purcell with the same goal in mind had developed styles of recitative sensitively attuned to their own languages </s>
<s> through long experimentation in his songs mussorgsky developed a russian recitative as different from others as the language itself </s>
<s> giving most of his musical continuity to the orchestra he lets the speech fall into place as if by coincidence but controlling the pace and emphasis of the words </s>
<s> the moments of sung melody in the usual sense come most often when the character is actually supposed to be singing as in folk songs and liturgical chants </s>
<s> even then the flexibility of the phrasing suggests that the word comes first in importance </s>
<s> aside from boris himself one need but examine the secondary roles to place mussorgsky among the masters of musical portraiture </s>
<s> even those who appear in only one or two scenes are full personalities defined with economical precision </s>
<s> consider the four monks who figure prominently in the action pimen varlaam missail and the jesuit rangoni </s>
<s> under no circumstances could we mistake one for the other </s>
<s> each musical setting has an individual touch </s>
<s> a quiet but sturdy theme somewhat folklike in character appears whenever the old monk speaks of the history he is recording or of his own past life </s>
<s> it changes and develops according to the text </s>
<s> it introduces pimen when he comes before boris in the last act </s>
<s> once he has been identified however a new melody is used to accompany his narrative a bleak motif with barren octaves creating a rather ancient effect </s>
<s> here the composer uses a favorite device of his the intensification of the mood through key relationships </s>
<s> the original d minor seems to symbolize blindness inescapable in spite of all attempts to move away from it </s>
<s> varlaam and missail always appear together and often sing together in a straightforward rhythmically vigorous idiom that distinguishes them from the more subtle and well-educated pimen </s>
<s> their begging song might easily be a folk melody </s>
<s> the same could be said for the song to which they make their entrance in the final scene </s>
<s> apparently their origin is humble their approach to life direct and unsophisticated </s>
<s> missail is the straight man not very talkative mild-mannered when he does speak </s>
<s> varlaam is loud rowdy uninhibited in his pleasures and impatient with anyone who is not the same </s>
<s> a rough ostinato figure heard first in the introduction to the inn scene characterizes him amusingly and reappears whenever he comes into the action </s>
<s> the song of kazan in which this figure becomes a wild-sounding accompaniment fills in the picture of undisciplined high spirits </s>
<s> the phrasing is irregular and the abrupt key changes have a primitive forcefulness </s>
<s> as the knack gradually comes back to him his rhythm becomes steadier with the rigid monotony of an unskilled reader </s>
<s> for the only time in the opera words are not set according to their natural inflection </s>
<s> to do so would have spoiled the dramatic point of the scene </s>
<s> musically and dramatically rangoni is as far removed from the conventional monk as varlaam </s>
<s> his speech shows none of the native accent of the russian characters </s>
<s> in spite of the italian name he sounds french </s>
<s> the effect is as if he had materialized out of nowhere </s>
<s> he speaks quietly concealing his authority beneath a smooth humility just as the shifting harmonies that accompany him all but hide the firm pedal point beneath them </s>
<s> it is only after he has involved her emotions in his scheme that he uses her given name placing himself by implication in the position of a solicitous father </s>
<s> curiously this scene is a close parallel to one that verdi was writing at the same time the scene between amonasro and aida </s>
<s> rangoni begins by describing the sad state of the church </s>
<s> this brings a reaction of distress from marina </s>
<s> the music becomes ethereal as he calls up a vision of her own sainthood it is she he tells her who can bring the truth to russia and convert the heretics </s>
<s> this is no assignment for a frivolous girl she assures him </s>
<s> now rangoni comes to the point and we hear for the first time a long downward chromatic scale that will become the characteristic motif of his sinister power </s>
<s> another theme sinuously chromatic appears as he directs her to gain power over grigori by any means even at the cost of her honor </s>
<s> coming from a priest the music sounds as odd as the advice </s>
<s> marina rebels at this suggestion </s>
<s> her pride is as much at stake as her virtue </s>
<s> she is the unattainable beauty the princess who turns away suitors by the dozen </s>
<s> indignantly she denounces rangoni for his evil thoughts and orders him to leave her </s>
<s> at once the jesuit pulls out all the stops </s>
<s> to music of a menacing darkness he describes the powers of satan gaining control of the girl poisoning her soul with pride and destroying her beauty </s>
<s> the combined threat of hell-fire and ugliness is too much for her and she falls terrified at his feet </s>
<s> we are reminded of this at the end of the next scene when his theme cuts through the warmth of the love duet again throwing a chill over the atmosphere </s>
<s> the most unusual feature of boris however is the use of the greatest character of all the chorus </s>
<s> this is the real protagonist of the drama </s>
<s> the conflict is not boris versus grigori or shuiski or even the ghost of the murdered child but boris versus the russian people </s>
<s> mussorgsky makes this quite clear by the extent to which choral scenes propel the action </s>
<s> boris first entrance seems almost a footnote to the splendor of the coronation scene with its dazzling confusion of tonalities </s>
<s> one reason for the unique vitality of the chorus is its great variety in expression </s>
<s> it rarely speaks as a unit </s>
<s> even in its most conventional appearance the guests song of praise to marina there are a few female dissenters criticizing the princess for her coldness </s>
<s> hot arguments arise between tenors and basses who will sing in harmony only when they agree on an idea </s>
<s> the opening scene shows this method at its most individual </s>
<s> mussorgsky paints a telling picture of the common people those who must suffer the effects of their rulers struggle for power without understanding the causes </s>
<s> they are held in control by force but barely </s>
<s> they will kneel and plead for boris leadership in a strangely intense song its phrases irregularly broken as if gasping for breath but when the police with their cudgels move away they mock and grumble and fight among themselves </s>
<s> there is a quick change from the plaintive song to a conversational tone </s>
<s> and mityukh apparently the intellectual leader of the crowd replies that he has no notion </s>
<s> the jokes and arguments grow louder until the police return </s>
<s> then the people strike up their song with even more fervor than before ending it with a wail of despair </s>
<s> mussorgsky frequently uses liturgical music with considerable dramatic force </s>
<s> the living as well as the dead now accuse him </s>
<s> this final reminder of his guilt is the fatal one </s>
<s> though brief it has a sharp dramatic edge and great poignancy </s>
<s> the mayhem in the forest of kromy is a natural sequel </s>
<s> the service is over and a number of people come from the church with their spokesman mityukh in the lead </s>
<s> they bring the news that the pretender has been excommunicated </s>
<s> this is met with scorn by the hearers who claim that mityukh is lying or drunk </s>
<s> so far these remarks like most criticisms of hardy have tacitly assumed that his poetry is all of a piece one solid mass of verse expressing a sensibility at a single stage of development </s>
<s> one might expect that in a poetic career of seventy-odd years some changes in style and method would have occurred some development taken place </s>
<s> this is not however the case and development is a term which we can apply to hardy only in a very limited sense </s>
<s> in a time when poetic style and poetic belief as well seem in a state of continual flux hardy stands out as a poet of almost perverse consistency </s>
<s> though he struggled with philosophy all his life he never got much beyond the pessimism of his twenties </s>
<s> and though in his later years he revised his poems many times the revisions did not alter the essential nature of the style which he had established before he was thirty </s>
<s> so that while it usually is easy to recognize a poem by hardy it is difficult to date one </s>
<s> there is only one hardy style but in the earlier poems that style is only intermittently evident and when it is not the style is the style of another poet or of the fashion of the time </s>
<s> in the later poems however the personal tone predominates </s>
<s> the bad early poems are bad shakespeare or bad swinburne </s>
<s> the bad late poems are bad hardy </s>
<s> these dates are virtually the only clues we have to the chronology of the poems since the separate volumes are neither chronological within themselves nor in relation to each other </s>
<s> the dated poems also give us an idea of the degree to which hardy drew upon past productions for his various volumes and therefore probably are an indication of the amount of poetry he was writing at the time </s>
<s> satires of circumstance and moments of vision coming during his most productive decade are relatively self-contained </s>
<s> two entries in the early life support the assumption that during this period hardy had virtually suspended the writing of poetry </s>
<s> and the first world war </s>
<s> we may carry this sequence one step further and say that at seventy he was a poet at the height of his powers wanting only the impetus of two tragedies one personal the other national to loose those powers in poetry </s>
<s> like a wise gardener hardy pruned away the shakespearian sonnets and songs and the elements of meter and poetic diction to which his personal style was not suited and let the main stock of his talent flourish </s>
<s> the range of the later poetry is considerably narrower but the number of successful poems is far greater </s>
<s> almost anyone could have written it </s>
<s> it is competent in the sense that it makes a coherent statement without violating the rules of the sonnet form but it is entirely undistinguished and entirely unlike hardy </s>
<s> the language is the conventional language of the form </s>
<s> there is no phrase or image that sounds like hardy or that is striking enough to give individuality to the poem </s>
<s> it is smoother than hardy usually is but with the smoothness of anonymity </s>
<s> there are many such competently anonymous performances among the earlier poems </s>
<s> if it is somber it is also precise and the precision lends authority to the vision </s>
<s> hardy was not hardy very often </s>
<s> these are the poems hardy wrote after the death of his first wife </s>
<s> they compose a painful elegy to what might have been to a marriage that began with a promise of happiness and ended in long years of suffering and hatred </s>
<s> hardy obviously felt that these poems were peculiarly personal and private </s>
<s> the view is always toward the past </s>
<s> the fire of love is dead and hardy stands as the speaker does in the last poem of the sequence over the burnt circle of charred sticks and thinks of past happiness and present grief honest and uncomforted </s>
<s> critically invisible modern revolt like x-rays and radioactivity is perceived only by its effects at more materialistic social levels where it is called delinquency </s>
<s> if the word deliberate means anything both of them certainly deliberately destroyed themselves </s>
<s> both of them were overcome by the horror of the world in which they found themselves because at last they could no longer overcome that world with the weapon of a purely lyrical art </s>
<s> both of them were my friends </s>
<s> living in san francisco i saw them seldom enough to see them with a perspective which was not distorted by exasperation or fatigue </s>
