<s> it had assumed the terrifying inertia of inanimate matter </s>
<s> being with him was like being swept away by a torrent of falling stones </s>
<s> now dylan thomas and charlie parker have a great deal more in common than the same disastrous end </s>
<s> as artists they were very similar </s>
<s> they were both very fluent </s>
<s> but this fluent enchanting utterance had compared with important artists of the past relatively little content </s>
<s> neither of them got very far beyond a sort of entranced rapture at his own creativity </s>
<s> music of course is not so explicit an art but anybody who knew charlie parker knows that he felt much the same way about his own gift </s>
<s> it is the theme of horace who certainly otherwise bears little resemblance to parker or thomas </s>
<s> the difference is that horace accepted his theme with a kind of silken assurance </s>
<s> to dylan and bird it was an agony and terror </s>
<s> i do not believe that this is due to anything especially frightful about their relationship to their own creativity </s>
<s> i believe rather that it is due to the catastrophic world in which that creativity seemed to be the sole value </s>
<s> art may have been for him the most enduring orderly and noble activity of man </s>
<s> but the other activities of his life partook of these values </s>
<s> they did not actively negate them </s>
<s> he was able to find meaning in his art as long as it was the answer to air raids and gas ovens </s>
<s> as the world began to take on the guise of an immense air raid or gas oven i believe his art became meaningless to him </s>
<s> thomas and parker have more in common than theme attitude life pattern </s>
<s> in the practice of their art there is an obvious technical resemblance </s>
<s> contrary to popular belief they were not great technical innovators </s>
<s> their effects are only superficially startling </s>
<s> thomas is a regression from the technical originality and ingenuity of writers like pierre reverdy or apollinaire </s>
<s> similarly the innovations of bop and of parker particularly have been vastly overrated by people unfamiliar with music especially by that ignoramus the intellectual jitterbug the jazz aficionado </s>
<s> the tonal novelties consist in the introduction of a few chords used in classical music for centuries </s>
<s> and there is less rhythmic difference between progressive jazz no matter how progressive and dixieland than there is between two movements of many conventional symphonies </s>
<s> it is true of the rhythmic pattern in which the beat shifts continuously or at least is continuously sprung so that it becomes ambiguous enough to allow the pattern to be dominated by the long pulsations of the phrase or strophe </s>
<s> this is exactly what happened in the transition from baroque to rococo music </s>
<s> it is the difference between bach and mozart </s>
<s> it is not a farfetched analogy to say that this is what thomas did to poetry </s>
<s> the metaphysical conceits which fascinate the reactionary generation still dominant in backwater american colleges were embroideries </s>
<s> this is one difference between bird and dylan which should be pointed out </s>
<s> again contrary to popular belief there is nothing crazy or frantic about parker either musically or emotionally </s>
<s> his sinuous melody is a sort of naive transcendence of all experience </s>
<s> emotionally it does not resemble berlioz or wagner </s>
<s> it resembles mozart </s>
<s> this is true also of a painter like jackson pollock </s>
<s> he may have been eccentric in his behavior but his paintings are as impassive as persian tiles </s>
<s> partly this difference is due to the nature of verbal communication </s>
<s> the insistent talk-aboutiveness of the general environment obtrudes into even the most idyllic poetry </s>
<s> it is much more a personal difference </s>
<s> thomas certainly wanted to tell people about the ruin and disorder of the world </s>
<s> parker and pollock wanted to substitute a work of art for the world </s>
<s> technique pure and simple rendition is not of major importance but it is interesting that parker following lester young was one of the leaders of the so-called saxophone revolution </s>
<s> in modern jazz the saxophone is treated as a woodwind and played with conventional embouchure </s>
<s> i want to make clear what i consider the one technical development in the first wave of significant post-war arts </s>
<s> ornament is confabulation in the interstices of structure </s>
<s> confabulation has come to determine structure </s>
<s> parker certainly had much more of an influence </s>
<s> at one time it was the ambition of every saxophone player in every high school band in america to blow like bird </s>

<s> the main line of development today goes back to lester young and by-passes them </s>
<s> the point is that many of the most impressive developments in the arts nowadays are aberrant idiosyncratic </s>
<s> there is no longer any sense of continuing development of the sort that can be traced from baudelaire to eluard or for that matter from hawthorne through henry james to gertrude stein </s>

<s> in the plastic arts a very similar situation exists </s>

<s> nothing looks anything like an ernst or an arp but another ernst or arp </s>

<s> now there is nothing wrong with complicated wallpaper </s>
<s> there is just more to tiepolo </s>
<s> a process of elimination which leaves the artist with nothing but the play of his materials themselves cannot sustain interest in either artist or public for very long </s>
<s> anglo-saxon and greek epic each provide on two occasions a seemingly authentic account of the narration of verse in the heroic age </s>
<s> nothing in all this is autobiographical unlike the poets of deor and widsith the poet of beowulf is not concerned with his own identity </s>
<s> the poet of the odyssey reputed blind reveals himself not at all in singing of the blind minstrel demodocus </s>
<s> since none of these glimpses of poetizing without writing is intended to incorporate a signature into the epic matter there is prima-facie evidence that beowulf and the homeric poems each derive from an oral tradition </s>
<s> that such a tradition lies behind the iliad and the odyssey at least is hard to deny </s>
<s> milman parry rigorously defended the observation that the extant homeric poems are largely formulaic and was led to postulate that they could be shown entirely formulaic if the complete corpus of greek epic survived </s>
<s> he further reasoned that frequent formulas in epic verse indicate oral composition and assumed the slightly less likely corollary that oral epic is inclined towards the use of formulas </s>
<s> yet a fresh inspection will indicate one crucial amendment beowulf and the homeric poems are not at all formulaic to the same extent </s>
<s> the bondage endurable by an oral poet is to be estimated only by a very skilful oral poet but it appears safe to assume that no sustained narrative in rhyme could be composed without extreme difficulty even in a language of many terminal inflections </s>
<s> assonance seems nearly as severe a curb although in a celebrated passage william of malmesbury declares that a song of roland was intoned before the battle commenced at hastings </s>
<s> the anglo-saxon alliterative line and the homeric hexameter probably imposed less of a restraint </s>
<s> the verse of beowulf or of the iliad and the odyssey was not easy to create but was not impossible for poets who had developed their talents perforce in earning a livelihood </s>
<s> yet certain aids were valuable and quite credibly necessary for reciting long stretches of verse without a pause </s>
<s> the poet in a written tradition who generally never blots a line may once in a while pause and polish without incurring blame </s>
<s> but the oral poet cannot pause </s>
<s> he must improvise continuously with no apparent effort </s>
<s> even though the bondage of his verse is not so great as the writing poet can manage it is still great enough for him often to be seriously impeded unless he has aids to facilitate rapid composition </s>
<s> the germanic poet had such aids in the kennings which provided for the difficulties of alliteration </s>
<s> the homeric poet had epithets which provided for recurring needs in the hexameter </s>
<s> either poet could quickly and easily select words or phrases to supply his immediate requirements as he chanted out his lines because the kennings and the epithets made possible the construction of systems of numerous synonyms for the chief common and proper nouns </s>
<s> other synonyms could of course serve the same function and for the sake of ease i shall speak of kennings and epithets in the widest and loosest possible sense and name for example gar-dene a kenning for the danes </s>
<s> verbal and adverbial elements too participated in each epic diction but it is for the present sufficient to mark the large nominal and adjectival supply of semantic near-equivalents and to designate the members of any system of equivalents as basic formulas of the poetic language </s>
<s> limited to a few thousand lines of heroic verse in anglo-saxon as in the other germanic dialects we cannot say how frequently the kennings in beowulf recurred in contemporary epic on the same soil </s>
<s> but we can say that since a writing poet with leisure before him would seem unlikely to invent a technique based upon frequent and substantial circumlocution the kennings like the epithets must reasonably be ascribed to an oral tradition </s>
<s> one of the greatest homerists of our time frederick m combellack argues that when it is assumed the iliad and the odyssey are oral poems the postulated single redactor called homer cannot be either credited with or denied originality in choice of phrasing </s>
<s> any example of grand or exquisite diction may have been created by the poet who compiled numerous lays into the two works we possess or may be due to one of his completely unknown fellow-craftsmen </s>
<s> the quest of the historical homer is likely never to have further success </s>
<s> no individual word in the iliad or the odyssey can be credited to any one man </s>
<s> no strikingly effective element of speech in the extant poems can with assurance be said not to have been a commonplace in the vaster epic corpus that may have existed at the beginning of the first millennium before christ </s>
<s> this observation is of interest not only to students of homeric poetry but to students of anglo-saxon poetry as well </s>
<s> to the extent that a tale is twice told its final author must be suspect although plagiarism in an oral tradition is less a misdemeanor than the standard modus dicendi </s>
<s> combellack argues further and here he makes his main point that once the iliad and the odyssey are thought formulaic poems composed for an audience accustomed to formulaic poetry homeric critics are deprived of an entire domain they previously found arable </s>
<s> with a few important and a few more unimportant exceptions no expression can be deemed le mot juste for its context because each was very probably the only expression that long-established practice and ease of rapid recitation would allow </s>
<s> words or phrases that connoisseurs have admired as handsome or ironic or humorous must therefore lose merit and become regarded as mere inevitable time-servers sometimes accurate and sometimes not </s>
<s> this observation too may have reference to anglo-saxon poetry </s>
<s> to the extent that a language is formulaic its individual components must be regarded as no more distinguished than other cliches </s>
<s> w f bryan suggests that certain kennings in beowulf were selected sometimes for appropriateness and sometimes for ironic inappropriateness but such a view would appear untenable unless it is denied that the language of beowulf is formulaic </s>
<s> if the master of scops who was most responsible for the poem ever used kennings that were traditional he was at least partly deprived of free will and not inclined towards shrewd and sophisticated misuse of speech elements </s>
<s> once many significant phrases are found in theory or in recurrent practice to provide for prosodic necessity they are not to be defended for their semantic properties in isolated contexts </s>
<s> it is false to be certain of having discovered in the language of beowulf such effects as intentional irony </s>
<s> a formulaic element need not be held meaningless merely because it was selected with little conscious reflection </s>
<s> time-servers though the periphrastic expressions are they may nevertheless be handsome or ironic or humorous </s>
<s> a long evolution in an oral tradition caused the poetic language of the heroic age to be based upon formulas that show the important qualities of things and these formulas are therefore potentially rather than always actually accurate </s>
<s> true we do not know how they were regarded in their day but we need not believe the epic audience to have been more insensitive to the formulas than the numerous scholars of modern times who have read germanic or homeric poetry all their lives and still found much to admire in occasional occurrences of the most familiar phrases </s>
<s> nouns and adjectives in a written tradition are chosen for the nonce </s>
<s> in an oral tradition they may be chosen for the entire epic corpus and tend towards idealization rather than distinctive delineation </s>
<s> reliance is therefore not to be placed upon the archaeological particulars in an oral poem </s>
<s> no-one today would hope to discover the unmistakable ruins of heorot or the palace of priam </s>
<s> a ship at dry-dock could be called a foamy-necked floater in anglo-saxon or a swift ship in greek </s>
<s> achilles like siegfried in the nibelungenlied is potentially the swiftest of men and may accordingly be called swift-footed even when he stands idle </s>
<s> the epic language was not entirely the servant of the poet </s>
<s> it was partly his master </s>
<s> the language however is a proper object of scrutiny and the effects of the language are palpable even if sometimes inevitable </s>
<s> beowulf and the homeric poems appear oral compositions </s>
<s> yet they are written </s>
<s> at some stage in their evolution they were transcribed </s>
<s> albert b lord suggests that the homeric poems were dictated to a scribe by a minstrel who held in his mind the poems fully matured but did not himself possess the knowledge of writing since it would be useless to his guild and magoun argues that the beowulf poet and cynewulf may have dictated their verse in the same fashion </s>
<s> this explanation is attractive but is vitiated at least in part by the observation that cynewulf though he used kennings in the traditional manner was a literate man who four times inscribed his name by runes into his works </s>
<s> if cynewulf was literate the beowulf poet may have been also and so may the final redactor of the iliad and the odyssey </s>
<s> in lieu of the amanuensis to the blind or illiterate bard one may conceive of a man who heard a vast store of oral poetry recited and became intimately familiar with the established aids to poetizing and himself wrote his own compositions or his edition of the compositions of the past </s>
<s> other theories of origin are compatible with the formulaic theory beowulf may contain a design for terror and the iliad may have a vast hysteron-proteron pattern answering to a ceramic pattern produced during the geometric period in pottery </s>
<s> the account of the growth and final transcription of these epics rests partly however upon the degree to which they were formulaic </s>
<s> thus one line in five from the iliad and the odyssey is to be found somewhere else in the two poems </s>
<s> anglo-saxon poetry appears to have no comparable amount of repetition </s>
<s> there is no reason to think that the scop used and re-used whole lines and even lengthy passages after the manner of his homeric colleague </s>
<s> in determining the extent to which any poem is formulaic it is idle however to inspect nothing besides lines repeated in their entirety for a stock of line-fragments would be sufficient to permit the poet to extemporize with deftness if they provided for prosodic needs </s>
<s> the closest scrutiny is owed to the anglo-saxon kennings and the homeric epithets </s>
<s> if any words or phrases are formulaic they will be </s>
<s> the iliad has two words for the shield aspis and sakos </s>
<s> this essay seeks to make that exploration </s>
<s> dickens was not for nothing the most theatrical of the great victorian writers </s>
<s> it is hardly accidental therefore that many of his most vivid figures do suggestive or eccentric things with their hands </s>
<s> in great expectations the hands become almost an obsession </s>
<s> mr jaggers habitually bites his forefinger a gesture which conveys both contempt and the inscrutable abstractedness that half fascinates half terrifies all who have dealings with him </s>
<s> wemmick reveals his self-satisfaction by regularly rubbing his hands together </s>
<s> such associations suit well with the gothic or mystery-story aspects of dickens novel but on a deeper plane they relate to the themes of sin guilt and pursuit that have recently been analyzed by other critics </s>
<s> through such details dickens indicates at the outset that guilt is a part of the ironic bond between pip and magwitch which is so unpredictably to alter both their lives </s>
<s> since they commonly translate thoughts and feelings into deeds hands naturally represent action and since nearly half the characters in great expectations are of the underworld or closely allied to it the linking of hands with crime or violence is not to be wondered at </s>
<s> dickens lays great emphasis on the hands in this scene </s>
<s> but only in one of its aspects is great expectations a tale of violence revenge and retribution </s>
<s> since a gentleman must if possible avoid sullying them by work his hands as importantly as his accent become the index of social status </s>
<s> when on the journey to london that immediately follows he pauses nostalgically to lay his hand upon the finger-post at the end of the village the wooden pointer symbolically designates a spiritual frontier between innocence and the corruption of worldly vanity </s>
<s> a variety of hand movements helps dramatize the moral climate of the fallen world pip encounters beyond the forge </s>
<s> the following items may be specified in actual or symbolic form in the operands of those instructions which refer to the particular items channel unit combined channel and unit combined arm and file unit record synchronizers inquiry synchronizers and alteration switches </s>
<s> continuation cards </s>
<s> thus when specifically permitted the operand of a given line on the autocoder coding sheet may be continued in the operand of from one to four additional lines which immediately follow </s>
<s> ie it must be left-justified in the operand column of the coding sheet </s>
<s> the operand need not extend across the entire operand column of either the header card or continuation cards but may end with the comma following any parameter </s>
<s> remarks may appear to the right of the last parameter on each card provided they are separated from the operand by at least two blank spaces </s>
<s> illustrations of the use of continuation cards are included throughout the examples illustrating the various statements </s>
<s> if a continuation card follows a statement that does not permit continuation cards the compiler will generate a nop and issue an error message </s>
<s> reservation of index words and electronic switches </s>
<s> the initial availability of index words and electronic switches is determined by a table which is included in the compiler systems tape </s>
<s> at the end of this pass the table indicates which index words and electronic switches are not available for assignment to symbolic references </s>
<s> both index words and electronic switches may have been made unavailable before the start of assignment in one of the following ways </s>
<s> the initial setting of the availability table indicated that the index word or electronic switch was not available for assignment </s>
<s> the one- or two-digit number of the index word or electronic switch was used in the operand of an equ statement eg </s>
<s> when the index words or electronic switches are reserved because of actual usage in the statements described above the position or order of the statements within the program is not important </s>
<s> any such reference will make the index word or electronic switch unavailable at the end of this pass </s>
<s> index words and electronic switches may be reserved in the following ways </s>
<s> the first two methods apply to both index words and electronic switches </s>
<s> the third applies only to index words </s>
<s> during the assignment pass each instruction is examined for reference to the symbolic name of an index word or electronic switch </s>
<s> when such a reference is found an actual address is assigned and the availability table is changed so that the assigned index word or switch is no longer available for later assignment </s>
<s> if a statement has been assigned an address in the index word area </s>
<s> by means of an actual label or </s>
<s> by means of an origin statement which refers to an actual address the corresponding index word will be reserved </s>
<s> these entries should normally appear at the beginning of the program or immediately following each litorigin statement </s>
<s> otherwise symbolic names may have previously been assigned to these same index words </s>
<s> the preceding methods allow efficient use of index words and electronic switches during a sectionalized or multi-phase program particularly when used in conjunction with the litorigin statement </s>
<s> extreme caution should be used however to avoid the conflicting usage of an index word or electronic switch which may result from the assignment of more than one name or function to the same address </s>
<s> it will not however be used for symbolic assignment until all other index words or electronic switches have been assigned for the first time </s>
<s> the resultant conflicting usage of index words or electronic switches may be avoided by reducing the number of symbolic names used eg through the proper use of the equ xrelease or srelease statements </s>
<s> declarative statements </s>
<s> autocoder declarative statements provide the processor with the necessary information to complete the imperative operations properly </s>
<s> declarative statements are never executed in the object program and should be separated from the program instruction area placed preferably at its beginning or end </s>
<s> otherwise special care must be taken to branch around them so that the program will not attempt to execute something in a data area as an instruction </s>
<s> if the compiler does encounter such statements a warning message will be issued </s>
<s> da dc dtf and dline require more than one entry </s>
<s> the da statement is used to name and define the positions and length of fields within an area </s>
<s> the dc statement is used to name and enter constants into the object program </s>
<s> when so instructed autocoder will generate one or more rdws and assign them successive locations immediately preceding the area with which they are to be associated </s>
<s> an rdw will be of the form af where xxxx is the starting location of the area and yyyy is its ending location </s>
<s> these addresses are calculated automatically by the processor </s>
<s> in some cases it may be more advantageous to assign locations to rdws associated with da and dc areas in some other part of storage ie not immediately preceding the da or dc areas </s>
<s> the drdw statement may be used for this purpose </s>
<s> the drdw statement may also be used to generate an rdw defining any area specified by the programmer </s>
<s> as many as ten digital switches may be named and provided by the dsw statement for consideration by the setsw and logic macro-instructions </s>
<s> each switch occupies one digit position in a word can be set on or off and is considered as logically equivalent to an electronic switch </s>
<s> it cannot however be referred to by electronic switch commands eg esn bsn etc </s>
<s> an individual switch or the entire set of switches in a word may be tested or altered as desired </s>
<s> through use of the dline statement a means is provided for specifying both the editing of fields to be inserted in a print line area and the layout of the area itself </s>
<s> the area may include constant information supplied by the programmer </s>
<s> the area may also be provided with additional data during the running of the object program by means of edmov or move macro-instructions </s>
<s> the declarative statement equ permits the programmer to equate symbolic names to actual index words electronic switches arm and file numbers tape channel and unit numbers alteration switches etc and to equate a symbol to another symbol or to an actual address </s>
<s> diocs is used to select the major methods of processing to be used and to name the index words used by aj </s>
<s> each tape file must be described by tape file specifications produced by aj </s>
<s> in addition to information related to the file and its records the file specifications contain subroutine locations and the location of tape label information </s>
<s> a duf entry must be supplied for every unit record file describing the type of file and the unit record equipment to be used </s>
<s> the duf also supplies the locations of subroutines written by the user that are unique to the file </s>
<s> this statement also allows the naming of the index words used by aj </s>
<s> source program format </s>
<s> the basic format of the diocs statement is as follows anylabel is any symbolic label </s>
<s> it may be omitted </s>
<s> the entry diocs must be written exactly as shown </s>
<s> the first item in the operand iocsixf is used to specify the first iocs index word for programs using tape files </s>
<s> if the first item in the operand is omitted the symbolic name iocsixf will be assigned </s>
<s> when an actual index word or a symbolic address is specified autocoder will equate the name iocsixf to it </s>
<s> the second item in the operand iocsixg is used to specify the second iocs index word for programs using tape files </s>
<s> if the second item in the operand is omitted the symbolic name iocsixg will be assigned </s>
<s> when an actual index word or a symbolic address is specified autocoder will equate iocsixg to it </s>
<s> in the midwest oxidation ponds are used extensively for the treatment of domestic sewage from suburban areas </s>
<s> the high cost of land and a few operational problems resulting from excessive loadings have created the need for a wastewater treatment system with the operational characteristics of the oxidation pond but with the ability to treat more organic matter per unit volume </s>
<s> since experience indicates that effluents from oxidation ponds do not create major problems at these bod concentrations the goal for the effluent quality of the accelerated treatment system was the same as from conventional oxidation ponds </s>
<s> recent studies by weston and stack had indicated that a turbine aerator could be added to an oxidation pond to increase the rate of oxygen transfer </s>
<s> it appeared from the limited information available that the aerated lagoon might offer a satisfactory means of increasing the capacity of existing oxidation ponds as well as providing the same degree of treatment in a smaller volume </s>
<s> red bridge subdivision </s>
<s> with the development of the red bridge subdivision south of kansas city missouri the developer was faced with the problem of providing adequate sewage disposal </s>
<s> the sewage system from kansas city was not expected to serve the red bridge area for several years </s>
<s> it was possible to maintain aerobic conditions in the pond by regular additions of sodium nitrate until the temperature decreased and the algae population changed from blue-green to green algae </s>
<s> the anaerobic conditions in the existing oxidation pond necessitated examination of other methods for supplying additional oxygen than by sodium nitrate </s>
<s> at the same time further expansion in the red bridge subdivision required the construction of additional sewage treatment facilities </s>
<s> the large land areas required for oxidation ponds made this type of treatment financially unattractive to the developer </s>
<s> it was proposed that aerated lagoons be used to eliminate the problem at the existing oxidation ponds and to provide the necessary treatment for the additional development </s>
<s> pilot lagoon </s>
<s> the lack of adequate data on the aerated lagoon system prompted the developer to construct an aerated lagoon pilot plant to determine its feasibility for treating domestic sewage </s>
<s> the side slopes were coated with fiberglas matting coated with asphalt to prevent erosion </s>
<s> the major contributor was a shopping center with houses being added to the system as the subdivision developed </s>
<s> this operation would permit evaluation of the pilot plant with a slowly increasing load over a reasonable period of time </s>
<s> the aerator had a variable-speed drive to permit operation through a range of speeds </s>
<s> the raw sewage was introduced directly under the turbine aerator to insure maximum mixing of the raw sewage with the aeration tank contents </s>
<s> the effluent was collected through two pipes and discharged to the blue river through a surface drainage ditch </s>
<s> analyses </s>
<s> composite samples were collected at weekly intervals </s>
<s> the long retention period and the complete mixing concept prevented rapid changes in either the mixed liquor or in the effluent </s>
<s> weekly samples would make any changes more readily discernible than daily samples </s>
<s> grab samples were collected from the existing oxidation pond to determine its operating conditions </s>
<s> pilot plant operations </s>
<s> the bod of the raw sewage was typical of domestic sewage from a subdivision </s>
<s> the periods of high effluent bod occurred during cold periods when operational problems with the aerator resulted </s>
<s> ice caused the aerator to overload straining the drive belts </s>
<s> the slippage of the drive belts caused the aerator to slow down and reduce oxygen transfer as well as the mixing of the raw sewage </s>
<s> it seems that the aerated lagoon was a very heavily loaded oxidation pond or a lightly loaded activated sludge system </s>
<s> with the spring rains the flow rose rapidly due to infiltration in open sewers </s>
<s> as construction progresses the volume of storm drainage will be sharply reduced </s>
<s> the large amount of vegetable grindings from the grocery store in the shopping center created a suspended solids problem </s>
<s> the vegetables were not readily metabolized by the bacteria in the aeration unit and tended to float on the surface </s>
<s> a skimming device at the effluent weir prevented loss of most of these light solids </s>
<s> variations in aerator speeds during the latter two months of this study caused increased mixing and increased oxygen demand </s>
<s> it appeared that most of the mixed liquor suspended solids were active microbial solids with the heavier less active solids settling out </s>
<s> the suspended solids discharged in the effluent were found to be the major source of the aj </s>
<s> this low bod was due to removal of the excess suspended solids by sedimentation since the only dilution was surface runoff which was very low during this study </s>
<s> microscopic examination </s>
<s> routine microscopic examinations were made of the mixed liquor as indicated by mckinney and gram for the various types of protozoa </s>
<s> it was found that the aerated lagoon was an activated sludge system rather than an oxidation pond </s>
<s> at no time were algae found in the mixed liquor </s>
<s> the bacteria formed typical activated sludge floc </s>
<s> the floc particles were all small as the heavier floc settled out </s>
<s> initially the flagellated protozoa predominated but they soon gave way to the free swimming ciliated protozoa </s>
<s> as the temperature decreased the number of free swimming ciliated protozoa decreased </s>
<s> but as the temperature rose the numbers of protozoa increased rapidly </s>
<s> only once were stalked ciliates found in the mixed liquor </s>
<s> the predomination of free swimming ciliated protozoa is indicative of a high bacterial population </s>
<s> oxygen transfer </s>
<s> one of the important aspects of this study was to determine the oxygen transfer relationships of the mechanical aerator </s>
<s> routine determinations were made for dissolved oxygen in the mixed liquor and for oxygen uptake rates </s>
<s> an extended cold spell caused ice to build up on the aerator which was mounted on a floating platform and caused the entire platform to sink lower in the water </s>
<s> the added resistance to the rotor damaged the drive belts and reduced the oxygen transfer capacity </s>
<s> it was approximately one month before the belt problem was noticed and corrected but at no time was there a deficiency of dissolved oxygen </s>
<s> a series of eight special tests were conducted at different rotor speeds to determine the oxygen transfer rate </s>
<s> five of the tests were conducted with a polyethylene cover to simulate an ice cover </s>
<s> oxidation pond </s>
<s> during this study septic conditions developed in the oxidation pond in the spring when the ice melted </s>
<s> shortly after this study ended septic conditions resulted which required the addition of sodium nitrate </s>
<s> the location of the oxidation pond in a high-value residential area makes odor nuisances a sensitive problem for the developer </s>
<s> microscopic examination of the effluent showed that minimum bod occurred when the algae began to decrease with cold weather </s>
<s> when the algae began to build up again the effluent bod rose </s>
<s> thus the three main categories of antisubmarine warfare operations are defense of shipping defense of naval forces and area defense </s>
<s> the last category overlaps the others in amphibious operations and near terminals and bases </s>
<s> surface forces have been used to provide defense zones around naval and merchant ship formations air to furnish area surveillance and mines for protection of limited areas </s>
<s> submarines and shore installations are new elements </s>
<s> the submarine now has a definite place in submarine defense particularly in denying enemy access to ocean areas </s>
<s> fixed installations offer possibilities for area detection </s>
<s> mine warfare is being reoriented against submarine targets </s>
<s> a sixth element not always considered is intelligence </s>
<s> it includes operational intelligence of the enemy and knowledge of the environment </s>
<s> operational intelligence presumably will be available from our national intelligence agencies </s>
<s> intelligence on the environment will come from the recently augmented program in oceanography </s>
<s> the major postwar development is the certainty that these elements should not be considered singly but in combination and as being mutually supporting </s>
<s> necessity for an over-all concept </s>
<s> thinking on submarine defense has not always been clear-cut </s>
<s> proponents of single elements tend to ensure predominance of that element without determining if it is justified and the element with the most enthusiastic and vociferous proponents has assumed the greatest importance </s>
<s> consequently air surface and submarine elements overshadow the mine fixed installations and intelligence </s>
<s> these have sought more and more of what they have </s>
<s> each seems to strive for elimination of the necessity for the others </s>
<s> this despite postwar experience demonstrating that all elements are necessarily mutually supporting </s>
<s> thus the most productive areas are not necessarily the most stressed </s>
<s> this is stated to emphasize the necessity for an over-all concept of submarine defense one which would provide positions of relative importance to asw elements based on projected potentialities </s>
<s> then the enthusiasm and energy of all elements can be channeled to produce cumulative progress toward a common objective </s>
<s> an over-all concept would have other advantages </s>
<s> it would allow presentation to the public of a unified approach </s>
<s> now the problem is presented piecemeal and sometimes contradictorily </s>
<s> while one element is announcing progress another is delineating its problems </s>
<s> the result can only be confusion in the public mind </s>
<s> a unified concept can serve as a guide to budgeting and if public support is gained will command congressional support </s>
<s> lacking guidance industry picks its own areas </s>
<s> the result coupled with the salesmanship for which american industry is famous is considerable expenditure of funds and efforts in marginal areas </s>
<s> an over-all concept will guide industry where available talents and facilities will yield greatest dividends </s>
<s> principles involved in an over-all concept </s>
<s> that which follows will be a discussion of principles and possible content for an over-all concept of antisubmarine warfare </s>
<s> russia possesses the preponderance of submarines in the world divided between her various fleets </s>
<s> some are also in albania and others are on loan to egypt </s>
<s> other countries which may willingly or unwillingly become communist can furnish bases </s>
<s> communist target areas can be assumed but there is no certainty that such assumptions coincide with soviet intentions </s>
<s> attack can come from almost any direction against many locations </s>
<s> logically then the first principle of the plan must be that it is not rigidly oriented toward any geographical area </s>
<s> it is often stated that the submarine can be destroyed while building at bases in transit and on station </s>
<s> in transit or on station it may not be possible to attack the submarines until commission of an overt act </s>
<s> the communists are adept at utilizing hostilities short of general war and will do so whenever it is to their advantage </s>
<s> therefore the second principle of the plan must be that while providing for all-out hostilities its effectiveness is not dependent on general war </s>
<s> antisubmarine warfare does not involve clashes between large opposing forces with the decision a result of a single battle </s>
<s> it is a war of attrition of single actions of an exchange of losses </s>
<s> this exchange must result in our ending up with some effective units </s>
<s> therefore the third principle of the plan must be that it does not depend for effectiveness on engagement by the same types unless at an assured favorable exchange rate </s>
<s> its speed has increased it operates at increasingly greater depths its submerged endurance is becoming unlimited and it will become even more silent </s>
<s> the next developments will probably be in weaponry </s>
<s> the missile can gradually be expected to replace the torpedo </s>
<s> as detection ranges increase weapons will be developed to attack other submarines and surface craft at these ranges </s>
<s> therefore the fourth principle of the plan must be that it provide for continuously increasing capabilities in the opponent </s>
<s> no element can accomplish the total objective of submarine defense </s>
<s> some elements support the others but all have limitations </s>
<s> some limitations of one element can be compensated for by a capability of another </s>
<s> elements used in combination will increase the over-all capability more than the sum of the capabilities of the individual elements </s>
<s> conceivably the submarine defense problem can be solved by sufficient forces </s>
<s> numbers would be astronomical and current fiscal policies make this an impractical solution </s>
<s> shipbuilding aircraft procurement and weapon programs indicate that there will not be enough of anything </s>
<s> therefore any measures taken in peacetime which will decrease force requirements in war will contribute greatly to success when hostilities occur </s>
<s> therefore the sixth principle of the plan must be that it concentrate on current measures which will reduce future force requirements </s>
<s> the world is constantly changing </s>
<s> what was new yesterday is obsolescent today </s>
<s> the seventh principle of the plan is self-evident </s>
<s> it must be flexible enough to allow for technological breakthroughs scientific progress and changes in world conditions </s>
<s> supporting elements in asw operations </s>
<s> to this point the need for an over-all plan for submarine defense has been demonstrated the mission has been stated broad principles delineating its content laid down and the supporting elements listed </s>
<s> before considering these elements in more detail an additional requirement should be stated </s>
<s> large area coverage will accomplish all other tasks </s>
<s> therefore because reduction in tasks results in reduction of forces required the plan should provide for expanding area coverage </s>
<s> but it must be remembered that the plan should not be oriented geographically </s>
<s> since effective area coverage appears fairly remote the requirement can be borne in mind while considering the elements air surface sub-surface fixed installations mines and intelligence </s>
<s> these are arranged approximately in the order of the vociferousness of their proponents but will be discussed in the reverse order in the hope that the true order of importance will result </s>
<s> intelligence as used herein will include information on possible opponents and on the environment which can affect operations </s>
<s> these can be referred to as operational intelligence and environmental intelligence </s>
<s> in submarine defense these must have maximum stress </s>
<s> good operational intelligence can ensure sound planning greatly reduce force requirements and increase tactical effectiveness </s>
<s> environmental intelligence is just as important </s>
<s> the ocean presently co-operates with the target </s>
<s> full knowledge of the science of oceanography can bring the environment to our side resulting in an increase in effectiveness of equipment and tactics a decrease in enemy capabilities and the development of methods of capitalizing on the environment </s>
<s> therefore improved intelligence will result in reduced force requirements and as it supports all other elements rates a top priority </s>
<s> gathering intelligence is important but of equal importance is its translation into usable form </s>
<s> a program is needed to translate the results of oceanographic research into tactical and operating instructions </s>
<s> approaching this problem on a statistical basis is invalid because the opponent has the same sources available and will be encountered not under average conditions but under the conditions most advantageous to him </s>
<s> therefore the on-the-scene commander must have detailed operating instructions based on measurement of conditions in the area at the time of encounter </s>
<s> all capabilities must be used to maximum advantage then </s>
<s> temperature wind oxygen content depth bottom character and animal life are the chief environmental variables </s>
<s> there may be others </s>
<s> variations in sound velocity should be measured rather than temperature because more of the variables would be encompassed </s>
<s> these variations must eventually be measured horizontally as well as vertically </s>
<s> progress in predicting water conditions is encouraging but little guidance is available to the man at sea on the use of such information </s>
<s> a concurrent effort is needed to make oceanographic data useful on the spot </s>
<s> mine warfare has in the past been directed against surface targets </s>
<s> by its nature it has always been of great psychological advantage and small efforts have required considerably greater counter-efforts </s>
<s> mines are being increasingly oriented against submarine targets </s>
<s> they are still considered to be for use in restricted waters however and targets must come within a few yards of them </s>
<s> mines need to be recognized as a major element in anti-submarine warfare employment extended to deep water and have their effective area per unit increased </s>
<s> mines can be used to deny access to great areas </s>
<s> they are difficult to counter cost little to maintain until required and can be put into place quickly </s>
<s> a most attractive feature is that detection and attack are combined in a single package </s>
<s> effective employment will reduce force requirements </s>
<s> for example effective mine barriers from florida to cuba and across the yucatan channel from cuba to mexico would remove all requirements for harbor defense inshore patrol convoy escort shipping control and mine defense for the entire gulf of mexico </s>
<s> more extended systems covering all passage into the caribbean would free the caribbean and the gulf of mexico from the previously listed requirements </s>
<s> systems covering the gulf of st lawrence and possibly the entire coasts of the united states are not impossible </s>
<s> such mine defense systems could permit concentration of mobile forces in the open oceans with consequent increase in the probability of success </s>
<s> the advantages inherent in mine warfare justify as great an importance for this element as is accorded any of the other elements </s>
<s> fixed installations are increasingly advocated as the problem of area defense emerges </s>
<s> the proponents are scientific and technical men who exercise considerable influence on their military counterparts </s>
<s> mobile forces are required to localize and attack detected targets since the systems are not capable of pinpointing a target </s>
<s> such systems are expensive and are oriented geographically </s>
<s> in an over-all asw concept dependence on and effort expended for such systems should be limited to those with proven capabilities </s>
<s> no general installation should be made until a model installation has been proved and its maximum capability determined </s>
<s> in addition proposals for fixed installations should be carefully weighed against a counterpart mobile system </s>
<s> fixed installations will always lack the flexibility that should be inherent in naval systems </s>
<s> the submarine has become increasingly attractive as an antisubmarine weapon system </s>
<s> but the submarine is a weapon of ambush and therefore always in danger of being ambushed </s>

<s> chemical studies are being pursued with the cooperation of kg untch </s>

<s> continuum mechanics and viscoelasticity </s>
<s> theory of non-newtonian fluids </s>
<s> by strengthening the differentiability assumption it has been possible to derive second and higher order theories of viscoelasticity </s>
<s> in the second-order theory one of the normal stress differences can be calculated from the first-order stress relaxation function </s>
<s> as many as seven decades of the time scale were thus covered isothermally </s>
<s> the simple time-temperature equivalence valid for many amorphous systems did not hold here </s>
<s> it was possible however to decompose the compliance into a sum of a frequency-independent component and two viscoelastic mechanisms each compatible with the boltzmann superposition principle and with a consistent set of time-temperature equivalence factors </s>
<s> geochemistry </s>
<s> trace elements in tektites meteorites and related materials </s>
<s> libyan desert silica-glass another natural glass is composed of nearly pure silica and has the same trace germanium content as sands in the area </s>
<s> the gallium content however has been enhanced five-fold </s>
<s> this glass is probably formed from libyan desert sands by comet or stony-meteorite impact </s>
<s> nickel-iron meteorites with sufficient kinetic energy to produce large terrestrial explosion craters may nevertheless melt only small quantities of material </s>
<s> most of the impact energy is spent in crushing and fragmentation </s>
<s> when rapid quenching follows melting impact glasses may result </s>
<s> these always contain metallic inclusions </s>
<s> impact glasses not containing elemental nickel-iron may have been produced by stony meteorites or comets </s>
<s> no meteorites have ever been recovered from paleoexplosion craters and recent craters containing impact glass have all been produced by metallic meteorites with the exception of aouelloul crater adrar western sahara desert </s>
<s> this crater contains impact glass with no metallic inclusions and no meteoritic material has been recovered </s>
<s> inorganic chemistry </s>
<s> preparation of a coordination compound is often accomplished by the simple method of reacting a metal salt with a ligand in a suitable solvent such as an alcohol </s>
<s> by applying this general principle a great number of complex compounds of osmium ruthenium iridium and rhenium with triphenylphosphine triphenylarsine and triphenylstibine have been obtained in this laboratory during the past few years </s>
<s> recent work with radiocarbon and deuterated alcohols as solvents however has given evidence that metal-hydrido and carbonyl complexes may be readily formed by reaction with alcohol in some of these systems </s>
<s> particular interest is directed towards the condensation of these ligands with metal halides to form substituted phosphide or arside complexes </s>
<s> the structures properties and reactions of these compounds are being studied </s>
<s> in another study chromium-substituted aluminum oxyhydroxides and related species prepared homogeneously by high-temperature hydrolysis are being characterized and investigated spectrally in the ultraviolet region with a view to identification and semiquantitative estimation of the phases formed under varying preparative conditions </s>
<s> structure and properties of macromolecules </s>
<s> elasticity of macromolecular networks </s>
<s> simple elongation has been treated in detail </s>
<s> the various stress-temperature coefficients for constancy of volume and strain constancy of pressure and strain and constancy of pressure and length have been interrelated </s>
<s> the dilation accompanying elongation and the simultaneously developed anisotropy of compressibility have been related to the elongation </s>
<s> in continuation of these theoretical studies a more precise elucidation of the effects of imperfections in network structure is sought </s>
<s> the mean-square end-to-end distance of the polyisobutylene chain has been calculated in reasonable agreement with values deduced from viscosity data </s>
<s> these studies are being extended to different polymers to increase our knowledge about the hindrances to rotation around chain bonds </s>

<s> the complex morphology of polycrystalline homopolymers is necessarily dependent on the same factor </s>
<s> hence the present studies offer a possible basis for interpretations in the latter field </s>
<s> contraction of muscle </s>
<s> experiments carried out over long periods of time in order to allow establishment of a steady state have shown that the onset of contraction and its completion are confined to an interval of several degrees centigrade and to a concentration range of only several per cent </s>
<s> the contraction therefore partakes of the character of a phase transition </s>
<s> while atp appears to be necessary for the occurrence of contraction its presence and enzymatic hydrolysis of it by the muscle protein myosin are not the only criteria for contraction </s>
<s> a simple process for the preparation of nearly monodisperse polystyrene of predictable molecular weight has been developed </s>
<s> the preparation of such products is not new but the systems heretofore employed in polymerizations have commanded considerable experimental skill and starting materials of a high purity </s>

<s> substances </s>
<s> all crystalline substances and other solid-state materials </s>
<s> properties </s>
<s> the aim is to collect a very broad range of physical chemical morphological and structural data for crystals on an encyclopedic scale and to seek all possible useful and revealing correlations of properties with internal structure </s>
<s> sources of data </s>
<s> the first stage of operation has centered on the literature imaging of critical or summarizing tabulations such as the barker index </s>
<s> coverage of primary literature will follow </s>

<s> criticality </s>

<s> however the proposed correlation of the many interrelated properties of crystals will reveal discrepancies in the recorded data and suggest areas for reinvestigation </s>
